title: New model does not support ADT Pulse, but old model does. New model does not support Apple HomeKit.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: PLTOUS
content: Works, records..but...doesn't record every movement in front of camera, records all unwanted events, night vision is good, but not for far away, and app needs some work. As of 12/19 app cant pause events on pop up screen. If I choose to pause motion detection for 15 minutes or any other option on pop up meme, it just doesn't work anymore. I have to go to app and choose from that option to make it work. Also, it should be easier to get to "view" menu.
title: Good system with a lot of paranoid users

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michael H
content: This is an amazing security addition!  Easy set up, HD camera provides excellent detail, works flawlessly with my Ring Alarm, Echo Show and IPhone.  Sensitivity and coverage area adjustments let you eliminate any unwanted/false activations.  Just having one on my front door is an excellent burglar and "package theft" deterrent - they know I can see them immediately before they even get to my front porch and question them before I set my alarm off & call the police!
title: Amazing Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gabby
content: Purchased to add “eyes” to the side door where most guests enter. Our neighbor has a Ring doorbell and highly recommended this item. So far I’m actually a tad displeased with the moton sensitivity adjustment. Seems to detect motion better at some times and not so great at other times. Haven’t mapped out the inconsistencies well enough yet to tell if it’s a weather-related issue or defective product. Also whenever it detects motion I cannot access the device from my phone to see what it sees without multiple steps through the app to get to the live view feature. Resolution is not great with the basic $99 model. The extra $100 might be a worthwhile upgrade to get actual 1080p resolution. All in all still a dramatic improvement over a peep hole in the door.
title: The $99 version might not be so awesome

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Grumpy Old Man
content: The device needed to be installed about 4ft above the sidewalk, so I had to make a fixture to hide the wire that I had to snake up from the old doorbell spot to the new spot. Luckily I am have hobby woodworking so that was no problem. Device was incredibly simple to setup. I am still trying to find the "sweet spot" for motion detection as I still get the cars going by at times. I don;t think we have actually talked to anyone at the door through the app yet,  so don;t even know if that works or not...
title: Yet another gadget, but kinda like it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bonnie Gonzalez
content: I have 2 issues with this doorbell. I purchased the ring 2 about a month ago. 1. It misses motion, I have missed 2 major incidents outside my house. A car flipped over and my son falling on my stairs.  And the 2nd issue is that I hard wired this to not have to keep charging it and after a week the battery is dead and it takes 12 hours to get a full charge. so one night a week I have no ring doorbell! I am disconnecting it and returning it!
title: battery doesnt stay charged

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: August Dog
content: Installed the Ring 2 initially as battery only. It pretty much connected itself to WIFI. But if you have a lot of traffic past it the battery is depleted fast. I got a second battery but it was still time consuming to swap them out. We didn’t have an existing doorbell that I could hook it to. But I got a 16 V standalone transformer that plugs into an electrical plug-in and hooked it to the connections in the Ring 3. No more battery swapping!!
title: Satisfied after some adjustments

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mike Buck
content: Mostly, I just love that it works exactly as advertised and is easy to install and use. We replaced our existing doorbell with this, so we have it powered by the existing wires. Battery should only ever be needed in a power outage. Get a nice clear picture, stores events, and the app is well designed (we also love the "Neighboorhood" feature). Only real issue is that my voice breaks up when I try speaking to someone at the door. Voice and video coming from the doorbell, however, is perfectly fine.
title: Loving this so far.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mary
content: Update: 05Aug2020 Ring updated their software long time ago and added the settings/feature that I was looking for the Ring camera. Original Review: 29Mar2020 Hi Ring, my home is facing where the sun rises and also a not so busy street. Every morning when the shadow of the cars are long, it reaches the area where i want the motion to be sense. With that i need to snooze the motion every morning for two hours and another hour after that which is kind of inconvenience to do every day. With my wyze camera, I can set a schedule on when I want to detect motion. I think that is an easy fix in your software. Until you add that option I will keep this 1 star.
title: Need user interface update.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Crystal Pugh
content: I love this doorbell! We’ve only had one issue- if I get an alert that there is motion or someone at the door and click the alert to go to live view, sometimes when I go back in to view the saved video it’s blank. It still has the Ring watermark, but the video is black and there is no sound for the length of the video. I’ve found one way to avoid this happening as often is to not click on the alert to go to live view and wait for the video to process then watch it. This works the majority of the time. Other than that, I like it, but this problem is a bit annoying.
title: Love it- with one caveat

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Matthew Morse
content: The Ring 2 Doorbell is great!! Glad I waited for the Gen-2 as the video quality is greatly improved. The rechargeable battery is great and has good life (I do not have a powered doorbell line in my 70-yr old house). It also mates up to the remote chime unit easily (also recommend for having a doorbell chime in the back of the house if you cannot hear the main chime). Only after one week of use the Ring 2 has paid for itself in managing home deliveries to solicitors! Best choice for interactive capability to respond to visitors. I've used Nestcam, but this truly is more human friendly and does the job of the front door monitor right!
title: Ring Pays for Itself!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Darren Gozy
content: Do yourself a favor and spend 30 seconds and look at their own community forum. 100's if not 1000's of people reporting the same problems over and over with no solution provided for months now. The audio volume is so low you cannot hear the caller and the caller cannot hear you. Spent time with their support to troubleshoot, rebooted routers, reinstalled the  application, had them access the unit remotely, they even sent me a new unit. Still, the audio is so low on my Galaxy s9+ that I cannot understand a single word. Same results on an iPhone and iPad. The only thing that does work is the Alexa devices, the audio is loud enough when asking Alexa to talk to the front door, but the audio quality is very very poor.  There was a fix (or workaround) in earlier releases of the software where you could disable the timeline event viewer and the audio would be usable, however newer releases have removed the ability to turn it off.  Those problems aside, there is also a lag between when motion is detected and the live view is displayed on my phone. By the time it connects the person at the door is walking away most of the time. Would be a great product if they would fix the software.
title: Audio is too low, I mean really low. No fix in site.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sandi
content: I had a SkyBell originally. Worked fine at first but then spotty and quit completely after a few months. I replaced with the ring and have had no issues. Video and WiFi is way better.  Not real happy about having to pay a monthly fee but in the long run I would rather pay the $3 and have a working video bell then free and the doorbell not working. I like the neighborhood alerts also. Would recommend. Bought one for a family member for Christmas.
title: Would recommend and buy again.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brian.
content: This door will is terrible. Please avoid this and go with another company if you're looking for a video doorbell. The past month it hasn't been picking up people coming up to our porch leaving packages, walking past my vehicles, nothing. But it'll pick up a car driving by. Don't waste your money. Unfortunately it's too late to return it. Also, the app. It's flooded with people who don't have a Ring flooding using it as a discussion board. Again. Do not purchase.
title: Dont. Purchase.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TDE
content: I like the ring devices I’ve had them for at least six years now I have a month to locations of my houses at two different locations and they serve me well when I’m not there and report right to my phone I have two on one house and six on another one and I make everyone feel safe along with my wife and children.  These are very easy to install and operate and receive messages and talk to people live even when you’re thousands of miles away it’s the best device that I have used in a long time now there’s a bunch of cops and catch out there
title: Very easy to install very easy to operate and you feel safe and secure and you get alerts everytime

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Zuukz
content: Nice but can't view on the Echo Show 5 as the wifi signal just isn't strong enough even with the Chime Pro. I have a wifi security camera 50 plus feet away, mounted outside and must transmit thru a brick wall and several interior walls and it has no problem. The Chime Pro is only about 18 feet from the Ring 2 and 9 feet from the wifi router and still no "Live" view. It does pick up motion/rings just fine and records them..just no "Live" view.
title: Ring 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chris S
content: We have a recessed doorway so the quality in the evening/night isn't great. Can't deduct stars since that is not Ring's fault. We'll probably get some cameras in the future since this first product has worked well in the two months we've had it. Battery life seems fairly long though it does take quite a while to charge and doesn't show you when it's fully charged (despite saying that it is supposed to). It's nice to have a little added security around the house. We didn't even have a doorbell to begin with. We've used this already a couple of times due to some delivery issues we had been having. I think the 2 is great if you just want basic security. We'll probably get a pro in the future though.
title: Long lasting battery. Not great for recessed doorways.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alejandro Garcia
content: Much improved camera over the first generation stick-up camera. This one connects directly to your existing door bell power supply, so no charging, even though it still needs the battery to operate. Took me about 20 minutes to get it installed. Works as promised. I would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for their customer support. I have been trying to transfer my existing prepaid cloud recording account to the new camera and it has been frustrating to say the least. A couple of years ago customer service was excellent, now, I cannot even talk to anybody. Last time I called, waited for over 20 minutes only to get disconnected. I guess the company got so big that they don't care about the customer any more. So if you want to spend a bunch of time waiting for somebody to answer the phone, only to get disconnected, then by all means this is for you. I am going to try to call them again and will update my review based on my experience.
title: Improved from previous Stick-up camera, but ....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Deborah A Rhea
content: I love the Ring Doorbell 2. I know who is at the door without needing to open the door and I can answer the door even when I'm not home. Coupled with Amazon Alexa device, it's loud enough to scare a predator away when their motion is detected even if they don't ring the bell. Ring Doorbell 2 also gives me control of how close it far to ty...i set motion detection as well. I feel much safer now and with the"Neighbors" set, I can see what, if any, potential bad guys are nearby (suspicious characters, thieves, burglars, robbers, vandals). I caught a would be burglar on one if mine and police looking for him now with the detailed pic. Love the product and plan to get a third for another door.
title: Love The Ring Doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Redmond jack
content: We have been very happy with the operation of the Ring2, The installation was easy and there are not a lot of false videos.  We like the fact that when Fed Ex, etc. show up we know without having to continually go look outside when we are expecting things.  We hope we can catch a porch pirate one day.  When I got the package I thought this is going to be very involved to set it up.  That was not the case at all and it seemed more complicated because of the various options.
title: Ring2 is very nice

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Albert F. Collins Jr.
content: Only buy this product if you are going to buy the ‘premium’ service other wise you are paying for a overpriced doorbell that chimes your phone & gives you 5 seconds to view what triggered the chime... but wait.... the time lag is over 5 seconds so all you get is the reminder that your 30 day free trial is over & you should really buy the service. NOT REcoMmEnd! DO NOT BUY! Glad I only got ripped off for $99 instead of the normal price. I have great WiFi service - use BLINK which does record without charging you, they have a premium service as well but not needed to view events.
title: Do not buy!!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John F. Pollinger
content: One of the first things I purchase after buying a new home was this product. Initially, the set up was easy. And then it started. No activation with someone at the door. Tried to work through the problem. Reset, WiFI extender, network resets, deleting and adding the unit again, starting over, contacting customer support, factory reset, called customer support, battery reset, failure again, called customer support, turned setting notifications off and on and finally told if it stops working I should turn off and turn on the notifications. What the heck good does that do if it doesn't detect someone at the door while I'm at work and not knowing it stopped working yet again?  I'm disputing the charge on my credit card. Perhaps that will spur some action.
title: Defective Unit and Defective Customer support solutions

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Miss V
content: Great health to you and your families. Stay safe.😷 All of you who work so hard. Thank you.  I Love this product, it's keeping my family safe.  I can interact quickly when someone is at my door when I am out. You can share with other Ring owners.  I live in Public Housing.  This and upgrade for me and I am blown away with the advantages of this device.  I intend to  add cameras in the apartment as well.  The Ring is on a neighbors door on another floor it saved someones life.  She was being robbed and while fighting  back the guys face was caught on camera.  He was found and  arrested and is in prison as we speak. I recommend this product all the time to my neighbors and others outside of my community.  We can sleep a little better. The night vision has been used.  However, the electricity in the building  has failed on several occasions.  I'll let you know.  Hopefully,  I won't have to review that part.  Sincerely VR
title: I can see you.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jozmin
content: What a disappointment.  Bought as a Christmas gift for my partner. After 1 month I had to call customer service because the battery would not charge even though its hardwired. After hours on the phone (and some really bad customer service reps) they sent me out a new battery A month after the initial call, i had to call yet again because my battery is STILL not charging and all notifications are a black screen. Again, dealing with customer service is a joke. Very condescending and a lot of smoke and mirrors. So a recap, I'm just over 2 months in and I've already had to call twice for problems. I have family that has the same doorbell and they have not had problems but all the ring customer service representatives want to do is make stuff up as to why it's not working. The delay in the motion sensor is ridiculous. half the time we dont even see what triggered the sensor. I regret my decision to ever buy this doorbell. Waste of money and the company doesnt back their product they just treat you like crap.
title: Regretful

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: P Molloy
content: The video is fine but as soon as our trial period ended and we started paying for monthly services, things stopped working. We no longer have snapshot capture. I called customer service and they were worthless. Then I was told that they were having their technical team look into it and I would get an email with in 24 hours as to what the problem was. Needless to say I never heard from anyone and that was well over a week ago. Not sure what their scam is but it seems funny that as soon as we start paying for something we don’t get it. So we are paying for features we no long have. Do your research before buying this product. There may be something better out there. I know I’m going to be looking for a replacement product that offers way better service. Also it takes so long for the video to come up on my phone that by the time you get it open and working, whoever rang your doorbell is probably gone. Very disappointed.
title: Poor customer service, slow app response time. Do your research.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: rg
content: Great product, well engineered and easy to setup. The smartphone interface is pretty good as well. However, I wish there was some better integration with regular old desktop web browsers. You can NOT see the Live view from a regular web browser on a desktop/laptop. I have a small touchscreen all-in-one mounted on the wall next to the door and it would be nice if I could setup the doorbell to automatically show the video feed from the doorbell as soon as the doorbell rings. The other use-case for this is that most folks who buy this likely sit near a computer at work and they can very quickly just check the video on their web browser instead of fumbling around on their phone.
title: Great product, well engineered and easy to setup

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Re View
content: It's easy to install and very user friendly. The ability to share videos with your neighbors is a huge plus. Additionally, the ability to easily share videos with law enforcement when a crime occurs is very convenient. Ring 2 does not allow the user the ability to modify the motion range. It's preset so if a flag or a tree is within your range, your phone will be notifying you on a daily basis.  It would be nice if the motion range could be modified by the user. Overall, it's easy to use and gets the job done.
title: User Friendly

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bonnie
content: I love the quality of the view that I can see no matter where I am.. Best view of my entire cul de sac. I can talk to the person at my door from my phone. My husband also has the app installed so he can rest assured I got home safely. He can also check our front door day or night. It even has a noise setting that sounds like heavy dog barking when the person rings the bell.if you would like that. I like this so much I have purchased a second one for my daughter who just bought her first home.
title: Good quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JNicholas
content: I didn’t realize that you have to enroll to see even a clip of who rang your doorbell . I didn’t enroll after I purchased the Amazon cloud cam but at least I get clips that I can review. When you are at work you silence your phone. So it’s really pointless to get this device unless you are constantly looking at your phone or tablet or you pay monthly fee to know who’s at your door. I will be checking other device to see.
title: Subscribe or NO VIDEO clips

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Taylor
content: HOW DID WE LIVE WITHOUT THIS! What you need to know: Ring is a doorbell that has a camera. It allows you to talk to people knocking on your door or nearby and records every time people come past your door. You can select the area it will respond to, so you won’t have to worry about passerby’s. It costs $3 a month for cloud storage of video. This price increases with the amount of cameras. We have one in the front and the floodlight cam in the back. The app is seamless and easy to use. We get alerts on our phones and we have a doorbell chime. My only complaint is that the battery has decreased 20% since we installed it about 2 weeks ago. I wish the battery was longer lasting but I understand it’s rechargeable. LOVE this thing!
title: More than a doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J.Ordaz
content: The Ring2 video doorbell works quite nicely...it compliments your exterior with 2 color options...its mounts securely and is easy to install... The video is quality and its functions easy to use with the app installed on your device The only issue I would have is the access to your video by law enforcement w/o consent but as of yet has not occurred to my knowledge... I highly recommend the Ring and its  coproducts as a way to monitor your residence at or away from home...
title: Ring2 Video doorbell works quite well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Norman
content: I have been using Ring Doorbell 2 for at least 2 months.  Here are my good and bad experiences: 1) Good. Battery operated. I can mount Ring 2 right in the center of my door. So that I can see straight out who is in front of my front door. 2) Good. Battery life. It is at 73% after 2 months. My usage is not heavy neither light. I have daily mail delivery and weekly front yard work. 3) Good. Neighborhood community allows you to see incidences/warnings posted by neighbors. 4) Bad. It is not obvious as a doorbell. Other than my own testing, it was used only once by a mailwoman in the whole 2 months. Most people still rang my old doorbell or just knock. Somehow, I believe, to most people, it does not look like a doorbell and the word “RING” does not tell people that it is a doorbell. 5) Bad. Speaker won’t work if the Ring 2 wasn’t pressed firmly or long enough. You still can listen but not able to talk through the speaker. I will have to use the “LIVE VIEW” quickly in order to speak to the person who pressed the doorbell too lightly. Ring 2 button was not designed to make pressing it easily either, at least not as easily as the traditional doorbells. It is too big for the index finger. I used my thumb to press it most of the time during my testing. 6) Bad. Motion sensing is unreliable. Most of the time, Ring 2 can detect the motions within certain distance. But every once for a while it will miss completely. As an example: My wife was watering the front flowerbeds yesterday. As expected she triggered the motion sensor at least 4 to 5 times. She also triggered it when she walked through the front door into the house. But not all the times! Once, she walked through the front door and got inside the house completely without triggering Ring 2. No notification, no recording. At the same spot, I also have a motion sensor camera installed. It is part of my home security system. It uses the same wifi router. My security system motion sensor camera triggered every time including the events missed by Ring 2. 7) Bad. Cannot pre-record before the triggering event. My home security system camera can be programmed to record how much ahead of the triggering event. In summary, Ring 2 is not reliable and therefore cannot be relied upon as a security device. I use it only as a supplement to my existing security system. It does not fulfill as a doorbell either per problems listed above. The only positive thing about it is the neighborhood community feature to share warning videos and map locations with my neighbors
title: Neither a good security device nor a good dorrbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. Corea
content: It looks nice, the concept is great. However this item did not work as advertised. We received the notification for one day. After that I spent approximately 3 hours with tech support on the phone and on a web chat. We did system restores and it worked some of the time. The live feed option only works 25% of the time. With support we tested the internet speed and the system was receiving 16mbs download and 5mbps upload which is more than sufficient for the system. It just did not work properly. I tried it for 10 days and finally gave up. I'm returning it and buying  a set of Arlo cameras. Update so I returned my original ring 2 and received a new one just in case it was defective. The replacement also provides terrible signal and only works about 10% of the time. After spending countless hours on tech support calls, resetting the system several times, and even installing the chime extender, the system as of right now is not even registering doorbell button pushes. By the way, after installing the chime extender, the signal went from good to poor. I stand by my original review and say don't buy this product, it's a terrible rip off which does not work. Oh and for those wondering about the wifi signal at the ring on the outside of the house, 16-18mbs download and 5mbps upload out side next to the doorbell. Inside next to the modem router it is 25 Mbps down and 5 upload
title: only works 10% of the time.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: john r. pascall
content: Having had this for just over a year, I have to say I'm not impressed. Even with settings set to just barely capture people coming to the door, this thing will drain a battery in less than three weeks - they're supposed to last three to six months! I always have to have an extra charged and ready and always keep track of how much juice I have left before it stops working. And even with that, the device doesn't capture everything. In most cases you wouldn't have known anyone was there unless they were right in front of the door and rang the door bell. It's also pretty much useless with out the pay by the month or year subscription... If I'd known all of this before... buyer beware...
title: nice addition - not really!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marbia Monroe
content: So far so good, we love our Ring doorbell system. I suggest ordering the backup battery and charger right away so that you have it handy when you need to replace your battery. The more motion you have at your door the faster you need to replace your rechargeable battery.
title: Ring Doorbell2 works well at my house

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amber P
content: So be careful before you install this product.  We installed it to their specs only to find out it isn’t compatible with our doorbell which is built into our wall.  When calling customer service (which was terrible) they told me that there was nothing they could do and that I needed to replace my doorbell with a new one.  I’m left with no options as I’ve already followed their instructions and hard mounted this to my house which if I remove it will leave several holes in my home.  What a joke.  All it would have taken was a simple list of non compatible doorbells and a suggestion to check before installing.  Terrible customer service!!!
title: Disappointed!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D. Moyer
content: I purchased 2 of these doorbells, one for my back and front door.  I recently moved out to a remote area and wanted some peace of mind when I am not home and when home alone that I can see what is going on at my front and back doors.  What prompted me to look into it is that I recently came home to find tire marks in my grass and there was no packages or notes left, so it made me nervous that someone was at my house when I wasn't home.  I went on vacation after installing the doorbells and was comforted in getting notified and seeing who was at my door while I wasn't there.  Excelled product!!!  Easy to set up and a great peace of Mind!!!
title: Peace of Mind!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jenny Dao
content: I bought two--one for the front door and one for the back door.  This product works really well if you have a strong wifi signal in your home.  The one at my back door works great because it's closer to the router.  My front door not as good since it's further.
title: Must have good wifi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dan Sherwood
content: When someone activates your device in the middle of the night, you need to see what's going on FAST!  App does not stay logged in.  1.  Had to look up password.  2. Then had to wait for authentication to be emailed to me.  THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE!  Furthermore, even when it manages to stay logged in, the access and reporting latency is several minutes even with fast internet.  Service appears to be oversubscribed relative to their back-end capability.  To be secure you need an in-house dedicated local system that responds instantaneously.  I was originally satisfied until I needed it.  Now, not so.  Replacing with Pi-based local system without it having to "talk" halfway around the world to authenticate and relay.
title: Logged out of app in time of critical need - DANGEROUS!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SWVT
content: I like the idea of this.  I don't like the inconsistency of it. Sometimes people are knocking on my door and I don't get a motion alert.  Also,  some times it detects cars on the road in front of our house and sometimes it's quite for days.  All different sizes of cars, not just delivery trucks.  The motion is quite slow.  The delivery guy, will put the packages down,  take a "proof of delivery" pic and the motion doesn't turn on until he's heading back to the truck.  I use Comcast for internet so one of them are failing me. This really doesn't work for what I wanted it for.
title: Needs improvement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: PLW
content: We’ve had this installed for nine months now and have had plenty of experience now. Most of the time, this works great. But there are a few problems that are either annoying or just undo any benefit this might device might bring. The camera will stop recording just 10 seconds after it detects a motion, and does not start recording again until whomever caused that motion is long gone.  We had a delivery van drive up last night, which triggered the camera to record.  Great! Except the driver didn’t get out of the van for 10 seconds, so the camera stopped recording.  We have no record of what happened to our package after that. There is no way to configure the camera timeout duration. My other nit is we are a multiOS family. You cannot configure the devices from a Windows PC, you need to use the IOS app. I’m glad we have this kind of doorbell camera now, but knowing what I know, I might have chosen a different option.
title: Nice, but with some real drawbacks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Horizon
content: I am very unhappy.  The RING marketing descriptions say that you can add a second unit to your account.  The descriptions do not mention the incremental monthly RING fees you must pay in order to look at recordings on the second unit.  It could have been ... should have been even more clear that RING will charge you more monthly fees.  Was it a bit of clever marketing by RING?  Or, just stupid me for not digging even deeper into my account with RING?  I suspect ... both.  Consequences?  I get to feel stupid.  I have become an unhappy (will not recommend) RING customer.
title: Make the effort to understand their fee structure before you buy additional units.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: todd
content: Don't waste your money on this piece of junk.  It took 6 tries for it to connect with internet.  I got it installed and it doesn't pick up motion.  I can stand in front of it with the largest zone and most frequent alert and walked right by it and even waved at it and it never detected motion.  Guess I'll return this and the Show 5 to get the Google nest. Update:  Actually started picking up motion about 2 hours later.  Going to give it a few days to see if it works as it should
title: Don't Waste Time or Money/Maybe?

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Margie
content: ORDERED RING DOORBELL2 - SET UP WAS EASY, CAMERA WORKS FINE BUT THE AUDIO AND FEED IS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE.  AMAZON SAYS TO REFER TO THE MFG FOR HELP AND GAVE THE PHONE # 800-919-8590.  THIS  ISN'T EVEN RING DOORELL'S PHONE #.  PHONE IS ANSWERED BY "STANDARD PLUMBING"  REALLY? I've CALLED AND THE WAIT TIME FOR RING DOORBELL IS 15-20 MINUTES.  IF THE GARBLED STATIC FILLED AUDIO CAN'T BE FIXED, THIS IS GOING BACK AND I'LL ORDER ANOTHER PRODUCT... - AS OF RIGHT NOW, THIS PRODUCT RATING IS -10
title: AUDIO DOES NOT WORK

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DMB
content: I had a stick up cam at front door, bought  door bell to replace that, becasue I got tired of charging the battery.  I had tough time installing. I gave it a review of 1 star. Ring reached out to me and gave excellent service to get everything up and running. Though it took one hour on the phone. So I couldn't go to the five stars for the time involved. I went to four because of the outstanding customer service
title: Great customer service, little long for me to set up

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shaun C
content: This works pretty well. Pro: installation was pretty easy. I did use command strips on my door since I live in a rental. Con: the battery does not last more than a few weeks. It is better if placed attached to doorbell power if you have it. I don't have that option. Perhaps more of solar power would be nice. Also, the connection seems to fail at times. I have to wait for a few minutes to replay the video instead of watching live That could be an issue if someone was stealing or an issue arises those few minutes could cost me a valuable time. But all in all, i do like the concept.
title: I like it but some flaws

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: diydad
content: Overall I like it. The motion detection does pick up alot of car. as my house is 20 feet from the road. I adjusted the sensitivity it did help alot. 2nd dislike is the live view for motion cut out the beginning of the event. 4 out 5 times if I try to view when I get a alert it cuts out the beginning time that happens before I get connected. If I have a weak cell signal I can miss the whole event and not be able to view at all. Like it charges right off my doorbells orginal wiring. Only took about 10mins to Install.
title: Overall I'm happy I bought this item.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tim B
content: This product is a nice idea, but it is so slow to respond to movement that a burglar could make off with everything I own before I get an alert. I've even installed a WiFi "booster" just inside the front door to ensure it has a strong connection to my WiFi, which is very fast. To make matters worse, mine arrived damaged (cosmetically) , and both the supplier and Amazon refused to take it back. I've been an Amazon customer since 1999 but that doesn't seem to count for anything anymore. Save your money.
title: This product is a nice idea, but it is so slow to respond ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: oved bagim
content: Generally, the doorbell worked ok.  However, they failed to tell us that in order to continue using the video you needed to have a subscription.  They failed to notify the buyer that in addition to paying almost $200 for the doorbell and representing that you can see and speak to whoever is at the door, you needed to pay for a subscription to continue voice contact and video use of doorbell (they give you a free trial without letting you know that it runs out in less than a month, then you have to sign up for a subscription). Without the subscription that they fail to tell you about, all you have is a $200 doorbell and holes in your door.
title: There was no full disclosure

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Scott B
content: Update: I wish I would have bought something else. I get a notification that there is motion by my front door. After 45 seconds the feed may come up and by then it's way to late. The other concern is it will either be too sensitive and go off every time the flag waves in the wind or you get a great shot of the delivery person driving away if you back down the sensitivity. Once I finally got the battery to charge (12 hours) I was able to hook this up. Installation was a breeze but connecting to a WiFi outside a brick home was a challenge. Once I placed an extender near it, the functionality was great. I am able to view live and see who was near the front of my home.
title: Great picture need very strong external Wifi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: G
content: Does what it promises, but... disconnects from wifi very frequently despite purchasing a high quality tp wifi extender from Amazon as well. Unless problem stops, I cannot recommend it. Perhaps a software/firmware update needed RING/AMAZON? Do employees have access to it therefore messing with it ( it's on the news). Just wanted to have this piece of tech working properly. RING support is really kind but does not deliver the results for this door bell to work properly.
title: On the verge of returning it. WIFI malfunction.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marsha
content: Motion detection is terrible. I can walk up to my door and waive my hand in front of it and not get a motion detection but yet regularly get motion detection alerts for trucks driving by (not every time though-so it’s not even reliable for that.) The doorbell feature works but takes a long time to initialize on my phone to answer or see the feed. I considered adding another unit but definitely will not be adding another ring product. The motion detection is what would be valuable. Not everyone in your yard will ring the bell. We have a very high internet plan and new powerful router.
title: Bad for motion detection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Charlie D.
content: Installed the doorbell 2 per instructions, it took several attempts to connect the device to the app because of my androids security system but is also occurred with the Apple tablet we have.  Finally got it working or so I thought until several weeks after, visitors are ringing the doorbell but its not registering on the Ring app. When it occasionally does, the video on the apps on all devices takes extremely long to load even when I am a foot away from the modem with a strong connection. There have been several instances where the video doesnt even load or people think we are not home like a delivery man and end walking away. There are bugs to be fixed Ring.
title: Interface sucks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gerry Clemmer
content: Ok it works very good however it take a while to load view and a lot of static from the speaker. Health report shows -66 or something like that which means that there some type interference from router to doorbell 2. The recommendation is to purchase a ring signal booster. My router is approximately 50ft from the doorbell how would this help.  I’m hesitant on buying this and the reviews I’ve read don’t provide reviews showing it helped instead made thing worst.
title: Not sure yet

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: cefg6224
content: The device seems so far good but it has lots of wear and tear corners scratches etc.  For the Price I could have gotten a better one from another vendor, but I saw the reviews from the vendor and he does have good reviews.  I think I was not the lucky one this time.  Its all about quality for the price it was not quality. Just be aware some vendors might have good reviews but merchandise not so perfect.  I understand wear and tear but not so much of it. For sure will look out next time.  Happy Holiday!!!
title: Samsung S9 Plus

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: krypton
content: An electrician with another company had to re-examine the work performed by Dish. It was correct that the existing doorbell needed a stronger transformer. However, the Dish Tech burned out the inside doorbell by connecting a diode to the Bing doorbell. The second Tech could not dismantle the Bing doorbell because the Bing Tech took the ring cover bit with him. We called Dish to return the bit and uninstall the diode. Then, secure the Bing box and connect the unconnected wire in the inside doorbell. As of now Bing has not returned my call.
title: poor installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eric E
content: I bought this along with The Ring Alarm System. I connected it to an existing door bell wire which charges the battery. I'm glad I got the 1070 high definition. It is truly amazing. The integration with the Amazon Ring Security Software is very good. I've also purchased and connected some of the New Ring Lighting System. And the integration all work well together.
title: Amazing Device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kathy and Vince
content: I like the doorbell. It definitely adds a layer of instant security. Things I don’t like: sound seems to be intermittent... battery change every 3-4 weeks....$30 annual fee to store vids.....sound quality..... The video quality is excellent Day and night. Installation was a breeze....and, I needed a bell!  My router is pretty close. If yours is not, you will have problems!! So all in all, it is a good product that just needs a bit more tweaking with sound quality
title: Pretty goid

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JBailey
content: I've had this for a year and a half.  This Ring Doorbell 2 is a piece of junk!  It doesn't pick up motion until someone is right at the door and records them walking away.  I want to know when someone is walking up.  It sure can detect every dang time my flags move though!  Yes, I've check all the things I have programmed and nothing changes the fact that I'm not warned until someone is right there at my door.  VERY UNHAPPY!!
title: Piece of Junk!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joseph Baruch
content: I really thought I would like this better the motion sensors are not that great I got all the extra attachments to make it work and she's not as good as I thought Buster's very long delays
title: Look for alternative

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RAJESH
content: I would like to Thank Ring for this wireless security product, now  i have a peace of mind at my work and during my travel that my home & car are safe , and no one is tempering them as it give you and instant message notification about the intruder or motion which you can set it up at your comfort level. I am planning to get another one for my kitchen door on the backyard for a extra security. Easy installation and quick setup as 123....
title: Wireless Security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Monica G
content: Ive tried purchasing cheaper camera/bell and was not satisfied until I purchased my Ring Video Doorbell 2.  This doorbell actually exceeded my expectations.  The camera view and quality is amazing, investing a little more $ into this doorbell is better then cheaper ones that don't give the same satisfaction as the Ring does, I had to learn this the bad way.  But glad I went with tis doorbell!
title: LOVE IT!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Charles
content: The device overall, I would give 8 out of 10. The huge issue I have is that as of last week, I've been getting alerts VERY late. If someone is at the door, I'm getting the alert after they have already come in, or after they've walked away. This was not always the case which let's me know there is something wrong with either the device, or the software. In either case it's not good. If a person is being alerted that someone is at their door stealing a package "AFTER" they have left... and you were actually home at the time, its useless. If this problem is fixed, I would rate this device a 10. Night vision and field of range are excellent.
title: Delayed response MUST be fixed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mrs. Robinson
content: This is our second Ring video doorbell.  Our first one is at our home in Florida, keeping an ever-watchful eye on our front porch and driveway.  We recently decided we wanted one for our primary home, just for good measure.  This thing works.  It's easy to install, easy to watch the videos it can produce, and is excellent quality.  It's amazing that, if someone comes to our door at our house in Florida, I can talk to them from Missouri and find out what they're doing at our door.
title: This Thing Works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Home Worker
content: I originally had an issue with using the Live View with my Ring 2 doorbell.  I must say Ring Customer Service was excellent in helping me resolve this situation.  I needed to add a Chime Pro and use that network for my Ring 2 Live View to work properly.  Ring Customer Service was pro-active and extremely helpful in working with me until I got it working.  Now it works perfectly.  I am going to add a couple of cameras next and will update when those are installed.
title: Updated review - issue resolved with Live View

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mary Morse
content: Given as gifts (bought 2) for family members- and they LOVE THEM! They had each been impressed by mine, and it was the perfect gift for both. I’ve continued to tout the ease of installation and the quality of service to others- and although I have been using “Blink” outdoor camaras for my front and back doors, I’m considering using them elsewhere in my yard and getting a RING for my own front door! Of course, with each gift or recommendation, I’ve stressed (and helped one friend) ensure their Wi-Fi and ALL devices used through it are safely secured and explained the need for double verification! So, as so many in my neighborhood have discovered, RING is a priceless yet affordable device for home security! 5 stars on EVERYTHING!
title: Don’t have a front door camera? Get RING!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mark S.
content: Just finished install and testing, so far, so good. One thing I would change is that I wish the optional angled mounting brackets were made of metal rather than plastic. I stripped one of the four screw holes while fastening the doorbell to the bracket without even tightening it much. But it is still solidly fastened even with 3 (and a half) screws.
title: Great, but should have metal brackets.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Irish
content: Very nice product. Easy to install if you have an existing wired doorbell button on your house. Make sure you charge the battery before you install it. I installed mine at about 48in high, and it gave the best viewing area. Linked it very easily to my Alexa and iris system. Neat how you can use the echo show to see who is at the door. Alexa also will announce when someone is at the door. You also still hear your existing doorbell (if you have a working one). This just replaced the button I had with all the cool features and left the doorbell being a doorbell.
title: Best when integrated to a smart home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jimmye Johnson
content: The Ring system works great and was just what I was looking for. Installation of this was so easy, I used the corner mount and did it myself in about 15 minutes and that includes unboxing, downloading app and putting ring device on the outside wall. All tools are included which made it really simple. The motion detection works great it is sensitive so i have adjusted a couple times  to find what works best for me. Camera clarity is really good and the night vision is clear as well. I am very happy with this product and will prob purchase  one for my backdoor as well.
title: Works Great, Picture clarity is Great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: yliebermann
content: All of my Ring devices have trouble with the network, which will cause a SEVERAL MINUTE delay when trying to access video. This means they're not very useful for talking with people who ring your doorbell, or even seeing if it's an intruder or a cat in your driveway. Ring tech support will happily blame your wifi setup all day long for any issues you encounter. But my house and yard are blanketed in strong wifi signal and not a single other device has any problems. I tried everything to fix the issue--I even added a Chime Pro, which actually gave me worse performance for the doorbells attached to it.
title: Wi-fi performance is terrible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Woody
content: My ring doorbell doesn’t pick up motion for a good 45 seconds. This is the second one I’ve tried and still disappointed. Now to record any activity we have to pay a monthly fee. On the plus side we get alerts for odd or criminal behavior within our area.
title: Motion detection is bad

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Raymond 3rd
content: Ring bell works as expected. I live knowing anytime is at my front or rear door. I have connected to both. Other than picking up a passing car by accident every now and then this works perfect and the picture quality is excellent. Great buy for $99.99.
title: Great Camera Bell for $99.99

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: mommakel
content: Constantly off line and not working Purchased for my aunt and she is constantly having issues. We’ve charged the battery several times, had to set up several times. Tired of it not working and it’s too late to return. Mote E-Waste Spend more and get a better model
title: Not a good choice

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Butch
content: I love everything about our new Ring doorbell except for one flaw, late on the motion detection.  We have a 7 to 8 foot long alcove and when it detects motion the person is at the door rather than when they enter the alcove.  I have the distance sensor set as far as possible and still it doesn't notify me until the person is at the door.  Even with that one issue I still love it and would give it 10 stars if possible.  Great product.
title: Love our Ring Doorbell.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lane L. Fox
content: This thing can sense motion like 30 feet away, I really had to tone back the motion settings to just work on my porch area and ignore the street. It's still a little iffy, I'm not sure why. Ended up turning off Motion Alerts so my phone doesn't get pinged for false positives. It includes a couple of mounts so you can angle it if needed and it's really easy to install. They ship it with a bunch of tiny bags of hardware which just confused me more than it should. I just poured it all into a pile and it made much more sense during the install. It hooks right up to SmartThings and the Ring app is easy to use as well. If you go flipping breakers for the install and can't find the right one, try to make sure you leave the internet/rounter/modem stuff on because you have to connect to wifi during the installation process.
title: Easy install, works great, totally happy.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Frankp
content: Like the Ring doorbell. Took a little while to get the motion sensitivity where I need it since I am close to a street. Picks up passing cars but I rather have it then not with all the packages that go missing anymore. It is very helpful with my kids and easy for all to use. Install took less then 15 minutes. Considering buying another and other Ring products for the other entrances  of my house. Got this at a great price of $129 (regularly $199) around the holidays and that made it an even better purchase.
title: Works great. Nice video quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: James E Alderman Jr
content: I am delighted with my purchase of the Ring Video Doorbell. It is everything it is advertised as and gives me a little more peace of mind being able to watch who's coming and going outside my house. I purchased the doorbell primarily because I could not see who was at my door when someone rang the bell. My door has a central light that will let me see a shadow of whoever is standing on the other side, but I had no way of actually seeing the person, nor did I want to install a peephole in the door itself. With the Ring, I get motion alerts and alerts when someone is ringing and I can see who it is and respond to the person without opening the door. Wonderful! I also installed the Ring chime, which works great with the doorbell. I am 100% pleased with my purchase and with the operation of the product.
title: I am delighted with my purchase of the Ring Video Doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joanna
content: The concept of having this at your door is brilliant but overall the product is lacking. My ring 1 had much better ability to catch WiFi signal. Ring 2 not connecting as well. The distance from router to the door is maybe 20F. I installed it on my front door. I live in an apartment/condo building. All I get is the black & white night vision. There is plenty of light in the space in the hallway and yet it’s black&white. Twice it recorded motion in color (same light exposure - no windows in the hallway so lights are on 24/7) - picture in color was so much better! They should allow us to choose the night or day mode via app.
title: No way to turn night vision off

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C. T. Ullrich
content: Extremely easy setup.  Love the ease of use and piece of mind being able to see who is at your door before opening it.  If you live in a busy/high traffic area, the biggest challenge will be establshing a zone for motion alerts.  I wound up turning motion alerts off altogether.  The camera will still capture video, I just don't get the constant alerts. If you don't have an existing doorbell, I highly recommend the Chime.  Works great and a lot cheaper/ewasier than installing a transformer. Great product.  Also recommend paying the $30/year that captures/saves your videos for 60 days.
title: Easy to setup/learn/use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Farm Boy
content: Video is crystal clear.  Integrates with Alexa perfectly.  App on phone works great also.  Just wish there was more flexability in adjusting sensativity.  Not a big problem though.  I have two 80 lb. dogs that hang out by the door.  Thought they would be detected and creating a problem.  Turns out to be no problem.  Got first Ring at back door.  Thinking about another for front door.  Just wish there was a way to store recordings without a monthly fee.
title: Recording requires monthly fee.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kara Frazee
content: Doorbell came on time, undamaged, and nicely packaged. App set up was incredibly easy. Physical doorbell set up took me some time, as I had to drill into brick in order to mount the camera. Otherwise the setup was really easy! The picture is incredibly clear as well. I also purchased a ring chime pro, which synced and was ready to work with the doorbell in a matter of seconds! The app is great and let’s you customize your motion detection zones so you don’t get unnecessary notifications. I do recommend buying an extra ring battery and charging station when you purchase the doorbell. The battery I received with the doorbell is already dying. Overall I am extremely happy with this product! Would recommend to anyone looking for a video doorbell!
title: Make sure you buy a battery charging station and extra battery!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DavidE.
content: First time in 20 plus years as an Amazon customer I feel like I was ripped off.  The advertisements for this product does not clearly indicate a subscription is required to utilize the important features.  The product utilizes my paid wifi and cell service yet Ring requires a subscription after the "free" trial.  The return eligible window closes about the same time as the trial subscription.  It is not clear a paid subscription is required until the loss of functionality which occurs after the return window closes.
title: Plan to add at least $30 per year in order to use this device.  **RIP OFF ALERT!**

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tomcat 79er
content: We installed the Ring Video Doorbell 2 almost a year ago to our existing wired doorbell connection.  It is working great for capturing all the motion on our porch and is so nice to see who is at the door before answering.  I also like that you can use it to take a live look at what is outside at any given time.  I wasn't aware before ordering this device that Ring charges a monthly or yearly fee to save the recordings that the doorbell camera captures, but it is a reasonably small amount ($3/month or $30/year), so I think it is well worth it!
title: See who is at your door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Hannah Sandmeyer
content: We love our new Ring Doorbell 2.  It was very easy to install and the app is super user friendly.  I travel a lot for work so the added security and piece of mind it provides is perfect for us!  I know there are a lot of competitive systems out there that appear to do the same thing but we also invested in the spotlight motion detector and like having both products from a single brand/app. Their integration is key.
title: Easy to Install, Easy to Use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sonia
content: I received this last week and my son installed it over the weekend. So far so good. It is nice to see what is happening in front of my house. One video didn't work or it errors when I try to look at it so I will have to look into it but all the rest I can watch and they are pretty clear. I even saw the postman delivering a package! My dog started barking at the front door earlier so I looked at the live cam and didn't see anything. We have coyotes in our area so it was probably something outside our yard that made her bark. A peace a mind if you can go to live cam to see what is going on or not going on. I plan to get the Ring Flood Light to replace the one above my garage that doesn't work anymore. I am going to get the Ring Doorbell for my kids for their homes.
title: Awesome to feel more secure

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert B.
content: This thing is such a disappointment. I wanted to give it a few months before I wrote a review, but it's been essentially worthless since day one. It just doesn't work. Over the past two months I've had numerous packages delivered to my front door. Only twice has it picked up a delivery person, and most of the time it's as they're getting back into their vehicle. The ring is installed correctly, my wifi signal is strong, but it just doesn't pick anything up. I've adjusted the motion detection settings, testing a bunch of configurations and nothing helps. Not to mention the lag time between when someone presses the doorbell button and when I'm notified on my phone. I've been sitting on my couch, which is about 3 feet from the doorbell, (with a strong wifi signal) and had someone ring the doorbell, only to get the notification after they got tired of waiting and just knocked. I'm super disappointed with this product. If it worked the way Ring's marketing claims it works, it'd be great, but the technology just isn't up to par. I feel like I'm beta testing something vs using a fully realized product. If you're wanting a motion activated security camera, I'd look elsewhere.
title: Ding-dong disappointment

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Having fun!
content: At first, I was very happy to have this device.  But after the last five months, dealing with Rings customer service, I want to smash this defective device. The internal settings WILL NOT STAY. Every vehicle, every walking, jogging, dog walking, bird flying event, sets ot off.  I have tried and tried and tried to get customer service to listen to me.  I want to return this, and I dont expect my money back. I just want someone else to use this device and discover I was correct. I wish now I had purchased a warranty.
title: Buy a warranty. Then return this junk

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sophia L.
content: I've been looking at getting one of these for about 1 year and decided to when the price was right.  It was very easy to attach to the outside door frame and connecting to wifi was a snap.  We had absolutely no problems.  It was a little sensitive at first but after making some adjustments it works just fine without sending me notifications all day long.  The picture quality is super crisp as well.  It's well worth it.
title: Works as it should

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jason W.
content: Note this was a package that I bought and it came with a new ECHO dot. It does not come with the plug in chime.  After using it with Echo dot you don’t need it. I have an echo speaker In every room of my house. They are fantastic (that’s another review) you can program which speaker to notify you when it sees motion or gets a ring. So whether you are in a different room you can answer using Alexa and have a hands free conversation, no phone required. Get this deal if you are in the market for you under $200 you cannot beat it.
title: Best deal you will find with Alex

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: PF
content: I do not know if my Ring doorbell is defective or if this is just how it's supposed to sound.  We worked on our Doorbell and camera for the garage the entire day trying to get everything set correctly.  We either get lots of notifications when cars pass, or no notifications at all.  The door bell does pick up a person after they are already on my porch and at the door.  However, the two way communication doesn't work.  I can hear the person, but the person can't understand me.  When I listen to the play back,  it is terrible.  I really wanted to love this product.
title: Two way voice is so garbled you can't understand what's being said.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Josh Gardner
content: Echoing others: It gets lousy wifi reception despite my router being on the other side of the door. This results in virtually useless video quality. If the product had onboard storage, poor reception wouldn't be as much an issue. But then Ring couldn't charge you $3/mo for the privilege of using your device. You can't connect it to Google Home or other Google Assistant devices because Amazon owns Ring and Google owns Nest. I bought this during a Cyber Monday sale and it was greatly discounted ($130 for this bundled with an Echo Dot). It is not worth the discounted price never mind the regular price.
title: Not nearly worth the money.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: E. B. Wolfe
content: This is a semi expensive product that is a great idea but... BUT... like so may things today its not a buy it an own it type thing.. One must BUY a MONTHLY subscription to get the real benefit of the doorbell.. I have cameras around the house that alert me to movement and they are set and forget. I thought this would be a good idea just to focus on the front door and it is until..... UNTIL the trial period runs out... get ready to give them your credit card for a reoccurring monthly charge to get the benefits. Not going to happen. At least with me.
title: scam

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
content: I purchased this product to help make our house more secure. It works well. We have been using it to keep track of packages at our front door that was delivered. We have had a number of thefts and we were hoping to keep the thefts down. It seems to work. When a package is delivered we get a motion detected at the front door. Then the deliverer presses the button and gets another notification someone is at the front door. We can view the video and see if they hid it or if it in a viewable location from the street. If not, we make sure to get the package right away. Great device with many features in the app to customize your settings.
title: Track Packages and Adding More Security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steph K
content: Love this ring doorbell. Feel a lot more secure knowing I have access to view who has been coming in and out the gate since we do rent to tenants it’s sometimes hard to distinguish who’s a guest and who’s a possible intruder. Everything else is pretty self explanatory. Deducting one star because it does run low on battery fast (bought a solar power panel to fix this), sometimes it does miss motion which can be crucial, when watching playback footage it does seem choppy sometimes and freezes, sometimes records for no reason making the battery die even quicker.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Patricia B
content: My old doorbell died. Needed a new doorbell, got this one. It has made my life easier. I got the battery powered one. the battery lasts @6-8 weeks(bought a spare battery to swap out). the battery recharge is @6 hours. I have it synced to Alexa to hear the doorbell in the house. Our iphones also let us know when someone is at the door. I like being able to see and talk to the person at the door from my phone. Set up took about an hour. My wifi is weak but it still works well. No issues. Great device.
title: Very happy with this device.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dale McDonald
content: It's comforting to know who is at your door before you open it. The motion detection is a bit slow to respond and notify you, but the doorbell function works great. The only real complaint I have is the annual, mandatory, $30 subscription fee, in order for it to work.  They don't tell you that on the packaging or write-up.  Overall, it does work well and does do what they claim.
title: but the doorbell function works great. The only real complaint I have is the ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nancy L Roy
content: It did take quite a while to charge the battery (over 5 hours), but after watching You Tube videos, I installed it myself using the included screw driver (didn’t need my drill) in less than 30 minutes on to wooden wall replacing an existing mechanical doorbell. I’m still playing with the motion and chime adjustments but when it informs me, I can clearly see who/what is outside using the app on my iPhone and iPad (I like the iPad visual better) day or night. Haven’t had a chance to use the audio real time, yet, but from what I could tell ... I’m going to love that feature, too!
title: Love it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: filosofia cafe
content: I was surprised to learn that the only way to access and view videos from the unit was with a separate subscription.  the subscription asks for a nominal fee ($3 a month) but it feels like being blackmailed.  I bought the unit around the holidays and just had installed a few weeks ago, so it is too late to return.  I'd suggest you buy another brand; there are plenty out there that don't keep you hostage to view your video!!!
title: be careful you will have to add an optional monthly plan to use  BAIT AND SWITCH

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Leo J. Mendus II
content: The product is a neat idea. The quality of the video was decent. But, the motion activation was terribly annoying. No matter how low I set it, it caught every car driving by. There is no way to remove the Neighbors social media from the app. You can turn off notifications. You cannot use the device without logging an address. In order to save video off your $200 device, you MUST subscribe to the Ring cloud service.
title: Hidden Costs to Use Fully

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bafire
content: This product is to wide for most door bell placement. Will have to attach to door and use battery only. Also the response to mobile devices is about 10 second delay. Intercom feature not that great at all and is actually worthless by the time you are notified most people leave before the app kicks in. I can't figure out why these are so popular better off with security camera and a real doorbell, this product says steal me. So this thing does not work period.
title: Does not fit most places for door bell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nana H
content: One thing I'm disappointed in is now I have 4 new holes used to mount it, besides it doesn't operate well.  The device was mounted 18" to the right of the door and it will "see" my wife drive in the driveway to the left, but 10 min. later totally miss the postman in the same location and walking in front of it.  Had a UPS delivery where the guy walked straight up to the door with no response, but when I went out to pick up the package it responded to my back as I picked it up.  The device was supposedly set for the street being 30' away.
title: Intermitant operation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Reikigirl
content: I bought this on Amazon Prime Day and received it yesterday. We hooked it up this evening and have been playing with it all weekend. It is easy to install and works just like it says. It also comes with a 30 day free trial of the software which isn't required but is recommended because it will store the video.
title: Very nice

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SHAFT
content: I added a second Ring Doorbell to my back door and I love the Ring Doorbell 2. It has great integration with Alexa and when someone approaches my door I have it set for all my Alexa devices to make an announcement. In addition,  they have great integration with my Alexa Show and Show 8 and automatically displays the video when someone approaches my doors. The app is very easy to operate and functions well with my Ring Alarm as well. I love it!
title: I love my Ring Doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JGNC
content: Three stars 'it's OK' is pretty accurate.  Great concept, great when it works, but it doesn't work well enough to be totally trustworthy.  Most of the time it will pick up motion, but sometimes the same motion will happen and you don't hear a peep out of it.  And sometimes it is so delayed, the video is useless.  And if you don't have the subscription, forget it.  You can't look back.  When my free trial ended, it wouldn't even let me view events in 'real time'.  It just kept 'accessing'.  I guess it would have started eventually, after there is no more action.  I sort of got the feeling that is how they get you to get the subscription.  Conspiracy theory, I know.  It just doesn't feel like a completed product.  I'll keep it, it's better than nothing, but I wouldn't recommend it. I have the chime/booster also.
title: Not Terribly Impressed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Garrett
content: The Ring 2 Doorbell did exactly what it was advertised to do... for a year and a half. Conveniently outside of the warranty period. One thing I wish it would have done was disable the physical chime via the app but that’s a “pro” only feature. Give me a break, easily could have been accomplished via software. Video and WiFi signal were okay but I have a 1000 sqft house with the WiFi access point in the middle. Motion detection was okay but I’m pretty sure it could see ghosts because it would trigger for no reason. Overall, the product was just okay. Nothing amazing. Disappointed at its lifespan.
title: Okay while it lasted....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: PB
content: Like that it lets me track who comes to my front door and when packages arrive.  Nice that amazon and ring interact. I did not  get the ring cameras. Fairly easy to hardwire to door bell.  You can look back at videos on who came to your door.
title: Gives comfort to whoever comes to the front door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Donny Brassco
content: Very short record time - ONLY 30 seconds which is not enough time to record anything useful No way to change the record time, and no way to even PAY to change the record time to make it longer Hard to really get it tuned in to sensitivity and the battery suffers if you dont hook it up direct, expect to charge the battery every month or so - Unless you keep it at the absolute minimum setting for sensitivity. quality is decent, but it has a hard time with background noise  - Someone talking 2 ft away gets drowned out by a car passing by or even birds chirping
title: Short Record time, short Battery life - just falling short

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Fuzzy
content: This product met our expectation of being a huge improvement over our old-style doorbell.  We were disappointed, however, to find the following two flaws: 1. there is a delay of a few seconds in motion detection, so that important information can be missed.  2. we had not expected to pay a monthly fee to see the stored video events.  A logical design would include CONTINUOUS video recording for installations that use transformer power to charge the battery.  The recording could be saved on the user's device.  A user-selectable amount of storage, say between 1 to 10 GB, could be used on a rotating basis.  The beginning of each event can also be stored, so that the user can jump to a specific event in the stored video.
