(A more sophisticated software could periodically delete large segments of eventless video.)  A one-time charge of $30-$40 could be charged for this feature.  Keeping this information on the company's site and charging a monthly fee would still be far better than the present policy.
title: It is important to know that there is a delay of a few seconds in motion detection.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: akaDavidB
content: The battery dies within a few days. I set the settings to the recommended settings for max battery life, but it still died right away. I installed the doorbell on my main door, which is on the side of my house and faces a fence. There is very little motion at that entrance. I contacted Ring and they sent me a replacement battery after looking at the data from my doorbell on their end (apparently they have a record of all actions). The replacement battery died right away too. I'm only leaving the doorbell installed because I drilled into my wood siding to install it. But it is too much of a hassle to charge the battery every couple of days so I will not be using it.... EVER!
title: Complete GARBAGE!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Love to read
content: The Ring2 came with everything you need to install it several different ways. I got it installed and I ran the setup. It was fast and easy. I had it all done in less that an hour including getting it working with Alexa. She will broadcast to all the Echos in the house that someone is at the door when the button is pushed. The motion detector makes my phone say, there is movement in the front yard. I love all the features, the build quality, and ease of use. I will be looking to add more products from them in the future. I should have gotten one years ago.
title: Great product easy to setup.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gadget Gal
content: Just installed and set up.  So far, so good.  It was easy to set up and connect with the wireless signal enhancer.  i will update post after i've had it for awhile. UPDATE: Works  like a charm.  i now can see anyone who approaches the "zone".  i am getting the video cam for the back as well.  Highly recommended.  I did have to get the extender booster to get a better signal to the unit.  Customer Service at Ring was outstanding.  They patiently walked me through any issues I had.  I'm a happy gal!
title: Excellent device!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KayBee
content: The door bell is a very reassuring security device. The field of view is great and resolution is very good. Sensitivity is very good. Although camera picks up cars on street at times, doing so is small price for overall security aspects. Already have other security plans so the base level plan for storing video is all that is needed. That plan is also needed if you want to see wha.t set off the doorbell, if smartphone not open to app then not going to get video in time to see; too long delay from notification to video access.
title: Visual security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Angela
content: Purchased after a couple break-ins. I spent the extra cash and purchased the original in hopes it would pay off. I would like to give it five stars but it only works about 70% of the time. The night I installed it a guy attempting to break-in noticed it and turned back down the stairs. So I am obviously thankful to have it; but unfortunately, the camera only recorded a small fraction of the incident. The rest of the recordings displayed a black screen. After sharing my concern with customer service they suggested purchasing a Chime-Pro. Apparently, if your router is over 30ft from your doorbell this could lead to poor signal strength but a Chime-Pro can address this for only an additional $50. After just buying the regular Chime for $30. I was not happy to hear this so they agreed to send me one. They have TERRIFIC- 24/7 customer service which is hard to come by these days. If the Chime-Pro resolves my issue, I plan to get a Ring Flood Camera also!
title: I would like to give it five stars but it only works ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KHutch18
content: This doorbell is probably the worst purchase I have ever made. The app doesn't work on either Android, or Apple. I can almost never connect to a live stream of the camera, and when the doorbell rings, the lag is so significant that people have walked away before I can answer via the app. What an absolute disappointment because when the camera does work, it's fine, the quality is decent, and it's everything you'd want. The only problem is, the doorbell has only successfully worked on my, or my wife's phone, 1 time in the past few years that we've owned the device.
title: Worst Purchase I've Ever Made

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Luke S.
content: The doorbell worked fine for a month.  By fine I mean the video/picture/sound quality is about what you'd expect, but real-time answering of the door was worthless.  By the time you get the notification on your phone, unlock it, and get through the self promotion and fluff of the app, the person at the door is long gone.  However, after the first month the real trouble sets in.  Not advertised is the fact that after 30 days you must pay a monthly subscription fee to view any recorded video, pictures, or sound.  While I understand the need for 'premium' services, like storing video indefinitely - being able to see video 24 hours, or even 5 minutes, after it was taken is by all accounts assumed with the purchase of such an expensive product.  The only free 'benefit' you get is being notified when there is motion or a ring.  by the time you the notification and are able to get into the app, the motion/person at the door is long gone and you're seeing live video of nothing.  Entirely worthless, and a waste of electricity.
title: WARNING - MONTHLY COST! Shame on you, Ring and Amazon

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JP
content: I love this thing.  I love having the peace of mind of knowing who's coming around my door or knocking without having to answer the door for strangers.  The motion detection works great for me.  I set it up and it only alerts when there is actually action around the door, and i seem to catch all of the actual motion and rarely false positives. Picture is clear. Setup was easy, I used my existing doorbell wiring with no issue, so i never have to charge the battery.  Included mortal drill bit worked great.  Only tool I needed was my power drill. The app is great and even convinced me to buy more Ring products.
title: Great for Home Security and Peace of Mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: anjul
content: We have had no problem with ours - so glad I didn't listen to all of the negative comments! The video and audio quality is excellent. I love how it interacts with phone/tablet and especially Amazon Alexa. I just say "Alexa, show me the front door" and there it is on my Echo Spot! Also all of our Alexa devices in our home (we have 3), will alert us as to motion or someone ringing the doorbell. I like being at work and seeing the mailman drop off an Amazon package! Planning on purchasing more Ring products!
title: Awesome product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Zee Naq
content: It's great to know who is at the door. The voice quality is clear. Visibility at night is poor. Cannot see much, even with the lights on outside. Battery charge holds for exactly one month. We have it set for live feed also, or else, what is the point of the camera if we can't view it when we need. But it lasts exactly one month. Takes a significant amount of time to charge, so either we be either the Ring bell for 10 hours, or we purchase another battery to keep as a replacement. Should really not take this long to charge but then how else will they force you to buy another battery?
title: We like it but needs improvement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: edward clark
content: I'm quite disappointed with the whole ring line at the moment. I did alot of research prior to buying the original ring doorbell and an echo spot because I was under the impression I could 2 way communicate with the doorbell. After a lengthy conversation with both amazon and ring tech support they said at this time only the ring 2 is supported with the echo spot for 2 way communication. So I returned my ring doorbell and spent an extra 100$ getting the 2. This doesn't work either. For the record 2 way voice works fine with my phone app.
title: Ring doorbell and ring doorbell 2 do not support 2 way communication with the echo spot

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cindy K.
content: We are very pleased with this product. We initially thought about installing the Rung Floodlight Camera, but it would be a challenge to install it under our waves. Opted for the doorbell-. My husband hardwired it to the existing doorbell and used the wedge to angle it. No installation issues. We are very happy with it. Night vision could be better, but any motion at night triggers our motion light over the garage, and camera lens picks up whatever is there. Would recommend this to anyone.
title: Makes You Feel Safe

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JC
content: The unit itself is amazing. So very impressed with the motion detection, and night vision. They really do deserve 5 stars. However, that being said! If you do not purchase a plan from Ring, the door bell is a $100.00 worthless unit. Without the plan it will not save any video from the motion detection. For example if you are at work, in a meeting. The Ring app is alerting you that someone is at the front door. You can't check because you are in meeting. Afterwards you check to see who was at your home. No recording saved! Granted it's only $30.00 a year for one device. I'm tired of companies wanting more money after we buy the product. Why can't I set up a stand alone recording system on a computer in my home.
title: Great Device, yearly plan if you want it to work right.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: H
content: Don’t waste your money, it’s useless!! It worked well for about six months.  The settings are set correctly yet it doesn’t notify me when people are parking in front of my house, walking by or even up my walkway, it does notify me when bugs fly passed. 🙄 if someone rings the bell and I want to see who it is all I get is the circle that it’s still loading. Half of the time I can’t play back a missed notification all I get is a black screen with ring in the left corner, if I tap the arrow back a few times sometimes it will play back but not the whole video. The battery life is terrible and I refuse to spend more money on an extra battery. My brother also bought one and he has the same problems. The photo shows it didn’t record anything from 8:39 pm until 8:25 am the next day, so I don’t know who just parked in front of my house. Save your money and put it towards a regular camera system that’s what I’m doing.
title: Don’t waste your money it’s useless!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Berrygirl
content: I bought this during one of those daily truck deals and I'm glad I didnt pay full price for it. The pros: easy installation with instruction for regular wired doorbells, good connectivity, clear camera and microphone when someone is at the door. Cons: The motion sensor is hard to calibrate, and if your doorbell is not in a great location, even with the adjuster plates, it will be a nightmare to get it to detect motion on time when a person comes near the door. Other times, it will go off when a car passes down the street. In fairness, I think the location of my doorbell is not the best for the Ring, but for the price and the annual fee to record videos, I would expect the motion sensors to be better.
title: Great when it feels like it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SA
content: The Ring is a great concept, but needs some work.  I am linked to Wi-fi and the connectivity is so poor.  I bought a booster and it sits within 4 feet of the door bell through a glass door.  It shows my connectivity as "good" and "poor" not excellent.  The codes I get say too much interference.  I live in a house and am not very close to neighbors.  Not sure what that interference is about.  It takes a long time to power up the image from the phone and on several occasions my door-ringer simply walked away before I could talk with them.  Maybe the hard wired version would be better.  I won't buy again.  Best feature (reason for 2 stars) is the neighborhood feature where you can post and see what is going on.  Otherwise, no thanks.
title: Poor connectivity

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Grant Higgins
content: This product works fine if you have it in direct line of sight to your router otherwise good luck getting a good signal. I have ATT Fiber 1000mb/s and the outdoor ring spotlight works great with it. The ring doorbell 2 however says weak signal no matter what I do. I can stand by the street 50 feet outside of my house and my phone gets 250Mb/s but apparently the ring doorbell doesn’t have that great a receiver. I even tried the chime pro, which somehow made the connection worse. Do yourself a favor and just by the outside floodlight versions.
title: Terrible WiFi connectivity, even with chime pro and 1000mbs WiFi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Larry
content: It works as advertised. It did not take long to install. I wired it to my old door bell, that way it stays charged and come thought the house door bell. The only problem is it takes a few minutes when some one rings the door bell for it to come up on my phone. Even when we have high speed internet.
title: Good product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Daniel Price
content: First off it has great video quality. But the motion settings are horrible and their customer service sucks. I emailed them a week ago and haven’t heard from them. The motion setting are either it catches everything and alerts you every 5min or it doesn’t catch anything till they are at your door. I went through all of their help videos and motion wizard set up with all the tips and it’s still like that. The WiFi sucks. I had to move my WiFi to right next to it. It is literally on the other side of the wall. It still sucks and I have the good xfinity WiFi.
title: Bad motion detection and WiFi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: cindersisty
content: We just installed this doorbell. It was easy (and fun) to install. The directions are not written by some poor non-native English speaker but likely by a millennial tech nerd who likes a good laugh. Works awesome with the plug and play Ring Chime. Set up was quite easy using the home Wi-Fi. I love getting alerts that there's someone at my door as my kids leave for school (when I'm already at work) and surprising them with the voice feature: "Have a good day kids!" Also being able to change the ring tone (need the Ring Chime) for the holidays (Christmas and Halloween) cycle so the dog doesn't get used to it and bark is a huge bonus.
title: Easy fun and useful!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jon Gordon
content: Fantastic! And what peace of mind it brings me. I was able to authorize a FEDEX delivery while I was at work - that ALONE is worth it! not to mention we get to see how our deliveries are being handled and most the time we're impressed. I know when friends are coming up and we've also integrated with Spotlight for a surround function.  I DID have to install a wifi extender - but that we already owned and moved to the garage.
title: Fantastic! What peace of mind...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tuesday
content: very active neighborhood, worked on my phone, really liked it till it didnt. updates a lot and more stuff to add.  .........as usual monthly cost.  but cant retrieve - what good is it.  Does help IF they ring doorbell.  but people dont. It works great or Deliveries and Postman  WHEN they ring.  its not on constantly till its pushed.  so we have another system for 24 hr. recording. fyi.
title: after 6 months it gets very glitchy.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rocky Mountain High
content: Nice upgrade to the original Ring Video Doorbell.  I really, really like the removable batteries & upgraded 1080p video.  The removealbe battery makes it much easier for me to keep the doorbell charged up.  I keep one charged & ready to go so all I need to do now is a 3-4 minute swap instead of pulling the doorbell off the wall, charging for 4-8 hours, putting it back on the wall.  The new camera is also much better than the older 720p camera.  Low light appears much better and clearer.  Daylight provides much more detail when you zoom in on it.  Great changes Ring, keep up the good work.
title: Great Upgrade

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Derek
content: Basically bought the product and it worked fine except it give you a notification every 5 minutes from a false positive. But the worst part is you HAVE TO PAY A MONTHLY FEE TO USE THE PRODUCT. How ridiculous, cant even return it now the the "free month" over. Absolutely disgusting and shameful manipulation of the product that works against the consumer. DO NOT BUY THIS. Buy literally any other one. SHAME.
title: BAIT AND SWITCH ARE YOU KIDDING ME

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Max
content: I really wanted to like this product but unfortunately its a motion sensor to track vehicles on the street passing by then it is for the human walking up and standing two feet away.  Tried many times with Ring support to get motion zones and alerting working, but each time I am told 'Ring Doorbell Pro is what you need' Doorbell 2 does not have smart motion detection.  Whats left is a car tracker for the street facing my door.  Dont buy into the hype, buy the Pro if you can, if not skip this product.
title: Not good, save your money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: N and S
content: My Ring is located right next to the room where the WiFi signal comes from and I have terrible reception.  My videos are completely choppy about 90% of the time.  Bummer.  Gave 4 stars because when it IS working properly, there is no delay when the motion is picked up unlike other cameras such as Arlo.  Also, the video (when it actually does work or I go to the live view) and the audio qualities are great.
title: Terrible Wifi detection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stryse
content: I know my local WiFi is up to speed to support this. I had that verified with both Ring support and independently. All the Ring devices themselves report a strong connection. I have a mesh-router setup so there is no single Ring device outside of 15 ft from a access point. Again, as verified in Ring's own app when looking at device health. But getting the feed to pull up when you have a motion event or door-bell ring? Forget it. They'll be long gone before you can "answer" the door. You are better off not buying Ring products. Good potential but highly unreliable when you need them.
title: Unreliable enough to be effectively useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: F. G.
content: I installed this on my front door, but the connection is pretty unreliable even if it shows a good level of WIFI signal. Also the motion detection doesn't seem to work even when we move right in front of the camera. I have other WIFI external cameras and I never had any problem connecting or getting the video like I do on this Ring video doorbell 2. As soon as I set up the connection the firmware was updated from the RING account, but the functionality is very disappointing. I repacked the product and I'm ready to return it to the vendor.
title: Unreliable wifi and cumbersome settings.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gwtw83
content: These things are a joke. They start recording way too late. Amazon driver walks to door. I get her walking away. They only record for 20 to 30 seconds with NO WAY YO CHANGE IT! Check the reviews online before you buy. Just google extend ring record time or ring recording too late and you will see. I'm trying to save someone else the hassle of install and de install and return. What a freaking pain.
title: Google ring records too late and doesnt record long enough

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amy T.
content: We loveeeee our new ring doorbell!! I love the security of knowing even if I’m not home I know if someone is at my house!! You can move the sensitivity to where you want it that way you can choose the radius of the area you want it to notify you!! The battery life is really good too!!
title: LOVE it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Matthew
content: I Purchased this product during the prime day event because of the substantial reduction in the price. Upon receiving and unwrapping my ring doorbell 2, the instructions were easy to follow and installation simple to complete  The product came with a diode which allowed my current chime system to continue to work. I love the live feed. The only downside so far is the lack of sophisticated detection zone modification. In order for me to have the widest motion detection closest to the sides of my house requires me to monitor part of a street about 30 feet in front of my house.  Therefore, it picks up a lot of general neighborhood traffic. Additionally, I’m part of the neighborhood Ring network which is nice but some people are way too paranoid and think any car driving down a street is suspicious. The neighborhood alert is a nice feature for list pets.
title: Great added security!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ernie
content: I like the idea of added security- being able to see and hear anyone at my front door, ability to talk with anyone at the front door from anywhere, have a video recording of anyone who entered the viewing area. I believe having the ring doorbell would discourage individuals wanting to steal a package. Also I liked the support including helpful instructional videos as well as written information. I received prompt help with I called the provided number. If the ring device is ever stolen, it will be replaced at no charge.
title: Rings with me

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ted Brooks
content: After two days, not a lot of experience with it.  I'm a little surprised by the limited range of the WiFi, but switch phone to LTE and it seems to work fine.  The picture quality is excellent.  Unfortunately, my location does not take advantage of the fisheye lens because of walls.  It would be nice if a different lens were available for my corridor like entry.  The neighbors app that can be downloaded is nice.  Just last night a neighbor had an unknown visitor at 11:15 PM that appeared to retreat when he saw the Ring Doorbell.
title: Security is Nice

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amanda R.
content: I've had this for about 2 months so far. I only have one Ring device, so I'd say that $30/year plan is worth it. I was surprised at how clear the picture was! My only drawback is that sometimes, if someone is approaching the door quickly (like the speedy UPS delivery guys!), they're walking away by the time the video begins to capture them. The field of view is VERY sensitive. I put it on the lowest radius, however I still get notifications for cars passing by. But those notifications are easy to turn off. Night vision is fantastic as well. I haven't used the talk feature... mainly because I'm old school and forget that I have it!
title: Picture Quality is Fantastic

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lamoine
content: This is not a product I would recommend to anyone I know. Never in my life have I encountered such a finicky and temperamental device. Signal is reduced if your house is made of brick- So essentially every home in every major city will have this issue. Camera feed at night is exclusively black and white no matter what they claim- The agent told me the only way to have color feed at night is to have a light close by. When I sent a pic of the light 6 inches above the doorbell she changed her story and claimed the light "needs to be as bright as the sun." As if that exists. Battery drains even when you are hardwired- This is the most infuriating issue. The booklet claims you would need to recharge the battery every 6-12 months even if hardwired. Not sure how that even makes sense with a power source. With that said, I have had to recharge it once a month. Their only "solution" was for me to buy a spare battery to use when charging the other. Device doesn't work in the cold- 50% of our country experiences a cold winter. Maybe you should only sell to people in the south. Even with a "good" charge the device does not activate consistently- With a full battery, the charge is "Very Good" and I can connect to the camera about 95% of the time. The moment it goes from "Very Good" to "Good" you immediately notice issues. The camera only connects about 50% of the time and half of those times it only puts out audio, and there is no picture. Even though I live in the city, it has stopped capturing motion events when it goes from Very Good to Good. Microphone is too sensitive- Even the slightest breeze will distort the sound and you cant make out what the person is trying to say.
title: What a finicky and temperamental device! Don't waste your money!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brenda StG
content: I always wanted a ring because all my neighbors have one and it comes handy when we have a just in the neighborhood. I got mine it was easy to install and to program. The downfall is that the battery only last about two weeks andOnce the doorbell is ringing it takes about a minute for the image to come on the phone. I was not happy that the battery life was only about a week and a half or two weeks
title: Need some improvements ! Battery not

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Asha
content: Great door bell. Integrated nicely with Alexa, Smarthings and my Samsung smart TV. The video is clear and audio is top quality. Installation was fairly simple, although I added a little silicone, just to make sure no water damage. My only peeve is the sensitivity for motion. My door is close to the road, so every moving thing is picked up. I had to disable live view, which I would have loved for those moments the dogs are barking at something suspicious. Aside from that, it's been working great and I am monitoring battery life.
title: Keeping an eye out!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Barb in Michigan
content: Could not get it to work right. Picked up the trucks going by but not the amazon guy that left packages.  Even with WiFi extender the signal was not strong enough.  I know people who rave about it, just wasn’t for me and my little brick house.
title: Returned

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lyla
content: I am having real trouble with this accessing my phone and telling me that people are at the door, can take up to 4 minutes until I am notified, and ringing on my phone when people at pushing the button.  I notified the company last night but still have not heard from them on how to fix it.  It was easy to install, easy to recharge and has great video when it tells me.  Most of the time it will notify me and I find multiple videos that I wasn't told about.  I am hoping a solution can be found for I am really hearing impaired and do not hear normal door bells.  I figured on my phone with loudness and vibration I would know.  It does let me know about motion but not very quickly.  Fairly useless at this point.
title: Having Trouble with it accessing my phone

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jesus is Lord!
content: We recently purchased the most Amazing beach investment property on the sugary white sand beaches of Pensacola Florida and were looking for something to monitor who is going into and out of the property. Just in case that the old couple who wanted to enjoy a quiet week at the beach didn't end up being 20 college students using mom's credit card! Anyway, so far, so good.
title: Pleasantly surprised!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Obladeeoblada
content: I've had the doorbell for a few months now. At first everything was working properly, but recently I've been getting false motion notifications. I've changed the motion setting on the doorbell, contacted support and I've done everything they've suggested and it keeps happening. In one day I got over 35 false motion detections, this is not including the actual motion detections. I've contacted support multiple times. The first time they said they couldn't help me,  the second time they gave me multiple suggestions, which didn't work, the third time the representative ended our chat session before it was over and the fourth time the representative attempted to upsell me on their products, sell me more accessories and told me to move the beam (that holds up the awning) on my porch. He also told me that it is a passive system and the motion detection happens when there is enough heat to generate detection. He essentially told me there was nothing he could do, even though I told him I had the device for months before having issues. I hate this product and the customer service. Do not recommend.
title: Do Not Recommend.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M. May
content: We recently got the Ring Doorbell and it works great.  The motion detector has settings for how far out it detects motion.  You can customize the alerts to a point which was actually a bit of a learning curve for me.  Initially I had all alerting turned on and my phone was ringing every couple of minutes it seemed like.  So I turned the alerting to only when someone pushes the doorbell.  But I do lose that visibility as to whether someone is creeping around my house.
title: Works very well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paulette
content: The door bell goes off when no one is outside.  It doesn't show the people walking up to the door.  I usually only see them leaving my door.  Have tried to adjust it, but still doesn't do the job that it is advertised as doing.  Today, the doorbell rang and I was already at the door when it finally announced someone is at the door.  All the video shows is the person walking away.  Not very happy with this product.
title: Poor system

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: G Money
content: Made the decision to use the Ring Video Doorbell 2 for the front porch and the Blink XT camera for the porch area and couldn't be happier with what we did. Both have worked exceedingly well and the costs in total were very reasonable. Ring allows you to adjust the range of the area you cover and that's a huge plus when you live on a corner near the street. Until you get your range established which you can easily adjust, your Ring grabs everything in the area and sends warnings to you. It can keep you busy reviewing what just happened until you settle on the range. Chose to direct wire ours and that was absolutely the right call for us as battery wear would have been an issue if we hadn't. Very happy with this purchase and the added clarity that comes with the 2 level Ring versus the original Ring makes the picture clarity much better. Feel much better having made these purchases and don't know why it took me so long to move forward.
title: Does its job!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Regina
content: The picture is clear and it detects motion as described. However, the speaker is awful. The sound is very low, making the communication with the person ringing the bell difficult. Not sure if the sound is something that can be addressed or if that’s just the way it is. Updated***4/20/2020*** It’s just gets worse. The device is slow or never responds when trying to accept a ring. Completely unless! Stay away and save your money!
title: Completely useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Claudie83
content: This doorbell will only record for 20 seconds if movement is detected.  Even if there is still movement, the recording stops.  Very inconvenient and defeats the purpose.  Also very selective as to when it records.  It will pick up cars going down my street, but it never picks up me driving into my driveway.  Starts recording once I park and walk 25 yards to my porch steps...  not very happy with this product as security for my home.
title: LImited Recording

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Illstreet
content: This doorbell is a great idea. I see videos of how they are supposed to work but the motion on this doorbell is seriously flawed. You have to be standing inches from the sensor for it to activate. Inches! Not feet. The motion sensor doesn’t work. The videos are great when someone rings the doorbell. But if someone is walking up the steps to our house it doesn’t capture them until they are literally opening the door. Package thieves don’t ring your bell. We’ve trouble shooted the problem with Ring and their solution is buy more ring equipment (a WiFi extender) to make it work. The motion sensor has nothing to do with the WiFi. We get the videos once the sensor is activated and when the doorbell rings. We have $5 motion lights that work better than this system that cost hundreds of dollars.
title: Motion doesn’t work right for this model

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mark M.
content: So the unit itself is easy to install. But the screws are to short. Who designed such a bad design. Thief's you can just rip it off the wall. The audio is not so good. Its battery operated that is suppose to last 6 months the girl from support told me. Will see in 6 months. UPDATE does not last 6 months! I attached it to my Alexa. Easy enough but all smart devices are making you register which really is a pain but they all are making you do it. Soon will have 1000 passwords for everything we do. Anyways my largest complaint is you cant record video unless you pay Ring. Other units you can do it for free. So get a different unit. why pay ring again? Addition  to my review. The unit itself is very flimsy. Went to charge the battery and all the screws are falling out. The unit is poorly designed. Screw depths of threads should not be only a couple threads. Lower the rating to one star now.  AND its only been two months not the six months the girl on the phone told me it would take before it needs a charge.
title: Better off with a different brand and I was lied to on how long the battery lasts

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C.T.
content: Works great when it works, seems like I have to do some kind of maintenance on it every couple of months though...enough to think it's probably not worth it. EDIT: if you're away and the battery dies (which it does even when hardwired) , you just paid way too much for something that doesn't work except as maybe a decoy. buy Blink - I'm still on my first set of batteries there, getting the same alert/recording bolume, and they were installed long before the ring was. this thing has died out twice in half the time.
title: won't be buying one of these again.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carin Maddux
content: It's much larger than it appears so it sits very awkward. Even with the proper settings, the motion detection is way off. And the best part? It took 2 technicians and over 400 dollars worth of wifi boosters to get it to work even on an already fast network that works just fine for my neighbor's nest doorbell. We'll see if it was worth my time.
title: Had to buy 400 dollars worth of equipment to get it to work

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Darius B
content: Bought at a great price, was delivered quickly and the security and safety provided is pretty good. I was forced to move my router to a more suitable location for optimum performance, along with needing to purchase several echo devices so the doorbell could be heard. The image was choppy until I improved the wifi signal. However, I do live in front of a highway, and the voice performance, hearing on both ends was questionable.
title: Welcome to the world of Amazon & Alexa

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lauren A
content: I bought the ring doorbell 2 for a cabin rental property. I use it to monitor people coming and going from the cabin as well as an easy way for renters to contact me through the doorbell function. I liked it so much I bought one for each of my children. It was easy to install and the battery has lasted for months without recharging! It is well worth the money to have peace of mind.
title: Security for peace of mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: the watcher
content: Buyer beware on this ring2 item... Seems like it  only has a 12 ft from door motion detection plus a delay in videoing...  If you're concerned about packages like me.... This may not serve your purpose in buying it..... I got a motion at back door message at the same time my wife came in the door....she entered the driveway, parked under the carport,exited the car, removed bags from the trunk ..walked around side to remove her pocket book and entered the house... I Need better reaction time then that .....
title: Came and gone.....???

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Misha Collins
content: This thing has really given me some peace of mind when I am home alone, it is good at detecting motion at the door and has kept me from having to answer the door for someone that I don't know when I am home alone. The night vision also works pretty well and I ;like that it makes recordings. the reason for three stars is the app is a little finicky, when it works it's great and when it doesn't it freezes up and I can't use it at all which makes the video doorbell kinda useless. As far as the battery goes, we've needed to charge it about once a month which doesn't bother me, but it might other people so I just thought I would add it here.
title: it is good at detecting motion at the door and has kept ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Meyertopia
content: PRO Very well thought-out unboxing and install/setup experience -- everything you need is included, except a power drill Nice mobile app (iPhone version in my case) Good video quality & night vision CON Very hard to get a good wifi signal through exterior wall @ 2.4 GHz. I was *very* disappointed when I realized I needed to use 5GHz but  it's only supported by the Pro. I would have bought the Pro if I had known how important this is (and the Pro looks better too). And yes, I have a high-end wireless extender right next to the front door. Mediocre wifi means videos that miss the first several seconds of motion, and that freeze after a few seconds of useful recording. And I don't mean the playback freezes, I mean the recording consists mostly of the same still image. All of this I presume is because the upload can't handle the camera's data stream, so those frames get dropped. Changing some settings from the mobile app requires you to physically press the doorbell button, meaning you can only change those settings when you are at home. CONCLUSION I hate regretting a purchase decision, especially at this price point. But I should have gotten the Ring Doorbell Pro. Before you buy the Ring Doorbell 2, make sure you have a solid wifi connection outside your home. If you have any doubt, spend the extra $50 and get the Pro. And make sure your wifi hardware supports 5GHz as well. I really like this product, but its performance depends entirely on the quality of its wifi connection, and being limited to 2.4GHz is a deal breaker.
title: Super product...if it gets a good wifi signal

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ghøst
content: This would be great... nut the mounts are cheap jokes... and the screws are so narrow and small they could easily be bigger and still fit... on top of that there are only to mounting holes so really its not that secure at all... way overpriced for not being able to put an sd card in....
title: Very poor design and cheap mounts....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MandamandaO
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. This was easy to install and works really well. I had to drill in to brick to mount it, but it actually comes with a drill bit for that! I did receive a package from a fedex guy who must be a ninja because he didn’t set it off, but everyone else has, including the hawk who came to visit in the video attached.
title: Good for a little extra security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TR
content: After getting the correct wedge in the correct combination we really like how the Ring works. I did not really need chime pro as requested by Ring support but it is nice to hear when Ring is activated. My new router is less than 15 feet away and audio is poor but video is great
title: Strong Wifi Signal Needed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JimmyG
content: My pathway to front door is straight like an arrow from the street. People were coming up to my door without setting off the motion detector. Even at the highest sensitivity. I called their 800 number twice and was told that the motion detector really only works when people walk across the path of the detector. That when someone walks directly straight to the Ring Bell there is a strong possibility that it will not set off the detector. So I returned the item. I don't know if this is an inherent problem with all motion detectors or just theirs. If they ever solve this problem I will definitely be a buyer. I gave two stars because of their tech. support, well packaged product. It also does have a nice camera and works as designed for talking to someone at the front door.
title: Motion Detection Needs Improvement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Darrin Jones
content: I researched the Ring Video Doorbell 2 extensively before buying and I could not be happier. The installation process both online and with the device is streamlined and easy to follow. They address all the details and even provide installation tools and help videos on the app. The video and audio quality is super and I love the motion alerts. You can customize the settings to fit your needs. Take the time to read and follow the instructions. They have it down to a science. Love it.
title: Exceeds Expectations!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ryan Browning
content: For the low price of $200 you can beta test software for Ring! Cool concept, but still seems like they’re years away from a viable product. I really regret spending the money on this thing. My internet is smoking fast and this thing functions maybe 50% of the time, both device and phones on solid WiFi. I think you wasted your $1.2 billion on buying this company, Amazon. Unless you plan on fully revamping the software, sensitivity and alert reaction times? We’ll see but I’m not so hopeful. Ring support sucks in my opinion, just want to review connection speeds and reset the thing endlessly. I just want it to do what it’s supposed to do by the description. Device health reads good, 77 mpbs down, 9.4 mbps up, 57 ms ping on a Nighthawk 5 gig router. I can only connect to live view intermittently, often takes a LONG time and often multiple tries. Alerts come through after people knock on my door or a split second before they push the Ring button. This is on both Android and iOS by the way. Think twice on this one.
title: Pay money to beta test Ring!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: T. Mannion
content: Wow! I have been getting the following message whenever signing in for more than a week v "Error occurred while trying to perform operation. Try again later." Have read at various web sites that this has been an issue for years. No help from support. Really, really, really disappointing. Cannot recommend.
title: Ring App stinks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Krista D
content: We had a few problems getting it to connect to our Wi-Fi, but Ring customer service was great and got us online in no time. Actual installation on the house took less than 30 mins and hardest part was deciding exactly how and where to position it for our desired viewlines Update Motion detection is a little on the slow side. And occasionally misses completely. Also has trouble connecting from phone when away from home to answer a motion or ring event.
title: Love it. Helpful support from Ring. Motion detection is a littls slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jill Henry
content: Takes a while to connect and the voice speaker is hard to understand. WIFI is close, within 12 feet and only the front door between, so kind of disappointing that we cant use it to speak to people as they come to door because you cant understand them.
title: spends a lot of time spinning

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JFW
content: Easy to install with clear instructions . Works fine with my own doorbell and the low volt connection  keeps my Ring 2 lithium battery charged.  I am retired and like being able to restrict my motion alerts during the day and keep them in the late evenings and during the night. I can change this anytime e.g. when I am gone on vacation. The videos are clear and my wife really likes the ring alerts and being able to see and talk to persons at the front door from inside the house.
title: Ring 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Leston Scott
content: Really love this! The Ring 2 is really phenomenal. It has a great video screen, lots of features, including the ability to limit how sensitive it is to people walking by, etc., I've tried some of the 'bargain' doorbells, and believe me, don't waste your time and money. When you change the battery (which is NOT often), it logs back on quickly with no fuss. It links u with no fuss. The doorbell rings nearly instantly, and the audio is good (which was horrible on the chepie unit). Definitely a good buy.
title: Works wonderfully!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Daniel A. Shelly
content: I too was wooed by the possibility of being able to see who is at the door and see what may have happened over the course of the day. The lag from when you get a notification and to when the video pops up on your phone is the time it takes the UPS delivery person to drop off the package and all I see is them getting back into their truck... Ring needs to change their business model so that you have at least one day of past recordings or that you could store videos on your phone and delete as needed.  For the cost of the device, to then hold the customer hostage to a subscription for the very essence of the device is misleading.  Thus, be advised that if you want this doorbell to work as you think it should, multiply the list price by the annual subscription and that then is the real price to do what you thought it would do for the list price.  Very disappointed consumer!
title: Tricked

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John
content: Night vision is distorted and colors are off, looks like everything is covered in snow.  System is slow to react when triggered and log in is slow and doesn't work properly.  The system is very close to WiFi and a booster does not help. A thief could be a couple miles away before your are notified and get logged in. Motion detection is not reliable. To make matters worse customer service is terrible.
title: System has many defects and customer service is very bad.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kim U
content: UPDATE: They sent me a replacement that is doing the same thing. :-(  When we first got the doorbell, I noticed it was real hard to hear the person talking outside and there was a lot of background noise. After about 5 months, the sound outside stopped working so we can't talk to anyone that rings the doorbell. For the cost, I don't know that I would buy another one. It's nice to have for the video and motion, but we can't talk to anyone through it 😕
title: The sound/speaker outside quit working after about 5 months

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chip Crockett
content: I'll confess that I haven't actually operated the product yet.  That's because I've run into several problems during installation.  The installation documents and videos are centered around the idea that your  existing doorbell switch is installed conveniently at 4ft on a outer flat wall.  But this is NOT where most door bell switches are installed.  Most are installed in the door frame at arm level (3ft - which is too low for the camera) or an appurtenant window frame, neither of which provide a wide enough surface for a stable installation of the Ring 2.  I don't think Ring does enough to prepare customers for the fact that many installations will require relocating the existing door bell switch, which could involve a lot of complicated modification to your home's exterior.  Suggest that before you buy a Ring 2, look at where your existing door bell switch is installed to determine if it will need to be moved, and how complicated and costly that will be.
title: May be a good product operationally, but the installation is not as easy as it sounds.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeff
content: I read the reviews but for some reason I thought I would have better luck or at least mabey satisfied as much as the few five stars. Believe what you read this thing frustrated me so much. I downloaded the app got it all ready, put on a table and the very first and second pass it notified my phone that it detected someone, I opened and there I was. Great look everyone another family member downloaded the app, and that was it. Now it delayed when it did pick me up but most of the time just didnt work. I am not only returning it I'm frustrated and angry now.
title: Horrible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kyle
content: Awesome camera. Works great. Although, after a 30 day free trial, you must pay $3 a month in order for the app to save your videos, which is kind of the main purpose for having a doorbell camera. The subscription doesn’t affect my review, as the product is still fantastic. It also notifies you of crime or suspicious activity being reported by other Ring users around your community. I bought this for half off on Amazon Prime day. Very satisfied with this purchase.
title: Great purchase

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: bluemax
content: Did not like inconsistent power supply, does not matter whether the power is connected to house power the battery ran down within 3 weeks was force to buy a back up battery also the chime needs a gizmo in order to ring. The finality is that all that is advertise should be taken with a grain of salt.
title: has to adjusted to reflect your needs.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: anonymous
content: I love the Ring doorbell.  It is peace of mind knowing that I can monitor my house even when I'm not there.  It was easy to install and download the app.  I read other reviews (on a different site) that talked about having to pay a monthly fee for the app.  I have no idea what model they have but the Ring 2 does not appear to have any additional costs, the app was free and they did not ask for payment information.  I would recommend the Ring 2.  Video quality is good and the sound and night vision are good too.
title: Great investment

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. SCHIERMAN
content: I just got my Ring Video Doorbell a few days ago and so far I love it!  Installation and setup were a breeze.  I used a wireless setup with the battery.  I recommend purchasing an extra battery as charging time is about 8 hours.  I also got an indoor chime which was also easy to set up, but it has an odd selection of ring tones, maybe for Halloween and they'll update after the holiday?  Also be aware, you get 30 days of the recording service, after that it's $30/year to continue the service, and you really have to to get the full use out of the device.  I'll update later when I learn about how well it stands up to time and the elements.  So far it's a winner.
title: So far I'm very impressed with the tech

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ben Sanders
content: This is no better than the original.  In fact many more connectivuty and reliability issues.  Same poor motion radius instead of geo areas like flood lights.  And though it claims to be a 1080p camera the quality of recordings are no better and the viewing angle is less.
title: If you have a first gen save your money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Fitzgerald
content: I love the Ring video doorbell 2!  It has a wide range of vision, but adjustable motion detection sensitivity. — which is great since we live near a busy road and have outside animals and I had been worried about both things causing unnecessary alerts.  With the sensitivity dialed down slightly, we don’t have that problem. The only issue we’ve had is with the live mode, but I’m sure that is because of our WiFi strength. All in all, the ring video doorbell is exactly what I wanted.
title: Exactly What I Was Looking For

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: glen
content: Best doorbell cam on the market in my view. Response is instant. Only downfall is no internal storage so it makes u kinda have to pay for the subscription. Once u use the app youll want to keep full access after the trial. Only 3 bucks and its actually well worth it. Wasnt happy about it until going through trial but my view has changed cause everything works so good. Makes it worth it.
title: Best doorbell cam on the market.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rnewton
content: The doorbell is very handy to have for being aware when deliveries arrive. The videos stored are of value in case you missed a caller. The doorbell sound volume through a smart phone when the doorbell button is actually  pushed is easy to hear. The batteries run out of power within a few months but will be hooking up a transformer to constantly charge the batteries. We will see if that works and if it will keep the batteries charged in the middle of winter.
title: Performs well so far

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dick Renner
content: The Ring Doorbell in theory is great. I bought this product last year and I was able to view visitors easily from my phone and view any suspicious motion/noise in real-time. This product worked great when my router was only one wall away from the front door. Now fast forward a few months... We moved to a home where the router is inside the house around 20' feet away from the front door/doorbell. I setup the Ring Doorbell inside the house, worked perfectly. Once I installed the doorbell to the front door, it says that the signal is too weak. I have a brand new router and the fastest internet XFinity offers. This product is now useless to me unless I completely rearrange my router setup which simply will not work for my needs.
title: Unless you have your router within 10' of your Front Door/Doorbell, Don't buy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DomoMom
content: I did not have a wired doorbell so I opted for the wireless option on the Ring Doorbell 2.  I was blown away with the HD quality of the camera and the night vision.  I am a big fan of the Ring products and I personally feel they are a fantastic deterrent to home burglaries as a part of your overall protection package.  The fact that they are triggered with motion detection is also a great feature and adds to the many reasons to purchase this product.
title: Great Product! Very, Very Smart

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TrueMe
content: So I normally do not say or give these kind of review.  I'm considerate.  This is by far the WORST product and it's ARROGANT Technical Support.  It worked awesome for first 2 weeks..... not its as good as an ordinary bell.  The app on phone does not work.... I'm done the install/uninstall and resetting dance over 10 times and this thing does not work.  It's a VERY expense Door Bell.  I want my money back.
title: One of the Worst Product from Amazon.....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: BOO BOO
content: Have Purchased the Ring over a Year ago.  Still waiting For the Great Fix. When someone Rings the Doorbell,  Sill can't seem to open up the video in the app to see who is at the Door. Have to open and close the app a few times to see is ringing.  The first ring was just Great, this on just Sucks, yes, sorry, but just Sucks. I have to relay Extenders, but the bell just doesn't work. Try Fixing it Properly.  OKAY, ONE STAR.  THE FIRST ONE WAS GREAT
title: Sorry, but just Crap, Needs a Better APP

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dessie Wewers
content: 9-5-18 I have owned this for a little over a month.  I love the concept of it and when it works, i love being able to see who is at the door and able to communicate.  Another great feature is being able to see other people's posts in the neighborhood to determine if there is any issues around your home. Unfortunately, this unit has had issues from the very beginning.  I say this unit, because i am sure a lot work perfectly normal and this is one of the few. The issue i have is when the alert occurs, my phone has an issue with connecting to the device sometimes.  I feel that it goes to sleep and i have to wake it up and then it starts working fine. The first time it started showing black screens frequently, i contacted customer service and they walked me through a factory reset.  They advised that they noticed the unit was not functioning as well as it should, but it appeared to be working fine after the reset.  If it occurs again, to give them a call. The second time i called customer service, the same issue was occurring and there were times when motion would not register.  The gentleman walked through the reboot and found the multiple instances when a black screen would appear.  From the beginning, he was leading on that my bandwidth is the issue.  I ran a speed test and tested my bandwidth.  40mb D / 10mb U and currently using 400kb D / 40kb U.  Although the unit transfers video when it works perfectly, when it doesnt, it is due to my network. The gentleman called back after he discussed the issue with others and advised me that everyone feels the issue is with my internet.  The steps to correct this issue is to factory reset my router and if this does not work, contact my ISP to determine if they have an issue with the internet.  I advised there are multiple people around my neighborhood that has the same ISP and suggested to find out if others are calling in for the same issue around my area.  After a short time, no feedback.  In the end, I factory reset the router and initially worked.  I highly doubt it will continue to work. Next day update.  Multiple rings and motion events occured and the screen is still black.  This is after resetting my router, disconnecting the ring and sitting it on top of the router, factory resetting.  I was advised i would be receiving a follow up today, but to no avail. The concept of this device is great as long as it works.  Unfortunately, my return on Amazon has expired and when contacting Customer Service, they will put the blame on your network and not a defective unit. Purchase at your own risk.  If you do purchase and find issues, I would return it immediately before your return policy expires. Update 9/12/18 After posting this comment, I received notification from Ring and was assigned a specialist to handle the issue.  After a few tests with the unit, they replaced the unit. New unit arrived and installed. Unit appears to be more responsive and no black videos so far. Unfortunately, I will not be purchasing the security package as once intended due to the CS as a security system will require a lot of interaction. I would increase the star rating to 3 for the unit as i do believe it is a good piece of electronics, but since everything relies on Ring cloud to use this (even if you do not use the subscription), I feel the CS needs improvement and not get special treatment when you finally write a honest but poor review.
title: Great concept unless it breaks and Customer Service doesn't help.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Luis Gonzalez
content: Bad product.  Go with a good CCTV product if you are serious about security.  This is mainly a toy for the kids to have fun looking at themselves through the camera.  Also, I think it is very intrusive to your privacy with all the questions it asks.  Wish I had returned it before the return date needed. Also they tried making the set up too user friendly and it is actually more confusing than easy.
title: Look elsewhere.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M McGowan
content: I installed the Ring 2 at my keypad for our entry gate. In theory, a visitor could come up, press the button, and talk to us. Well, the speaker quality is so abysmally poor that it's nearly impossible to talk to visitors. I can hear them ok, but only that. I would love to be able to mount an external speaker so that this can be remedied, but, so far, haven't had any luck finding a way to do that without disassembling the unit and soldering in. This product needs to be improved on the audio portion.
title: So far, it's unusable for two-way talk

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sam Hamadi
content: I wish we had this ring doorbell for a long time now, this is one of the best inventions ever as it makes us feel safe at home the whole time. The motion on this is very accurate as you can also change the range of motion under the settings. This makes a great doorbell whether you are home are you are outside of the home because you can see who's at your door from the ring door application. You can also communicate through your phone with the person standing at your door. This is an amazing tool for package deliveries, End it also scares package thieves away. We bought three ring doorbell's for each of our doors which we truly love and makes us feel safe at all times.
title: The best invention ever !!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Adam Wall
content: All the Ring products are great. had this on our front door for awhile then bought a Ring Pro. Swapped this to the side door. Just renamed it and it worked immediately. This does use the battery pack, that i only charged once and have never had to recharge as of yet :-). Also connects to our existing doorbell wiring so we get the doorbell action to our chimes. A must have for protection and surveillance
title: A must have for protection and surveillance

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gretchen Good
content: The first month or two was great until the part you had to send in monthly to get your videos if you want to see them so since then I have paid for a warranty extension but I have to re-install both of the doorbells which is not so easy it doesn't want to read the box code and I don't want to have to take the doorbells off the wall with my screwdriver to get to the button and to the code that it wants to read in the rich read install my doorbells so they're basically useless to me right now other than to bringing up the Bell but I can't see who is there because I had can't set it back up again since that.
title: Not so great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ronald Saunders
content: Not the quality I expected. Doorbell rings randomly when no one is there. Support was going to send a “complimentary” replacement but it appears that now I will be receiving a new mounting bracket or maybe just screws, not sure from messages received. Confused about what a mounting bracket and/or mounting screws will do to solve this problem. Am looking at alternative hardware
title: Ghost in the machine

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sister Ana Cristina
content: Now I can see in my office who is at the door. Sometimes my 85 year old dad stays home alone and I can see who is at the door or any motion movement. I live in Lima Perú. This works great and the battery lasts a long time. The only thing I would like is to regulate the volume so that the person at the door can hear better. Great product.
title: The only thing I would like is to regulate the volume so that the person ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Topaz Fire
content: Difficult to install, difficult to remove screw to recharge battery and now I do not have a working doorbell!  I consider this a MAJOR DESIGN FLAW! If the bell itself is hooked up to the wiring my standard bell used, why doesn’t it feed power to the device instead of a battery?  It’s a lot of money and inconvenience for seniors like us who are trying to impress security in our home.
title: Disappointed!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Horseman
content: Merry Christmas to everybody and a Happy New Years yes I love to ring doorbell the only reason why I gave Wi-Fi of 4 and really you can't blame the Wi-Fi it all depends how strong it is in your house but the most favorite actor is great night vision it's good but I don't like night vision I like to see what the person is wearing the color and everything so really you can't blame the night vision of doing this job the way it's supposed to it's just me but all in all it's a great product
title: Excellent product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John M.
content: Neighbor ordered & installed a wired unit; we ordered Ring 2 with battery due to size. Unit is okay but battery life leaves a lot to be desired as with full first charge lasted less than one month which was a major disappointment. Function is okay, speaker is weak, easy install, just short battery life. Unit fronts a street with some traffic, but not really heavy traffic.
title: Works okay, but has short battery life.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Linda Cooney
content: I live in a historic district bordered by subsidized apartments and am currently undergoing knee replacements for both knees.  I have a monitored security system, two yipper dogs, and i shoot very very well.  The other day, the yippers set off that someone was at the door, I hobbled to the door, and without opening it, communicated with a man who wanted me to open the door, which did not happen.  The ring system will give me that added security to allow me to know who is at my door, record issues that I need to, communicate without opening the door, and report suspicious behavior.  I am a member of my local Citizens Police Academy and I know that security is critical in todays world.  It was easy to install, after I cried and my son came over to install it, worked right away, and I have seen my Fed Ex delivery driver for the first time in 19 years.
title: Old Lady Security Concerns

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Emily P.
content: I really wanted this to work better.  It only gives me a motion alert when someone is already at my door, despite having it set to the furthest motion range, sometimes I get a barrage of false motion alerts when there is no movement outside and when I do answer a ring or motion alert from the app, there's such a delay and glitch in the video that the person is normally gone by the time the video feed shows up.
title: Has potential, but too many glitches

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Heisenberg
content: Bought 2 and very disappointed in this. Motion is delayed by as much as 1 minute so by the time I get a notification the person at the door is gone.  Bought for live as I am not willing to pay a monthly fee for playback.  Aslo nightvision is non existant. EXTREME disappointment!
title: EXTREME disappointment!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeni
content: Purchased and was happy until I realized it wasn’t actually a doorbell. Nothing rings in the house! It only alerts my cell some one is at the door. If I don’t have my cell in my hand whom ever is pushing the ring button is out of luck.
title: The doorbell that is not a doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alice
content: The signal was weak and I'm in the process of returning the item. The photo was delayed
title: need to be replaced

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: BirdGirl
content: Very well thought out and designed product. I comes with everything needed to install. Installation is easy and removing the old door bell and installing the new one on the wires took about 15 minutes (the instructions were excellent plus there are a lot of videos showing this step by step) . Doing a wireless installation would be faster. Contrary to other reviews, we thoughly tested and found the sensitivity to motion alerts can be adjusted so it does not trigger on people just walking nearby but does trigger to someone in coming close to the door (or even in our yard but not the sidewalk if we want). It has about 1 second lag time which is just fine. The audio quality (both directions) is excellent. It sounds like we are right next to the door to the person ringing the bell.
title: I wish more products were this well designed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Flowtronics
content: If you subscribe to the plan this doorbell is everything it claims to be. I Don't have to worry about power with existing wiring, I feel safer in a big city, it's a small deterrent against porch pirates, and is a convenience when hosting. Without the subscription you (tried it out on accident) youhave to be real quick at checking the app with every notification. Don't answer quickly enough and not only do you not know what happened but your worried about what you possibly missed.
title: Works well but needs subscription for majority of use.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: claudia coello
content: Love the ring doorbell2. It was really easy to install, don't need to have any tools, comes with everything you need. The app is really simple to use too and gives lots of options. Makes me feel a lot safer know who walks into my property. No problem with getting wet when it rained. Only thing i wish is that i was able to move the lense. I have a corner property so i don't care about one of the sides but even when i put the piece to angle the doorbell it doesn't go as far as i wish it could, so what i did was just bought a ring camera and put it on that other side to have all angles.
title: Great product, gives piece of mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Road Toad
content: Did not take long at all install and hardwiring it to an existing doorbell setup. Works as advertised. BUT ... best you ensure you have a decent wifi signal strength in your home as this will draw heavily from it when its activated to record or used in Live View. With a weak or low signal, the sound recording and video recording can be jumpy or messy. With a strong wifi signal it works fantastic.
title: Easy and quick install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeff Probst
content: I'm not going to write a huge review on this, there are plenty on Amazon. What I will say is that this refurbished, used, whatever, arrived looking and working like new. Everything was in the box and organized like it had never been opened. At half the price of a "brand new unit", buy this you won't be sorry! Well as long as you know this is what you want.
title: "Refurbished"?? Looks brand new!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Matt B.
content: Not so happy with the video feed/live feature. We only get the feed while on wi fi. We get most of the notifications, but can’t see who’s there if on data only. My family uses Verizon and AT&T with good signal strength in our area, and we have a strong wi fi system at our home, which is an office as well, so I think the issue is with the Ring software and devices. It works fine when we’re home. I called customer service and the non-caring “expert” told me to re-load the App and call my service providers. Sure, that’ll do it ): C”mon Amazon, your advocating this product, so make it work like you show in all the ads.
title: Not completely what it says it does....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: FKSF
content: Setting it up is easy. And it works amazing the first time, though every consecutive ring is hit and miss. Sometimes there's no delay between ringing and chiming/showing up on your phone, sometimes there's a delay of up to 30 (THIRTY) seconds. It's crazy and makes the whole thing useless. not to mention the video that rarely works.
title: By far, the most unreliable doorbell I've ever had.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jake23456
content: Have this located at my front door. I have the motion sensor setup on almost the lowest setting but still picks up motion from vehicles passing by in front of our house about 30-40ft away. Then when someone does come to the front door the motion activates right when they get to the door and not when they are walking up to it. I do not like how this motion sensor is setup for this product. Something that needs to be improved for sure. Other than this motion sensor issue the camera works well and takes video clearly. It is choppy at times but that is do to poor WiFi on my end. Still all in all a good product!
title: Good product/poor motion sense

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Texas Gal
content: Good daytime picture when it worked, but sometimes the picture color was bad (blue tinge over the whole picture, other times blue and orange colors were reversed--so the sky was orange).  Night vision was terrible--very fuzzy and could only see about ten feet.  Ring's customer service said these were known problems that they were working on.  Motion detection was also intermittent--sometimes never got an indication and sometimes only got it when very close to the camera.
