After a few minutes it stop recording even when there's people in front of the ring. It looks like there's a non working pixel or something like that.
title: Not the best but good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brenda Haines
content: I purchased a floodlight cam wired, a spotlight cam with 2 batteries and a solar panel, and a battery ring doorbell 2.  An electrician put up the two cams and I installed the doorbell.  I used both wedges which give me a perfect view, better than I anticipated. All is working well except, the mic on the doorbell amplifies on my phone and my Echo Show, but does not reach the doorbell. I  looked in the app to see that the mic was turned on, it is. I read that I could need a chime, or amplifier for my WiFi. I will look into that but it is peculiar since my Router is closest to the doorbell and only about 12 feet away.  I purchased Ring Assist and will call to get their help.
title: One minor issue to resolve

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: FleshWhistle
content: Video quality is decent but two way audio is distorted. Delay in notifying you.. Detects movement every time.  Battery will die in about a month if you have alot of detection. Catches every bus that drives by, even with motion detector set to low.. UPDATE. 2 way talk is completely muffled. Dont purchase ring doorbell. They won't replace it
title: Stay away

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Science Teacher
content: I have been wanting to get a ring for quite awhile and finally decided to go for it when they were on sale for cyber Monday. All night long we get notifications of moths or bugs, yet don't get notifications of cars in our driveway or people. The other issue is that it takes forever to connect, often over a minute. We are quite frustrated.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Vicky L
content: I hesitated on buying this product after reading some negative reviews about the camera not working properly and the cost of the yearly video storage; however after using this for over a month now I can say I'm extremely happy with this product.  I haven't had any issues to date and the camera video quality is wonderful.  The pictures are crisp and clear; even at night.  I know others have stated that Ring shouldn't charge for storage of the videos; however I'm more than happy to pay a mere $30 a year for this service.  Its a great piece of mind.  Highly Recommend this product.
title: Great Product / Highly Recommend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ddrum
content: Amazing price for this on Prime day.  I used the hard wire method to install (which really easy). Batterie method would be even easier.  It's the best! We were out for a walk and a delivery requiring a signature arrived at our house. I spoke directly to the delivery person and he circled back so I wouldn't miss the delivery. Works great, looks good and the features are excellent. We liked it so much we got a second one for our side door!
title: Ring, should have bought this earlier.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jim C.
content: I like the clarity of the videos.  But for me, the most important thing is that I don't have to look out the bay window blinds to see who is at the door.  I also am alerted and have video of every package delivery.  I get nearly daily deliveries and not always home when delivered.  I have not had a porch pirate yet, but is nice knowing you will have video of it if it ever happens.  Two other neighbors also have Ring 2.  This was a good purchase.
title: Comforting to have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shashidhar
content: This thing just doesn’t work - even though it claims to have strong signal.  WiFi repeater is right next to device, strong signal. Connection drops and system never alerts you.. It has endlessly frustrated everyone in the house, and our guests. Addendum: after a while, the thing started working. Maybe a software update? Not sure. The only bad thing is that it misses the first few seconds of video capture.
title: Now it does work.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RachelTowns
content: So, definitely serves its purpose for seeing who comes and goes at your door. But, unless you are close to your wifi, speaking across it is nearly impossible. I tried to speak to a driver and it was just all broken up and crackling. I finally got him to understand, "LEAVE UNDER CHAIR". The clarity is not very good voice wise. Visual is pretty good, like the app usage, comes with a variety of tools to adjust it just right. Just wish the speaker was better.
title: Video and app is great.... voice and sound not so great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chippy
content: Set-up was fairly easy and with everything included in the package it made it a breeze. My only thing is, if you do have a two story house and your router is on a different floor you will definitely need a wifi-extender for this to have reliable functionality. Otherwise the product is great and I have it hard-wired to my current doorbell so I love that it helps add security for my home. Next up is the Ring Alarm to add to the whole package.
title: My Wife Loves it More than me

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Teller
content: I hate the fact that I use my own wifi to access this stupid thing BUT if you don't pay a monthly fee you can not see the motion activation feature.  I called the company and they are "SORRY I FEEL THAT WAY"  I'm glad they are sorry for the way I feel.  I asked why they didn't advertise you pay a fee to see the motion activation, but the person I talked to said they thought they did???? No they don't so if you want an expensive doorbell cam get this one or you can look on amazon and find one much better that does not charge you a fee to use your own wifi to see motion outside your door.  NEVER BUY THIS!!!!!  it will be in a box on a shelf in the garage until I throw it away. TRASH COMPANY
title: get ready to pay

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brandi Rose
content: I really like this BUT I have an old house and a low budget. I can afford to have it hard wired outside(no previous doorbell). The battery last a pretty long time I just didnt want to have to do that....so i purchased the solar charger for this...and returned. See that review for more info. So all in all it's a decent product.
title: Good product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kinslynn Stratford
content: This little gadget is pretty awesome. Install was easy, comes with charging pack. The video quality (as long as your internet signal is good) is great. Sometimes sensitivity can be too high but you can tweak it to meet your needs or even turn off notifications. I haven't had it more than a month but it asks you to purchase a membership to store videos. It's very inexpensive but I wasnt aware that you had to pay extra monthly/annual to maintain videos.
title: Great Home Addition

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert Koch
content: When I bought this product it kept asking to buy a support program.  I really am not interested in a support program but if you don't buy it, it stops saving video.  None is saved. Makes the unit totally worthless for any evidence to show police.  I want to return it but as it turns out both Amazon and of course the feature thats saves video stops working at the same time.
title: Must Pay to Save any Video

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Movie lover from HB
content: The installer tried for a couple of hours to get this to work.  Then we called Ring Tech on the phone that THAT tech spent over 20 minutes giving us steps, and he finally admitted it was defective (but perhaps it was just defective with OUR system). BUT, We ALSO got the RING FLOODLIGHTS with CAMERA (for front yard and attic (rats)- AND THE FLOODLIGHTS SET UP FINE AND WORK GREAT - LOVE THOSE!
title: WOULD NOT WORK WITH OUR FIOS ROUTER - OR JUST DEFECTIVE?

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ry Tehomes
content: This is very worth it. It is a great feature to have and something i wish I got sooner. Set up is very easy and quality is very good. Comes with both black and silver case and with supplies to attach to your house. The neighborhood app that comes with this starts with a 30 day free trial then a 30/year subscription which is cool because you can see what other neighbors who have this product are reporting.
title: Worth it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Themaildude
content: Like it very much! Easy to install! I wired mine, everything you need for installation! Only reason I give it four stars, you get past triggers for free the first month, then they push cloud service on you! I wish that it would be set up so that you can store x amount of video on your phone, then delete as you need to! I purchased an I phone with large amounts of storage, I should have been given that option, not just force into cloud service!
title: Useful device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tim from Ohio
content: The package comes with everyting you might need, and Ring anticipates a few common as well as odd, but realistic, scenarios.  A multi-use screwdriver is included, although I had to find my own micro phillips to remove the existing doorbelll.  The package even comes with spare screws in case you "drop one in the bushes".  The battery did take forever to charge (near the max stated of 8ish hours).  If the box had mentioned that, I would have opened it to start that process sooner while I did other things.  A USB cable is included as well, but no A/C adapter.  Once installed, it would not "see" me but it was dark (it is December...).  It must have "learned" overnight and during the day as it worked too well the next day, picking up passing cars well outside the stated range in the app.  The app is mostly great and allows adjustments.  Having to push the Ring button to sync makes sense, but is annoying when making changes away from your front door.  I created the app account with my email and added my wife, but cannot grant her the same access I have to a couple of items.  Hopefully this will be added in an update.
title: Very well thought out design and installation/guide

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Reviewer123
content: Fun gadget allows me to watch live what’s happening outside my front door. Issues: despite being wired and having excellent wireless internet connection, I have found instances where I was alerted  that motion was detected but then it never recorded a video, or just a black (blank) video appears. Lots of lag/buffering at times with video which would be problematic if there were ever to be a crime at my door - not confident the Ring 2 would capture it but it’s fun and useful - more of a toy than something I can rely on for security. Not what I expected but it’s good. Just not great and I don’t think there is better.
title: Not perfect, but it’s fun and mostly works.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Heather
content: We love our Ring! We had a package stolen from our porch, which prompted us to get this. We feel safe knowing we can see what goes on outside when we are either inside, or not home. It comes with a sticker you can put on your window saying your home is secured by Ring, which is a great touch. We do not feel the need to display that, because the doorbell seems like enough of a deterrent!
title: Makes you feel safe, and works very well.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steve Fishman
content: The Ring Video Doorbell 2 is very easy to install and configure. From what I can tell so far (about 2 weeks since install) the battery should last for 2 to 3 months. I did buy a second battery. I have it fully charged and ready to go. This will make it easy to do the battery swap. The app configuration is simple and setting up alerts on your phone is also simple. I also installed the Desktop app for MacOS. I also have a bunch of Amazon Echo devices sprinkled through out my house. I installed and configured the Alexa skill so now the Alexa devices announce when there is motion or when someone presses the doorbell. I am happy with the features and functionality. It would be nice if Ring introduced Apple HomeKit support in the future.
title: Very easy to install and configure

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Thomas A. Aiellos
content: Was sucked in like thousands of other unsuspecting buyers. The main problem is that unless you have a network totally dedicated to this doorbell, you won’t get your visuals until “at best” after whatever is stolen is gone. The ten seconds delay after the activation affords any criminal plenty of time to make a clean getaway.
title: A completely dedicated network signal is a must!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lisa K
content: The battery life is short and it takes about 9 hours to charge. So basically you have no doorbell for 1 day. The motion detection is difficult to get in range. You either can't view your property or it goes off every time a car drives by I have trouble getting a live view unless i am home - so what's the point really. It's a neat idea but i am not really happy with the product. Until they work out the bugs , I would not recommend this .
title: Battery is terrible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Frosty
content: Our whole family has ring video doorbell 2 and it is an awesome security system.  It gives you motion and ring alerts, takes good video of event, allows you to be aware of neighborhood security events, allows us to watch each other’s homes while on vacation, and is very economical.  Can’t say enough about this ring video-doorbell.  Ours is WiFi.  Highly recommend for every home.
title: Awesome security system

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Snow Bunny
content: I live in the mountains. Only humans, cats, and feral pigs walk past my front door. This Ring doorbell catches the motion of humans (sometimes) and feral pigs (sometimes). Stealthy cats don't trigger the motion detector. The doorbell function works well. it rings loudly in my house, especially with the help of Chime Pro.
title: Catches motion of humans and feral pigs

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jae Fox
content: Really easy to install and begin using. The motion detection is a little slow to pickup sometimes and a little to anxious to pickup when the wind is blowing. They’ve just recently developed an update to set motion detection to people only. Hopefully this helps. These things are super minor though. This is a great, low key watch dog for the front porch!
title: Great, low key watch dog for the porch!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kim P.
content: I don't often write reviews for products, but this doorbell has frustrated me enough to begin. I purchased the Ring Doorbell 2 roughly a month ago. At first, it worked perfectly. It captured great video and there were no problems. One month later, in the same house with the same wifi router and conditions, it has suddenly decided that the signal strength is weak. I had my internet provider check the router and all is good, so I called Ring customer service. Their very helpful response was that my wifi must be struggling to reach the doorbell (which is less than 30 feet away from the router with nothing blocking it) and I would need to purchase a wifi extender which- SURPRISE- Ring sells for an additional $50 or so. Maybe I'm imagining things, but it seems a little crazy that it would work perfectly for a month then suddenly stop. Based on reviews, I'm not the only person with this experience. Hopefully it can be worked out, but it seems like a faulty product, by design or accident.
title: Worked for the first month, then failed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jack Safire
content: A waste of money, barely works, night vision is horrendous, faces are unrecognizable at a couple feet away. they force you to buy a yearly subscription or else you cant record or save anything. And the battery only lasts a couple of days instead of a month as advertised. Stay away from this scam, and don't be fooled by the fact that its an amazon Brand.
title: Very disappointed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: HME
content: We’ve purchased two of these now and the first one was purchased this past November and already doesn’t work. It stopped working after our house lost power for a short period of time.  Put a fully charged battery in it and it doesn’t even light up, absolutely nothing. Of course the return date of 1/31 has just passed so I can’t get my money back. The power loss occurred on 2/1 so I wouldn’t have been able to return it anyway. Not impressed and hoping a replacement can be sent ASAP. It worked pretty well beforehand - great picture and range - but how temperamental are these items if a short term power loss ruined it? It didn’t ruin the other one we have but is it next ....hope not as these things aren’t cheap.
title: Didn’t make it 3 months

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Anne Marie
content: We get a lot of false notifications on our ring. I think if a bug flies by it goes off. I think we just need to work on the settings and maybe buy the bracket that lets you adjust the vision more precisely.  There are times when we are away it will not come up. There are also times the video is fuzzy. Most of the time it works very well.  Even though we have a small house we also purchased the Ring Chime Pro which is a WiFi extender. This improved the video quality.
title: Almost works too well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ChristineR
content: This product was amazing at first. My device is kept under a covered patio and is in excellent condition. Exactly 2 days after my warranty ran out the device stopped working completely. Did all the trouble shooting and called the company they said I needed to buy a new one with more warranty.
title: 1 year review

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: BK
content: I wish I can give negative stars to this product. Takes for ever when you need it. Works less than 10% of the time. Other time keeps spinning or says Live view ended. My Doorbell2 does not work. I tried resetting the app and the bell myself. I also called customer support and they suggested I reset everything again and they even added 5 days of trial video recording. But its again dropping intermittently like before. It's highly unreliable and multiple times when someone rings my bell, I cannot connect to the app. I have confirmed and my wifi speed is ~90Mbps DL and UL and my phone has more than 20 Mbps DL and UL and still, it does not connect
title: Highly Unreliable Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Fire and Vice
content: I am a single mom with two school age kids. I decided to get the Ring 2 Doorbell after my 16 year old answered the door and a person posing as a utility company personnel told him we had an unpaid bill. I was at my other son's dentist appointment when my son called me freaking out over this. There has been a rash of robberies from home invasions to people stealing delivery packages from doorsteps in our neighborhood and I had enough. The Ring 2 was easy to set up and install and works great! It's given all of us more security and peace of mind.
title: The Ring 2 was easy to set up and install and works great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Audi
content: This worked moderately okay for a couple of years, but it completely stopped working just past the warranty.  I was hoping to order the floodlights, but am going to research other brands before I send Ring more money.  I am extremely disappointed that I have a faulty item and my only option is to purchase a new one.
title: I'm Researching Other Options

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Laura
content: Having trouble capturing the live feature. It also has a delay so usually by the time we get to the view, the person is already away from the door. The video option requires a subscription after the trial period. If you're familiar with Pavlov's theory on classical conditioning, your dog will love the phone chime, too.
title: A bit of a delay

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Phil Grabmiller
content: The thing that was not clear was the level of functionality available if you decide not to use their video storage plan. It's basically a live feed camera with no video review capability. Ring only allows video review if you sign up for their subscription plan. You won't discover all this until after the trial period. Go with another manufacturer if you don't want a subscription plan.
title: Unclear

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AndrewA
content: I disliked that it is subscription based if you want to see past events. Plus wifi signal is horrible and my router is 20 feet away with a chime pro. Regret purchasing this item.
title: Not for me.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sjames
content: I really wanted to like this.  I installed it and it worked fine, but the video clarity was poor up close.  I got a clear view of the surrounding area, but the close up video of the face was not clear.  If I were to have someone steal a package and I gave the video to the police, they would never be able to make out the face clearly.  It does work well with regards to motion alert notifications, but unfortunately not getting a clear facial image makes it useless to me.
title: Poor clarity with the facial images

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Momma_RN
content: I wish this Ring Video Doorbell 2 had better motion detection and notification timing! For the price of the device and data storage... it should be better, but Ring captures the market and limit alternative options exist. This device picks up EVERY vehicle that drives pass the house... but never the Amazon delivery person or mailman who walks up to the door to drop a package... Oh...and our occasional lizard sightings are comical! Overall...glad we have it.
title: Glad we have it; however..

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: john glover
content: This doorbell worked "OK" for about a week before the random doorbell ringing began. My guess is that this is caused by the battery getting low.  All of the information I read ahead of time stated that it can be hardwired so constant recharging of the battery wouldn't be necessary.  That is a lie.  No matter what you do, you will have to recharge the battery.  Bottom line, the RING doorbell is a POS. Dont waste your money.  I should have followed my gut and gone with the NEST. Live and learn.
title: Don't Waste Your Money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ariel B.
content: I installed my Video 2 using the battery and hardwire. After about a month of use it wasn't working the entire time and the battery said 2%. I contacted customer support and they told me because of the cold and a large number of activities noted that the trickle charge from the hardwire couldn't keep up with the battery discharge. Since I ordered this the end of November, the return window expired 9 days ago. Ring customer service offered an upgrade to the Pro for a $50 fee. Since the Pro has no battery and is completely hardwired, I went with that.
title: I needed a Pro not a Ring 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Neal
content: Now, having used this product for one month (trial subscription interval) I see a value to this product.  I've disabled the "motion notification" since wind blowing some of the trees and bushes set it off, I do see when and who delivered a package and rang the doorbell.  Plus I can look back and view (though not notified) if someone hung something on the door handle unannounced!
title: See what's going on outside!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John Hynes
content: What a disappointment. The live view never works and the door bell itself rings less than half the time. I’ve had people come to my home and say they rang the bell, and yet my phone never reacted, no motion detection and the ringer in the house didn’t ring. As far as I’m concerned it’s junk.
title: No live view, no motion detection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Maryann S
content: I just love this product. It gives you a great sense of security and is just plain old entertaining, watching who comes and goes. Sometimes it's just the wind or a squirrel. But super helpful, affordable. The battery is easy to recharge. Not sure my kids like it that much, knowing mom can see their comings and goings. But really, I highly recommend it.
title: Addictive to use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mr Valdo
content: Its a great doorbell but the response time on it starts to deteriorate to the point that I've had to restart the app up to 5 times in order to see thur the doorbell and I live on a busy street (30 feet away) so it records every car, and if I reduce sensitive on the motion it wont record unless it is like 2 feet away all around
title: Loved it at first but things started to happen

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Angel
content: I got two od this. Video qualiti is good and instalation was relativly easy. The conectivity to my wifi is spoty and I get low signal warnings but i can take my wireles devises 30 ft farther with no problems, it makes me wonder if this is a tacktic to make you buy a range extender. And the cloud service is paid. They dont have a free plan (first 30 days are free) if you dont pay you cant store video events (some security cameras ofer a free plan with 2 days of storage or similar)
title: Poor conectivity to Wifi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jenny M
content: I love this doorbell. It’s got fantastic picture and video quality and a wide range that the camera reaches. I can literally see my whole front yard and street. It’s pretty neat. Also, I used to have people bang on the door when my baby was sleeping, which made the dog go crazy. Now they just ring the doorbell and I get a notification on my phone. So baby stays asleep and the dog stays quiet. Great purchase & price during Black Friday.
title: Great picture & video quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Riowood
content: The wi-fi on Ring is very poor.  I have done everything I can to improve the wi-fi reception but audio is very choppy and poor (if at all).  It just doesn't work as advertised.  I have an Echo Dot in my garage that is way far more removed from the wireless router than Ring and it works perfectly.  Just really disappointed and wishing I hadn't spent the money on this thing.  I have Google Wi-Fi with a node only about 15 feet away from the doorbell.
title: After all the hype, very disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Craig Blomgren
content: I have had my Ring Bell 2 device for 2 years now and I am not impressed! I just recently replaced the battery and the charger that charges the battery continually. And my new battery is slowly dying; it won't hold a charge; even though it is continually being charged! As for the performance of the Ring Bell 2, it rarely pops up the video quickly; even though I have a wi-fi booster three feet away from the Ring Bell 2. I have great wi-fi speed! The device rarely alarms when someone is at the door and often alarms when there is nothing there. Not impressed. Wish I hadn't wasted my money on Ring Bell 2.
title: Not Impressed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: N. SANDERS
content: Great concept, but weak on delivery. The WiFi reception is AWFUL - I even moved an access point to a front room less than 15 feet from the unit, and it still complains about weak signal strength. (And I don’t use consumer network junk - I build wireless networks for a living.)  But even more frustrating is the time it takes from receiving an alert or a doorbell press to being able to pull up the video in the app (iPhone XR, Amazon Echo, or iPad Pro). I’ll probably move this to the back door and replace it with a better product.
title: Average at best; poor performance on WiFi and in App

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kim623
content: Great investment and like it..once I found a chime sound that didn’t make the dogs sound like they were vicious and we were being robbed.  :).  Actually, it is good.  We did need to charge the battery after 2 weeks because we watched “live” like it was a game. Once we used it as intended, battery life is fine.  I recommend it.
title: Good doorbell and security investment.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JustBill
content: This is hands down the easiest video doorbell to install and the 1080P video is very noticeable if you have been using a 780P doorbell. It has excellent night vision and the activity around your door is very useful if you have a dog that does not want to stay in the back yard. Another great feature are the long lasting battery pack that lasts conservatively 6-8 months but suggest you buy an extra.
title: It comes with the Tools.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gingerrider
content: We use it to keep an eye on our house and other than the annoying alerts that tells you every single time someone walks back, it’s been helpful for package deliveries and solicitors. I have since shut off the notifications as we live in a busy apartment complex, and I still get alerts from the Alexa show. Which is helpful.
title: It’s pretty cool

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: George F
content: I’ve found motion detection to be hit or miss, sometimes it misses the obvious movement in the motion zone or there would be a delay in the alert, other times it would pick up motion way outside of the motion zone, like a vehicle passing in the street. That’s when Motion Alert worked on my Ring Doorbell 2!!! Now it doesn’t work at all!! I’m unable to turn ON the Motion Alert from the App. It appears the Motion Snooze feature defaults constantly to the 2 Hour Snooze setting. Even when I turn the Motion Snooze OFF, it reverts right back to the 2 Hour Snooze, which prevents the Motion Alert from switching back to active. After 3 hour long sessions with Ring Support, the best they can offer is “we’re sorry your having a problem, our software engineers are looking into it” with no timetable for resolution. So for now I have a $200 doorbell!!!!!
title: Ring Doorbell 2 Motion Alert Faulty

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Taylor W.
content: USELESS. It SOMETIMES picks up motion but pretty much only cars. Ocassionally it will record my mailman who comes to my wall mounted mail box everyday located DIRECTLY next to the door bell. It definitely DIDNT pick up a package delivery or the theft of said delivery. Super frustrating because what's the point??
title: Completely useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: R. A.
content: If you like tinkering constantly with electronic this is the item for you.  It is a buggy unreliable system!  You better have a stellar WiFi signal to start. Its downhill from there. I won't go into all the issues. They are too numerous to list. When it does work, which is sporadic it is very nice.
title: Not ready for prime time!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jaimie
content: Aside from the bulkiness of this device. I love it. My only other issue is that they sent me cheap screws... The head of the screw literally screwed off, leaving the rest of the screw in the wall so that I couldn't remove it. I had to use different screws and change the placement slightly bc I couldn't put the second set of screws in the same place.
title: Bulky but get live feed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ricknaub
content: I love having it around to keep an eye on the place, but the sensor is super strong even on it's lowest setting. I get a lot of notifications for squirrel.
title: Nice item but...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Leon Childers
content: I wanted a stand alone doorbell camera that didn't require any add-on's and Ring 2 fit my needs completely. Video quality is excellent as well as two way talk. Mine is wired with the battery, so interior doorbell still works. Mine is set to detect motion at about 15 feet and start recording. I used the wedge looking down, but kept getting my neighbor's cat and close up didn't show faces. I reversed it to look up and it's perfect. I plan on buying the wired camera to mount over my garage door so I can watch my entire front of house. Install is very easy and straight forward.  Since I can't add a new review, I'm adding this 4 months after install. Not happy with how slow it is to respond. I get video's of people leaving or not at all. WIFI signal is strong at door when checked and only 20 ft from router, but response is too slow. Had to modify sensor range to stop all the bogus alerts due to motion that was non-existent. Works good when doorbell alerts but still to slow to record. It works, but not to my satisfaction. I should have bought a standalone camera system.
title: This was purchased for my wife to have peace of mind when someone is at the door and I'm not around.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Matt H.
content: I've had two different releases of a 'round' competitor with promises of great functionality and reliability... the Ring 2 has delivered above and beyond the other devices. Works consistently and provides a clear useful picture. It's very responsive and having the full history quickly available is a huge bonus. My only concern is the monthly service fee; I'd prefer a one time perpetual cost or an API to store data to dropbox, onedrive or any of the many other available services.
title: Best available tech - Monthly cost for full features

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ms Jennifer Herrera
content: I've had this unit for 2 years... and I've done everything from change the settings to everything possible and the battery always has run out quickly. Used to be once a month but now it's once every 2 days. So the battery doesn't work and nor does the wireless doorbell work when I try to synch everything. Big waste of time and money. Now I'll have to figure out and buy another system that works.
title: No matter what is done, always have problems. Need to replace.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: NVious
content: Why pay $200 for a doorbell that never works? We have a bigger house, so we had to buy another wireless router, and hub. We had to have it all installed. I'm at $400 for a doorbell that works intermittently, at best? I miss more people at my door than not. For $15 get regular doorbell, and avoid the hassle and frustration. Good idea. Terrible execution.
title: Get a regular doorbell for 1/30th the price

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristen K.
content: While the idea of the doorbell is a good idea, the battery dies out within a day or two the. Takes a whole day to charge. It seems more work to use it. We just got it and already had to charge it four times.
title: Battery doesn’t last more than a day

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marzmom
content: Bought it, installed and followed all directions.  Would not detect motion or ringing of the doorbell.  Initially thought it was just my devices so I tried to receive notification on three other devices without success.  called tech support - their response was to send it back to where I bought it from.  Therefore returned.  My 30 Wyze camera has better detection then this doorbell and with no monthly fee
title: Nope!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Calirose
content: This doorbell had been so disappointing. The battery had to be changed every week, I contacted someone last week and the new battery is suppose to be shipped to see if it’s bad batteries or the ring bell itself is bad. I was out of town and it notifies me someone is at my door but I cannot EVER see who is at my door. It always says video recording cannot be done at this time. The last time it recorded a video was weeks ago. What’s the point of having this if I cannot ever get access to see who is at my door or look back at saved videos.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Megan P.
content: We love our Ring doorbell! This is our fourth camera on the house and by far my favorite. It’s been so useful, especially during this time of year when package theft is at its peak. It makes me feel at ease at work all day and even during times we are away. So easy to install and has such a great view even without the wedge.
title: Great doorbell camera

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gary Gagliardi
content: Returned two of them. Couldn't get audio to work with my android phone (Note 8). Tried on two different networks (have four in house, only supports the  low speed ones). Couldn't get to work with Echo Show at all (installed skill, found device, but wouldn't ring on Show or any other echos (have six in house). Love Amazon products. Cannot believe that they bought this company. Need because my wife just had leg operation and she needs to answer door without leaving bed. Will try a competing product. So disappointed.
title: Love Amazon products

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Yendia
content: This This Works Goid, TOO Good. Catches EVERYTHING..Bought as a Xmas gift fir My bf and he posted a video of the mailman tripping down the stairs and it went viral(he wasn't harmed, they're friends😂)..CONs, maybe a little too sensitive, he turned the specs all the way down, but every car that goes by sets it off. Even ones off too the side of the house.
title: Catches EVERYTHING!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LNicole
content: Love this and gives me peace of mind as a girl who lives alone. I like too that it rings my phone for deliveries and if anyone enters the house. However, it’s motion detection is hit and miss. I have it set to reach all the way out to the staircase of my condo complex. But it keeps saying there’s motion if the complex lights turn on and off, and sometimes it won’t  detect a person who is literally at my door unless they open the door (which is always me).
title: Solid buy but motion detection is glitchy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jason H
content: Want to keep an eye on your place while you’re away? This ring doorbell camera works great.  I have this and the spotlight cam, so once the free trial expires you’ll pay $100 for 12 months of “monitoring”. The camera works great and the video quality is very good. The motion warnings are a plus and being able to set the zones helps against false alarms. Neat technology to be able to answer the door when someone rings your doorbell.
title: Good way to keep an eye on your place.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Aaron Kiser
content: Almost a year in, and it's still going strong. It definitely makes me feel more secure when i Ieave home. The motion detector is awesome and alerts whenever there is movement at the door. You can even answer someone at the door when you're not even home. Great camera, considering a second for the back door.
title: Great security addition to any household.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rob S.
content: This is the 2nd Ring doorbell i have purchased, the first one was lost in a recent move and later found so I’m using that at the backdoor.  Ring doorbell is worth the extra$.  The connection, video quality, link ability to other systems is unbeatable.  This unit was bought refurbished and i have no concerns.
title: Ring Doorbell is worth the extra $.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Martin Padilla
content: It works fine. But the company that makes it is trying to Rangel you into a monthly charge to allow you the ability to see previous video notifications. So if you don't answer or see emediatly what set off the motion you won't have proof of whom broke in to your house or stole your packages. I suggest purchasing YI cameras...they have mini USB disks to save all alerts.
title: It's ok but they want more money out of you.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amazed
content: This Ring 2 device does bring a sense of security/peace of mind.  We live in a senior community peace of mind is a close priority.  Two days after installed the device, we had an unwelcome visitor; a person posing as a student selling “goods”.  With the Ring2 I was able to see the person on my phone and communicate to him our no solicitation policy.  He immediately left our community.  On the “wish list” I would like to see Ring update to allow immediate view when the sensor announces activity.
title: Ring 2 Doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tambo
content: Utterly useless. I can't see my entire porch, which means I can't see what packages were delivered. I have cameras on my house to see the front yard and cars driving by. Amazon told me to buy another camera to view the packages on my porch (what kind of answer is that?). At this point, not really sure what the purpose of a Ring doorbell is. Useless and misguided product, very unfortunate.
title: Utterly useless video angle.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kentra
content: This product is great but coming from skybell I just say the night vision is horrible I hate the fact that it shows black and white..My skybell was with a security company but night vision was clear as day. With the ring you really can't tell what color the person is wearing at night everything is just a grey scale. I've tried everything from going in the settings to see if u can turn the feature off but nothing. Overall it's a good doorbell camera...ohh and I hat the fact that it chimes on the outside so loud when someone rings the doorbell bits super annoying.
title: An ok doorbell could be better for the price.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D Ricks
content: Overall this doorbell is nice. Be aware of subscription prices. I have it hardwired which I love about it. It integrated well with my current doorbell and even makes the house look nice outside
title: Overall nice camera

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Natalie Seim
content: The door bell works, the video works but....that commercial that tells the bad guy to leave is a joke.  The person outside can’t hear you talking.  DISAPPOINTING.  You can search and see lots of software issues with this.  We EXPECTED that to work.  RING needs to fix this software glitch.  Good Grief.
title: Those at your door can’t hear you.  Buyer beware.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David Scurti
content: I am not happy with the ring. The app is not even working correctly now, its unable to connect to the ring. We have strong wifi and other stuff connected to the wifi but the ring is the only thing we are having problems with. Very disappointed
title: Very disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nor
content: The ring system has good and bad like most products but what i dislike about the unit is the connection during live issues. If you are away and something happens out of the ordinary, you get your alert but the camera doesn't let you see because it’s processing and will not go to live feeds causing blood pressure spikes for us that have loved ones at home... i hope they find a way to fix this issue.
title: Processing Lag

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Wizard
content: I like how easy the app is to use and the camera is good quality. You can also use the ring as an intercom which is one of my favorite features. Sometimes it catches only the end of an event, such as a package being dropped off, which I don’t love. Over all a good product, we will likely get a few outdoor cameras from this company as well.
title: Home security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Talmadge Grigsby
content: So i understand people have complained about the subscription associated with the ring system. Honestly for $30 a treat its woth it. I installed mine yesterday and paid for subscription. My wife and both downloaded the app and answer the calls from our phones at work. Or we use echo show 5 to answer calls. Works great with alexa and our wifi is strong enough to place anywhere on our house. This is a great product worth the money and sense of extra security you get. The rechargeable battery is A++. Don't let all the negative feedback steer you away from this great product. We plan on buying the security cameras next. Thank you ring.com
title: Worth the money + subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dominic Barrass
content: Unless you pay for a monthly service you cannot view any videos even immediately after it has taken. The App om my phone activates so slow people have usually gone by the time I get it up and running. I wish I'd picked one of the other video doorbells. I definitely would not recommend this item to anyone.
title: Disappointed with the service

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jerseysouix
content: The only con is that I always get a “your internet connection to the doorbell is weak!  It still works BUt it takes a minute before it connects.  I have a very sturdy and wicked internet quality so I know it’s not on my end. I also have a mesh net web extender located 3 feet or less positioned to the ring doorbell. I love e some of the functions and I would recommend this product.  Has more pros than the one con.
title: Very excellent product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Westpointe
content: The excess stucco on my wall gave my a little problem when trying to lay the RING flat on the wall, but after installing it, it was a breeze setting it up. The box comes with everything that you need for installation, and then more. You pay $3 a month or $30 a year for recording. Not much money for the peace of mind you get in return. Many times I'm busy and the doorbell rings and within seconds I get an alert in my phone and see who's at the door. I can talk to them if I want or ignore them. Great investment. When I bought it, it was on sale, plus I got a free Alexa (Echo device). So wait for a sale if you don't want to pay full price.
title: Easy to install. It works!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Teresa
content: This Ring video 2 door bell (with battery) did not work at my house. I thought it was defective and ordered another one. I was on the phone with Ring tech support for over 2 hrs trying to get it to work, trying this, take off that, put this on, move it higher, move it even higher (6 ft WHAT!!!) ..etc.  and no luck! The gal at ring said she would call me back the next day (because her team was reviewing the videos) and she was ready to get off work... really!!!  I have been on the phone for over 2 hrs with no success and you want to call me back the next day..instead of transferring me to another tech person!!! It has been 2 days and no call back! I packed up the Ring and sending it back!!!!
title: Did not work!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RichardZ
content: The Ring Video Doorbell 2 has higher image resolution than the previous model, but passing cars still generate far too many spurious alerts.  (I received 45 such alerts today).  This is true even with the doorbell angled downward using one of the supplied wedges, and the motion detection radius set to less than 10 feet.  The vehicles are at least 40 feet away, so this shouldn't be the case. I guess the only choice is to use additional wedges (which makes the doorbell look a little peculiar), or to mount the doorbell on a different wall.  Anyway, it's pretty clear to me this product wasn't tested in a real-world environment.  At the very least, the documentation should mention that heat from passing vehicles will trigger motion detection, regardless of what your settings are.
title: Motion detection still works poorly

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mary Thrasher
content: Replaced Ring 1 with this.  Night vision a little better than 1.  However, day vision is 100% better than 1.  Motion sensor is adjustable on 1 and 2 but is still a nuisance on  windy days.
title: Ring Doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TK
content: After further consideration of my generous 2 star review, I have to update this. It gets one star. Not one single time has the system been able to activate for me to answer the doorbell. My wireless signal is very good and product support see nothing wrong. BUYER BEWARE! DO NOT BUY! I expect much more from Amazon than this. Previous Review: I would give this a one star but the app seems to work well for my wife. When the doorbell rings, my app cannot seem to activate the device. People ringing the doorbell by the time I see them. If my wife's app worked only as well as it does for me, I would definitely return the device. I cannot recommend that you buy this device.
title: Really Bad App

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RB
content: Great doorbell and I did not need to replace the power supply for the actual door bell. Have had recurring issues with the Ring Doorbell keeping synchronized with the WiFi, not a signal strength issue so I end up having to reboot the doorbell every few months. The video quality is good.  Overall very happy with the product.
title: A doorbell that answers my needs

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MICHAEL R.
content: I like the product, but I bought two ring products: 1. This doorbell.  The instructions recommend that you charge the battery even if you're going to hard wire the doorbell.  The battery should take about 12-14 hours to charge.  The one I received took only 8 hours. 2. I also purchased the 14 piece burglar alarm system.  When I was looking at the installation video online, it tells you about the parts included.  The package I received did NOT include one of the pamphlets. CONCLUSION:  THE COMPANY IS RESELLING RETURNED ITEMS AS NEW....WHEN THEY RECEIVE THE RETURNS, THEY REPACKAGE THEM AND SELL THEM AS NEW.
title: Sell used stuff

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lina
content: Installation was pretty easy and the app is easy to use. And if you're only using it as a doorbell that you can interact with live, all you need is the doorbell and app. If you want to monitor motion sensor activity, you should probably get a subscription plan after the 1-month trial (which is $3-10/month depending on what level of plan you pick). If you have the motion sensor on, it'll send you a push notification every time there is activity at your door, and if you're unable to answer it right away, it's useful to have recordings.
title: Installation was pretty easy and the app is easy to use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LLS
content: Yes! Yes! Yes! Must have in your home!!!!! This has saved us from so many times. We knew we had people trespassing to our property didn’t know how many and we found out at least 7 people where coming in and out to view our home. We immediately contacted police and they helped us thanks to Ring we had full video/audio and photos of the trespassers.
title: If you want safety here it is! Must have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nightshift
content: Not hard to install. Picture and sound quality is great. I like the neighbors feature which let's neighbors share suspicious activity. It's amusing and sometimes scary. My only complaint is that sometimes when motion is detected I do not have immediate access to the video. I suspect this is an issue with the wifi signal needing more strength though. It also won't be much use without the subscription service to keep video, but at $33/year it is well worth it and you get 1 free month.
title: Useful. Good quality hardware.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Peter Liu
content: I have used this product for a few months now. I waited to write this reivew because I wanted to give it a fair chance. But when it didn't detect my husband coming into our house again this morning, it was the last straw. This Ring doorbell is a major disappointment! The motion detection is the worst. It did not only miss a lot of passerbys, it also missed us coming into our house in multiple occasions! I have maximized the motion detection area, selected all the motion detection zones and played around with the settings as suggested by some people in troubleshooting threads, but nothing helped. I am using this unit as a doorbell and a security camera. With the crappy motion detection/capture, it does not function for its intended use.
title: Worst motion detection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: niecy
content: I love my new Ring doorbell...It was easy to install yes I installed it myself...the motion detection works perfectly and it notifies my phone and Echo Show when someone comes within the motion range...also when someone comes up to ring the doorbell  it the camera is clear...I love it best investment ever...now I feel safe when I go put of town knowing I can view my home at any time....
title: Great doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mike Aeling
content: Great addition to our home security.  Easy to install and get working.  Added the device into our SmartThings app.  Great camera, even at night.  Motion sensor is fantastic and two-way communication is clear.  This will definitely  help to stop those nasty  Porch Pirates is more people had them.  Too bad it doesn't work when it gets REALLY cold like it does in MN  sometimes.
title: Everyone should have one!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Barbara Debevec
content: I installed my Ring 2 doorbell 6 weeks ago.  Suddenly it no longer saves any motion videos, nor does it show me who is at my door.  The RING app tells me that my Ring Protect Plan has expired.  What the heck??  Nowhere in the sales or marketing info did it say I would need to continue to pay to use this device!!  Neither on the website nor on my Ring app can I find ANY info on the cost of the “Ring Protect Plan”.  Where is the clear and direct info on the continuing cost of using this device in ANY of the sales docs??? So now it doesn’t work AT ALL!  This is a ripoff!
title: Ring Doorbell 2 - Beware !!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: brittney
content: Awful. Just awful. It seems to only function either way to sensitively or not at all, with no in-between. Either my alarm is going off every few minutes every time a tree branch rustles in the wind or it doesn't start recording until I'm already through the door. Also, unless I already have my phone open and in use, I can't answer it in time because it requires I unlock my phone before booting the app, thus every single event becomes a "missed" event. I also apparently didn't get the memo that it requires a subscription to use. I have been advised of a fully wireless 4-camera continuously monitoring system for only $50 more, no subscription required, I will be trying that instead. The only reason I am giving it 2 stars instead of 1 is that the video quality is undeniably excellent. I could actually recognize someone, even at night. Plus I am not a tech person at all and I was able to install it myself, instructions were abundantly clear and packaging leaves no room for error. Even the least tech-savvy person could install it.
title: Useless because of horrible lag

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Andrew P Finn
content: I bought this and have trying to set it up for 2 days. I am using an samsung android and have verizon fios as my provider. I looked online have disabled my cellular service during setup but still cannot get it through the final step.There wait time for help is always 30-40 minute wait. Will return it and try another brand. Sad all these companies do not provide a person to talk to, I am technical but this is an issue I need a tech to walk me through
title: Do not purchase....poor tech support

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eric G
content: Have a good signal, but relying on this to see who is at your door right now has never worked. The commercials show it as instantaneous. It is not. By the time I get on my phone or if I'm on the computer getting a verification code through email, the person who rang is already gone. I have good RSI as I have a booster and fast internet through a cable modem.
title: Cool gimmick type device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Lamb
content: Seems to mostly pick up motion in the exact area I EXCLUDED.  Completely missed a delivery man coming in and out of the screen door!  Probably does not reset it's motion detection quickly enough when it triggered from cars driving in the corner of the screen.  Not very quick to enable chat when someone rings the bell.
title: Glad I got it on sale, but not as practical as you might think.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Craig
content: Will not charge, two units purchased, 3 different power adapters tried, will not keep charged.  I have de-mounted 4 times now checking connections and trying different chargers, none keep it charged.  Device is useless unless you wanna charge a battery ever 3 days.
title: Will not charge, two units purchased, 3 diffrent power adapters tried, will not keep charged.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Zepita
content: I am totally satisfied with this product, it hasn't failed and the images are pretty clear. I get notices anywhere I go with the app. The night vision is not extremely clear but it all depends on the lighting, not the product. The wifi signal is pretty weak at times and it lags to show the live video, otherwise is a great product.
title: Yes for Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marilyn Howard
content: Liked that I could see who was at my door especially when I was away. But, to me a door bell should be more dependable. If the weather gets too cold, the batteries stop working. Also I think the batteries should be longer lasting and easier to replace.
title: Could be more dependable

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steven J. Collins
content: How do I return this?  I was so excited about this product An now have three major issues. 1) The basic functionality that should come with the phone (video clips etc) are charged at an additionally monthly fee. I assumed that was premium features like neighborhood sharing. Nope. If it records anything you have to pay to see it. Isn’t that what smart doorbells are for? 2) Battery life is short. In part due to the fact that the range which is set at 5’ isn’t 5 ‘. More like 30’. 3) As other have found there is a huge delay on the motion record when it does record at all. I usually get the tail end of the mailman walking away. More often I get nothing at all. Very very disappointed for $200.
title: High cost low performance and a bait-n-switch to boot

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jo Ellen- Hidden Ridge Designs
content: So far so good! I purchased this device because I receive a lot of deliveries and I don't want things stolen. It has successfully notified me when my door was approached.  It was a Black Friday special which included the echo show 5 and I am loving both! I am paying for the yearly service on this device and it seems reasonable at $2.50 a month.
title: So far so good!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Patricia Haight
content: No where did I see that I would have to have a monthly fee and that’s fine  When I get notification I can click on it and get live link if I am quick. But no saving recordings.  And even the live feed will not work without a subscription. Really!?!?!?
title: Additional monthly fee required!!!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SA16DI
content: Very satisfied with this camera doorbell. The only complaint is sometimes the notification shows motion at door and when I click the button to see, there is a lag...I don't see anything that would have caused a motion detector to send an alert. But overall great product with a clear view during day and night vision.
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Roel Lopez
content: Over all it’s pretty good but every 5-10 recordings it records a black screen so I can’t see what’s happening and I missed a guy picking up a check from under my entrance mat and well it recorded black so I don’t even know if the right person got it. Now think about this what if the one time some one breaks into my house and it records black then what is the point of the camera ???!!
title: What if the one time some one breaks into my house it records black!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Productho
content: Love this thing.  I travel for work so now i can monitor whose at my door from anywhere.  Since I'm an Amazon junkie, i can see when my packages are delivered and get someone to pick them up for me while I'm gone.  No more wondering if they will disappear or sit for days.  Video and audio work well most of the time.  It will lag depending on your connection but that's the internet,  not the device.  Definitely recommend!
title: Awesome!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Francee Offereins
content: I had it installed and hooked up but the motion feature didn’t work. Called Ring “support” and after jumping through hoops and doing what I was told (reset this and that etc. ) NOTHING worked. Then was told to return it to Amazon and get a replacement. Now have to repack it, send it and wait for a replacement. Worst customer service and tech support ever. If the next one doesn’t work I will just get a refund and buy some security cameras.
title: “Tech support” and customer service is horrible !!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Courtney F.
content: I initially bought this for additional security of my home, as there were many break-ins in neighboring towns. I've found it's very useful when I am expecting packages and am on another level of my home or away from the house. If someone was to steal my package I would have them on camera and could file a police report. Love this product, especially the live view and starred options
title: Bought for additional security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shawn Miller
content: I got this for monitoring my front door.  Because of the orientation of my door and my walkway motion detection zones needed to be available like what they with 5 zones but this unit only supports 3 zones.  The basic unit supports 5 zones but the better unit supports less go figure. The WiFi reception is not that good and the output audio is very poor.
title: Not as good as I thought it would be.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DM
content: So far so good!  I had to set this up with a Wasserstein solar panel since we didn't have an existing doorbell.  The install was easy due to simple instructions and even videos.  Setting up with motion alerts and fine-tuning the doorbell was also easy.  My only complaint would be that it would be nice if the Ring doorbell would recognize your phone so it wouldn't give you alerts about yourself.
title: Simple product, worth the money.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CW
content: We have had this camera for a little over a year and it consistently lags in catching any motion. By the time the person is ringing the doorbell, it takes a good seconds-minute to show up on your phone. You can barely hear them speaking when they talk to the doorbell. I basically only use it to check on packages, but if anything were to happen to a package or security of my house it would already be over by the time I was alerted. Very disappointing.
title: Lag time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nat
content: Lousy night vision in pitch dark more than 5 feet away you couldn't see candle and couldn't even detect me until I was almost standing beside it.  4 minutes delay between notification and me walking in front of it. And I have really good ping times and a really good internet service here. If you want to know how bad it is go read the Google Play Ring app reviews.
title: LOUSY NIGHT VISION, TO MUCH LAG ON NOTIFICATIONS

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Morgan K
content: while the idea of a battery video doorbell is appealing, this product is not what you would expect. I wish ring would spend some of the money they put into advertising on making better products because the couple cameras we bought from them are terrible. not to mention after a year they want to charge you like 10-15 dollars a month just to view your videos. ring is a scam and I wish I would have never given them any of my business.
title: buy a real camera

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: E. Yang
content: I have owned Ring Doorbell 2 for a couple of months now, and at least once a week the Ring 2 would get disconnected from Wifi signall. My router is only 4 feet away and it is working fine. The problem with the Ring 2 is that once it gets disconnected from Wifi, the only way to reset the device or reconnect it back is to remove the plastic cover and press down the little button inside.  The plastic cover is very hard to remove and is very poorly constructed. I had to use a screwdriver to remove it and it has been difficult every single time.  If you are away from home, and your Ring Doorbell 2 get disconnected, then there is nothing you can do to reconnect it apart from having to come home, remove cover, and reset the device. Very frustrating! The customer service is great and is available after hours. However, it  seems that all problems are to be fixed with resetting the device.  And the company should have implemented a way to reconnect the device from the app without having to remove that plastic cover, or to design the cover to be more user friendly.
title: Easily disconnected from Wifi and difficult to reset

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Silverkat
content: It detects motion very well, which is what I wanted it for. However, sometimes the light doesn't come on in the dark, even when there is motion, and the wifi is a bit weak, but does seem to function consistently. I like that you can wire it into existing door bell power supply, which eliminates the need to worry about battery usage. All in all a good product that is performing the job I bought it for.
title: Works Well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kathie P.
content: After owning one for 8+ months, we decided to buy another one for our back door.  The doorbell is a great investment, with one tiny issue.  The slight delay in the video, and if someone comes to the door, it doesn’t notify us until they are already at the door.  We’ve checked if we needed to adjust the span and the angle, but all is set correctly.  It’s a small negative that we are willing to overlook. Just having the ability to see and talk to people at the door is a safety we both are thankful we have!
title: Have your door visible 24/7, 365 days a year!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jon Ivan
content: I stream video through my internet service but this product has such a bad delay that bybthe time you get the notifications that motion was detected they are gone and most of all not captured on video! Worthless for nor more than a doorbell. I actually went through customer service and they were great but even a fter replacing it with a new one, after 3 calls to attempt to fix it, it did the same thing...
title: Expensive doorbell!! Try some other brand...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Top Drawer
content: I was among the first to purchase the "original" Model over three years ago.  This version is worth upgrading to.  Improved Camera, much better Motion detection setup. motion snooze is useful, and the Alexa connectivity is really cool. You can't install it in five minutes though...c'mon... But the inclusion of an adapter plate to upgrade from the original, was most thoughtful, and perfect for my scenario.  I like it, the Black Friday Deal was excellent.  I don't really know why one would spend the extra cash on the Pro model.
title: Much Improved!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Customer
content: The device worked as advertised for the free 30 day period. Once I subscribed, the delays were too long to able to respond on real time. It notifies immediately (most of the time) when someone rings the door but it takes more than a minute for you to be able to respond. Lately, it is skipping many events. Deliveries and rings are not even registered at all. Their network must be saturated. I was better off with my mechanical ring. The device seems to work fine, but their service stinks. I am not sure how it got a 4+ rating. Perhaps it is because Amazon owns this. A waste of money. Do not buy
title: Bait and switch!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Camerin
content: I don’t love this. The app doesn’t work very well — it takes a VERY long time to load, which kind of defeats the purpose when it goes off. The video quality isn’t super great either, though I don’t expect it to be wonderful. It would be a great product if the app actually worked.
title: Eh.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LaToya Walsh
content: This is my second Ring device. My first one, I sent back due to I was not receiving notifications on my phone. This time I discovered I still was not receiving notifications due to an android cleaner app. Once removed my notifications arrive as expected. Please keep in mind of this fact before purchasing. Otherwise, I love the app and device. In our community our village police department has joined the neighbors community. I live love this device for my home.
title: Second Time's  the Charm

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Val_NYC
content: All that's good about this device is worthless when you wake after a rainy night and find it full of water. Everything shorted out, the $200 were a waste of money. It's supposed to be rainproof. It's supposed to be protected against shortage. A year cloud subscription paid in full, no refunds for that either.
title: Get yourself a better brand

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carlitos
content: I have an echo device in every room, and I get notifications of any door activity on all of them. I want to disable the RING SKILL for one of them , but is not possible...AMAZON must fix this
title: SKILL has very limited custom options

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Luis D. Antezana
content: It does most of what it’s supposed to do but none of it impressively. The motion detection works but either it’s slow or the camera mechanics are slow, but either way the biggest problem I have with this device is it starts recording somewhat late so you don’t see all of any event. Like it records the person within a few feet of your door but not the person approaching your walkway, and then it goes on recording like 15 seconds after they’re out of sight, which is never helpful. The video is “1080p” but looks 480p at best. The mic is just OK, the Alexa integration works well, the chime quality is really cheap, it’s fine. It feels like a great piece of $40 hardware.
title: Does its job well enough

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nick  Wall
content: it came with ONLY Chinese instructions of how to hook doorbell up.  I had to go to different programs on U tube for step by step, finally learned that an app I could download also walked me through what I needed to do.  It was a Pain in the bottom from the lack of correct installation instructions  I have had to buy an more powerful router for wi fi signal It has a long ways to go- maybe 20 feet  Sarcasm intended! I would look at other makes such as Nest before I would buy this product again.
title: it came with ONLY Chinese instructions of how to hook ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dennis Leonard
content: when the doorbell detects movement, it takes from 5 to sometimes 30 seconds to notify me.  when someone presses doorbell, by the time the app opens, the people have left. I have had this for 6 months and have been trying to change settings, etc. nothing works. you will have video evidence of someone at your door, but not in time to do anything about it.
title: detection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: conde burnett
content: We live in the back of the house do not see or know what is happening out front.  This is perfect for that took some fine tuning for motion to get correct.  We have been happy with the camera function, WiFi was no strong enough to keep on line all the time had to add an additional WiFi signal booster.  We are happy with this now thanks.
title: Motion detected at front door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ray
