content: Husband bought 2, refurbished doorbell #2s as a xmas gift for me bc I've been suggesting, "hinting" about purchasing for awhile now. Both doorbells came in great condition, no scratches, and we're pleasantly simple to connect and install. App download is free & simple to navigate as well. Picture quality in the daylight is perfect, night time isnt bad but the cam/video color switches to gray, black/white once night falls that I'm not particularly a fan of but everything else, phone notification, motion alert, 2 way talking, app recording is awesome! I highly, highly recommend the ring doorbell 2 and can wait to add other products to our home security!!
title: Quality/Experience

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nicholas Casper
content: I like that the ring doorbell was easy to replace with our old doorbell, setup was quick and easy, and it’s sensitivity can be adjusted to the distance from the device out to the street. The alerts while we do get them are not as instantaneous as we’d hoped them to be, however the recording is there.
title: Not the top of the line security system

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert Anholt
content: One reviewer said it took 10min. Was that after charging the battery for 10hours? The Ring App took a few tries. At one point it popped out to read a VERY long License agreement and left me in SHop.ring so I had to restart the process. There's not much help on the setting up Alexa-that took some fiddling around. I went through two doors to reach the room with router and it didn't need an extender. I got it to ring on my Win10 in my office using the PC ring app. Didn't need Echo there
title: Set up not so easy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. Schmidt
content: After some trial and error, i have two additional wifi extenders.  Signal is now good but was a struggle at first.  Battery drains faster if you like to do live view a lot.  Audio voice not do good - too quiet and many times scratchy, hard to understand.  Still better than nothing.  Tech support so far has been very good.  Easy install.
title: Easy install, good video and settings.  Audio not as good.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ashley B
content: Works great when the doorbell rings, however the extra motion detection is not great.  It detects every car the drives past the house, yet WON'T detect the suspicious person walking through my yard, or the person who parks their car in my grass.  Picking up the traffic isn't an issue overall but it's annoying that it won't pick up what we actually need/want it to pick up.
title: Motion detection is not great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Emily Slyter
content: This doorbell has added to our home a greater sense of security than we have ever had. I know any time someone is coming or going from my house, and I can see when our friendly neighborhood bears are around. I love that you can share your videos with those in the Ring community as well. I also love that it can connect with our Echo Dots. I look forward to buying more Ring products in the future.
title: Great sense of security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: mjs
content: By the time I get a notification that someone is at the front door the person has gone.  I also have a Ring Chime Pro WiFi Extender positioned between my WiFi router and the doorbell. As a doorbell it is pretty much useless. As a security cam that records things happening outside my front door it is probably fine. I may remove it and replace with a more robust straight up security camera because the doorbell function is useless.
title: Latency is bad

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: OOOps
content: spent hours with customer service to set up account because app does't  let you to enter country. after cust serv manage to create account i could not to set up device for the same reason: cannot find country USA. bad, bad, bad. returning it to amazon
title: impossible to set up

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Beck RR
content: It’s kind of a pain. Always need to be charged. Goes off easily. Needs to be charged again. And again. Do u I really need this? Probably not. But now that I have it I’m afraid to not have it.
title: I don’t know...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C Nealon
content: Did research and bought this on a “deal” to go with the Arlo cameras I bought. The ring was super easy to install and get going. The Arlos took many attempts with the hub not staying connected. So I’m returning the Arlos and have got the ring cameras which again were hassle free to set up. Only downside is ring wants you to have a subscription to save video
title: Remote living and can see all around

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diane B
content: I ordered the Ring Doorbell 2 on Prime Day because I wasn’t sure I would be able to hook it up to my doorbell and wanted the battery backup just in case. Turns out it is too wide for my door frame and hangs off it. The pro version is narrow and fits in the frame. I read so many reviews and did not see that feature mentioned until I had trouble connecting the doorbell wires. The instructions and videos are not detailed enough for a novice to follow. But YouTube had plenty of helpful tips. If I had to install a 2nd one, it wouldn’t take hours again now that I know what to do. It’s just so disappointing that it hangs off the frame. I really wish I had gotten the pro version. But it is great product. I want to get the spotlight for my driveway and I’m nervous about which one to choose. I don’t want to make the wrong mistake again! Finding out after install is so annoying!!
title: Warning! Make sure it fits!! Get the correct model

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: GP123
content: I have a small to medium sized house and the doorbell never receives a good wi-Fi signal. I tried the chime pro in just about every outlet as well as another brand wi-Fi extender neither boosted the signal (actually made it worse). I have no problem receiving a wi-Fi signal on other devices when I standing next to the doorbell including streaming HD video on my phone and a wireless direct tv box. WORST OF ALL CUSTOMER SERVICE IS AWFUL, which is surprising since I’ve always said amazon customer service is second to none. Bottom line is that I wish they didn’t skimp on the internals that receive and transmit signal and video. I would return but I got it on sale so same as a cheaper video doorbell.
title: Disappointed with this Amazon product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: joseph.staudenraus
content: It has potential but they don't honor their own policies.  So, if it works perfectly always,  you may be alright. But, if you should have to go through customer service,  you will regret the purchase.
title: Warranty not honored

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eddy B
content: Doesn’t stay connected to WiFi at all and it’s 5ft away from my router
title: Don’t waste your money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Some kind of Pandaful
content: This company is selling your video footage to law enforcement with no warrants. It's also been found that employees just look your archived footage up for giggles. Don't buy, and if you have one, get rid of it now.
title: This thing is stealing your info.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nestor M.
content: It worked amazingly during the first month, but after the free trial for recording video runs out, the device is terrible. It will pick up motion but will take you 5+ minutes to connect to your device (computer,  cell phone, etc) it never works when you need it to and quite frankly,  at this price range, you can get a much device. Save yourself the money and buy something else.
title: Buyer beware

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J-Sue
content: The description makes it sound like you don't need the subscription but it is just an expensive doorbell if you don't subscribe to the monthly fee. It does not store video for ANY length of time without it. Apparently the older version does. Should have bought that one. By the time you realize this option isn't standard, it is too late to return it. Im so disappointed.
title: Deceptive Marketing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jessica F
content: I love this product! Easy to use and install for someone who doesn’t know a lot about tech. The app is great. I have it connected to my echo show as well as my phone. It will pop up video of who is at your door on the echo show or your phone and you can talk to them at your front door. Great for using for contact less delivery too!
title: Great camera, clear video and puts your mind at ease

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rodolfo
content: This is a great camera. I wished it would have the option to save on a SD card instead of paying $30 dollars a year. The app works most of the time. My only complaint is loading time when going into “live view” it’s slower than it should be. Rather annoying when someone’s is at the door and you missed them cuz the connection lagged.
title: Useful, the Neightboor hood watch is a great community tool

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Susan E Griffiths-Olson
content: I AM SO IN LOVE with my ring doorbell. I am at home most of the time and the ability to view who is at the door is so great and the extra security I feel with it is priceless. It was very easy to set up and use. BONUS it alerts to my SAMSUNG Activity watch.  I just wish I could connect it to my ALEXA.  Great product I have had friends buy one after they saw how much I like mine
title: Do not know how I lived without this

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert C.
content: Motion Sensor does NOT work. It's pissing me off.  Ring is supposed to be this great company, but after waiting to get the thing, it only functions as a simple doorbell. I've had 2 people walk up to the door, then walk away and I had no idea they were even there. Buy something else. This is going back in the morning.
title: Not worth it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Janis D Lafluer
content: I love this Ring doorbell. Easy to install and setup, great audio and visual.  Night vision is clear.  I feel safer being able to see who's at the door before opening it and being able to monitor my property at night.  I ordered Echo show and a blink camera for the back.  They all integrate and work well together.
title: Love this system,  feel safer

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DWizard
content: I like the simplicity’s of all the ring products so far. I bought the motion activated HD camera floodlight...outstanding product...floodlights work great, I bought 4 more after a testing on a 12 ft ladder, and I am installing them around the perimeter of the house. The doorbell/range extender works perfect for my application, and can be configured to communicate differently with different cameras. I bought the Doorbell Pro to use as an alarm/camera, because I don’t have power where I needed it...in my garage. Even with “live view” on continuously the battery life has been great so far. I configured it to trip-the-doorbell with motion in my garage. Great product line!
title: It’s easier if you’re a techy, that’s for sure. But setup is fairly easy using the iPhone at least.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Imma
content: I really needed to point it down and angle it better.  I did use the wedges provided, but it just would let me adjust down far enough..  It would"be been nice to be able to adjust it side to side without wedge.  So we laced it in an awkward area about 3 ft off the ground in right corner of door. We rea!lot wanted this to work.  We kept the alarm system.  Picked up night vision and sensitivity was good.
title: Unable to adjust angles despite wedges provided

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kaye
content: Love the product. It’s actually thicker/wider then I expected however the video/sound quality is excellent ! My cons are that it will notify you of any motion if you turn on motion notifications (this is only an option, an can be turned off). And that can be every few minutes if you live on a busy street. Also that it’s imperative to have a WiFi extender as the connection will be poor. Also if you do not have your phone with you at all times the chime will be needed.
title: Now I don’t have to go downstairs for nothing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dsucces
content: I had a stupid person that decided to commit a murder in front of my house while my wife, stepson and I was standing outside. This doorbell saved our life. It record the whole act with perfect audio. Now this person that committed the crime will soon be convicted for Murder. This doorbell is priceless. Thanks to Ring!
title: Saved our lives

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amika
content: Works in and off. Will not connect immediately when someone is detected or door bell rings. Stays buffering almost a minute before connecting. Had my WiFi upgraded to the fastest and problem still exists. After a month it will not download videos to your phone. You’re forced to pay a fee to check or view video playback. I told customer svc I didn’t want to save videos on their cloud and still had to pay a monthly/yrly fee to view my videos. Should have returned it while I had the chance.
title: Not worth the cost. Buy another brand.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mary Russell
content: I don’t have a clue what this would not work.  I tried to get help via the phone number listed, to no avail.  After three days of trying to get it working, I gave up.  I told my helper to send it back since she had another box to mail off.  This was before I saw that I needed to print a label.  I could not have done it anyway since the printer is not working.  However, it was sent back.  Hopefully this will do.  It was not the problem of Amazon...it was the product/lack of help for installation.  As you can see by my account, I love the convenience of Amazon.  Mary Russell
title: Mary.russell301@gmail.com

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jasminarey
content: It was really easy to install. Love that you can easily angle. Battery does not last long if you are outside a lot and its constantly going on. Doesnt record if my phone dies. cant slow down some clips or maybe you can and i just dont know how too. Love that you can get updates from local neighbors with RING doorbells. Quality is good but mine often looks blurry if it gets too cold.
title: Great but downside

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jacques C Sprenger
content: I had an electric door bell with speakers in various areas. However, the ring product could not connect to them, unfortunately, so I had to buy chimes. Bit of a problem connecting to Alexa but I finally got it working. Otherwise, it's a great product with clear image, though the speaker is weak as it is difficult to understand the visitor. It was worth the money I paid.
title: installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Solid Lee
content: Had to return NEST twice because I simply can't get it to work. Even for a brief moment it worked but after 30 min it stopped working. Plus the so called tech support can't get it work. Plus I also changed the transformer. So I gave up and tried Ring because I used it for my other property. And it's just simply amazing. Wire or no wire, It works.
title: Beats Nest by 10 levels

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Acquanita
content: Don't rely on the battery as your main source. Make sure you have a 16v/30va doorbell transformer Make sure you have a supported chime kit. If you don't you'll be unhappy.  Don't bother with support either they will cast blame at everything else but the product. I have 16v/30va now, 16v AT THE DEVICE.  Still doesn't charge or trigger the doorbell. I'll get a "supported" chime and report back.  Might buy a new ring 2 just to prove It a broken device "OUT OF WARRENTY", return it and knock this down to one star if that's the case.
title: not happy with support, product is ok.  Do your homework first

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tom S.
content: This thing is a joke. Do NOT buy. If you like waiting 40 seconds to connect to video, if at all, then by all means, buy it. Also, same thing happens with all four motion sensor light/cameras I got. Customer service is non existent. I’m going uninstall them, put them in a box and send them back. You get an alert that there’s motion or activity and so you log on to see what’s happening and ... you don’t connect to video. I have strong signal to the camera, it just sucks. Makes me want to get on Shark Tank when the jackass owner is one of the Sharks and give him a piece of my mind.
title: Do NOT buy!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tina
content: I was unaware of the required plan for basic recording beyond a month.  If you purchase anywhere besides Costco, then you will need to purchase a plan for $3 per month for it to save any recordings.  Their marketing of this is very weak.  Even on their app, you cant find out much about the subscription.  I was caught off guard when my ring stopped working effectively a month after I purchased it.  My battery was faulty after about a month to boot.  Their customer service is not very customer friendly either.  I would have thought that they would have extended my trial period given that their product did not work properly for me to begin with.
title: Beware!!  Subscription plan needed for recording feature to work.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: James el
content: I didnt know you only had 1 free month of service and then you have to pay like 12 bucks a month to actually record anything.  So over priced.  One of the worst investments i've made in a long time.  Wish i could return this stupid thing since it just sits infront of my house not even charged.
title: Ring sucks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: btseed
content: After being satisfied with the Ring original (with the exception of the short battery life), I ordered a Ring 2...  It has been a huge mistake so far. The motion is going off every 5-10 minutes with nothing there. However, when a car pulls up or someone walks by, it doesn’t do anything.  The original Ring was great about letting us know when someone was walking up or a car pulling in our driveway, but the Ring 2 has been useless. It will be going back
title: Very disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Scannell
content: The device comes with two mounting wedges of equal size to best position the bell on the wall.  It needs to include more wedges of varying sizes for even better placement.  In many cases, there are columns that block the view of the main walkway/steps to the door and the wedges provided with our unit give us an image of more sky than porch area.  That said, the video/live view function is great when it does capture motion on the porch.
title: Where and how to mount the device.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DLS
content: Monthly fee for recording is ridiculous. Battery needs periodic charging.  You would think that the design would anticipate that and make it easy to do so. Nope! Screws for mounting are way to shallow and small to stay secure when taking off cover and removing battery.  Doorbell does not work after installation. Software upgrade features sometimes require monthly service to be available.  Stay away from this for many reasons!!
title: Fee is required and is ridiculous.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Big  Fan
content: I installed on my home connecting to doorbell wires,  followed the directions to the letter.  The once connected my home door would not stop ringing.  I have digital chimes that were comparable.  The next day I had my neighbor, a licensed electrician check over everything and he could not figure it out.  After years of following this product, I thought the bugs would be worked but no.  I would never buy this again.
title: Horrible!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Supaili
content: Awesome I can totally use it to check in my house even if I’m in Australia or no or whatever you may be outer space but it’s awesome just to see my little doggie and to see what’s going on it’s an amazing product I highly recommend it and there’s like stuff I can’t on there that is creepy too so it really into that kind of stuff but I didn’t get it for that I just got it for surveillance but there’s some things that my pop out there that are unrealistic and you’ll see totally get it
title: unrealistic amd amazing! I’m and you’ll see totally get it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mondoman
content: VERY easy to physically install and setup WiFi and video storage account. VERY complete including all sorts of mounting hardware and even security screw for battery pack. Good quality video and easy tie in to standard doorbell signal/power line so no manual battery charging needed.
title: Would have bought one earlier if I knew how easy it was.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paul V.
content: It works on old doorbell wiring, but if the old wiring is on a side wall you cannot adjust the unit to see toward the front of the house. In order to use on battery you need to buy an extra battery and a new wireless chime for in the house. Both were over priced. I returned the unit.
title: Not usable

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alex T
content: The video is pretty good. Only time it really sucks is when my cell service is slow. Worth every penny and cant wait to catch someone with it. I suggest buying a different angle mount that adjusts if you need to, the ones that come with it dont adjust. Works with alexa very well. I ask her "who is at my front door?" and she will load the video on my fire TV stick. I have chose ring as my security system because of how much i like this doorbell.
title: Very Nice!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dave Arndt
content: Thus far, I love the doorbell.  I do not have a wired doorbell, so I was always hesitant due to the battery, but so far, over a week in, and it looks like the battery will last a month, about the same length of time as a normal wireless battery unit wo the camera.  I will say it was a bit of guess work with the wedges they put in the box, so I just went without them.  Overall, I am happy with it, but need to get the plug chime to connect and we will be all set
title: What took me do long to buy this

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kitty59
content: What I dislike is I have added the levelers or spacers like it says. I still get motion detected,  when adjust motion like says it will not stay saved no matter what I do. Talked to few people I know who have it an they have same problem. I finally turned off alert, an readjust motion hoping it will save.
title: Has some issues

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sharon Smith
content: Great product but not for my apartment. Lady who lives across from me goes out to smoke every half hour. She sets off my doorbell. I've had to charge battery 3 times already. I pay no attention to alerts. Pain in the butt to delete 40+ notifications a day. I'm home all the time so if I did go out and something happened I would watch the tape. I feel like I wasted  $30 to join for a year. Would be good for a home, not for an apartment.
title: Not great for apartment dwellers.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bcballer19
content: Camera is fine and detects motion just fine. My complaint is that when there’s a notification and by the time I click on it and the camera loads, I already missed the action that triggered the alert because it takes so long to load. On top of that, the video takes a while to be processed, and you can’t access it while it’s processing. If someone stole stuff from my porch, by the time I realize it, it would be too late to chase after him/her.
title: Slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: William Hederman
content: There are several issues with this product, but the key problem from my perspective is that this is supposed to be a security product. However its time limitations largely defeat that purpose. If you get motion and don't answer it (e.g., asleep, busy at work, not constantly monitoring your phone), then it stops recording after 30 seconds. So, if someone were say, breaking into your house or car after 30 seconds of casing it, then you would have no recording of it. Completely stupid. I understand it is to save battery life, but battery life on a useless product is still useless.
title: Stops recordings after 30 seconds, even if someone is still there

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Linda Eli
content: Really wanted to like this product but after struggling for months with it, I'm very dissapointed. We have very good wireless internet speed, modem is approx 40 feet from front door. No cement walls or anything blocking it and any other wireless devices get great signal. It works maybe half the time, usually can't connect to live view. We've tried 2 of this model so it's not just a bad item. Assuming they all work this bad. Tried to contact customer support, says their chat suport not available at this time. I'd recommend another brand of door camera.
title: VERY DISSAPOINTED

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Giovanni
content: The device does it's job per the name. When someone rings the bell you can have a conversation with the person who ringed the door bell. The motion sensor is feature that sometimes work sometimes doesn't work.
title: It's not what I thought

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kimberly L Haggin
content: This worked well until the “optional” storage trial period ended. Then it lost connectivity to the internet and they suggested I upgrade to pro.  Unless you plan on subscribing to their service, this is not the product for you.. UPDATE: contacted by Ring, their customer service person was very nice professional. Re-connected to the internet. The product  itself I still like, at the end of this next 30 day trial we will see if it works according to its stated description.
title: Stopped connecting to the internet as soon and the optional trial period over

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Benjamin Campfield
content: Great product. Very good motion detect. I seem to get a day per month with a lot of false triggers. Haven't figured out why yet. My hypotheses are: effect after a rain storm, a bunny in my yard, bugs flying around,... in other words, I have no idea. The majority of the time, it works flawlessly. I have had many other motion detect cameras, and alarms, and they all have had major issues with false triggers. This is by far the best. I would recommend... and buy again.
title: Great product. Occasional false triggers.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K. Shaneyfelt
content: We really enjoy being able to see who’s at the door and talking to them if needed. Our dogs now alert to Alexa sounding the movement detection which is nice!
title: We really enjoy being able to see who’s at the door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Raynphx
content: Well packaged with nice presentation. Removal of old doorbell button and replace with this took about five minutes. All tools and supplies you need are in box. Even drill bit if you need it. Linked to smart phone and Alexa within minutes. Video quality is excellent. Night vision is greyscale but still pretty good. I'm happy and highly recommend.
title: This thing is amazing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: William Jorth
content: The package contains everything a person could need to install the Ring Doorbell and to set it up. I’ve been using it for a few days and find it works as expected. I like the notifications. They come in immediately and allow me to see people coming and going from my door. The camera is appropriately sensitive but not much that a leaf blowing by does not set it off. All I had to do was charge the battery, connect it to my network following intuitive instructions, and mount the device.
title: Simple and Reliable

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TB
content: Struggled with it staying connected.  Purchased the Chime Pro and isn’t much better.  Camera takes too long to come into view when the motion ring alerts, even when the doorbell is pushed or a live view of the front door, even it even comes on at all.  Contacted my internet provider and they weren’t much help either.  Always the same story... too many things online at the same time and I only had my iPhone, husband’s iPhone and 1 computer.  Wanted to purchase additional cameras, but now not sure it was even a good purchase at all.  Very frustrated.
title: Not the greatest.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Andrew Knight
content: I have had this doorbell for 1 year 1 month and 2 weeks.  Today, the doorbell started ringing on its own. I had to disconnect the Ring Doorbell to get it to quit.  Of course, after the warranty was out.  The connection to the Ring is garbage and has always been garbage. Trying to see a live view remotely is a total joke, rarely connects.  The product is trash for the money one spends for security.  Will never buy another Ring product again
title: TRASH!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: scott
content: It isn't really adjustable as far as setting the distance it activates at. then after 1 month you have to pay to keep using your new toy ($30-60 per year).  so. before you buy, remember you have to pay forever or it's useless. but it does have a good picture if you need to use it( in all fairness).
title: good camera/doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diane Tietje
content: This worked great until i paid the heat subscription. Then it intermittently works stop notifying me of any motion although it should in the history. Ice had to uninstall and reinstall the app 3 times in about 40 days. It will work for about a day or two then bam - nothing. The app is constantly updating which tells me there is serious issues with it.  It also takes forever to live view. I honestly feel ripped off. I would not purchase this again. Very disappointed.
title: Get ready for frustration and annoyance

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: firelane
content: Notification of motion is delayed. For 30 days you can at least watch the saved video to see who you missed. After 30 days the ability to do this is no longer available without putting out more money. So one has to decide whether to pay up or watch a person’s back or empty porch. At first this product seemed like a good idea, but if I had understood about the delay (that makes it a never ending money-maker for the company), I would have not purchased the product.
title: Slow notification forces paying yearly subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Melinda Shaw
content: I thought long and hard about getting one of these, but my main entrance is my garage and I couldn't hear people knock and my old doorbell was broken. This has been great to see deliveries and great for security. My only complaint is the range of motion, it picks up large vehicles out on the street. However the security is worth it. Happy with it. Free for 20 days and then just $3.00 a month. I am happy with it.
title: Ring works for me 😊

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brad K
content: Super easy to set up, and battery is lasting long (after I quit testing the doorbell too much). I'll never go without a video doorbell after seeing the benefits and security it provides. The app is really great and easy to understand. The neighborhood alerts are an added bonus. I'm super impressed with the Ring company, and will be buying more cams to watch my front, back and side yard. It's a small investment to be able to monitor your property. I looked at other brands, and am glad I went with the Ring community. They build a quality product, and stand behind it.
title: This thing rocks!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. Louis
content: I live in a three story townhouse. I needed to be able to see who is at the door when the bell ring. The Ring video door bell 2 works for my need. Using a wireless router on the second floor has not kept me from getting a reliable connection. Using the included wedge and being able to reduce the field of the motion sensors has helped to eliminate unwanted motion alerts (house facing busy street). After one week the battery is at 92%. Facial recognition/registration of the house occupants would have been great. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.
title: Easy to install. Works Great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Adam C.
content: The install was easy and included everything except a drill, the picture quality is average. The issue was what it actually captures was not useful at all. Tried all different settings and still would rarely even catch a person walking up and would capture video when nothing present. Returned item. Not awful, but did not meet expectations.
title: Doesn't capture what you think it should

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kathie Maloney Oerfradi
content: I never would have purchased and installed this had I known it was going to cost me extra to view video of who or what is at the door. Will be uninstalling and going with a different company that does not charge extra for the sole purpose of their product.
title: Must Pay Extra After 30 days

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Coaster
content: The Ring-2 meets or exceeds my expectations and installation was very easy. Instructions provided were consise and easy to follow with all required fasteners included for various mounting methods.  I recommend the Ring-2 to anyone considering a doorbell/video monitoring device.
title: Ring-2 performance is great!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C Miller
content: This doorbell has sealed the deal on my addiction to ring products. Works great! Seamless integration with Alexa and Fire TV. I bought this with the Echo Show 5 and it's great how you can view the front door cam do easily on the echo. Since then I have purchased more trying products including the alarm system. Definite must have for DIY home security!
title: Ring is the best doorbell product available!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michael M.
content: I bought this as part of a bundle with a dot. I guess it’s my fault for not doing a little more research, but there are at least 4 models of ring doorbells. I know several people with the ring, I have seen them in the hardware store, etc. This is not the same one, it’s huge!! It doesn’t even look like a doorbell, I was worried guests wouldn’t know to press it since it looks like some huge intercom system. The mounting system is poorly designed and cheap. The provided masonry bit could not drill into brick. There is a level on the bell for mounting, but not on the actual mounting bracket, which is the part you need to mark for holes to be drilled. Someone didn’t think this through. The mounts that sit behind the unit are cheap plastic and when I tried to screw them in the screw head just went straight through them. So I wasted an hour, drilled three new holes in my brickwork, and ended up returning the unit.
title: HUGE!! And cheap mounting.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joanie Schindler
content: Love this ring doorbell!!! The picture is very clear, took less than 30 minutes to set up! The only thing that I didn’t like was the battery was composers when it arrived! But I understand there really isn’t anything that can be done about that! I just wanted to play with it as soon as it was delivered!! The is a great security measure for anyone!!
title: See who’s here

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Scarlett
content: Bought as a gift for my in-laws and they love it! It alerts your phone anytime someone approaches your door and you are able to talk to them. Also records so you can go back and see the activity around your house. Picture is great.
title: Records and Alerts. Great Picture

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: theresa Sederholt
content: I needed a doorbell along with a camera. This solved that need, however, if you need to contact customer service you will find it is very difficult. When you finally reach the part where you can chat, it becomes even more difficult. The extended time spent in the chat with no real answers that weren't read from a script. Total waste of time.
title: The product is good but Customer Service is terrible.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lewis P.
content: It was very easy to install for me. Everything works pretty good but occasionally when I get a notification and go to view it within the app it hangs with the spinning icon for way to long......sometimes never connects. To which the person has left or is walking away. I think this is do to where I may be at the time I need to see whos at the door. Like on the other end of the state (RI). There where times I was in a more local area and or populated area when I worked just fine.
title: Works Great most of the time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeff & Annika
content: I bought this and didn’t know that a $3 monthly fee is required to see any videos that are not live. Works pretty good. If someone runs up to the door and runs back it will not turn on quick enough to see the front of the person. If you don’t hard wire it the battery doesn’t last long enough.
title: Must pay $3 per month subscription to see videos.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Josh G
content: Great device! You can see and hear anyone at your door. Motion detection works great. Connects great with ALL Echo devices, especially the Echo Show. With the Echo Show, you can ask the Show to view the front door or Video from your Ring Doorbell. When there is motion or someone ringing your doorbell, your Echo devices will chime and give a voice alert to the activity. Great for home security.
title: Great Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Averageshopr
content: After the last software update, the ring quit detecting motion until the the person was almost gone. So basically, they could rob the house, and not unitl they reached the curb would Ring detect their motion. We tried every adjustment, but nothing helps. The only time we're notified is if they actually ring the bell. Not very useful. :((
title: Software update ruined our Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Todd
content: It's not too bad if only used as a camera, but completely useless for viewing events in real time. When motion is detected it takes over a minute to open the video stream. This is when the app functions well. It usually crashes. Either way it is useless when you need it most. If you want an IP camera there are much better options at a much lower price. That is all this device functions as.
title: App usually crashes, and too slow to be of any use when it works.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Winnie H
content: This is the worst!!!! Do. Not. Buy!!!! Treasure truck failed us with this one!!! 1. Ring states that the battery lasts 6-12 MONTHS, yeah, try 6 DAYS!!!! It does NOT last!! 2. When the wind blows the tree, it alerts you. But when someone is walking up TO YOUR STEP TOWARDS THE CAMERA, it doesn’t capture it!!!! 3. After 30 days, there’s a subscription fee... which is BS... 4. When an alert comes up, IT. DOESNT. EVEN. LOAD!!!!!! This is the WORST.... way better security systems out there’s.
title: Do. Not. Buy. Save your MONEY!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Denverite
content: i really wanted to like this product.  My wife works in our basement, and I envisioned her being able to answer the doorbell from there without having to come upstairs.  Unfortunately, the lag time between the ring and the time the app loads on a phone or iPad is >30 seconds, so the device is largely ineffective as a video doorbell.  I set it up so I dedicated an old iPad I have to the app so it wouldn't have to open, and it still took more than 30 seconds to load. I imagine future models will be faster, but for now, this was a big disappointment.  I have returned it for a refund.
title: Different in practice than in theory

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dizzney bear
content: For the most part it has been ok.  The fact that when it detects activity or a person, it takes longer to connect and view the activity than I had expected.  Otherwise it seems to serve the purpose. I don’t regret buying it and have been considering adding one to my side door as well.
title: Worth the purchase

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jerry
content: I have three ring video doorbells, one at my weekend property for security (a life saver), one at my front entrance way, and one yet to be installed on my sideyard entrance. My son two doors away has a ring and I can watch his home, and for deliveries when he is working. Needless to say "I love ring video doorbells.
title: The best invention since the wheel. I love ring video doorbells!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: James Hall
content: I have had my Ring 2 for several months now, so let me share my experience so far. First this device has a terrible wifi receiver in it. I have 2 very expensive long range wifi routers and I had to add an extended literally 4 feet away to get it to work at all. With the extender it still on gets a 63 on the app and the video gets pixilated constantly. Also the battery only last about a month with the motion turned off and being activated only about once a week. I would not recommend anyone buy this device.
title: Terrible WiFi Receiver

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AMERICANMADE
content: Why is there not an option to record locally to phone?  I don't like the fact that I purchase a product and that product relies on a subscription to the manufacturers "cloud" to operate correctly, (which would be ok if there was an option to record locally).  Not everyone wants their crap stored on a cloud.
title: Subscrition to cloud storage is a scam.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shareef Yousef
content: We've all read about the Ring hacks. Ring really Neds to offer a way to offload recorded footage to either local storage or any number of cloud providers. We simply can't trust their services. Returned mine and won't be buying any Ring product as long as their servers are the only connectivity options.
title: Need a way to offload videos to local storage

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sharon
content: We love our Ring doorbell!  It works perfectly.  We get notifications on our phones and I love being able to talk to the person whether or not I'm home.  I highly encourage getting the video feature.  You could be shocked to learn what goes on in your surroundings when you're not home.  We saw a strange lady walk up to our door, stare at the corner and walk away!  We kept the video should we ever need it.
title: Great product!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dennis P. Bolduc
content: The best investment I ever made. It has lots of features, I always know who is at my door. Happy can even talk to them if I’m not home. I always have a video of anyone who comes to my house and if thief comes on my porch and steals a package, I have them on camera and can give that information to the police and it make it easier for the police to catch this person. It had one unexpected feature, I have outdoor cats and when they want to come in at night the door alarm lets me know and l let them. I advise anyone to get this device, you won’t regret it and you will realize it’s the best investment you can make for the safety of your home.
title: The best  investment for the safety of your home.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: And
content: Motion detector failed in an intrusion when the perp crouched to get in... Impossible to use to communicate with someone live or answer the door as it takes forever to connect on the app. After 1 year the battery doesnt charge 3 days even on lowest settings. Customer support is non existent, no way to reach them and support email never replies. AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL - forget even considering this brand
title: Zero customer support - fails most times

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jia S.
content: Great device and visuals however it’s atrocious that ring won’t integrate with google home. I bought it to have an integrated house but it won’t show up and I can’t control it from my google home device despite it being advertised as “being able to be integrated with google home.” The integration is poor of at all and clearly just to market to customers. Don’t but this if you want to integrate it to google home.
title: Poor integration with google home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kerry Zimmerman
content: I purchased the original Ring doorbell and sent it back because it did not detect when somebody was at my door.  So next I bought a Google Nest and it did not have a settable Alert tone and I never knew when somebody came to the door.  The Ring Doorbell II works perfectly.  It detects when someone is in the alert zone and it gives a clear sound so I know when somebody was detected.
title: Ring 2 works and gives notification

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Affiliated Customer
content: This is great except for two issues: 1.)  Recording usually starts just as person is leaving porch back view of them stealing pkg. 2.)  If installed at doorbell level (even with tilting plates), it’s too low to get good picture of face.  If porch light is overhead, face is backlit and in shadow.  With hoodie it’s worse. SUGGESTION to mfr:  Add some kind of motion controlled light/flash on it.
title: Best on market but could use improvement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: screw you
content: I have reads reviews on the speed of this unit and lag problems. I don't have these problems at all. Before I bought this I did a speed test at the location I was mounting it to make sure I had enough internet. I have this on a back patio door. I have had small birds land on my deck and set it off, but I had to play with the zones and sensitivity to make this perfect. Would most definitely recommend this to anyone. BTW. The cost of video capture for 1 year is $100. That is a very good deal when you price other plans.
title: Very Impressed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stephanie30p
content: We love this as just an added security feature ... however I’ve had it installed for almost a month & am having a hard time figuring out if I need or/& how to pay for the service for the video to be stored etc .. the websites info regarding what exactly you get for wtvr price etc is NOT very easy to clearly understand ..
title: Added security at great price

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Louis J. Levy
content: Easy to install. Great camera view and clarity. Motion detection work great. I see the next door neighbors cat make it rounds twice a day, haha. Sound is good. If you order through Alexa, you can save $30. Just tell Alexa to add to your cart. Simple. This came with two attachments to angle sideways and angle up or down. No need to buy additional accessories.
title: A great buy for security and convenience.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dustin Bryce Onaran
content: The camera cannot distinguish between background movement and actual motion on our porch. Every car that drives by the street out front sets off the motion sensor, but most days the mail carrier doesn't set it off when he is literally standing directly in front of the camera, which is mounted above the mailbox. We have tried every setting, and we have tried the angle mount. I'm a patient person, and I don't expect perfection from electronics. But the motion sensor portion of this simply does not work. I guess it's a nice looking doorbell though?
title: Motion detection feature is useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JS White
content: When this was first installed it worked just find. Then as time went by it took so long to connect that by the time I got the view, no one was there which kind of defeats the whole purpose. Now it says wifi connection is weak. I only have problems with the Ring. All other devices work fine.  So I guess if my gateway isn't by the front door I am out of luck unless i spend more money. May try another video doorbell. I am not inclined spend more money with ring.
title: Useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brenda
content: I love my Ring video door bell ! This is my second purchase. We have one for the front door. But needed one for the back door too. We had some things stolen in the past. I posted the ring sticker in the window. Have had no problems since then. Also turned on the back yard flood light. That may have helped too.
title: Works great !

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Deborah B
content: I thought I’d replace my original ring doorbell hoping this one would work better at being able to communicate from my phone in the house.  It doesn’t!! I can’t get the live feed up in time to talk to the person at the front door.  It says my signal is good.  The video is much clearer though.
title: Still can’t communicate of live feed it takes to long to come up on my phone!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Corinne Griffith
content: I started with the ring original and saw that at night time it kind of looked terrible. So this one went on sale and I exchanged. This one is so much better
title: Love ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jonathan Wol
content: The Ring has been a disappointment. I bought it at the same time I purchased a Blink camera system and because I can compare them, the Ring’s weaknesses are apparent. The Ring often does not capture the motion until the person has turned to walk away. For instance, if a delivery person leaves a package and hits the door bell, the video is most often of their back when they are moving away. The most frustrating part is once the trial period is over, you cannot access the videos unless you pay a subscription!! In other words, unless you are available when someone hits the doorbell, you have no idea who was there or what they want. I will be trying to return it and if I cannot I will move it to a less used door and buy something else. In contrast the blink cameras never miss anyone and I can hear on the saved videos there just isn’t any two way communication. I should note that the Ring video quality is higher than the blink.
title: Ring is very slow to respond to motion.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dino Duss
content: Great addition to my ring family. Got the RVD2 on Prime Day. The only reason I picked the RVD2 over the Pro is because I do not have a power source to use where the doorbell is installed
title: Great doorbell for a location that does not have existing power

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John H. Stansbury
content: This is my second Ring 2.  I got one earlier for my front door and hardwired it to my existing bell.  It worked so well I bought a second for my back door.  No hardwire there so I added the solar power kit and it is work very well.  All aspects are function well and my link to Alexa is spot on.  I have even purchased 2 of the Rin 2 for gifts for my children's families.
title: It works just as well as the other Ring 2 I purchased

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: victoria88
content: It does have some delay sometime, and I dont get all notifications to my phone. That is the only reason for 4 stars. This is a great product, and we purchased with the chime pro. Love that we can live feed to the front door anytime. Pics up motion when a car pulls in the driveway, and alerts me well before someone is standing at my front door. So far this has been a well worth the money.
title: Love the added protection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gabriel
content: They say that battery is good for 6 month, all depends how you set up the motions. I set up the motions just when you very close to my door and when you ring the doorbell. Iv'e been receiving around 2 to 3 notifications daily, witch is not much. I installed the ring 2 like 5 days ago and the battery is already on 75%, that means that will be on 0% on the next  15 days. Or the battery is defective or the battery doesn't hold 6 month.
title: Battery Life

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: GrnEyesAmyZ
content: A huge factor for me was ease of installation and set up.  I am not handy or tech savvy, so I needed an elementary level product.  This was it for me.  I had everything installed ( I didn't wire it to my doorbell) and it was operating in 15 minutes (excluding battery charging time).  I'm looking forward to utilizing this awesome device in every day life.
title: So Awesome!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Andrew Buck
content: Provides peace of mind when away from home, especially when receiving deliveries. Motion sensor may require tuning over time if facing a street or busy sidewalk. Battery lasts weeks; total time varies based on frequency of camera use. Installation is as simple as drilling a couple of screws into the wall.
title: Effective security device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Frank J. Lawler, Jr.
content: Ring set up very quickly and was up and running in minutes. It's always a cool thing to have your new toy work the first time and very quickly. The video is very good and the sensor alerts you immediately when someone approaches your front door. The phone also chimes and it's  a matter of seconds when prompted to tap the phone and immediately you see a clear picture of your "guest'. The reason it is not 5 stars is that the sound is very poor and is hard to understand. I haven't contacted Ring yet to rectify this problem so in all fairness there may be a solution this issue.
title: Ring is a MUST HAVE doorbell/video camera!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rich Jensen
content: The device will show up maybe 10% of the time. Just read all the other 1's There is something basically wrong with th connection to the doorbell. It might have to do with the power getting to charge the battery. I have played with it for hours. No idea. It will work very occasionally, but the goes back to sleep! If I ever get it working with my other ring devices which I bought specifically to use with this, I'll maybe upgrade review.
title: If there was a 0 possible I would have rated it 0.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bruster McFrisk
content: It worked great until a update was pushed and I received no notifications now after many hrs of reading and adding a WiFi repeater, i still get no notifications. motion works OK but that's it, I never know if someone is at my door while i'm away. Past warranty and Amazon doesn't care so I'm guessing I'll wait for it to die then put my old door bell button back on.
title: Bought the Ring 2 9 months ago

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K Gochenour
content: I was happy to get this initially because I have four dogs and don’t want to get sued if someone claims they were bit by one. I’d have proof that the didn’t. Didn’t realize there was a fee after the 30 days. Also didn’t realize that was such a short return period. Walmart and Costco will let you return much longer. Feel like this was a total waste of money
title: Waste of money! Don’t buy!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lockinvar
content: Question why it needed a signal booster. Other devices in house much further form router than Ring work fine. Why does Ring need a booster? Also set it up to 'see'  shortest distance as possible, but on a clear sunny day it 'sees' across the street. Easy to set up with iPhone app. Thinking of getting an Alexa show for it to sit on my upstairs desk. I like this thing. Bought one for my son's house.
title: Use it all the time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stephan Wong
content: Constantly all day alerts!  Windy, trees, and walking plants and moving cars oh my!  So many false alarms it almost defeats the purpose of why I got it.  It even a point where delivery people know what the ring is and try to hide from it when delivering.  I even seen delivery people ring the door bell and run like a zombie is chasing after him.
title: Beep Beep Beep boop!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kelli
content: I LOVE the Ring doorbell.  It was the perfect addition to our security camera system in our home.  The Ring captures a wide view of the front door area including our front yard. This adds piece of mind in knowing who had arrived at the house, even when i am not home. I am able to view each motion movement as it happens form the touch of my phone.
title: Family security at your fingertips

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tyler
content: The motion sensing simply does not work. Constant false alarms nightly (picture attached) with no actual motion recorded on any of the stored videos mean you may as well have no motion sensor at all. Simply put, while I was excited about integrating the Ring’s motion sensor into my smart home automations, this product does not work as inrended, and we’ve ultimatey just had to disable that functionality. I’m very disappointed.
title: Motion Sensor does not work at all. Constant false alarms.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: She Ra
content: This is such an amazing device! I don't know why we didn't get it sooner. It was relatively simple to install (my husband didn't complain) and the resolution of the video is so clear. I'm especially excited to know that my children and all that come to our front door can be seen and vetted. I love the sensitivity of the motion detection and instant notifications delivered to my phone. I highly recommend this product!
title: So cool!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: t6yh832
content: We returned our first unit and now the second unit is defective.  The battery won't charge to 100% and dies within a few hours even with motion/alerting turned off.  We bought a wifi extender to improve the connectivity.  While this same wifi extender works for a Ring floodlight, it doesn't seem to help with Ring 2.  We never got either unit working more than 24 hours.  Again, this seems to be Ring 2 specific because the Ring floodlight works fine for us at even a greater distance between the Apple Airport Extreme and the Ring device.
title: Wait for the bugs to get worked out - assuming there's not a bad run of hardware

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dimmelus
content: It's so nice being able to see who's at my house when I'm not. Seeing when packages arrive is great. Picture quality is great. Works much better than my other cameras. Wish it had its own storage or could hook up to a DVR but the cloud service works great. The community feature is nice it will alert you to emergency situations sometimes 10 to 15 minutes before the news does
title: Know who's at your home when you are not

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ergibson83
content: I love this video doorbell. It was easy to mount, but the reason I deducted 1 star is due to the fact that you cant save video to your own network location. You have to purchase their service if you'd like to continue saving video after the 30 day trial period. Other than that, the video is crystal clear and it works exactly as advertised. It's also a very user friendly product!
title: Great addition to my home!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: L. Runyanwood
content: I am so sorry that it took so long for my husband to install this that I can't return it. I can't create an account, so I can't get the subscription to save recordings. Chat is "unavailable at this time"- for two days. I was looking for something that worked better than Arlo.  This doesn't work AT ALL.
title: I would give zero stars if I could.  No customer support and it won't work.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tracy
content: We loved our first Ring 2 so much, we bought a second one for the back door.  And then we bought a third one for one of our children who just bought a house!  there is an added piece of mind that comes from being able to see who approaches your door, whether you're at home or not.  Easy to install, easy to set up, and works great!
title: So good, I bought it 3 times!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Beth C.
content: I love Ring products!  I have this door bell and 2 flood lights. I can’t say enough about this product. The only thing that is annoying (no fault of Ring) is my nextdoor neighbors cat is constantly setting the flood light cams off. Therefore keeping me up at night. I’ve tried setting the motion sensor on The lowest setting but it still goes off. Hmm 🤔. What to do????
title: Great product and video footage!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JGS
content: The Ring Video Doorbell 2 is the easiest to use and install video doorbell on the market. The package comes with all the tools, screws, etc. you need to properly install it. The features of this device are great. You can see anyone who rings it or gets close to it (using its motion sensor). The battery lasts long, it is very easy to setup and connect to your wifi, and the app is super easy to use.  The bottom line is super experience and value overall.
title: The best high tech video doorbell on the market

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M Diaz
content: I didn’t realize you have to buy the doorbell for the inside of the house separately.  Daytime viewing quality is good, nighttime quality isn’t that great.  This gave me great peace of mind especially during the holiday months with all of the packages I had delivered.  I found this easy to assemble.
title: Need to buy interior doorbell also

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: skbh
content: It keeps giving me info for things that are happening in Columbus Ohio.  I can't make that go away.  I have only been able to add my own address to see my own house.  I have been able to get notifications from around my house, but I can't stop the ones that are no where close to my house. It also has been named. And I couldn't set up from beginning.
title: Pretty sure this was refurbished

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: R.J.
content: Ordered this item and was pleasently surprised by the ease of programming and installation. It integrates well with the Echo Dot purchased with it, and lets us know when someone is approaching our front door. The add-on recording package is reasonably priced and available recordings are on line for 60 days; additional devices can be added though the recordingg package increases in price (Looking into Cameras now). Ordered 2 More for our Children for their homes as a gift since it is working so well at our home. One thing required is a good wireless connection, to your devices.
title: Great security device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. Elliott
content: Stays connected unlike the Chinese El cheap-a-dero versions.  Actually works reliably.  My only real complaint is the WiFi doesn't seems to reach like I would expect.  Need to put an AP within 10 feet to make it reliable.
title: WiFi poor distance.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Fosty
content: The delivery was prompt. The instructions were good and easy to follow. The only difficulty I had was with the security screw being so small that it was somewhat difficult to insert. I did lose one of the security screws while trying to install. Once installed, it works great. The motion detection system  is excellent and easy to adjust for the vision field desired. The notifications on the phone for both motion and the doorbell also works great
title: Ring the doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: indy
content: I bought two ring doorbells for the front and rear doors on 9/5/19.  The rear doorbell has become a real problem in putting out multiple phantom alerts even when there is no motion.  I have made every possible adjustment the Ring company has suggested.  Then I went to their Community support message board only to find many people are having the same problem, and Ring is aware of the problem and basically they have no answer to the problem that solves the issue.  I wish this wasn't true because it is very nice to get notice of legitimate motion, but it has become annoying.
title: Read the Ring Community Board for "Phantom Alerts" before you buy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: HlMoore
content: It was fairly easy to install. It works with our digital doorbell chime which is really nice because our old doorbell didn't (we had to hold the button down to hear the full music - I believe my husband installed it incorrectly) It's nice to know who is at the door before I answer it (if I answer it). My kids come running to me now before they answer the door to whom ever knocked. My older children have the app on their phones. It gives them some security when they are babysitting. My only complaint has to do with the app. It takes too many steps before you can see who is at the door.
title: I love my Ring 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jon
content: One of the selling points is ‘live view’ see and react to someone ringing the doorbell. 80% of the time the device will either not connect or takes so long to connect that what ever triggers the motion is gone. If you are going to use this just as a passive detector it may work fine. But I doubt that it would respond quick enough to capture a image if someone ran through the field of view.
title: remote video processing, very slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: GG Grandma
content: It's a great door bell however the video is only 20 seconds long.  I had a thief trying to break into my car and the video didn't show much as it's only 20 seconds long!  If the video was at least 1-2 minutes long it would have been more help to the police.
title: It's a great door bell however the video is only 20 seconds ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: B. Schweller
content: Our Ring doorbell is located only 30 feet from a high-speed router and high-data rate network.  When the doorbell is rung, we never have a response time adequate to talk to the individual at the door.  Detection is inconsistent (especially if you have a recessed door...even four inches!).  We have had packages delivered without the device alerting us.  Night vision only works well if you do not leave a porch light on.
title: Not as reliable as advertized.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shalinda Boyd
content: This thing sounded great. It worked for a solid maybe 2 weeks. Since then, it goes off line for no reason that we can find every couple of days and it doesn’t notify you that it is off line. You only realize it when someone comes to your door while you are home and it doesn’t work. I’m am still making monthly payments for a product that that doesn’t even work 1/2 of the time. At first I thought that it was an Internet issue, but everything else our house has had no problem with internet connection and when you try to reconnect, it doesn’t work but will randomly reconnect on its own for a few hours. Very disappointed in the performance. I may as well have nothing but a regular doorbell.
title: Don’t waste your money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ave_Maria
content: They need to be way more up-front about the subscription you will need to continue using it. Borders on false advertising. Really cheesy too. Just charge upfront. I am so sick of these subscription scams.
title: Subscription?!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: z@iboo
content: The best thing is, it is Wireless doorbell and easy to install with two interchangeable face-plates. There is a delay when motion occurs actually and when you receive notification about that. I don't like their paid service to save video recordings in cloud which starts from $3 per month which is additional cost if someone want to keep video recordings otherwise they will be lost.
title: Thing I liked: Wireless; Thing I didn't like: Delay in Notifications + Paid Cloud Storage

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Verbal Kent
content: I love the ring 2 doorbell.  I love extra sense that it gives me being a single person.  I use UPS and FedEX tracking but it's good to have additional confirmation when my package is delivered.  It was easy to install.  My ring doorbell 2 was setup and ready to go within 5 hours of me opening the box.  Most of the time elapsed from waiting for the battery to fully charge.  I, also, installed a chime in my basement so that I'm notified if someone is at or rings my doorbell.  This combo is the best!
title: I love the ring 2 doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MARK MOFFITT
content: Works as expected, but won’t record not even ONE recent event unless you pay them for their subscription service - no, not even just one, or just the last time someone was at your door - nothing.  It’s really just an opportunity for them to sell their subscription service.  If ONLY seeing what’s happening live is what you want, it’s perfect.
title: Will not record ANYTHING unless you buy a subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: 3dprnt
content: I have other camera systems all around my house,  this was a purchase my wife wanted.  So far she's pretty happy with it which of course works for me.  The WiFi portion appears to work well as does the motion detection.  The video quality is adequate,  nothing special. Overall it does the job as intended.
title: Works pretty well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mesa Man
content: I must say, it has been pretty flawless. I always have my phone with me, so no matter where I am in the house, I always hear the doorbell. Being able to see it /hear it across town is pretty cool. Now when Amazon delivery people don't ring my doorbell, I know there is a delivery at my door, which is why I bought it in the first place. Hear me Amazon...I can see you now :)
title: Works as advertised.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AuthorElizabethYork
content: I love what this doorbell does, especially since I don't have a wired doorbell anymore. The only issue I have is there is a severe delay, it sometimes doesn't see movement, and I had to buy a Wifi extender for each Ring product. The doorbell is outside of my router (6 feet away) and it wouldn't stay connected. The chimes are the same way.
title: I love it, but...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ms. Edwards
content: I really wanted to like my Ring Doorbell 2 but I don't...I've had it for a couple of months and I've had to re-charge the battery 3 times already. I've adjusted the motion sensor but that has not helped.  I keep getting alerts that there is motion at my front door but I hardly EVER have anything in the history - when I do, usually no one there.  I try to go to the Live View and it won't let me because it says "Motion at the Front Door" but nothing in motion history.  It is a vicious loop.  I've ordered a spare battery and moved the server (also says wi-fi signal low but everything else I have says the signal is strong...).I can even use my wi-fi at the pool across the street but according to Ring my signal is too low at the front door.  It really sucks and does not work like they advertise.
title: Does not work like advertised

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Caroline F. Cantrell
content: I’m satisfied with the purchase, the reason I gave it a 4* was because of the delay between the camera and notification to my iPhone. I give it 5* ‘s overall. The motion sensor is great, it set off the camera one day while a spider was weaving a new web on my front porch. I would recommend purchasing the Ring, I plan on purchasing two more for my back and side doors.
title: Worth The Purchase

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rian A. Holayter
