content: Video quality is very good. I like being able to interact with those at the door. Install was straight forward. Initially I wanted the pro because it was smaller profile- but the transformer in the house was difficult to locate- and so I decided to get the doorbell 2 after talking with support. This was great because even at the 16 VAC the battery is been rock solid at 100% using it a couple times a day as it is new.
title: Pretty happy with the video doorbell and support

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CWS
content: The camera angle (even with the wedge) is too high to show the floor or ground near the door so impossible to see if package is there.  The sound notification for my iPad does not work even after spending a great deal of time with Anthony in customer service. Notifications do work well with our android phone but very slow.  The motion wizard does not hold my custom settings and will notify when cars are passing when it loses the settings.  I bought the chime and it goes offline for no reason often as well.
title: Good idea. Needs a lot of improvements.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D. Walls
content: I bought this for my nearly 80 year old mother because she wanted to be able to see who was at her door before she opened it. Unfortunately there is a significant delay before the app on her ipad tells her somebody is at the door which makes it useless for what she wanted it for.
title: Delay when somebody at the door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mayra Ewald
content: I bought this as a gift for my dad and was very unsure about the wide angle. My parents doorbell is right behind a large post and I was afraid that it would be a problem. This is what it looks like on their front door. The wide angle is so good that it shows the front door and even his 2 car driveway in front of the garage. My dad is very happy! Especially with the fact that he can check on the house while he is at work if he gets a notification. He really wished he had this during the last election when he constantly had people knocking on the door. He said it was very easy to install and it is connected with his echo in the house. I’m very happy and I may have to buy one for myself.
title: Very Wide Angle

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D4tay
content: Just in love with it and can not wait to get more. At first the product wasn't working correctly and called Ring and they sent me a new one even though I got it from a third party. I was shocked and told them that I would always get their products. I have installed Rings for others and they just love them. I still think the price of these are high but when the price go down I will get two more.
title: Great video doorbell.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Karen Delaney
content: At first this worked really well.  The detection was almost instant however now there is a long delay to the point that when it detects someone they could come and go without being recorded.  The delay getting to my phone has deteriorated and the sound is distorted.  I haven't changed anything and can't figure out what is going on.  It is almost to the point of being useless.
title: It has developed a severe delay to get the picture and sound to the phone.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: N0HEQ
content: Vivid HD video image with great IR capabilities for night-time operation.  Full motion video with audio.  Original item received was unable to connect to the Internet.  Ring customer service quickly sent a replacement unit that connected to the Internet almost immediately.  I am so pleased with Ring that I have purchased two additional Ring doorbells as well as Ring chimes that are a very practical accessory to your Ring doorbell for remote areas of your property.
title: Five Stars

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Priscilla E. Whitlock
content: When I ordered the ring2.  it did not say you had to buy a protection plan.  So I tried to with no luck.  SO I BOUGHT A SECOND ONE STILL NO LUCK.  WHAT AM I TO DO.  SOMEONE SAID THERE WAS A DOORBELL THAT DID ALL THAT THE RING2 DID. SO I GUESS I WILL TRY THAT AND YOU DIDN'T HAVE TO BY A PROTECTION PLAN.
title: NOT SATISFIED

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shawn
content: Good video quality the menu of settings are really good gives you piece of mind.  I just wish Ring explained the use of there product better like you have to pay at least $3.00 a month to be able to play back any motion videos the ring records they advertise the ring door bell doesn’t have any maintenance fees ect. But if your not home and want to see the motion video the ring detects and saves to the cloud you have to pay at least $3 a month or $30 a year . The battery doesn’t last 6 months like they advertised either with regular use it might last 3 months before you should charge it . All in all this product is great and I like it a lot .
title: Ring Door Bell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kpzone
content: The installation was great.  I charged the battery overnight before attempting to install, just to be safe.  In under 20 mins and I was able to see the front door area just perfect. I do occasionally have slow response when trying to view live, but no issues when responding to a motion or ring notification.  Not sure why this happens.  According to the status, the power and Wi-Fi signal are good. Anyway this is a great product that I never thought I would be getting, but it solved a worry for my wife so I'm glad we have it.  Happy wife; Happy LIFE!
title: Easy installation.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cyndi0715
content: Bought this because some creep left a perverted note on my doormat that was directed towards my daughter. This device is amazing.  The camera is clear during the day and at night. The camera angle is almost panoramic. I can see part of my driveway, across the street and all of my porch area.  Records anything that moves in front of the device.  You get notifications and you’re able to view instantly.  Having this will hopefully make those creeps think twice before doing something malicious.  Definitely worth the money. So nice to see whats outside before you open your door.  And you can communicate with them without opening your door first.  Happy we bought it!
title: More than just a doorbell! See what goes on outside your door 24/7!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dennis Quintela
content: Device has utterly failed me. I had two thefts in a single day and the ring didn’t detect or record either. About a week later the battery died without warning or any notification. Took me a day to figure that out. This is utter garbage and I wouldn’t keep it for free. Switched to a Nest Hello which records 24/7 and has facial recognition. Night and Day difference! Sure I had to run wire for the Mest but at least it works and has never let me down. Still have Ring for home protect but I’m done with their mediocre cameras.
title: Two stolen items in one day and no video

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Di
content: I purchased the Ring Doorbell 2, 2 echo spots and 2 echo Dots.  My ring doorbell goes off constantly when no one is there and then today, UPS delivered a package while I was watching on my security cameras and the Ring Doorbell 2 did NOTHING!  I am sending all of these products back because they do not work.....just now the Ring Doorbell went off and no one is outside!!!  USELESS
title: HORRIBLE

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jennifer Scott
content: The ring doorbell is a great idea and I was hoping it would replace my security camera outside or add to it.  However, my $20 camera responds right away and is more functional every single time and the ring doorbell is not. The excuse from ring doorbell FAQs and error messages is that it is my WiFi.  I have fast WiFi and it is not far from the router.  All the other cameras in my house have zero issues staying connected to WiFi.  There is a lag when receiving notifications from outside the home and many times inside.  It takes minutes and restarting of the app to answer a ring.  It is useless.  I am highly disappointed.
title: Terrible connectivity

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: rilera
content: First off, it’s really big. At least for my small area. But other than that it really does the job and was a cinch for me to install myself. The video is clear and the wiring to my existing bell was easy to do. If I had it to do I would buy the smaller version. As it is I will probably be relating it to the right which will mean drilling a new hole (no big deal).
title: So big!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Matt Brian
content: Our new apartment doesn’t have a peephole or a doorbell so the ring doorbell was a godsend. After a simple setup, the ring is able to show me anything that passes by my door, person or otherwise. I didnt have a doorbell prior, so I will need to charge the batteries, but that really is a small price to pay for the convince this offers me
title: Our new apartment doesn’t have a peephole or a doorbell ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rocio
content: I absolutely love this product but I am very disappointed with the battery life. The package says that the battery last 6-12 months. I’ve had the ring camera In use for 26 days and I’ve had to charge the battery twice. I am extremely disappointed with the battery life, especially when ring advertises the battery to last months between charge. Other than the battery issues, I think it’s a good product. I just wished I would have purchased the hard wired doorbell camera instead.
title: Poor battery life

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M. Koenig
content: I was disappointed with the performance , the servers they use are SLOOOUUUU , therefore doorbell the reaction time is questionable .  They only want you to pay for the recording feature per property! and to sell stuff . The app warns you of motion at the front door, you tab on the warning and instead of going to the  issue at hand it takes you to a screen where you tab again , to another screen , to tab again on live view to see , some time later someone walking away .... USELESS .
title: Disappointment.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rub Val
content: The phone time to view is too quick and then its gone. which means I have to change distance reaction and that will then give me more alerts from walker. But what I need is a longer delay on my phone. Also after the 30 day try out all changes which is not user friendly.
title: Just ok

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: StephenT
content: This is a product that seems to work as advertised except for the following:  in the Amazon page for this product, they distinctly say that it can be controlled with Alexa.  Well, not Alexa on a Fire tablet.  The bad thing about it is that there are ads for Ring Doorbell 2 apps on the Amazon App Store, but they are all scams.  They charge you for watching a video on how to install the Ring Doorbell 2.  No Ring Doorbell app to be found.  Very disappointing.  Other than that, though, it performs quite well.
title: No Fire Tablet App

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Allison Treu
content: We got this as a wedding gift. It works great. We live off a busy highway and wasn’t sure about the range of the notifications. Sometimes we get notifications when large trucks pass but that’s about it. It’s nice to have to know who is at the door or around the house since my husband works night shift. The app is super easy to use! Highly recommend!
title: Good wedding gift!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Fitz
content: I bought the  Ring doorbell during the Prime Sale for a great price.  Installation and setup was very simple.  The camera quality is very nice and the motion detector works well especial with our fairly long driveway.  I also have fun talking to the critters that eat my plants.  Il'l probably buy the spotlight cams in the future as well.
title: Great Security Device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dannie Duncan
content: I got one each for my daughters because I find ours very useful. I also got them second batteries, because the thing I like least about my old model is that it doesn't have a removable battery and I have to wait for it to charge, necessitating two trips to the door and a period of outage each time it needs charging. If I had electricity at the door, I'd go for one that can be wired.
title: An improvement on a good product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TheMightyC
content: I really love having access to this kind of technology. It is so awesome to see and hear what is going on at my home from anywhere, anytime. I Love being able to know when items are delivered or a neighbor stops by. Not tickled about paying to see my video, but worth it in the end.
title: Smart & convenient access to my door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sherry S
content: My husband gave me a Ring doorbell for Christmas and I love it. I work in an office in my house far from the front door and now when there is someone at the door or a package is delivered, I can see what’s going on without leaving my desk. I love it so much that I bought one for my nephew as a housewarming gift. He loves it too
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M. E. Jeter
content: The best combination of efficacy and reasonable cost when it comes to surveillance for your property is the Ring doorbell.  Installation is not difficult (but you can hire someone to do it; they even include tools with their kit) and with the added feature of "sharing" your doorbell with others (relatives, neighbors) you can add protection to your property that will probably be much better than you had hoped for when you purchased this doorbell. If in doubt, try it out.
title: Need surveillance?

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Pepple
content: Overall, it was ok.  Unfortunately, the legacy doorbell (at my father’s house) is side mounted; not forward (street) facing. Also, the lag between when someone rings the doorbell and the alert(s) appearing on the phone is noticeably long  (~20 seconds).  The WiFi signal was perfect and on a 5G network with 100Mbps download (from the spot we tested). Set up was incredibly easy though.  10/10 on that one. Packaging:  also solid. 10/10 I’ve read other reviews where the app requires payment to continue receiving the service, but we didn’t make it that far. In the end the tech is close, but no cigar.
title: Good product but needs improvements

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Edwin J. Valerio
content: I really like having my Ring Doorbell, it’s almost perfect. The only problem is the doorbell has a lag time. If I am at work sometimes I don’t get the notification till the person is leaving, at home is not a problem, I really wish that the timing was more on point, thus the 4 stars
title: Great doorbell, one exception

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sheila
content: The Ring Video Doorbell works exactly as advertised. I had my electrician install it for me because I wanted it hard-wired. My neighbors and I share videos of people who come to our doors, which promotes both security and neighborliness. ALSO – my experience with the Ring doorbell has been so good that I just bought (and installed myself!) the complete Ring Alarm System. I bought the starter package plus an extra keypad and enough contact sensors for every door & window. I will have my electrician install the exterior light/camera/alarm because I want it hard-wired, too. I signed up for the professional monitoring package – at $10 per month! In every way, this is a better deal than the traditional ADT-type services.
title: So good I bought the whole system.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: yojimbo
content: Got this to replace the old Ring Gen 1 doorbell. The Ring 2 has better picture quality, and has removable battery, which is convenient for recharging. For some reason, the WiFi connection is not as strong/fast as the Ring 1.. but overall, it is a better product.
title: great for peace of mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RAK
content: Was excited to get this RING and I am NOT good with electronics. Didn’t have an existing doorbell so I had to get the battery/WiFi one.  However, it goes offline about once a week and I have to take off the cover, pull out the battery and reboot it. It’s a pain.
title: WiFi goes offline frequently

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kate
content: This Ring Doorbell is AMAZING.  It notifies us if there is motion at the door and if someone rings the doorbell.  The picture quality is perfectly clear day or night.  We also have Alexa announce both features so we are aware of any activity outside along with notification on our cell phones.  We are totally impressed.....
title: AMAZING

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jstiff
content: Great little device with a quick and easy install.  After adjusting the sensitivity so that the Ring wouldn’t pick up cars driving down the street, we are only receiving what we would call valid motion.  Also really like the neighborhood alerts from other Ring owners.  So glad we purchased!!
title: Everything we wanted it to be...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: eldoroddo
content: The battery is awful!  I have to charge it every week.  My settings on it are only alerting when you actually push the doorbell (no other notifications).  This is unacceptable.  I'm not sure if I got a bad battery, but it's too high maintenance.  other than that, it's a genius product.  Super easy to install and makes your home a much safer place.
title: The Ring is Great and a must have, however....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: toorude89
content: Battery lasted about a month and a half on its first charge. Would like if it lasted a little longer but only takes a few hours to charge. Easy to get the battery out too. Caught our dog walker only walking half the time we paid for and spending the rest of the time in our house. Paid for itself immediately. Awesome addition to the home and Amazon network.
title: Must Have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: elaine m
content: My granddaughter helped me install, but with the enclosed instructions, I could have done it myself. We had it installed in less than half an hour, I did charge the battery before installing. No problems with installing the ring app, and setting it all up. The video is clear and the voice you can turn on or off.
title: Easy to install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michael paul
content: Works ok...dont like that when you are home that the connection still goes from your doorbell to the router to the internet and back to your phone. Better if your phone is on the home network, there is a direct connection for answering the door. Because of the delay, I never am able to answer a rang bell...ever.
title: Works but improvements need to be made

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Coolmaker
content: From the get go, the iPhone App needed was not clearly labeled. Once I found and loaded the correct App, it took almost an hour to set it up. The device would not recognize my wifi extender, so had to connect it to the primary router. It might work or not . . . the jury is still out. Getting the video to work is counter-intuitive. Some considerable improvement is needed in the software or the instructions.
title: Doesn't inspire much confidence.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Victoria C.
content: I feel like we wasted our money.  Couldn't get it to work well, even bought a wi-fi extender for it.  Still missed 2 different occasions  where people were at my front door.  But the worst part is the battery life (wireless).  The battery lasts maybe a month before draining.  And yes, we tried every suggestion to extend that. We are taking the loss and going with a different brand.
title: Waste

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kto
content: I purchased Ring doorbell 2 to replace my original Ring doorbell. I am constantly get notifications of movement at my front door only to go look at the app which says unverified motion. The bigger problem is that it can happen every 10 minutes. Nothing has helped. I’ve made every kind of adjustment recommended and it still happens. This is not a good security system and I want my money back so I can find a better security system. Sadly the warranty is only 30 days. I’ve only had this just over 4 months.
title: Don’t buy until they fix issues with frequent unverified notifications but yet just don’t buy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: richard sunkin
content: After having my ring for a year and a half or so I’m very disappointed it is slow to react to someone walking on the porch and they are usually gone before it connects with my phone plus when it gets cold out it doesn’t work when I gets hot out it doesn’t work, buy yourself a regular real surveillance camera these things aren’t worth it it’ll pick up every car in the street but not  Somebody who walks onto the porch till after they’re gone
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Maria Konar
content: Not very satisfied with this product.  Motion is activated only when the person is at the door and not when they enter the patway.  The notifications are horrible, and not accurate. The night vision somehow blurry. The view doesn't pass the patway and part of my front lawn. If there's a car park in front of  my front yard, I can't tell. 😞 I don't know if this is a defective device or if it  is the service.
title: Ring door bell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: aloha
content: Wow! This is better than I thought. I’ve traveled twice since this has been installed, and needed care takers for my animals, this device is Priceless! I knew exactly when they arrived and left. Not to mention being able to view my home at anytime. The only cons; the install video could be better and offer various installation situations. I’ve already done a battery recharge and I’ve only had it up 2 months. But the recharge is easy.
title: I love this thing! Everyone should have one of these!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Frank Whright
content: It took some time to understand how to connect it to Alexa, I had to watch a YouTube video. It was easy to install into drywall. I didnt connect it to my existing doorbell because of the angle. The app is pushy, I turned off the notifications because of it. Overall, it works.
title: It works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: R. Thompson
content: Disappointed. By the time I've loaded the app, the delivery guy has come and gone. Don't know why the same might not apply to a package thief. I'd be a lot happier if I didn't have to pay for online storage to see what I missed. This should allow local (free!) storage.
title: Disappointing product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jared
content: Love my ring doorbell! I have always wanted one of these but living in an apartment it wasnt possible. Just bought my first house and installed the ring the first day! Love this thing, it works perfectly where we have it so that it doesnt detect vehicles on the street or people on the sidewalk, but does detect anyone coming up to the house.
title: Great product from a great company

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gabor Ambruzs
content: For you to use this product you will need to pay the $3 a month. If you dont the only thing you can do is "anwser" the door bell when someone rings it. I cannot comprehend why not give us an option to place an sd card in there and let us record our own stuff.
title: RIP off for the price you pay.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JiffP
content: The Video Doorbell 2 itself is fine. But don’t fall for the “protect plan” scam. If your credit card doesn’t go through during the automatic payments, even if you’ve been paying for years and immediately pick up the payments again, they will cancel all existing coverage -  without notification until you file a claim.
title: “Protect Plan” offers no protection ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: teresa
content: I've been impressed! Clear pics. I like being able to see who is at the door without walking up to it. In today's world much safer option. Took a minute to figure out how to change the notification sound. The default sound is WAY too low. Plenty of directions in the web
title: Loving this

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TheReviewer
content: Ring-Battery install. Early morning or at night especially in humid or cold areas, the camera will fog up resulting in foggy video. Its more a design issue. I have the original Ring Doorbell that does not fog up since the camera lens is bubble style and exposed to the outside elements. Unsure if the issue applies only to battery installation of the camera since it only feeds power (heat) as needed vs. in-house power.
title: Foggy camera

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ryan Mac
content: This is a great device when it works. The connections are not very consistent. Sometimes I'll get notifications when someone is at my door, and as the days go on, it's becoming more rare that I am able to connect with my Live view feature. I've yet to try all of the troubleshooting instructions to try and solve my issues but it's still a great tool. Totally worth it. I feel they definitely need an update to address connectivity issues though.
title: This is a great device when it works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bosslady
content: I was so excited for the ring. Loved it for the first few weeks. Was a little sensitive at first but I adjusted the settings and it worked like a charm.  Life was good.  After the first re-charge, it seems to require a charge more often and I’ve noticed that it doesn’t seem to pick everything up. I’ve only had it two months.
title: I was so excited for my new ring...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brittany King
content: Works just as intended. However, the battery doesn't last as long as they claim.  Says based off usuage, can last 6-12 months. Mine only lasted a couple of weeks. I rarely do live view but it is triggered by motion quite a bit. Video quality is perfect!
title: Good but the battery could use some work.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: will2build
content: I have two major criticisms. First problem: motion detection is delayed or doesn't work at all. It only detects a person at the door 25% of the time. When the doorbell rings, it takes so long to load the video on my smartphone or Echo Show, the person will have already left.  Second issue: a paid subscription is required to utilize all functions of this product. Other reviews also highlight these problems with Ring doorbells. I regret purchasing this product.  There are other smart cams and smart doorbells on the market which function better and have more features - all without a paid subscription.  If I could, I would give this '0' stars.
title: Unreliable, Disappointing, Useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Donna G
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Wow! Very happy with this purchase! Love being able to “answer” my door from work or bed! Best purchase ever! You won’t be disappointed with your purchase!!
title: Somebody’s watching you!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dealseizer
content: Love the product & convenience of having a camera at a separate apartment entrance to our home. I am not as techy as others & made my decision to buy based on present online reviews. The camera quality is super & the ability to converse w/ guest or delivery service is a real plus. We recently installed & started use. I am not sure at this point if I am going to want the $3 monthly video service. That may be my only negative to report. Plan on placing x2 at other home entries. May go with the Skybell on those locations since video storage is included.
title: Love it .... but

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Just_Me
content: Let start by saying that it is easy to use is good for warmer weather. With that being said, thieves are out in the winter time as well and this doorbell has stop working when the weather in Chicago is below 20 degrees (-6 Celsius). I know cold weather plays havoc on electronics but maybe some better insulation would help? Today it is -4 degrees (-20 Celsius) and I can't get it to even give me live view. I will update this if Ring sends me an insulation kit.
title: Winter is Trouble for this Doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Larry Leonard
content: This doorbell camera notifies when something moves near it and takes a good quality video, but it is SO slow connecting with my iphone. By the time I get the video, the visitor is long gone. There is NO way to talk to the visitor because of the slow connection. If it was not so expensive, I would throw it away and get something else.
title: SO slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: F6Rider
content: This was an awesome experience. The people at Ring thought out everything. Extra fasteners, tools,  parts, multiple mounting options, excellent instructions, and much more. All of this was packaged like some really high end gift. I did not find anything that could have been done better. The product installation took minutes and it works perfectly.  I recommend this product and this company to everyone!!!
title: Very Pleased with this product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Charles W Dietz, Jr.
content: I like the Concept BUT Do NOT Like the fact that EVERY 2 - 3 WEEK'S I have to RE-CHARGE the battery Pack :-( I just got 2 Extra Battery Packs from another Company from Amazon and HOPE that they will Hold a Charge Longer. 1 thing I Don't like is that I can't contact the seller easily to ask them WHY the Battery does NOT last as Long as they are Supposed to :-(
title: Battery Does NOT LAST LONG :-(

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paula Duffy
content: I got the battery-only product and bought an extra battery to keep charged when current one runs low. Didn't even need a drill to mount it on door frame. The view is fantastic both in scope and clarity. Nighttime vision is the best. Connected it to new Echo Show 5 I got for the holidays.
title: Great view, easy as pie to install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert N
content: Only thing I dislike is the size of the unit, it looks big and ugly on the slender frame of my front door. However, it probably helps to remind people that I may be watching them! What I like about it is that it seems to work very well. I get alerts whenever someone is at my door, or if a family member is entering or leaving my house. Alerts come directly to both my iphone and also my iwatch. Very useful.
title: Keeps me informed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Juju
content: We have had the Ring Video Doorbell 2 for about 2 weeks and have been quite impressed with it.  It has worked flawlessly, exactly as advertised.  We especially like the ability to answer a ring, view the visitor, and have a discussion with the visitor.  This is especially wonderful when someone rings the bell when we’re away.  We also were able to watch a recording of a delivery where the package was dropped and damaged!  This product really provides safety and security.
title: Outstanding Product!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kevin Nozeika
content: So I have had this thing for about 2 months, and I have to honestly say, in not impressed. It goes off constantly, no matter how much I mess with the settings, zones or frequency. I really regret purchasing this and honestly if I wouldn't have waited so long, I'd of shipped it back.
title: Annoying

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RocknRolla
content: Pure garbage. So people say it was good with the prior software. I just purchased 2 months ago and it misses people at my door but will pickup some random car driving by on my street. The motion options really suck. I have a $20 camera in backyard with better features than this thing....
title: Garbage

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Benjamin S.
content: Works good and nice bit of security. I do wish it was better at detecting objects apart. It goes off when cars drive by in the street but not people in sidewalk. The positive is it isn't telling me about people on sidewalk which is great. Negative is cars zooming by even farther away I don't need to hear about. Wish it had a better wifi receiver. Had to move my router to the other side of the wall so it would pick it up.
title: Nice With Few Drawbacks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jen
content: I got Ring 2 because of what I had seen on TV news station on how it catches people stealing packages and stuff. But after having it installed by the door. Setup the App on the phone. Doing test runs and 80% of the time the Ring just Freezes. I would have to open the cover and remove the battery for Ring to reset. Very frustrating. My Ring's battery is full charged. It is then wired to the door bell to the house.  The Ring App is on an Android phone. Video is fuzzy at times its not the best quality. Amazon really need to do some more test on these systems before selling them.
title: Working half the time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeannie
content: I love this product. Living in the basement and not having a door about this has changed my life with knowing what’s going on outside and having people come to my house. It also functions as a security system The battery life is extremely good I have not changed it yet in two months
title: Love it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Becky d Hobson
content: I Really Really wish that they would have a Disclaimer on the front of the picture. Because it doesn’t work with All Doorbells!!! 🤬 As for Alexa I just Love Her!!!!! And as for the Camera my Husband turned lemons into Lemonade. He hung the Camera in a spot that works for Us but to bad we couldn’t use the Doorbell!!!!
title: Making Lemons into Lemonade!!!!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Karl
content: Why does this thing work great the first 30-45 days then just absolutely become unreliable?? I’ve read this is a trend for many. Done ALL the trouble shooting from Ring (WiFi signal and router) to try and get it to reliably pick up motion (about 50% of the time) and stop the falsing (other 50%). Absolutely no luck and so ridiculous...
title: SOOO RING FRUSTRATED GRRR !!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jimmie D
content: This security device far exceeded my expectations, it is beyond incredible. Alerts, pictures are perfect, and you get a video, for me, mail going into my nailbox, packages being placed at the front door, and if the doorbell is rung, you can talk to the person at the door with your cell phone. Members of my family have bought one after seeing how mine works. Installation is a snap when reolacing an existing doorbell.
title: Ring Works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. Williams
content: I wish I could change the sounds for notifications they have a few but I prefer softer sounds and they are not available on this product. Also I have yet to figure out how the timeline works I turned it on but I don't know where to look at it to review but it could be  operator error, that would be me.
title: Good product needs sound notifications Improvement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gweniibee
content: The ring is okay however it rarely works when someone is actually at the door. It freezes and lags when activating the camera. However, it catches every car that rides pass in the street despite multiple adjustments to the sensor area and sensitivity. It is almost useless without the subscription. Which is messy in itself. So, I mean if you have ADT just pay a lil extra for the camera. It is good for neighborhood alerts. I found the community helpful.
title: Not as useful without subscription.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sandbergs
content: So far so good, I wish the cloud service was included with prime membership or maybe only cost a dollar if you prepay for a year. It still works without the service so that is nice. Also maybe a local storage option would be good for when the internet is down
title: So far so good, I wish the cloud service was included with ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Randi
content: I wish there was a little more info on where to set it up.  We have a wall that jets out from the door... That is where our doorbell was set up.... But I can't see my driveway or really most of my yard. And even with the angle mount...I can't even see my whole porch. I wish the were more ideas or options for odd places. Other than that, out works and it was VERY easy to wire up to the old doorbell
title: Great device, bad placement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: snoop
content: It was ok. The main thing to do is it has to work for your house. We live in a subdivision around a curve and it has a lot of traffic.  The motion setting is an arch and so it will register most of the traffic and not enough of our yard or vehicles.  We returned it.
title: Has to work for your home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: BookReader
content: I could not install this camera unless I agreed to share my sightings with neighbors. You may have been able to turn that function AFTER you installed; but by consenting when installed, Ring was covered for any leaked sightings. I never read anything about this feature before I ordered it and I read a lot of reviews. I am returning it to Amazon
title: Privacy invasion

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: tinabina
content: A little sensitive with motion..I even have it on the lowest setting.  But I love having this.  I never realized how many random solicitors came by my house during the day. Most people dont use the door bell.  But I like the motion sensor because then I see them all!
title: Love it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sandra m.
content: Front entrance has good picture range.  Its good to hide from the jehovas or LDS knocking at your door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ashley M Diaz
content: So we’ve had this doorbell for about two months and we’re pretty happy with it. The battery has had to be charged twice since we bought it but I’m sure that’s pretty normal considering it’s something that stays on all the time. We haven’t had any inconveniences or trouble with it and are glad we decided to purchase it. There have been a string of reports of neighbors packages getting stolen or cars being broken into, so this is a good product to have!
title: Makes us feel a lot safer

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LKG
content: This just turned into a $200 piece of junk!  I guess today was the 30th day of ownership.  I got an alert that there was motion at my door.  By the time I grabbed my phone and tapped on the Ring icon, I got the message that I no longer have access to anything in the past.  10 seconds after someone was at my door is the past????  What a rip off!
title: Useless without the monthly fee!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sandra H.
content: ABSOLUTELY BEST INVESTMENT EVER!! Caught someone forcing their way into our home. The doorbell recorded everything and the quality was second to none! The police were able to view it and arrest within minutes. DEFINITELY WORTH THE INVESTMENT!!! The police love the quality of these videos! Definitely make sure your WiFi is good!!
title: Know who is coming before they approach.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Donna63
content: This doorbell sends me a notification when there's nobody around then when somebody comes to my door and actually opens the door and comes in and I'm not warned until after they are in my house already. On sunny days I get notified when every single car goes by. It's a shame because I love having the video of people that come to my door and it's the only reason why I gave it 2 instead of A1
title: It's a shame because I love having the video of people that come to my ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cary Bland
content: Ring doorbell jumps off the Wi-Fi intermittently.  No notice that it goes offline, just the fact that there are no alerts or rings at the doorbell for a few days until I notice there should have been.  I have to restart the modem, then it works for however long it wants to work.  When it works, it is an ok product, the sensors sometimes give false alerts, even with the settings fine tuned.  The voice through the ring is atrocious, all I get in response when trying to speak to the person at the door is "What?"  I would not recommend this product to anyone. Customer service fixed everything see new comment!
title: Disappointed in product, intermittent issues with connectivity -- Update -- Fixed!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: cviola
content: This Ring Doorbell has been the best security purchase I have ever made. It isn't the most regular of items. It doesn't always go off when people go in and out of the door. It goes off when the wind blows leaves by the doorway but not always when I am approaching the door. My husband was outside washing the car and the bell didn't go off each time he approached the door.
title: Security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cristina Rodriguez
content: I really like this cámara. Really useful and it register the motion, plus it works perfectly with the Echo Show which is how I bought it during Black Friday, in a bundle to work together. I definitely recommend it!
title: Definitely recommend it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D. L. Byrnes
content: This is great.  The installation was straight forward.  It came with everything need.  Once the battery was charged it took very little time to set up.  The video is clear, night vision works well and the motion dectector works well.  I was able to zone it down to exactly where I want it.  Does exactly what I want it to. Update:  has a battery problem.  This needs charging about once a month. And it takes about 8 hours to fully charge.
title: Perfect - Perfectly Annoying

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cphus
content: Customer service and app are not great took 3 calls to amazon before we could get it linked to echo devices. Still can't get a notification on phones to come through. Which was surprising to me. Requires a subscription $30 a year which they don't tell you when you purchase the device.
title: Poor support from Ring and Amazon

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: inane
content: Have had installed for over a month and it works great when someone rings the bell. I’ve never been able to get the motion sensing function to work despite performing a hard reset. Also, I wasn’t aware when I ordered that I would have to pay a subscription in order to be able to review past recordings. So basically if I’m not able to answer the alert right away, I’m not able to see who was there which is half the point.
title: Works great, requires subscription for full functionality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: msu4ever
content: I love this doorbell!  It works exactly as advertised.  However, I have two suggestions: (1) Since wi-fi signals don't go through walls too well, improve the sensitivity of the unit.  I have a wi-fi booster sitting on the opposite side of the wall from my doorbell, yet I still get a weak signal, (2) when constant view is 'on', the battery drains quickly.  Even though I have my doorbell wired into the house bell circuit, I get a reminder not to use the constant view in order to save battery life.  The unit should be able to recharge the battery from the 24V house bell circuit whenever the bell is not in use.
title: Great Bell!  Suggested Improvements.......

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: rosek418
content: Overall I really like my ring doorbell.  The only thing I notice is there is a lang time of a few seconds between a movement recording and it starting up again. Saved my nights sleep the first night we had it as a stranger came to the door and we could get rid of him without leaving our bed and see that he was gone.
title: Saved a nights sleep

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: mark twain
content: Absolutely fell in love.  I get instant notifications if there is any activity out side my front door.  I can view the live feed on my phone essentially being able to keep an eye on my home at all times.  I also love that I can open the app on my phone to talk through the ring device if someone is at my door.  Camera works great, would recommend leaving  a light on at night as the night video is not great without some light.
title: I can view any activity outside front door while my teen is at home alone.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Charles L. Simpson
content: After installing my Ring Doorbell I looked at the quality of the picture on my iPhone and saw that the color was really great. The only reason I gave it four stars was because of the night vision. I live on a street with no street lights ( in the country) only a porch light here and there, maybe that’s the cause I don’t know. So far I’m satisfied with the product.
title: Quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: manny aka splash
content: I really like this doorbell. The one and only thing I hate the most is the delayed motion pick up. I hate videos of the person just walking away ! I would give this 5 stars if they fixed that.
title: Pretty good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Firman
content: Bought this for our neighbor and he loves it!  He said that it is so much better than the 1st generation Ring.  He loves how the battery unit comes out for recharging.  The 1st generation you had to take the WHOLE unit off to recharge the battery.  When our unit goes out, we will consider buying this unit.
title: Love the removable battery for recharging.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SP
content: If you don’t have one of these you deserve to be ripped off. Buy three of them. One outside your front door one in your backyard. And when your gardeners doing work needs to get a hold of you he can push the button. Plus you can see him. You can also get another one and just put it in your living room between some books. But use them outside awesome
title: Just get. Be safe

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sandeep Godkhindi
content: I tried to install the Ring Doorbell and could not get on the WiFi network at home, tried a few times as per instructions given both by scanning the QR Code on the device, QR code that came as part of the instructions, without scanning the QR Code through the manual process but no success. Returning it.
title: Not as Easy to install as claimed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Reliable Shopper
content: We already have ADT as our security, but because most of our friends have the Ring, we decided to get it. I'm now able to see, hear and speak with anyone by the door even when I'm not home. Considering getting a second Ring for the backyard. By pairing it with Alexa, I can now do so much to protect our home. Highly recommend i.
title: Great Security System

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: lang
content: As noted in other feedbacks, Night vision has very poor range. Day vision is good. Doorbell 2 is a far superior unit than Doorbell 1. The removable battery is invaluable. Just insert the spare and no down time. Works very well with the Ring App and was easy to connect to the network.
title: An Improved Ring Doorbell Cam.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Optimus Prime time.
content: Got on sale Christmas sale. Fun to have. But realy its hard to use when someone rings the bell app only gives you seconds to answer.  .audio cuts in and out. But it works.  The motion only works as someone is to the door. So you dont see the leading up to. And not a lot of time filming.  It work as what it is.  Batter.  Is nice you can place it anywhere..
title: Ok for what it is

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kevin Vincenti
content: You know what's really annoying to do? Get broken screws out of things. Apparently, the good folks at Ring don't feel the same because the screws they supplied are an absolute joke. I had three screws break on me while installing the Ring 2. I got so tired of dealing with their cheap screws, that I went and bought new ones that actually function properly. Extremely disappointing when a $200 product decides to cut corners.
title: Maybe it's a good product...wouldn't know because the screws they supply keep breaking

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joe Willy
content: The upstream bandwidth requirements for Ring doorbells exceeds the capacity of rural DSL. This doesn't just mean you can't use it "remotely" when you're away; it means you can't complete the set up process. Ring should be explicit about this -- and so should Amazon -- you have to have 2 Mbps upload capacity. If you're stuck with less than that, as I am, it simply is not going to work, even if all you want is to see who's at the door when you're home.
title: Not for rural internet users (or anyone on DSL)

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Hondo715
content: I ordered the Door Bell Camera and "dot" as a promotional item 22 November.  I received the Door Bell/camera.. but no 'Dot".  It was a season promotion, and not listed with the options on the site today. Without the 'Dot", there is no bargain- just another  purchase.  Please review promotional  sale and kindly inform me if this was an oversight or the dot is bein+g shipped but not received
title: great price-- PART ORDER MISISNG

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Annette Mattil
content: I have this for 2 months now and just had to charge the battery for the first time. The battery holds a really good charge. I do have to say there is a 5-10 second delay when motion sensor goes off which I am sure is frustrating for those who did not purchase the subscription (I paid a one time fee of $30 for a full year). I think the subscription is well worth it!
title: So glad we got it!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LB Churchill
content: I have crappy WiFi and this doorbell—along with the whole ring security bundle, really works great! It’s a little slow to connect live but that’s on my WiFi’s end. The motion sensor is seriously sensitive so I had to play around with the range but have it down now. Great device!
title: Works great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Megan
content: The doorbell itself isn't bad. The problem is the company behind it. I had this set up for 2 months, then the 'plan' expired. It wouldn't let me purchase a plan online or in the app. Then the customer service told me I didn't have a device set up? How weird because I have been using it for 2 months. The couldn't help me with out having the doorbell in front of me. It's not worth the price or the hassle I would 100% go with a different company and smart doorbell. It's concerning that they have no record of me using the device for two months.
title: Bad customer service

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M A Blake
content: Just like the headline says, I LOVE This Doorbell!  The camera is clear, field of view is great and battery life is wonderful!  It takes a bit of playing with setting the range for motion detection to get it just right so you aren't notified too much, but once you get it dialed in, it's awesome!
title: I LOVE This Doorbell!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: zag
content: Very long latency. It misses people very often - they’ll trigger an alert but by time the recording starts they’ve already left. Even further this product causes tremendous increases in ping on your home network (spikes upwards of 600ms) and the videos the product makes often freeze - you'll get one freeze frame and by time the video recording actually resumes the person is often gone. Quality is not as amazing as you would expect based on their specs.
title: Long latency. Only useable if your door has no entryway at all (ie: the camera & door are flush with the front of house)

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Douglas S.
content: It works well and is easy to set up. You will have to have a subscription in order to go back and review motion detection once the 30 day trial runs out but it is not an expensive subscription. The battery last for a decent amount of time but takes a long time to charge so I bought a second battery and charge station so that I always have the doorbell working. Have had it for a few months and had zero issues with it.
title: Great peace of mind!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DearestJane76
content: Works great, but unless you check immediately every time the sensor alerts, you will not see who approached your door. Many times it will take too long to activate and see in real time. Need the paid plan to be able to record and view past events.
title: Useless without plan

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Charles Edwards
content: Very good product! Motion control could be a little better. It seems to be all or nothing. There is a yearly fee not mentioned until after purchase. However $30 a year isn’t bad at all.
title: Must buy!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K. Ziegler
content: Our Ring doorbell arrived, but did not function properly upon installation.  I cannot say enough about the helpful people at Ring support!  They spent 1-1/2 hours on the phone with us trying everything to resolve the issue.  Turned out it was software issue with the unit we received.  We returned the unit to Amazon and received a replacement two days after entering the original unit on Amazon for return.  The replacement worked perfectly!
title: Works great and Ring support is the best.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ben T. Cooke
content: Works about half of the time. Poor to no wifi connection despite other devices recieving strong signal in the same location.
title: Works part of the time and that's not good enough.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rob
content: Omg just installed like 15 min 30 with setting up app works amazing absolutely going to luv this only using battery because my home had no existing doorbell so glad I finally purchased
title: Amazing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sont
content: Not the best night vision and it does not work well in cold weather. The camera gets all foggy and the battery starts dying faster.
title: Does not work well in cold weather

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Walter
content: I had bought this camera for a week, and found it is useful for keeping my front door safe. Image is very clear in day time, and also acceptable in night time. One disadvantage is that it is kind of too sensitivity, sometimes I got a motion alert and when I checked the video, did not find suspicious thing out there.
title: Clear image, good sensitivity

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kelly Starr
content: Great tech gift for the hubby! It's fun to see who's at the door and to be able to communicate when you aren't home! The camera is great for keeping an eye on your porch especially if you order from Amazon regularly!! We did have to get a Wifi extender so it would reach to the front porch but it was super easy! Def recommend!
title: Hubby loves it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jennifer B. Misbach
content: We have had the doorbell about two weeks and so far really like it. We like being able to use the live motion and also see who’s at the door or any activity outside. My only complaint is that when you answer a motion ring, it seems to take a while to activate the video. We have fast WiFi so I’m not sure if it’s just how the doorbell works or if it’s our device.
title: Good device and very usedul

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joseph L. Zipfel
content: I got two for my front and back doors. Easy to install and the WiFi works great. Great picture quality and after a month the batteries are at 75%. Forget all that hacking crap on the news and be responsible and set up good passwords and two part authentication.
title: Works great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: andy george
content: I like the device but did not the concept of they have their hands in your pocket with the Subscription
title: Hands in your pocket

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: foxhil4
content: The ring was a very easy install on existing doorbell, it took my husband less then 10 minutes. We followed Phone app instructions and adjusted the zones to sense movement. This took a little longer because we live on a main road and we had to find just the right spot not to pick up passing cars, once we did we are very pleased with the area it secures and the clear picture it sends us. I would recommend the ring 2 to anybody looking for some security on their house.
title: Easy install and app usage.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: pamela m
content: about every other time doorbell is pushed, it gets stuck and the blue light circles for 7-8 minutes and records the whole time. when that happens, you can't use the doorbell for that time frame. then for the next few hours, it doesn't work at all when pushed. this has happened every few days since about 35 days after we installed it so either we got a lemon or this model itself is glitchy. unfortunately we are out of the return window so of course we are stuck with a sometimes working doorbell. very disappointed with this purchase.
title: doorbell only works sometimes

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Phone Buyer
content: The first Ring quit work after several weeks and needed to be exchanged thru Ring.  Ring provided prompt replacement after it quit recording video.  Overall I am disappointed in the product when it comes to detecting cars.  It will not always detect my car in the driveway if the car is cold or wet.  It pickup's larger vehicles in the street.
title: Replacement Needed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Domini Buikema
content: We ordered this on a deal and are so happy we did!  We have wanted a video doorbell for a while and looked at most available.  This doorbell came with the Echo Show 5 so that sealed the deal.  We are happy with our doorbell and feel safer knowing we can keep an eye on the outside of our house.  Picture is clear and detection is great.
title: LOVE IT

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: NAREN
content: Ring products are a bit expensive but i like the simplicity and features. The best part is i dont have to hook it up with a charging wires, its battery (rechargable) operated and with a busy neighborhood where there is a lot of movement near my door entrance it lasts approximately 45 days and then i have to replenish it with other spare battery.
title: Easy to use and wireless.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rick C.
content: Easy to install and set up. Everyone in the house can download the app to monitor activity but only one person can change settings. You can monitor several different types of alerts in your surrounding area up to 5 miles from your house.  You have to pay a fee if you want to track history for more than a day.
title: A simple, inexpensive way to add a layer protection for your home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dominique N.
content: I like the ring doorbell. I did not know that this service requires a monthly/annual subscription if you want to continue using the camera portion. Yes you can always use the doorbell and receive a notification but if you want the option to view your videos at a later time, you have to pay for this subscription. I find this to be a downfall because I actually purchased two Ring cameras and I'm not sure if I want to pay for the annual subscription. No where in the product specifics does it say the subscription is required and it definitely is. I would've liked the option to save the videos to an alternative storage or cloud service (amazon) that I already pay and own.
title: I like the ring doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Georgia L. Wright
content: The range of the motion detector does not work. If you said it low car still set it off in the street, if you said it high every car sets it off in the street. And sometimes nothing sets it off. I’m going to need a replacement door bell.
title: Useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Edward Jr
content: Bought this for my 70 year old dad. He loves it.  It was easy to install. Setting it up on the phone was pretty easy. Picture was great quality and sound was good.  I bought this along with the Amazon Echo Show 5 which was a added bonus.  They work great together.  I am jealous i did not buy it for myself.  So i will now have to wait to buy it when it goes back on sale or special price.
title: Great Gift

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dickb
content: A clear, recordable view of those who approach our entry door -- even if not "ringing" the doorbell. Handy to be alerted to package delivery as well as persons entering the entry area.  Also purchased the low-cost back-mount "bevel" to give us a wider view of the entry area.  Great for security AND notification of movement within our entry area.
title: Gives a clear view of those approaching  our entry door!  Poweed from existing wiring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: gladys dunn
content: I bought this Ring product for my son for Christmas He has a business and equipment is delivered to his home. He can keep tabs on delivery and see who is in his area. He installed the product himself and set it up on his phone. Very easy and he loves it. thanks
title: Wonderful Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Vieke
content: Right now this is a 3 star.  I had to buy the chime pro to extend my WiFi signal.  However, the RSSI signal did not appear to improve with the chime pro, however, the audio and video appeared to improve.  The doorbell is not far from my router, so it aggravates me that I had to buy another product.  The jury is out if I plan to keep it.  I will leave it installed while away on vacation.
title: Poor connection until I added the chime pro with WiFi extender

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: adamg
content: I really like the ring doorbell! It was easy to install and set up. I have mine direct wired to 18V DC, so I never have to charge it. It trickle charges itself off that connection, and then whenever the camera is in use it will run off the battery to support the higher power requirement. There were a few times my phone was unable to connect to it for Live View but that turned out to be an issue with my old wifi router. Overall works very well and very pleased with the product.
title: It works exactly as it should.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristen Cumberledge
content: I got the ring doorbell 2 a little over a month ago. Install was simple, set up was simple. The product works great, so I know you are wondering why the 1 star review. Ring will allow you to have access to your doorbell video free for the first month, after that you will not be able to see who or what activated your doorbell. So if you have a package delivered, then stolen from your porch, you get a notification that there was motion at your front door. Granted, the monthly access fee is not expensive but that's not the point. If you don't pay you can not access video recorded by your doorbell.
title: Works great but.....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Segundo
content: Got the Amazon Echo and Ring combo package a little while back, and I can honestly say it is amazing! The ring on its own is great for keeping an eye while you're away from home but combined with the echo show it shines even more! being able to see whos at my door, by just saying an Alexa command is really amazing. Add to that a nest thermostat that is also Alexa enabled, and that's just about the most automation I want for my home!
title: Great Combo!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bruce Hochman OS
content: Not a quality product. Several times customer service helped me to reset. I do not get audio alert on my android. Only alert says "some one is at your door" No visual. The motion detector does work well, Visitors leave because I do not know they are ringing bell, I regret buying this useless product.
title: Does not ring my android

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Name withheld
content: A strong WiFi signal is critical for proper function. Had to purchase a booster to make mine work okay. Setup can be a little tricky so I contacted support twice. Great to speak to local folks who speak English properly. No support from across any oceans. Both support folks were dedicated to providing the time to help get it right - best tech support in a long time. Followup - Cannot contact Ring via e-mail so am hoping their folks see these additional comments. Snooze Motion is a great feature, but it must be enabled for each device connected to the doorbell. Would be nice if it actually snoozed the doorbell for the selected time period. Also, there is not currently a way to snooze the alerts on a Mac computer - annoying. I asked tech support to request these enhancements - hopefully they will be available soon.
title: Great to speak to local folks who speak English properly

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TD
content: I have the cheapest model Ring Doorbell which I paid $200 for a year ago,  I started having night vision problems with it so I decided to buy a new Ring 2. Big mistake, it doesn't record some of the time and when it does record it freezes every time. The cheaper model didn't do that. I bought the Ring 2 cause it was on sale,  now I'm not sure it was a good idea.
title: Ring 2 Doorbell Video Freezes

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: The Phelans
content: It is awesome. I live  50ish feet off the street with a farmers porch that is 3 steps off street level. I can’t seem to get set correctly to not get motion detection notifications for bigger vehicles(fed ex, oil trucks, etc.). Other than that great video quality and works well with Alexa products. Super easy install. Very satisfied.
title: Awesome product, few false motion detections

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lisa B.
content: My only complaint is that there is not a quick and easy way to silence it and the Alexa announcement or to limit the volume for it on all devices. I have small kids and hate when it goes off and wakes them up because one of the echo dots was left to loud and now it yells motion at the front door.
title: Overall I like it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michelle Loredo
content: It's a great protection tool! I wish it would tell us sooner when it detects someone coming towards the front door. But with us being "close to the street" our options are limited. Also be aware you need to purchase a plan if you want to continue to see your past "visits".
title: Content with it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Aurele Kamm
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I bought the Ring doorbell for our front door because we can't readily see who is there until we are literally in front of the door. I feel more secure and check my app frequently. I find it helpful to look for packages. My only  criticism is that it takes the app to long to respond. By the time it opens I miss the actual person, so I can't speak to them. Also, sometimes the app freezes with a black screen. It's still much better than not having one. And I live that it captured my little birds making a fuss when I removed their wreath... which I promptly returned.
title: I love my Ring but app needs a little tweaking

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sara Washburn
content: I can’t tell you how much I love this product. Being able to see who is at my door at all time is huge for us. We also like to play with it and make funny faces on it at each other so we get alerted to it on our phone. It’s funny seeing what some of these guys do when dropping off packages. I also love that I can talk to the person to see what they want without ever opening the door.
title: Love this product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KC
content: I was skeptical if the Ring Doorbell was going to be worth it. It is. I can see when my delivery packages are dropped off and who dropped them off. I can see my neighbors dog messing in my yard and no longer need to "guess" at who's leaving the mess. Plus you can actually answer your door bell and listen/talk to your visitors anywhere that you have an internet connection.
title: These units capture everything that happens at your door when you're not around

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Darwin fan
content: Had a neighbor help to install it because he has installed several. Easy to install, even though hardwired. Had to do the troubleshooting because it would not connect. Then, the Ring site blocked my connection when I tried to add my husband as a user. I got a delayed email & had to email them back, stating my frustration. Good device health check for router signal info. Great motion notifications. Good view.
title: Easy to install but had to do lots of troubleshooting

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David M. Bowman
content: The phone app has some features which are not user friendly, had to ask the magic box (google) for help a couple of times.  The speaker on the device is more like a bad drive-through speaker, although the microphone picks up the person on the porch very clearly.  Overall we are happy with the purchase.
title: Sensitive but adjustable

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sue Bennett
content: You need to purchase a separate chime if you want to HEAR the doorbell in the house. Still haven't figured out how to know when there's someone at the door when I am downstairs, necessitating coming up to find it was just a delivery. I admit that I am definately not good with computers, but this has been very frustrating. Several friends have tried to figure it out for me, and the customer service person was hard to understand, obviously reading from a script, and surly.
title: Not any where as simple as they imply.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Maureen J
content: I purchased this for my husband as a secondary safety unit. The installation was easy , I had to tweak the motion. However it seems it worked better when I was under the free limited time recording package. Now a few issues. It does not connect to live as quickly as it did.
title: Secondary security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Winter Splinter
content: Easy install. Works as described. Think about the best network you want to use as you have to remove the screwed on cover to change networks. Live View is a heavy power drain and recharging the battery, for non wired options, takes hours. Neighbors crime sharing feature is interesting but goes out too far to areas not of concern to your immediate neighborhood. Hard to justify at list price. Look for deals.
title: Easy install but long battery charge time.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nuhi&co
