content: I wish it worked better. The camera Detects motion too late. sometimes the person is already gone by the time it starts recording. The app also loads very slowly. whenever I get an alert, it takes about 30 seconds to load the live view. The unit is also very big.
title: Not worth the price

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RidgebackRunner
content: I got this for my parents who are not the most tech savvy but want some securities. And by not tech savvy I mean I get a phone call every time their internet gets slow. Once setup they are now able to pull up the live feed and replay saved video clips (mostly of wildlife) on their own. Great interface and quality.
title: Easy to use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert Parker
content: I bought this because I cant hear my doorbell if I am upstairs in my bedroom. This thing is awesome. Works just as advertised. I have it wired to my existing doorbell so it stays charged 100%. My doorbell sits about 2 to 3 feet to the side of the door. I was worried that my doorbell was too far to the side but with the 15 deg plate and the wide angle lens it sees everything. The motion sensor is great for letting you know when a package is left at your door. I have had no issues so far at all. Wish I had bought this a long time ago.
title: Works as advertised so far.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MomRidd
content: This device doorbell wireless 2 is way better than expected! After hours of reading through so many options, I'm so glad I chose this one! It's awesome! Looks cool too see the pic! The HD video camera works beautifully day and night. I connected wired to the existing doorbell and it was so easy to install! Love it ! You can adjust the motion area per your needs ! Excellent !
title: Gladly surprise! Works great!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Don Stewart
content: I bought this before Christmas but waited to install until the weather got better. It’s been up a bit over  a week and has spent most of the time unconnected to Wi-Fi.  When i get it connected, it’s good for 1-2 days and then it loses connection agai.  I get Wi-Fi on my phone 1/2 way down the block and stream tv in the basement which is farther from the router than the doorbell is; ive never had any internet signal issues.  Seems to be a common issue though and if i can’t get it resolved, i will try to return in.  I’m certainly not paying annual fees for a doorbell that won’t stay connected.
title: Will not stay connected to Wi-Fi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Innovation
content: Easy to Install and Good addition. Motion alerts are delayed by few seconds. Video quality is good and we need to have professional monitoring to store the video. The package comes with everything we need to get it installed. Well thought through packaging. Other than it serves the purpose.
title: Easy to Install and Good addition. Motion alerts are delayed by few seconds

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SaraRae124
content: This was one of many Ring products we’ve purchased and they seem to keep improving their design and features.  This came with a side tilt that mounted on the wall so the range of view was wider than if we just mounted it flat on the wall. We rarely have issues with WiFi and connection, though sometimes the app has a lag in connecting.
title: Happy with Ring!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Back In NC
content: Very happy with this. Has already helped me when an Amazon Driver was recorded STEALING a package off my porch (not to bright in front of an Amazon doorbell camera. Amazon replaced the package but didn't sound very concerned, had to talk to 3 different people.....oh well
title: Love it, adds security to my house

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Barbara Babin
content: The battery wears out after a 2 or 3 days and it requires unscrewing and dismantling , not easy by the way , and needs to be charged overnight.  It rings every time a breeze makes a leaf fall offa tree .  Although people may come to my door I can never see them. What a huge waste of $188 money.  I’ve called customer service and they just told me to narrow my range and charge the battery again.
title: The battery only lasts a couple of days making the Ring totally useless.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Edna R.
content: I am not a techy person but I was able to muddle through and get it set up.  My husband is fair with electric stuff and he was able to connect it where the old door bell was. I would recommend everyone get this for your front door.  It works day and night.  It took a little adjusting for the proper area to cover since we are close to the road.
title: Good product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. D.
content: Cons - Ring service plans are per location - Door bell is a bit bulky - The battery requirement - Cannot always connect to live stream like I can my other doorbell / cameras - The app is pretty slow when you get a notification Pros - It's a ring? - Nice (slow) app - It was built with quality
title: Unable to connect to live view ... will be swapping this device out w/ another.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Doitall Briarwood NY
content: Everything is smart today.  Good door bell but try taking to someone the voice quality is not good,  don't believe what you see on TV
title: Really good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JerseyBroad
content: We are grateful to have one more level of security and convenience. To be able to see and hear who's at the door without having to go down a flight of stairs unnecessarily is a wonderful convenience. It's easy to program and Ring 2 is expandable so we can add cameras later. For an added cost they will store your recordings in a cloud. We like it a lot.
title: Ring 2 provides added security and convenience

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kit
content: When I first purchased the ring doorbell, installations was easy and I was very happy with the system. No where did it say I would not have access to my recording 5 minutes later without purchasing a subscription plan.  I find this ridiculous to not even be able to see who rings the doorbell without paying for it. This is nowhere on the packaging.  So if you are not wanting to pay a monthly fee this is not the video camera for you. I called and the customer service was terrible
title: Doesn’t record video after trial unless you pay.  Not even 5 minutes after doorbell rings

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kyle Kollar
content: Sometimes turns on and sometimes doesn’t. Really wish it just recorded all day and deleted the footage after a week or something. Make it easier if my car is constantly getting broken into and i could go back to the time and see what happened. Overall it’s ok but I really wish it constantly recorded
title: Great, but wish it recorded 24/7

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Netta
content: The ring is on a delay WTH. My internet is fine. What should I do. Don't waste your money on the chime. It's almost like being force to purchase a ring pro. I even have a Netgear extender. It's real time 15 seconds later. I want to be able to see who is at my door when they are at my door, not after they have left
title: The delay is crazy.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert McDonald
content: The thoroughness of the packaging for this product shows me that they really care about their product and the customer. Everything is included- down to the drill bit you may need to install the provided wall anchors. The product works as advertised, and seamlessly integrates with other smart devices like Amazon Alexa. The $30 yearly subscription is more than worth it- the subscription allows you to store and review all past recordings. 30 bucks for cloud video storage integrated into a user friendly app is a great deal
title: Extremely easy to setup and use!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: I. Smith
content: It's great. Highly recommend.  Thinking of getting my mom one.  Waiting on a great sale.  The ringdoor bell 2 to me is better, than the first one.  Charging last me about two weeks.  They say in cold weather it can drain battery.  I purchased the flood lights which are the best.  They light up my yard.
title: Ring doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mr Joseph F McMahon
content: I have had the Ring Door bell and have had nothing but issues with. It records maybe 30% of the time and the rest someone can walk right up to it and walk away and it does not detect them or notify me someone was there. Ring support is no help at all and that's when you can reach them.
title: Do not waist your Money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Helene Shapiro
content: Had to call service dept, very unhelpful, tells me it's my poor WiFI, which it most def is NOT!  I see others on line with similar reviews.  Waste of money.  Need a real security system.  Bought one for a friend and I'm afraid to ask her how hers is.
title: WORKED WELL FOR ONE MONTH

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bill Murray
content: This was a really good buy for the first 4 months and the camera still works really well the problem is the Android App after the last 2 updates I cannot answer the door from my phone. Now the video freezes if someone comes to the door and the App has multiple other problems as well. The other day I called the support line and after being on the phone with him for an hour and a half doing a new update and resetting up the Ring doorbell and check this and that he tell me that my phone is running Android 6.0 and the new updates are pushing the new Android 8.0 so my phone is no longer compatible with the Android App and there is nothing that I can do to fix it unless I was to get a new phone. If you look up the Ring doorbell it still tell you that it works with Android 4.0 and higher and I have friends that also have bought the Ring Doorbell and are having the some problems that I am having. Now that Amazon owns the Ring Video Doorbell company they need to get this fixed or they are going to have a lot of mad people.
title: Do not buy any Ring Video products

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Deb C
content: Voice doesn't work well at all --horrible can't understand anything and the lag time is 12 seconds on mine before it shows up when the doorbell is pushed -- I have 5 mbps and it not really worth at that speed  I would guess that 15 mbps  or better for it to work right also I have had it for a while now and if you have to replace your router than it is horrible to reset up and customer support is no help
title: don't bother unless you have high speed internet

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: david
content: Bought to replace ring doorbell 1.. thank goodness this has a replaceable battery.. So next time it's just the battery haha Update: after 2 months the battery won't charge above 15%.. very dissatisfied.. Have to buy another battery now..
title: Don't buy refurbished rings

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stu
content: Echo Dot 3 on Back order.  Works well with Show and Alexa  Echo devices.  Tech support has confusion as to what Echo devices are compatible or supported. Battery charging takes a good 7 hours, consider purchasing a 2nd battery.
title: Packaged with Amazon ECHO Dot 3 / Combination

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Roc S
content: These ring devices want wacky permissions, and have been spying on people. (in the news) Serious word of advice; You are just mapping out your home and surrounding areas with these devices so take heed!
title: Spy Device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Len H
content: Perfect for my courtyard - gives good coverage. Easy to set-up if you follow instructions in sequence. Found I needed a WiFi range extender close to the Ring for smooth voice communication. Hats off to their customer support team (Antonio) when a friend by passed instruction sequence and had difficulty - he walked her through every step to get back on course.
title: Ring easy set-up

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dr. Jon A. Buratti
content: I wanted to reset motion detector distance but am away from home--it tells me push button on doorbell...so too many motion notices that are empty and no notices when people leave.? I can see people waiting at the gate when roommate lets them in but I never see them leave.? Good quality considering my noisy street. Worked with existing door bell wiring but doesn't ring old doorbell so I had to buy the ringers too.
title: Some remote changes possible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stan A.
content: Purchas the first one on October 19, return it on November 1 due to motion that is too sensitive on passing vehicles 60feet  away even motion set on 10 feet and triggering alarms so often that empty battery to 18% in same period. Order new one on Nov.10 hoping to resolve the problem, wish that I did not return first one,2nd one constantly losing Wi-Fi connection, can't access with a phone, does not trigger motion unless a person is standing in front of it for few seconds, poor picture quality. Totally disappointed I'm returning this one too.
title: poor picture quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carlos Frey
content: ...I elected to place the doorbell in the middle of my front door...so hard wiring was not an easy option...(see photo #1...taken with 'flash' to lighten the entryway).  Consequently, I chose the Ring 2 Video Doorbell because once installed the battery is still easily accessible when charging is needed.  Installation was relatively easy...but more detailed instructions would have been most welcomed. ...The entryway leading to my front door is long and narrow...(10'x4')...which makes it relatively dark...(see photo #2).  In this darker environment the Ring 2 camera lens 'opens up' to take decent videos of activity within the first 3 to 10 feet of the door...but beyond the entryway, the images are completely burned out because of the much brighter exterior surroundings...(see photo 3...taken with Ring 2 video camera).  This is disappointing as nothing is visible beyond about 14 feet of my door.  I  hope a software fix is coming...as I would like to see activity in the street to the front of my house. ...Overall, I am happy with my purchase. ...NOTE:  The first two photos were taken with my digital camera...the 3rd photo was taken by the Ring 2 Doorbell...(showing 'burned out images' beyond the entryway).
title: Installing Ring 2 Doorbell...on Front Door...in a longer narrow entryway.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: McCants
content: The ring doorbell works great. Even at night with the porch light off you can still see clearly. Many features are available on the app. However, when I made this purchase I was supposed to have received the doorbell with Alexa bundle. Did not receive Alexa. Beware of false advertising.
title: Did not receive the Alexa bundle as ordered

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: caceemommy
content: Not worth the $170 price vs current $90 for Ring 1.  Image not great.  Got an Echo Dot as part of bundle but Ring 2 does not really work with Echo Dot/Alexa.  Two way audio is horrible.  Would return but already installed on our door not worth the hassle to revert to original doorbell.  Night vision is terrible, no way to adjust for clarification.
title: Mediocre, not much but of an upgrade, save your money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Patti
content: Took less than 10 minutes to install. App is awesome. Video quality very good for the purpose. An addition to my present security solution. Great because my front door doesn't have a peephole. Came with 2 faceplates - one silver and one that was supposed to be black but actually looks more brown/bronze which was even better for me. Charge the battery, install the app while near your router/wifi and then mount the product on the house.
title: Easy to Install. Nicely Designed. Works Great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tommy
content: Very unique product and I like the Ring so much and also make my life comfortable. The reason why I gave 4 stars because when I got the Ring and check the history on the device and I found lots of history files on the device which mean this device has been used by someone else besides myself. I paid a new device but I got used device. Not happy
title: used device received

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Foster E. Kawaler
content: Initially, the installation didn't get into the corner of the Lanai by the door, but the kit came with a bevel that points it in just the right direction to cover everything it needs to cover.  Nice planning!  They certainly listen to their customers.
title: It works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sarge
content: The best on the market!  Super easy to install. Had some issues with connection but contacted the company and they have awesome customer service.  They helped  alleviate the problem and sent me something to assist.  I highly recommend the product!  Keeping aware of what’s going on during the day and into the night in our neighborhood is a must these days.  Wow!!
title: Best way to stay aware of your neighborhood

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Crispin Castro
content: Only reason why I have this 4 stars is because, just like everyone else. The delay from the door bell to the time you answer through your cell phone or echo show is slow. By the time you answer, who ever rang your doorbell has walked away.
title: Time delay.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Luke D Adams
content: The picture is great. Installation instructions were super clear. Integration with Amazon Echo Show is a bonus. My only complaint is that people at the door can hear you but you can't hear them. Could be a problem with my wifi though?
title: Mostly good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ColoGene
content: Installation and WiFi connection went fairly well.  Picture quality is very good.  Only complaint is lag time when requesting live view.  Motion detection seems to work well.  I would like it if motion detection would trigger an audio alarm on my iPad like email does.  Will probably add solar powered motion detection camera when it becomes available...supposedly this fall.
title: Picture quality is very good. Only complaint is lag time when requesting live ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Denise
content: The time it takes to process a motion or someone who rings the doorbell is very disappointing.  I also have a Blink camera system which is more reliable in processing the videos and easier to manage the activity...and it has 4 cameras.  Also, I’ve had the Ring 4 months and charged the battery last week for the first time since installing.  In less than a week the battery is already down to 17%.  Contacting Support did not help other for them to say it’s either due to high use or a weak WiFi connection.  Funny how my Blink system has not had an issue.
title: Slow video processing and poor battery performance.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jesus Saves
content: Totally disliked this product. It did not pick up movement until the person or animal was right at it. You could not see anything at night it was awful. I returned so we can get another floodlight ring security camera it's way better.
title: Horrible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: cssmgt
content: Mounting screws to mount device to bracket are not long enough and don’t catch I needed a small wood screw instead.
title: Mounting bracket screws for device are too short

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tim K.
content: Sadly this is great tech that sits behind a paywall. Once your free trial runs out, you can’t review events. I get they have to make money but don’t steal my hard earned $$ one month at a time.
title: Pay to play- minimal features otherwise

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ken Kirk
content: If you don't have extremely strong wifi signal at your front door, do not purchase this product, I have never gotten the live view to work not even right next to my router. I can run my laptop and any other product on my wifi signal in my yard, go figure
title: Highly Overrated Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tmac
content: Motion zone is tricky to get perfect. Too far out and it picks up every car. To close in and it doesn’t pick up anything until the person is at the door. Biggest annoyance is the app is very slow to load when you do get a motion detected. If I click on it it takes a few minutes before I can view the video so if someone was at my door and doesn’t ring the bell they’ll likely be gone before I see what they were doing live.
title: Decent product but app is slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jenny
content: This is my first Ring doorbell and I love it.  Still trying to figure out how to set the sensitivity of motion detection so I don’t get an alert every car that goes by, but it has already help out a few times to be able to speak to the person at the door through the intercom.
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stan
content: Works great. I do like the product. It has been working for a month and I still have 60% battery life left. That should get better, lots of traffic during the holidays.  I bought the basic plan for $30 a year. To me, without a plan it would be useless.
title: Works great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kurt tillery
content: I live in a 100 yr old adobe home. Wireless is a challenge , let alone my front gate being 40 ft from house. After many tries and alot of expletives, it worked. It works so well i know when my neighbors just drive by our house, even people walking their dogs are now on camera. The talk function is great, scares everybody when you say hello. This it is a grest home security improvement and i would definetly recommend it.
title: Very secure home system

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RockA
content: Most of the time it doesn’t work or work quickly enough. I have a very strong WiFi signal at that location and I’m unable to get live pictures or be able to talk to people on the microphone. I will probably cancel my subscription. Very disappointing.
title: Too slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Molly Bee
content: Sadly this device was defective. We previously owned a similar device with no issues. This one failed to detect motion but would randomly activate at all times of day and night. WiFi signal was poor. We are returning in exchange for a new device. Stay tuned for update.
title: Defective device, returning for exchange

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nepofle
content: My door is located  within three walls and a ceiling, so the Ring doorbell looks out like out of a cave into the bright sun.  It shoiws nothing in the sun, close up works well and at night it works well but during the day not very well.  The motion detector also has not worked well.  The rest of the operation is as advertised
title: works well at night, but in bright sun not very well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Geo
content: I was leary in trying to install this bell. Once I started with the provided instructions, it all went smooth. It works beautifully and I feel safer with the camera on all the time. It’s hard wired, The sound is good, but the voice audio still needs tweaking. It glows outside with a nice hailo. I can track activities at any location  where I’m shopping.
title: The camera and the bell with notifications are superb.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jV
content: Absolutely a HEADACHE. BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK. RING HAS NO EMPLOYED TECHS TO TROUBLESHOOT OR ASSIST IN FAULTY EQUIPMENT OR INSTALLATION. THE INSTALLATION SERVICE IS BASICALLY HANDYMEN CONTRACTED OUT TO AMAZON TO INSTALL THE PRODUCT. MY POP UP ALERT HAS NOT CONSISTENTLY WORKED SINCE DAY 1 AND ITS GOING ON 3 WEEKS. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS THRU AMAZON!!!!!!!!!!
title: Totally Frustrated

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Janet L Pankonen
content: I bought this after reading reviews and looking at all the video doorbells on the market.  This is the only one that really had all the features i was looking for.  So far, I'm quite satisfied.  The only thing that I think needs some work is lag time between pressing the bell and getting the notification on my phone.  The load times are also a bit long.  I have excellent wifi and it still takes longer than i'd like to load.  Other than that, it's a great product.  I would recommend anyone who buys one for non-wired, that they purchase a second battery, as it takes a long time to charge.
title: I'm quite satisfied. The only thing that I think needs some ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: lauren lincoln
content: This doorbell works great. I recommend it to everyone I talk to. It has a great picture and pairs well with our Amazon Echo Show. I love that we can look at our phone or Echo screen and see who is at the door. We have several Rong Security Cameras as well and we love them all. The setup and installations took less than 10 minutes.
title: Great picture

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LoriMick
content: Despite calling Ring customer service my $25 Wyze camera does a better job alerting me to people at my door.
title: Doesn’t work for me

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Smith
content: I got this thing last year for Black Friday and have regretted it ever since. Important thing to take note of is that this camera has a subscription fee to even be useful, others do not.  The sense seems to go off for all kinds of things that I can't even figure out what is trigger it.  The app has problems as well, most of the time if I try to look at an alert it will just fail to even bring up a video display.  Save your money.
title: Vastly over hyped

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Torres
content: Have had this for a few months. The installation and casual use are great. However after some time I've started to spot chunks of activity not being recorded, sometimes not at all. This is not subtle activity, this is people leaving the house. That leaves a really bad taste in my mouth. Hopefully they update the quality of the service.
title: very good, has critical issues.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jess C Bowling
content: worthless without a subscription.  Can't see whose at the door, I have a Reolink Camera that leaves in the dust. Uninstalled after 30 days and reinstalled my old doorbell since they work the same unless you want to pay by the month so not interested
title: worthless without a subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Richie Poor
content: The Ring 2 works great and the app is very intuitive and easy to use. The camera quality is also great. I couldn't enable the Alexa linking from the Alexa app on my phone. I had to go to alexa.amazon.com and enable the skill from there. Ring support helped me figure this out. They were very helpful and easy to work with. Now I want one for the back door too.
title: Great Device. I highly recommend!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: inquisitive
content: The ring doorbell is great. I purchased it in time for all of my Holiday gifts to arrive at the door and I can watch my items safely. However, I get a lot of notifications. Some good and some unnecessary in my local area. Like a missing cat or a lose dog- I guess if it was my cat or dog I would be grateful but to me its just useless notifications. I plan on purchasing another one for the back door- almost better than my security system( I said ALMOST) :)
title: Around the clock notification

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Melody Stricklin
content: I love my ring doorbell! It's for my front porch and I can finally see who is there with out opening up the door!!!
title: Great to see who and what is going on!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: leo900mso
content: This works great. More sensitive than we'd like at time, but it does the job perfectly. It's a must have for any home, especially with family. You can leave and wave buy to your spouse or monitor your kids going in and out. A must have for sure.
title: Ring Product are GREAT

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Barb H
content: This was a gift for my son and he loved it! We are amazed at the video quality both in daytime and the night. It was super easy to connect and install, just added a little weather stripping behind it to keep out bugs. Even the sound quality is great.
title: Gift

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John A Swindell Jr
content: Works great if you’re home to answer it via WiFi, but when you’re away, there is too much lag. They are already gone before you can connect to answer it. Also, have a 20 year old multiple tone doorbell and it won’t work with the Ring. Not even with the diode they send. It either doesn’t ring at all, or won’t stop ringing.
title: Too much lag

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John W
content: Works great.  So much better than the first ones that came out a few years ago. You definitely need to get the HD version... worth the extra money. It was a little tricky getting it to connect but I reset my WiFi and it connected no problem. I like everything about it.... no complaints !
title: Works great, very happy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: chris osmer
content: The video quality in the daylight is pretty legit. That kind of where the impressiveness comes screeching to a hault. The response time of this doorbell, even when hard-wire and on a 200mb/s Internet connection is VERY slow. By slow, I mean the beginning of the 30 second clip typically doesn’t start until the delivery has dropped off a package so you never even see their face. The other disappointing thing is the boot up time from when you open the Ring app. Immediately upon  receiving the notification, it may take 8-10 seconds to reach a live view that the camera sees which is often too late.
title: Perfect For Catching The Delivery Guy’s Head... From Behind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bill M.
content: The doorbell portion of the Ring works well BUT, after the 30 trial period ran out it’s impossible to access it to see what might be outside the door unless there’s motion.
title: Don’t waste your money until they fix this

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J & J
content: This product is awesome, we have had video surveillance for years but love how the Ring alerts to your phone, you can answer someone at your door. was easy to install, didn't like the battery having to be charged so hooked it up to permenant power.
title: Ring Rocks!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John Toccafondi, DDS
content: This bell/camera is mounted near the front door. I get alerts on my phone whenever someone goes near the front door even when they do not ring the bell. This in my opinion is great security. I paid for cloud storage and get alerts from neighbors when they record suspicious activity in the area. I’m on battery now but am considering running power to it. Battery life is great now in the summer but winter cold will degrade this.
title: Works as intended. Easy to set up.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DJM
content: Live view video only works during the day.  Does not work at night, nor does the ring doorbell video work at night.  Have reset the unit and purchased the wi-fi extender the chime pro all to no avail.  Just a fancy doorbelll in my opinion and not worth the asking  price..
title: Video does not work at night

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A. Jeffery
content: I like it but there is s delay in the signal and my seei g the activity which is annoying.
title: Delay in visibility to phone app

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A LOYAL AMERICAN
content: I am very pleased with my Ring 2. It was easy to setup and the videos are good quality when my WiFi is working well. The only issues I have at all are with the WiFi not being consistent so I ordered the Chime Pro which has helped with reliability and response time.
title: My Ring 2 Doorbell Chime Pro

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: German Di Manzo
content: I loved the concept of the Ring video doorbell 2 and really hoped it worked as advertised, but, sadly, I have to admit it doesn't work as expected. Looks like my door is in a position that even turning off zones and setting the doorbell to it's minimum range for motion activation it activates many times during the day to record some passing cars, all this activity drains the battery so it didn't last more than 60 days (vs the promised 6 months to an year). I was ready to deal with the issue but not it had stopped working altogether. A quick search on the internet shows that an internal battery (not the main battery) is prone to fail after an year affecting many of this units. I'm disappointed with this product and I'm giving it an extra star because of the concept I wanted so badly to work, but it doesn't. Time for me to move out of the Ring ecosystem to a more reliable product.
title: Stopped working after an year

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: charlotte
content: I am not unhappy I bought it, BUT there is a delay between when it is actually activated and when you can actually view the image on you i-phone.  Takes too long, but since I live in a two story, it still beats answering the door without knowing who is there....just too long a lag in my opinion.
title: good product BUT

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Annette
content: I love having this to watch out for strangers in our yard or to see who is outside without them knowing I am there. It is a little slow to activate and sometimes I'd miss someone's face as they walk away but over all it gives me piece of mind.
title: Great especially for the price.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John K
content: Purchased this Ring 2 to upgrade my original Ring.  Video is great, audio is terrible.  Going to put the original back on, which has always worked great.  The Ring  2 should make a great paper weight
title: Junk

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rob Hale
content: It is definitely worth it. My advice, purchase the extra battery. If you don't, you'll wish you had. Works great! I have just one issue with this product. You will need to download the Ring App onto your phone. With the app come....Adds. I've already bought the product. I don't need to be saturated with more advertisements. Other than that low down dirty trick, I like the camera and the peace of mind it brings.
title: It's worth it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C. Wong
content: Doorbell2 Like: easy to install, easy to see on phone, wireless ability with charged battery Dislike: Easy for theives to pry off, anyone having Ring wrench screw driver can steal battery and device while you watch them away from home, notifications a little slow but maybe slow network router, ring sound on outside, advise to remove QR code maybe to make it tougher for thief to reuse or resell
title: Easy to use, BUT

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Christopher Corbett
content: This is a great idea. However by the time motions alert you, the reason for the motion has passed. too much delay. As a tech I have taken every course of action to have the best signal. The latency is a few seconds to 10 sec. Kind of misses the point of the "catch the motion" cause. My wife or I usually make it into the house before we are alerted of our own presence. I also have the chime repeater in the house to amplify the signal. I mean its on the inside behind the doorbell. Typical wood structure. Vinyl siding on he outside and sheet-rock on the inside. Signal is crap. So much potential, yet a fail in my book
title: connections can suck

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristin b.
content: recommend!  Security, peace of mind, pets bark at door bell? know it’s ringing before it rings! change the tone, record, catch potential intruders, talk to them, see who is stealing packages, see when packages arrive. 10 out of 10.
title: no price tag on peace of mind for families safety. 10 out of 10.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gunnar
content: I could not believe how simple it was to install the app and walk through setting up. Even if you have no experience you can set it up in a matter of 5 minutes or less even.  The video quality is very good and the app allows you to see video from others in the area that might have had suspicious or criminal activity! I will buy another cam definitely.
title: Great quality and simple

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: HARLAN
content: Got a lot of help with a problem with this unit from a gentleman at ring support.... Found out it was the phone carrier was the problem.... well the carrier is history now... cancelled them real quick...THE RING WORKS GREAT NOW.... I'm going to save up and put one in back of house... Harlan
title: This is a wonderfull item

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Wendy Keller
content: Love everything about this doorbell! It’s so nice to see the front porch and road area when not at home. We feel so much more secure! The echo show is a nice bonus as an alarm clock and notification of Ring alerts. Our free trial just ran out so paid a year subscription plan for $30 which is cheap for a security system!
title: Love everything about Ring!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: lynn campi
content: I love that you can see if there is a delivery even if you are not at home. The bell is perfect. Picture quality is very good. Would like better control over the area covered. A truck or loud car can set it off and there can be a delay in the notification. But I still love having the Ring. Improvements will come with time but for now it’s great.
title: Great safety feature for anyone living alone.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ramkim
content: It was quit easy to install and also to change the battery. I ordered two (2) batteries when I ordered my ring, so when my battery needs charged I have another to install while I am charging. I simply love the RING and feel more secure while knowing who is at the door or on my porch
title: I LOVE MY RING!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tim, The Real
content: Horrible user experience with the motion settings (and I'm a tech guy). - To save motion settings, you need to "ring" your doorbell, then "hangup", then press "continue"...I think? - So far, motion notification only occurs when we open our door to LEAVE...no motion as someone approaches! - Motion detection occurs maybe 1 out of 10 times. - The cloud service is slow, so you get the notification, then maybe 10-30 seconds later, you can see the video.
title: Terrible motion detection/notification

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MD
content: Reinstall the doorbell earlier today. Getting messages about poor signal strength (RSSI something). Doorbell is literally 7 feet away from the router directly on the other side of the door. Same signal strength and connectivity issues with the spotlight cam above the garage about 16 feet away from the router. When it does work it is nice but paying hundreds of dollars and a monthly subscription for something that “might” work...... hopefully it works better for you Update:  I contacted ring support and their response is to buy the ring WiFi extender. Having to spend another $50 for a device 15 feet away from the router is just poor build quality...... or ideal for getting people to buy more stuff (ring extender)
title: Signal strength and stability

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Victor Vazquez
content: Very easy installation.  It even comes with tools needed for installation. The Ring app is user friendly. Image quality is great. The interface with Alexa is seamless, whether with Echo 5 or 8. I  would recommend for quality and ease of use.
title: Very easy installation.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: No Local Setup
content: It is OK to let you know if you have motion and probably works slightly better than a fake decoy camera as it "could" possibly record video.  Takes too long to activate to use in real time and is most useful to go back and look at past events, but once your 30 day 'trial' ends, ANY video is a past event and NOT viewable - even 1-2 days would be reasonable and expected from a reputable company.  Also, as soon as signed up for the 1 year of service, the video worked much better; so they obviously handicap the devices to ensure people sign up for service.
title: Never reliable and con to sign up for service.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Francesco01
content: So far I like everything about the device. I do worry about someone stealing since it cant really be locked in place. The camera is very good and the motion sensor is working great. I like the event history capabilities. I will update the performance in a few months .
title: Its a great security device to have in your home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ken S
content: The product itself is decent...probably four stars. However, to get full functionality there is a minimum $3 per month fee, up to $10 per month. With that information I probably would not have purchased this item in the first place. Since there was not a clear indication on the Amazon based "RING" doorbell  page I have reduced the rating to one star. My next doorbell will be a competitor without monthly fees and I will move the RING doorbell to another door. Shame on you Amazon.
title: Continual Monthly Cost for Full Functionality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Starlight
content: Great item. Hooked up via wifi and Alexa flawlessly. I have motion connected via the app and the doorbell via the app and alexa. Impressed with the pictures it takes in between the detection of motion. All in all a great investment
title: Five Stars for Ring 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joseph L. Curry
content: I paid $200 for this unit and now they are trying to hold me hostage for additional money for monitoring.  Some of the functions I expected to get with the unit are disabled unless I do a monthly payment.
title: Works well but they are trying to rob me for monitoring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jgd2011
content: Very easy to install and set up and install.  Works well with existing door bell and wires.  Notifications work well, and you can change settings so you don’t get false alarms.  If you want full benefits to save footage etc you have to pay a fee, but it’s worth it.  The app also has a community feature that lets you see things your neighbors share, and crimes that have been happening in the area
title: Easy to use.  Monthly subscription for most benefit

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AmusementInsider
content: Battery went very quickly in the cold, so hardwired it and it has been working perfectly down to very very cold temps. Night vision isnt the best and notion detection can be delayed, but for the price this is great. Hate the hidden monthly fee that you kind of need to pay for to keep videos.
title: Great Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Judith K. Sturgeon
content: I order a lot of Christmas gifts online and wanted to keep an eye on deliveries. I also discovered that my dog isn’t psychotic after all and there’s no neignborhood kid pulling pranks: a mockingbirs was trying to build a nest in my mailbox and a squirrel was stealing the artificial poinsettias off the door wreath and the leaping onto the christmas light hanging ball and swinging like Tarzan. The entertainment alone has been worth tbe price of the devices! Both front and back doors are set for the sensitivity I need.
title: Works great with bonus security action

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Evelyn
content: if someone stood still you were able to see them but it was awful resolution definitely not 1080p, when they moved it was pixelated. Only recorded for 30 seconds n by the time the motion sensor started working you couldnt see a clear person or you would catch their back. Also my wireless was 3 feet from it and i bought the chime signal extender, but that didn't help,  the ring would also chime every hour at night n no one was there, maybe a ghost was visiting. Poor picture quality slow motion sensor (even when set up high all the way) doesnt record long enough to clearly see someone
title: Poor picture quality, slow motion sensor, doesnt record long enough

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pat
content: Night vision is "meh" at best. You cant listen to sounds outside unless it hits a certain threshold, and dont forget amazon owns Ring, and jeff Bezos sits on a board in the Pentagon.
title: Overpriced, but peace of mind.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lynne @ the Beach
content: Love being able to see who is at my house and the videos are great, but the connection to see who rang the door bell is very slow. I can’t see or answer until they have been at my door for a while...in fact, someone rang the door bell and the contractor who is working on renovating my house answer the door and let them in and I never say who it was.
title: Love the video; hate the slowness of seeing who rang the doorbell.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ronald Sliman
content: Works as intended and pics up motion. We had to purchase the Ring chime with WiFi extender because our WiFi signal was weak outside front door. The video does take a few seconds to upload to ring servers, process, and view, which then you can see on your smartphone app. Sometimes delivery person has left.
title: See who is at your door from anywhere

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Noodles6954
content: It does great and monitoring for $3 is a great price. Just can't seem to figure out why it magically quit giving me notifications after about a week: fortunately, every motion event is still recorded.
title: Does the job

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KAS
content: We purchased the original ring doorbell for the carport which we use to enter the house. We liked it so we wanted one for the front door which people mostly go to. This ring is more narrower than the original ring which worked well for us. Has a much better video.
title: Better video

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tammy
content: When it works, it's great! However, 75% of the time when someone rings my doorbell and I try to answer it, they are gone before the picture pops up and I have a chance to see anything. Also, if you do happen to see who's there in time and try to push the green button to talk it doesn't work half the time! Very disappointed especially considering how much it costs!
title: Slow to pull up, constantly sending signal!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Natalie Cranford
content: We really like this little gadget. The only complaint I have is that the video does not begin until the person is already on the porch. By the time the camera picks up, they are turned around walking away.  In other words, it seems it would be more beneficial if the motion sensor picked up sooner. I believe I have it set on the furthest difference, but technology moves faster than me these days. Overall it’s a great investment.
title: A Great Investment

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SheShaw
content: My ring takes so long to connect that the person at your door has already broken in or left.  Instructions say to have ring next to router.  It's not like I can move my door and my front door is 15 feet away from the router.  I wish I had purchased a different product.
title: By the time you can see who's at the door, they have gone

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: R_setnar
content: It works well, connects easy even for a non tech guy.  I’m disappointed it does not none with a charge, it was a long 4 hours till I could play with it lol.  I’m 20 ft from the street and it easily adjusted to not pick up traffic and just focus on my driveway and from door.  It brings price of mind to know what’s going on.
title: I like it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: May
content: The functionality of this doorbell camera is great, with wide fisheye lens, adjustable sensitivity, and user friendly app which all make this a well rounded product in general.  Installation was super easy, even for clumsy people like myself who has almost zero electricity knowledge.  However, I was kind of caught off guard by the fact that you have to enroll in monthly or yearly subscription if you want to keep the video footages.  I mean come on, that’s totally unnecessary and not cool especially since the camera itself is already pricey enough!
title: Awesome doorbell camera but should eliminate the monthly subscription fee

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nel.
content: Great product, we really like it, but motion detection alerts can be annoying if your family is constantly going in and out the door where the RVD is located.  Unless your away, or everybody's gone for the day turn the motion off.  Some family members are tempted to view every alert and that cab be like “Big Brother” is watching you.
title: Great Product, we really like it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David Hicks
content: There is a significant delay in Live View and when you receive an alert.  So, when someone rings your doorbell, it takes around 30-45 seconds for the camera to activate before you can see who is there.  Customer support said it is our Wi-Fi speed, however, I bought a Nest Doorbell Camera and installed in the same place, in the same home, with the same Wi-Fi and the response time was instantaneous.  I also installed and tested both at a different house with the same results.  There are other customer review that say the same thing as well as Consumer Reports.  Not happy with the product.
title: Delay in Live View and Alerts

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Purchaser
content: Such great added security! Clear images, feel safer! Had to purchase WiFi  Extender  To get better signal but worked great After that. Will be purchasing another back up battery since I was unable to hardwire it. Great product great value
title: Added security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tony
content: Read the reviews and opted for the Ring 2. It had everything we thought we needed. After receiving an inoperative unit, Amazon replaced it, the second unit was received swiftly, it did work and was simple to install. My partner loves it and  for a couple of days was asking me every 15 minutes if anyone had used it.
title: Read the reviews and opted for the Ring 2. ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sean
content: I bought this combo and then bought other products directly from Ring.com to complete a full house solution. I have 2 spotlight cameras and I can see them all the time from my tv. The Ring Doorbell 2 sometimes does not show on tv and I have a range extender a foot from it. Once I do a hard reset on the router I can the see the Ring Doorbell 2 for a few days and then do it all over again when it disconnects from my network. Would be nice to see a firmware update since ALL other devices in my house connect to the same SSID without issue.
title: Works great sometimes....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tanya
content: Doesn't work as great as I expected. Audio is horrible when trying to talk with anyone at the door. When I'm at work and someone rings the bell, it takes a good 45 seconds for my phone to connect to the camera. Router is inside, about 10 feet from the hard wired Ring. May try moving router closer, before calling customer service.
title: Audio issues

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mr.Fuenmayor
content: I really like my ring had for a year now and it’s really convenient, useful and gives me peace of mind knowing that my front door can be monitored.  Not hard to hardwire took me like 10 minutes ,  Would definitely recommend
title: Love it !

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: masckerade
content: Bought this for my father for Christmas so he can see who is at his door before he opens it.  Camera shows images in grayscale so not recommend for use by the visually impaired. Otherwise very good product and would definitely purchase again!!
title: Good product!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chuckster
content: I love the way my RING alerts me when someone approaches the door regardless of whether they ring the doorbell or not.  I'm able to quickly see who is at my door, and whether or not to be alarmed.  Wish I had this years ago, before my house was burglarized.  I feel much safer now, and know that we'll have good video images should someone access the house when we're away.  Thank you, thank you, thank you!
title: LOVE MY RING

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mary Thweatt
content: I love the Ring doorbell because I have limited mobility and can now see if I want to answer the door before I try to make my way there.  I did have to buy a wifi extender and a corner bracket but overall I am happy.  My only complaint would be that no matter how small I make the motion area it sill signals when a car goes down the road.  I don't have the road or most of my yard in the blue area but that doesn't seem to make a difference.
title: Very Happy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Annie Oakley
content: The installer knew only how to install the doorbell with the battery, not how to hard-wire it and batteries have to be changed frequently. You really have to have two battery packs in order to have the doorbell working all the time. There's also a delay between the time the person hits the doorbell and when your phone tells you there's someone at the door. The ring itself is tinny. You have to be in a room with your cell phone or Alexa to hear it, which means you must buy additional plug-in inside door chimes for rooms you enter without Alexa or your cell phone. Very disappointing.
title: Do not pay the money for installation. Plan to buy two battery packs and extra inside door chimes.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MTD Wyo,Pa
content: Excellent  product with a high resolution image and video. Very easy to install, really anybody that can hold a screwdriver should be able to install this doorbell following the online videos and detailed instructions provided. Top of the line product if you are procrastinating about buying one move forward and do it you will not be disappointed. Based on how well the doorbell works I will be purchasing the wired spotlights for the side and rear of my house.
title: Awesome product that actually performs as advertised

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D
content: I’m so happy I bought this.  The picture quality and easy setup surprised me.  We liked it so much we bought some other Ring products. It’s perfect because we keep our garage doors closed and needed a doorbell there.  We have a long driveway and having a view of what’s going on makes me feel more secure.
title: I love it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: cred
content: I liked how easy it was to hook up. I don't mind the $3 or $10 month fee for subscription for storage. My only pet peeve is Ring is now owned by Amazon but if you use and Amazon tablet guess what NO RING APP so you can view video. How stupid is this AMAZON?
title: no Amazon app

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tom
content: We are on our 3rd ring due to replacements. First doorbell did not capture motion until person was already at my door or by the time the FedEx guy dropped a package and was back at the truck. 2nd Ring video had crazy color distortion. Everything was sepia. I also have my router 5 ft from the device and the connection is sometimes spotty.
title: So much potential but..

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: William D. Sykes
content: This product was easy to install and get up and running.  I love the sharp image it produces and the ability to save the ones you want to keep.  I recommend this product to anyone who wants security for their home without a huge cost.
title: Great Image

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: oldrinka
content: Love it, and I purchased it knowing that I would need to purchase the monthly cloud backup fee. However I was not totally prepared for the weak WIFI these units have. All my other devices work flawlessly at the front door, but this device keeps saying weak wifi and is slow to provide pictures of visitors at the door. Knowing this we got our daughter one but same weak WIFI.
title: Weak WIFI

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Natasha McClendon
content: Absolutely love our ring doorbell. You can set to motion detection range so it doesnt go off every time a car drives by or your pets walk in your yard. The night vision is great within a certain distance (short distance). We loved it so much we ended up buying a full security system and 4 cameras.
title: Worth the money!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Scorpn1
content: I can go on about this item. This doorbell save me a lot of time answering my door without leaving ANY room in my home or abroad. I stay in touch with my kids as leaving out for school n coming home from school (very important). Like I said I can go on. Bottom line I’m getting another one and I love the Ring doorbell II.
title: The audio, video and still photos are nice.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Geraldine L Kreider
content: Bought the Video door bell 2 to replace the original Video door bell.  Put the previous version on my back door.  They both work as advertised.  pictures are clear and I can see who is at the door without opening the door. My WI-FI with Verizon is poor and this does affect the timing on receiving the alerts.
title: Love, love the Video Door Bell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paul Mc Allister
content: Product works but found it to be a little to sensitive , it does have adjustments but they are not much different, it picks up vehicles on the street which is 75 feet away. the picture is not the greatest especially at night.
title: Product works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Debbie Ramon
content: I bought this as a gift for my mom and dad. At first it worked well and they were so excited to get notifications that someone was at their door. We understood that the battery could drain according to the motion or checking the “live” function. But then after charging the battery, it started to die within a day. Then it started to say poor WiFi connection but at first it said stong WiFi connection. Now it won’t even connect when we put the battery pack back in. Dead. No lights, nada. It actually jumped from 57% to 17%. We’re so dissatisfied that it isn’t working. Now when I troubleshoot, it has a warning on the weather conditions. It says bring it in if it goes below 40 degrees!!!!!  Can I get a refund and just chalk it up to have too many kinks?
title: Poor battery, loses connection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ryinatx
content: Ours is missing a part. It was a gift so by the time my husband received it, I could no longer return it. One star because we were sold an incomplete piece of equipment that doesn’t have the parts to be able to work
title: Pieces missing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gemgil
content: The Ring Doorbell 2 is Not a good product. Someone at the door? Go ahead, try to answer, they’ve already walked away. Usually takes two to three minutes, sometimes longer, to view the video after any motion is detected or the doorbell button is depressed. I will not purchase another Ring product nor recommend any Ring product. I’m very disappointed as I also have the floodlight by Ring as well. Great idea but functionally a dismal failure.
title: A disappointing product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mitchell
content: Good item to have.  I noticed it takes a few seconds to start recording.  It caught the delivery person after they had walked off.  I have it hardwired, and my network box is not far from it.  Then other times it will pick up a bird passing.  I learned later that there is no storage of your recordings only a free trail.  You will need to purchase a plan from Ring otherwise what you miss at the door... you miss.
title: Easy to use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JASON PACK
content: Mostly works great except the snapshot feature doesn’t work at all. Don’t expect any worthwhile assistance from their support team either, unless you like restoring the device, uninstalling and reinstalling the app and restarting your phone three or four times for no reason.
title: One feature doesn’t work and pointless support

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kwon
content: Convenient to use, can check up on the camera anywhere even out of home. Only thing is if you're in a house facing a close street, the motion detection field is not all that customizable; so i sometimes get a lot of false notifications (This is after lowering my detection range, and installing the vertical wedge included) **Also must connect to a non 5g Wi-Fi network
title: Convenient - but

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Merry
content: I purchased the Ring 2 with better visibility. It lets me know if a package is delivered or if there is any movement on my porch. Our police can use it for any crimes in the area. I am very happy. Easy to install. Our neighbors have it which helps a lot.
title: Ring 2 Best decision I made!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Grunt65
content: There were some negative reviews that had me a little worried, but I have been very happy with my ring over the last 2 months.  It does exactly what I wanted it to do and that is turn on and record when motion is detected.  It took some adjusting because every car that drove by was setting it off, but I was able to solve that fairly easily.  Video quality is good and I went in knowing I would have to pay a fee to save recordings and that’s fine-I understand that is a business model and it’s pretty cheap so I’m ok with it.  Haven’t thwarted any crimes with it yet and hopefully I won’t have to!
title: I’m happy with my ring.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristi B.
content: We have had this for quite some time and it sucks. It NEVER works. It doesn’t matter what time of day it is or what is going on, that thing will not show me the live view of the outside. And if it does, it’s 20 minutes later so the event that triggered it had been over for 19 minutes. It’s terrible. More than Half the time it doesn’t even record motion events but it tells me that there was one. I hit the alert on my iPhone and go to events and the last recorded event was like the night before. Total junk. Highly disappointed.
title: Do not buy. It’s worthless.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: mikeg261
content: Motion detection was terrible. It would detect cars going by, but not people right in front of the door. I used several levels of sensitivity, even on the lowest setting it did not work. I have a gen 1 Ring that works fine. I replaced a Ring Pro that failed with the Ring 2.  There is no flexibility on zones.  Used it for two weeks and returned.
title: Truly disappointing- Terrible motion detection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Willy Mischel
content: Very good product, easy to install, even for people that are not professionals and what is best, works like a charm. The app works very well, i now can now exactly who is on my door in a very easy way and also answer while i'm away. Comparing to others in the market (and i had a couple of smart door bells), this is for now, the best i had. Recommended !
title: The perfect door bell for the right price.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: EDWIN M AGUANNO
content: I feel victimized by a "bait & switch" fraud act.  I never would have bought another Echo Five for $53. The purchase that I made was focused on the door ring 2----with $10 added as a bonus to get another Echo 5.  Your rebate for $96 did not compute or align itself with my math at all. My lawyer is anxious to handle this for me----  but i will give you another shot at correction although my TP call to your office led me to believe that you would resolve it at that time. Pls respond soonest !!
title: ring phone fraud act

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kayla
content: Ever since I had my car broken into and a couple packages stolen off of my door step, I have been paranoid and super cautious. Now with The Ring 2 I can finally feel safe, and watch over my house while I'm at work. I especially love that Amazon allows you to pay it out in automatic payments, I will be purchasing more for my backyard and for family members! I have been telling all of my co-workers about it as well.
title: I can finally feel safe again

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mosher, Mark and girls
content: Everything was great and in working order.  This purchase saved me a lot of money from buying a new one.  Only negative was the screws to mount the bell to any of the wedges were not included.  A quick trip to the hardware store solved that.
title: Great buy!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Adam Garcia
content: This Camera is crap. The picture resolution is nowhere near what Amazon quotes it is. Video is more then often poor, grainy, and glitchy. The motion sensor work whenever they feel like it. I’ve had people at my door ringing the bell and it took 8 minutes for the camera to relay the message to my phone and by that time the person was gone. Amazon won’t even replace mine after only having it for 30 days unless I agree to pay an additional $100 for a warranty. Spend your money on a camera with better performance and quality. This Camera Sucks!
title: This Camera Sucks!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Francois
content: I can complicate anything but Ring was soldier proof to install.  It went offline do to a WiFi issue and I called customer service. I got through with zero wait and the young lady was very patience , helpful and knowledgeable.  I also got the chime wifi extender and extra battery.  I will be buying more ring products.
title: Easy to install and works well.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: shopaholic
content: It takes a break between 5pm and morning, sometimes as late as noon. I have it set to frequent and one day it only captured two events for the entire day. Other days is works well. Customer service only suggests using the wedge. They have no explanation for the long pauses between events and for why it sometimes sees the mailman and sometimes it doesn't.
title: Works only sporadically

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sonya
content: I bought this from Amazon in November. It worked perfectly during the trial and then I subscribed. After a couple of months, it started saying that the Wi-Fi connection was too poor, even though the doorbell is only 13 feet from the router and modem and I have super fast Wi-Fi. I believe this is a scam to get you to buy their signal booster, as I have seen other reviewers with the same problem.
title: Terrible Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RM
content: It takes some time for the all to lunch and then for the live video to start. By the time I can see the video, the person at the door is gone. I have this issue both with Android app and Alexa Echo show so it is not due to my cellphone.
title: Very slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Frank Albanese
content: I got the first one which worked great for a few weeks then my wifi went out. When it came back the ring was dead and wouldn't connect. I recharged the battery and tried to reset it but it was dead. The nice people at Ring sent me a new one which was working great for another few weeks and I had the same problem. Once again its dead and will not come back to life. Even though the battery is fully charged. No lights or anything. very frustrating. At least I didn't subscribe to the service.
title: The second one to die on me.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Terence D.
content: EVENTUALLY TURNED OFF VDEO RECORDING RE MOTION.  MTG ON FRONT DOOR FRAME IS TOO CLOSE TO ROAD EVEN WITH ANGLINGING MOUNT AND CALIBRATING DISTANCE.  OTHER THAN THAT, GOOD FOR DOORBELL RING AND VIDEO OF THOSE THAT RING IT.  NOT SURE IF WE WILL KEEP THE MONTHLY ACTIVITY CHGE USE FOR $3 PER.
title: RING DOOR BELL

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nicolette
content: The place that I am petsitting at has a Ring Doorbell and I was taking out the cat litter. I didn’t realize that the doorknob lock was locked. So I accidentally locked myself out. I didn’t have my keys, I was wearing a short sleeve shirt, there was no spare key, it’s in the low 60’s (not too cold if not for the wind), I couldn’t pick the lock, and I didn’t have my phone. But thank goodness they had a Ring Doorbell! I could talk to them and they had someone come over and give me a key to unlock the door and get in!
title: Ring doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Start2hunt
content: After charging the battery overnight, I installed and configured the system in less than 40 minutes. Very easy and simple process. They included ALL the necessary tools and hardware. It is awesome to see all the activities taking place, from package/mail deliveries to strangers attempting to access the driveway. Another great feature is the Neighborhood Activity section. The unit works exactly as advertised.
title: I'm kicking myself for not purchasing this sooner!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carla M.
content: I can’t say enough wonderful things about this product!!! It’s changed our lives. I do a lot of online ordering and worry about porch thieves. I know the second someone is on my porch and can quickly retrieve packages. Additionally it makes me feel safe to have the front door camera. What a wonderful product.
title: Can’t live without this

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C. Farlow
content: I was skeptical before buying the Ring doorbell, but it is surprisingly easy to make adjustments so that the battery doesn't die quickly. I am actually glad I bought it now! I've seen things that I wished I hadn't but you'll be happy (and angry) to learn how some of your packages are delivered!
title: What's Happening at Your Door?

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DT
content: Useless and slow once the free subscription runs out.  Alerts once the person is pulling out of the driveway.  Did not have this issue when under the free 30 day subscription trial.  Plan to throw this away and get another brand.
title: Waste

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: princess
content: I love the pictures with this but when talking through it the person doesnt understand you. Its a waste if you are trying to speak to the person outside. That part is very disappointing.
title: ok product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tamela Donaldson
