content: We've had ours 5 months and my husband hates it so much he wants the app off his phone. Unless somebody rings the doorbell the camera barely works. We usually get a notification AFTER the person has left and that's on the second highest setting. Jump up to 30 feet and it goes off all the time. I would check out other options.
title: Had since Nov 2018....not happy at all

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sara Husser
content: I bought the Ring 2, and was very impressed with everything about it.  The packaging was good, instructions are clear and plentiful (written instructions and links to video's on how to set it up).  I thought everything was great, and then I hit my 30 day mark and figured out you have to subscribe to view videos from the history.  If I would have known that I would have bought a plain doorbell for $3 and been $157 ahead.  The only real benefit now if you don't subscribe is it tells you when there's motion, so you can go to the door and grab your packages off the front porch right away.
title: The ring is great except for the subscription requirement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeffrey B Pafford
content: DO NOT TRUST THIS SELLER!  I had an issue with the device that I purchased in November 2019 (it was not properly recording) and when I called Ring customer support, they told me the device had been previously installed by another owner the month before!  So I received a defective device that was already used, Ring would not honor my warranty, and my device was not monitoring my house correctly the whole time.  I am extremely disappointed with the deplorable lack of honesty of this seller.  Very disappointed.
title: "New" device was actually a pre-installed one

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kelly Eastman
content: Works just as advertised, though the night vision isn't as good as my cheaper cameras. Still very handy to track packages and keep an eye on the neighborhood. I'm watching you, Lady Down the Street Who Lets Her Dog Crap In Neighbors' Yards.
title: Spy Hard 2: spy harder

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nobody from nowhere
content: I really like the doorbell, but only gave it 4 out of five stars because I would like the option to store history videos locally (on network hard drive that is backed up) vs paying a monthly subscription. Other than that it works great and setup is easy.
title: This thing works very well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mustafa Hamzabegovic
content: The ring door bell itself is great 5 stars, I just don’t like the fact that it’s worthless without a monthly subscription..., another monthly or yearly bill... bummer, I have the complete ring alarm set up, I would of liked the features included instead of paying for the minimal features
title: Product itself is great, worthless without subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: amp381
content: Works great, battery lasts about a month I'd say. Maybe there's just a lot of motion at my house. Charges quickly and works fine.
title: I see you

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Annonomous
content: Love the coverage area for notifications.and wide view of camera  I like the ability to customize how and when to be notified.  I would have liked more details upfront during setup; to explain details of saving/sharing etc. I deleted without realizing the save “timing options” ie: 60 days vs permant download with protection
title: Very efficient security option

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: B. Kelly
content: By the time we get a notification that someone is in our breezeway, And we check the video (when it will even connect) they are already gone.  And they don’t tell you, you have to pay additional monthly fee to see recordings of who was at your door.  Would never buy another.  Very disappointed.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jessica
content: It’s nice to see who’s on the porch and get playback, but it does occasionally lag and won’t go live quickly enough to do what I need it to do. I would recommend to friends however because it is useful, I just wish it had more capabilities.
title: Pretty good, not what I thought

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KKenny
content: Very easy to install. Works very well... so well we had to adjust the sensitivity so the mail/garbage truck wouldn’t set it off! Just a heads up you get a 30-day free trial of the service, and after that it’s a $30 annual subscription - this is only if you want to store videos that were created. Still worth it to us! Thinking about adding on a second camera to our back door.
title: Good start to extra security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Truth
content: Stopped working in less than one year due to software failure. Ring sent a used "refurbished" replacement that does not work. Firmware would not update. *Update company sent a new replacement. Seems to be working so far.
title: Stopped working less than one year.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Keith L
content: I've used this for about a yr now.  Works great.  I've got the ringers on main floor and in basement.  I wish my internet speed was faster (I have DSL), but this still works, and captures the video.  The batteries last months--I think I've charged them once, maybe twice in the year.
title: Good security device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: leasia rolle white
content: I like the fact that it truly only takes 5 min to install. The picture and sound quality is very good. It connected with ease to both my husband and My phone. Gives us 30 days of free trial monitor so we can make an educated decision on what we want. So far everything is operational. I am glade I made the decision to purchase this product. Thank you
title: It works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Miz MtnMoma
content: I just love my Ring doorbell. I lost my husband last year and asked my son to install it for me. I feel so much safer having it. I get a video immediately when there is any activity by my home. Perfect for me.
title: Absolutely love my Ring doorbell!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shankar
content: I have a 1 month old ring. I guess i was unlucky to get a bad piece. It works, but it never worked well from the start. I placed the router next to the door to get strong signal outside (I have xfinity Blast = 50+mps next to the ring. checked with my smartphone standing next to ring). However i am facing two problems - 1. Sometimes it doesnt ring! 2. All the time, the person at the door can hear we very well. But i cannot hear the person well + the image i see is very pixelated (Though i have 50+ mps wifi connection next to the ring doorbell)
title: Bad unit.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: tazjedi
content: Often when cars drive by it goes off even though I set it to be only up to the steps and the street is another 10-15 feet away.
title: Motion detection goes off too often

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K.G
content: I like the video quality and the motion detection but the battery dies too quickly so make sure to have a spare that's always charged and ready. There's no local storage so you have to pay to access recorded footage.
title: Good Quality, weak battery.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steve Prochaska
content: Installed this for 2 days. Went and bought a Nest Hello and wow. What a difference. The video quality seemed less than HD almost all the time. Half the time I went to check live view it wouldn't work. I would either get a forever loading screen or just a black screen. I really really wanted to like this one. The big bonus it has over Nest is that you don't NEED to have any previous wiring.
title: not quite there...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: buyer2go
content: the fish eye view of the camera is great! The motion sensor is super sensitive to the point that passing vehicles on the street set it off. Had to tone it way down or the alerts would drive you crazy. Bought the extra battery and charger, since we didn't hard wire it.  Nice to know when your packages arrive and talking to the delivery person has helped with hiding the packages from would be crooks
title: Good view

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kim
content: Works great, when it works. Camera is nice and clear.  Our doorbell unit will randomly decrease its Wi-Fi strength. When installed it was strong. The strength will go all the way to poor even when nobody is home using Wi-Fi and then the camera does not open to view. This happens quite often. The speaker quality is good. The motion detection hits th cars passing by in the street. If decreasesd it can’t pick up motion in the driveway. I wish there was a way to decrease more precicely in certain areas.
title: Works great, when it works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Anna Bousarkis
content: Our home is in a remote area with DSL for WiFi. Service is not very fast. So far, we have had the Ring installed for about 2 months. Receiving alerts and motion activation. Sometimes the feeds are a little slow but I was not sure it would feed at all. Pleased with the product. Night vision not too great - need to be 2-3 feet from device and then not very clear. Day time vision is very clear.
title: WOrking better than expected

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Wayne lipko
content: Very pleased that I finally got one of these. Keeps us informed of anything going on, especially packages delivered etc. Alexa and the alexa dots we have all inform us motion or when the doorbell rings. Was apprehensive to buy it, glad I did.
title: Love it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JW
content: We had a package stolen off of our front porch which motivated us to make the plunge. Its easy to install and set up. Once done we can monitor all activity at the door. We have even answered the bell remotely. Very slick!
title: Great way to monitor your front door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mae
content: never worked right, i tried everything. my little wyze $25 camera works better, with no additional charges and great software FREE
title: dint work

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sailingmyway
content: No internal storage, makes it useless without service at a min of $3.00 a month. And now the security problems.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dog lover
content: More security in seeing who is at the door and whether or not there’s a delivery. So much better being able to speak to someone who rings the doorbell when I’m busy at the other end of the house.  Also love being able to replay the video of comings and goings we’ve missed when out.  Easy to install - we wired it into existing doorbell.
title: More secure seeing who’s at the door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: NJA
content: It is a great concept, but it never seems to find the wifi coverage, and I bought the Ring wifi expander/ringer, and that has never worked either.  Disappointing.
title: Not what I expected

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nathalia Coelho
content: We added the ring camera to our front door bell and it works just fine. I had to adjust the motion detector because its was too sensitive... it picks up the motion of the tree in front of our house with the wind and keeps sending me notifications. But its great!
title: Love it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Frankj_monreal
content: Just like the first doorbell I am extremely satisfied with ring doorbell 2 it works so perfectly, I had no issues with installation, the picture is better than the first doorbell but it does seem a bit lighter than the 1st as well, almost one and a half weeks with it and the battery life sits at 93% definitely purchasing another product from ring, as a matter of fact I purchased the ring floodlight camera to add a bit more security to my home
title: Great doorbell, great company

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DrYeo
content: Easy to set up and install. Captured video is very clear and high resolution. Only possible complaint would be that I wish it knew it was us and would go off and record us getting the mail. hahaha
title: Awesome

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Deanna Fronk
content: The idea behind these are great! No matter how many times I adjusted the motion sensor it wouldn’t work properly. It would detect a slow moving vehicle out on the street (lower field than my walkway) but it wouldn’t detect someone on my walkway until they were right up on the door. Very disappointing and hope to find a different brand to try out!
title: Idea is great but motion sensors not so much

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lindsay May
content: I really like our ring doorbell. It works perfectly and notifies us when someone is there or close to the door. You can adjust settings to let it know how far the road is from your house so it doesn’t pick up cars going by. We did purchase a monthly plan for $3/month so we can review any movement it picked up that we couldn’t watch immediately. I feel safer knowing I can check in anytime.
title: Great purchase

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JAE
content: I RECENTLY PURCHASED A NEW HOME & GETTING NEW EVERYTHING- SECURITY // SOMEHOW THIS RING WILL NOT CONNECTED---WHICH I'VE BEEN TRYING TO DO FOR THE LAST 4DAYS BEFORE I WENT ON VACATION CAME BACK & IT'S STILL NOT CONNECTING---UUUGGGHHH ---- C/S TOLD ME CONTACT MY INTERNET PROVIDER--REALLY??!
title: COST ME MUCH NOT TO WORK!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Co
content: My husband and I love the Ring. It gives us a peace of mind when we aren’t home. The only “false alarms” it gives us is when the garbage or the recycling comes by. Just two nights ago two suspicious people knocked on our door claiming to be with AT&T? They asked to speak with us about some deals and my husband was able to speak to them over the Ring instead of opening the door. All in all, we love it!
title: Worth It!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pam Bollenbach
content: Like being able to see outside vision. Not liking the jingle that plays
title: Ring Doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Travis Tabak
content: It’s spotty when it picks up someone around my door but sees every car that passes. Example: package dropped off sees the person walking away but never walking up, but as soon as a car begins to pass it sees that whole thing.
title: Sees what it wants to when it wants to

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MIKE
content: I installed this for my parents and not HAPPY. From what I have researched the doorbell is not connecting to their iPhones. This is my second purchase. The first one works great, however the second one not so lucky.
title: Junk

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Terrie
content: I dislike the fact that you need a plan after the first month in order to get video of earlier events. Battery life is not very good. Night vision is awful. It pick up people walking by but twice it didn't pick up people on the porch. Other times it does. I would return it but worry about the security of returning it. It also, will not open for live feed most of the time.
title: Waste of money.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D M
content: Easy install, app works great, quality is great. The night vision makes it difficult to see details, but I think it is a great product. $30 a year for a cloud subscription is required to save video, but I have no problem with that. You can talk to people through it. It is quick to detect motion and notify you on your phone. Very very slight delay. I am glad we got this, no problems at all. After 6 weeks, we are still happy with it.
title: Works just fine

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jose Leon
content: I bought this on Amazon days and frankly it was a spontaneous buy...one I usually regret. Not this one. It was fairly painless to install -simply switched out my old ringer and it hooked right up. Works as advertised and Love the features. Recommend even for nontechies .
title: Glad I bought it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lochner
content: This is my second Ring - it’s better that the first model as the battery is waaaay easier to remove and recharge!
title: Great improvements!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cesals
content: I like the doorbell. Works great, battery last long time. ( if trigger a lot drains it faster) if u connect it to house doorbell wires not a issue. Good picture or videos. Easy to navigate the app. Only issue I don’t like is when theres motion detected there’s a 2-3 second delay before ur notified. Wish it would notify u as soon as motion is detected.
title: Great tool to have.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Karen B
content: My Son was able to install this easily and it works great.  We needed a new doorbell, so this works so much better than just a doorbell.  We got the chime pro as well as the WiFi in our home is not that close to the front door.  The added strength provided by the chime pro is all that I needed.
title: Ring is working great!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jon_slider
content: This doorbell has very poor reception. I bought the wifi extender, upgraded my wifi service to faster speed, and still I more often than not, fail to load Live view. I do not recommend this unit for a video feed. It only works reliably as a doorchime. Ive had numerous contacts with support. They send me the same troubleshooting form letters, over and over. Not recommended.
title: Not impressed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dspiers
content: I bought Ring Doorbell 2 ad I had one before. Set it up and put camera range to 30 ft. I am getting nothing but me and dog going in and out. Have all zones enabled and camera picks up nothing. I was told they change the range of camera recently and no longer picks up that far.
title: Ring Doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paige
content: Its handy to have, but it picks up cars driving by, no matter how many times I set the motion zone. Also, sometimes it doesn't catch things until they are right in front of it. The picture isnt as clear as advertised,  either.  Not sure if all of this is normal, or if I just got a defective one.
title: Hit or miss

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brandon
content: I bought this Ring device and I am not too happy about it for the following reasons:  description didn't disclose that I must pay annual fee to see  video alerts;  there are many times I got alerts but don't see actual motions due to delaying recording motions and thus do not know who or what caused the alerts; due to slow response some alerts only show the back of the persons leaving away from the house; when someone pushed the door bell the delay it too long and thus by the time I got the alert and response right away is still too late and the person walked away.
title: Motion and alert response time is too slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C.hill
content: Cost effective, easy to install, user friendly program and giving ease of mind.  I am more than happy with this product and security camera light!  After having 5 attempted break ins prior to installation of my Ring, and since no issues. Word gets around. The ability to act prior to real problems and speak to possible bad guys is better than filing Police reports after the fact of a break in.
title: The Best Security System all Around

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Randy
content: I had purchased the original Ring some 5 years ago for a different house.  I wasn't impressed with the original Ring, but this one wired up quickly to the door bell wiring, so the battery stays charged, the regular doorbell rings too.  I also find the wireless strength of V2 version seems better than the original.
title: Better than V1 Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: k :)
content: very handy and puts my mind at ease. glad i bought it despite some of the reviews i read. so far so good. bought one for my mom’s house after using mine for a couple months. she’s paranoid with technology and she works fine with the app etc. - only problem we have is her wifi isn’t strong enough and takes a while to load sometimes. but that’s something on our end. (i have no problem with mine)
title: works for me

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michelle M. Wood
content: Beyond my expectations.  Lasted over 7 weeks from 100% to 34% before I swapped out batteries.  I actually was thinking about mounting these as cameras since I read bad reviews about the new stick ups did not use the ring app.
title: Very good battery life.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: BDAmundson
content: The Ring Video Doorbell was easy to install and set up. We don't have a peephole in our door, so the Ring Doorbell allows us to quickly see who is at the door. In addition, we can see where packages are left on our porch and monitor other activity on the front porch.
title: Easy Installation; Like Security It Offers

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Like to think before buying
content: It lets you know when someone has entered the detection zone but by the time you can get your phone out and wait for it to connect to camera they are gone.  Also when trying to see past history of motion detection you just sit  there waiting for the video to process before being able to see it.
title: Does not react like commericals show.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kathy G
content: I am having difficulty using this battery operated Ring doorbell and in fact most of the ring cameras.  I have excellent wifi service but for som reason this has not worked from the start.  The batteries run low very fast so you are continually taking them out to recharge!
title: Not good for the money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dr. E. F. Anderson
content: Just had the Ring Doorbell installed along with the Ring Chime.  I am very pleased with this product as it adds a way to remotely and at home to monitor traffic to ones door.  It allows you to speak to door knockers  in a more candid manner than through a screen or open door.  One can simply indicate no interest in what they might be selling or ask them to move on or advise them that you are summoning the police.  after I ascertain the effectiveness of this system I may add components to it to further enhance my control of my homes perimeter.
title: Ring Doorbell is a hit at my house.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dwight Nestrick
content: Though we have only couple weeks usage, it is clear that Ring works. Picture is clear. Sound quality is good.  WiFi connectivity is great.  We have had couple opportunities to answer door from remote location.  That too was a great interaction.  Highly revommend
title: It gives us strong feeling of security.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: wehav2
content: Does a good job as a doorbell but there is a slight delay in connecting so if someone were breaking in, it might not catch sight of someone moving quickly. Light reflections from passing traffic sometimes sets off the motion detector.
title: Good for a video doorbell. Maybe not so good for catching bad guys in the act.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Temeku
content: I can't believe I waited so long to get this!  Simply put, this is awesome technology.  My installation required the ability to limit the motion activation zones or it would be triggered constantly.  The motion zone settings work perfectly for me.  I now know when someone is at the entrance to my property, packages arrive, etc...  Even when I am not home.  And the My Neighborhood feature is great for keeping tabs on anything that happens nearby. After having the doorbell for 2 days, I ordered a security cam and plan to order 2-3 more cams once I decide how best to cover my property (I am on 4 acres).  One caveat, all wireless devices are dependent on good wireless network coverage so if you have issues with the wireless connectivity you may need help from someone that understands coverage areas and signal strength. I can't wait for the security system to be available.  I will be replacing my traditional security system immediately.
title: I can't believe I waited so long to get this!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: c0y0t3_007
content: I am having problems setting up the Ring Video Doorbell 2.  While I set up the Ring Video Pro easily, when I "completed setup", the Doorbell attempts to update the firmware but is unable to finish.  I have been on Chat with Ring Support for more than 3 hours and they keep having me do the same thing over and over. During my 7th attempt on setup as instructed through Ring support, I overheard another person's conversation through my doorbell.  It was quite creepy.  Ring Support has not been able to give me an answer as to how this happened.  I'm not sure if maybe my device was a "returned" device and was still connected to someone else's account.
title: Setup Difficulties and Mixed-Up Audio

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lee_Bo
content: Very easy install, video is great (day and night) and the app is easy to use.  Love the motion and doorbell notifications on the app.  I got this model because I was going to replace the existing doorbell and use the 24v wires that were already there.  If you're looking for a doorbell camera, I highly recommend this product.
title: Really good product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D'Neicy AH

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Christian Wetnight
content: This is my second ring door bell. I love the bell and would be 5 stars but unlike the first one. You have to pay after 30 days to watch videos even after just 30 secs. The first one came with a whole year. Money grab by Ring and very misleading.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DRC
content: Bought this last month.  Installation was fairly quick and easy as well as the interface with my Wi-Fi.  It does work as it is intended to, except the unit I have will not allow 2 way communication.  I can here folks at my door but they cannot hear me.  I have contacted the customer support without any luck.
title: Works for the most part

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: johnson
content: Description said you could download to your desktop, laptop, whatever. Unfortunately, if you have windows, it only works on Win 10. This leaves you with the option of upgrading to Win 10, or just use a cell phone. I couldn't afford the $500 upgrade, so I'm returning it. The other issue was having to pay to keep a log of activity. That's bull. You should either get it free, or be able to save to your computer(s).
title: Description said you could download to your desktop, laptop ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ThinkingWoman
content: With all the great reviews, we this would be a good replacement doorbell. Camera works great. The device itself keeps going offline. It is 15 feet from the WiFi router. It badly needs a “reconnect to WiFi” button in the app! When it goes offline, you have to be there to physically go through a 3-step process to reset! Not good if you are away from home. 😕
title: Offline often.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KLM
content: This is a much improved model to the first generation and was fairly simple to install. Picture quality and response time is much better. Volume control is appreciated.  They could add a choice of ring tones, but I was happy to be able to adjust on low/level one, so it's doesn't annoy neighbors. Added bonus, is the item arrived ahead of schedule!
title: Improved Model!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Forrest Palmer Jr.
content: Installation at my door was a snap with very detailed instructions. Easily connected to my Eero mesh network after starting the set up with my iPhone via Bluetooth. I added 3 Ring Chime Pro's which also setup easily.  Video is a bit grainy but people are recognizable. Motion sensor works very well. I get alerts from my iPhone and iPad as well as the Chime Pros so I won't ever miss anyone coming to the door. All-in-all a great product.
title: Easily connected to my Eero mesh network after starting the ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MotherOfAxel
content: Added this doorbell to our back door after loving our front door. This updated version of the doorbell is even better than the 2.0. Added on a backup battery so we can just change out instead of taking down and charging.
title: Super Happy with this System

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pittstop3
content: I had the pro version and decided to down-grade to the Doorbell 2 just to have the battery.  (The Pro does not have a battery).  Even though I'm hard wired in - if the power goes out (or in the middle of a hurricane) the battery will still let me see the outside.
title: This is the most recent version w/ a battery

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: tom chatham
content: This works great, don't buy a cheap one... so far batteries have lasted 5 months!! However, it is a little slow on the trigger...eg; person has left before it films...like UPS does, runs up, throws package, doesn't knock. but still worth it...
title: door bell/video

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Craig C Van Horn
content: We don’t always know when we are going to receive a package from FEDEX or UPS. The delivery service often ( but not always) leave uncovered packages even when rain is expected. With the motion alert from the Ring doorbell 2 we always know when packages are dropped off. The delivery personnel don’t usually knock or ring a doorbell. The video is extremely sharp, both in daylight and at night. Setup was a breeze. I hard wired the unit using one of the plugin transformers designed for ring doorbells. It works great.
title: No more rain soaked packages from FEDEX or UPS!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. C.
content: Simple easy to set up. Battery life is excellent! Motion detection is a little slow at times although I think my internet is hindering it. My only complaint is it’s a little over sensitive at times. Other than that it was worth the money!
title: Money well spent

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lowell Alia
content: I love the way it helps me who is in front of my house. When things get delivered in my front door, when I’m expecting any delivery and I’m out of the house, I know exactly when it’s delivered. Also I would the clear profile of the person who’s at my doorstep.
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ChicagoNative
content: Hired Geek Sqaud to install. They used a 3rd party that couldn't connect the Ring to connect to my wifi. The Ring was also installed right above my mailbox meaning I can't get the now dead battery out at all.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Tuccinardi

We are senior citizens and installation couldn't have been easier. The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is that no one has come to our door, other than us as we were testing it out! lol

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: fdrnet

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Happy with purhcase

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: WappyOne
content: They lied. I want to return the item and find another brand. You MUST PAY MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION to see anything that happened at your door that is not live. I understand monitoring, but that costs even more. Cameras at our store can be reviewed on our phones, no subscription. Ring - NO.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lisa

It's going back because it's a piece of crap

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Wuss912

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Yeyi M.

title: Do not alert when people standing in front of the door! Not helpful at all

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DES
content: I love the concept of this Camara.  The video quality is really nice. I do not get notifications until sometimes 3 to 10 minutes after motion detected.  A few times it took me 1 few hours. I got this Camara to see motion when it happens. I wish it would work better :(
title: Delayed motion notification

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Cohen
content: [update on 8/31] I talked with Ring's excellent customer support and they helped change a couple of settings on their end which significantly improved things for me. Connections are more stable and reliable for sure. Still just 4/5 instead of 5, since it's not perfect. Very rarely, a video will drop out despite my internet connection being fine. And motion detection is still a little wonky - sometimes too sensitive, others not sensitive enough. But most of the time it works well, and well enough for me to cancel my return and keep the device for now. Hopefully they'll be able to fix some of the remaining issues in a software update! [original review - 2/5] I really really wanted to love my Ring 2 and spent hours debugging issues, trying different wi-fi channels, moving things around, and on and on. In the end, I simply couldn't get it to work reliably, which is just a complete non-starter for me when thinking about products which are supposed to give me a sense of security. The biggest issue for me is probably that the Ring 2 doesn't support 5GHz wi-fi. My router still has pretty good 2.4GHz wi-fi support though. The ring itself claimed that it had a "Good" (green) signal. Yet despite that "good" signal, I often couldn't connect to it remotely or locally, and the videos it tried to record would end up just being 40 seconds of black/blank video instead. Ring (the company) was even kind enough to send me a Chime Pro for free, since it works as a wi-fi extender in addition to a loud chime noise. I placed the Chime in multiple different locations - all of them between my router and the Ring 2 itself - and not only did it not help my signal at all, it actually made the signal significantly worse! From there, customer support didn't have any suggestions left to offer. So in short: It worked poorly with a "good" signal, it worked even worse with their extended installed, and now weeks later I'm just giving up.
title: Improved after talking with customer support, tentatively recommended

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LEGIN224
content: It works for what I need. I don't like the short battery life. When the battery is low, it doesn't alert my phone. I bought a 2nd battery to try and eliminate the dead times. This means that I have to monitor the battery status often.I also wish that I could view it on my pc. I have Windows 7 and I am told that there is an app for Windows 10, but I don't like the platform.
title: I don't like the short battery life

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MT
content: The installation is clear and concise. Everything is needed. I didn't have a powered door bell connection and so first thought the internal battery connection would be the way to go. However, the door where it is installed had a lot of "door traffic" and so the battery went down quickly and access to the battery was not something I wanted to often so bought a transformer and ran the cord to it.  I have been an owner of ARLO cameras and this is superior.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ravenhair

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ken lovesit
content: The battery does not last long. Don’t have a hard wired power. Have to charge after s little more than a month.
title: Bad battery

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rey
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Once you get the settings right, this thing is spot in. We started with this, got the Whole House alarm system and so also ended up getting two cameras. We use it all the time, it’s awesome!
title: Awesome purchase!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RBLFowler
content: Motion detection is difficult to adjust. When set for short range, I don't get notified at all. When set medium range, I see every leaf that blows by. Wifi is horrible, weak even when in the next room.
title: Too sensitive

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristine
content: I just got this and think it's great. I went from using a knocker to this so it was quite the upgrade.  However, I think there's a lot of opportunity in improving the speed at which the video comes up. More than half the time I view Live View, it doesn't work, kicks me out of the view or takes more than 30 seconds to load. I have a small single story ranch and run high speed 100 mbps wifi. I even bought the Ring Chime with a wifi extender. If this could be improved, then I'd give it 5 stars. Otherwise, it's still a good device and I would recommend it.
title: I just got this and think it's great. I went from using a knocker to this ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Renee PATCHIN
content: Easy to install. Only issue was cheap quality of screws and hardware. Screwed in screws and they went through the cheap plastic of the extenders too.
title: Good but need a better assembly hardware

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Richard Sandgren
content: This camera is a total rip off. I had purchased a ring spotlight cam about a year ago. It quit working. I bought the year monitor plan just weeks before. When i bought the doorbell cam they said they would transfer my monitor plan. They lied. No plan and NO monitoring. RIP OFF.
title: TOTAL RIP OFF - SCAM

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lynn A.
content: We finally hooked up our Ring Doorbell 2 yesterday.  The feral cats do not set it off which is great!! I get notifications over my phone which is perfect.  Very pleased with the purchase.  It is easy to set up - just follow the verbal instructions.
title: great security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TRON
content: Thing is worthless, it's like calling the cops after. Live view never works. I have gb down and up and excellent wifi strength but it never works. Wish I could return it but I waited too long. Don't be me , be better
title: Get a can with sting wire

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: steven miller
content: Battery lasts about 3 months for us. It depends on how much traffic is in front of the door. The app has nice features. It would be nice if you could shut it off via the app if you are going to be in front of it for a period of time. The snooze feature is nice, but it still records and runs the battery down. Great video quality
title: Great video quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K. Smith
content: Because of where I have this mounted I used one of the wedges. I found the screws completely stripped out of it and the ring almost hanging loose. I know nobody did it... Due to the camera, it just did it on its own. Other than that I really like it. It has some issues with being to sensitive or not sensitive enough, but overall does the job.
title: Wedges have issues, but good base product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sunshine
content: I am able to see all activity at my door whether I am home, in the neighborhood or even overseas!  It gives me real piece of mind.  When I was in Israel I was able to see and speak to my husband as he walked out of the door at home in Arizona!  This is an amazing and very reasonably priced home monitoring system.  Thank you Ring.com.
title: Ring.com is like having a personal door attendant!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: rbg
content: love the Ring doorbell - although even after adjusting to smallest motion range - it still picks up large trucks, school buses, etc. - gets annoying. By the time I hear the Ring and open up the app, then have to click on Ring Icon, person has left the front door - needs to open up from app directly to the doorbell.
title: Clear images

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DAS
content: Live View doesn't work consistently even with my strong WiFi. Piece of garbage. Camera also records 2-3 seconds of white at the beginning of each video and missing the action that triggered the alert. I'm printing return label now.
title: Live View Not Reliable, Doesn't Work as Advertised

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bill Cardinal
content: The whole Ring system is not bad really. All easy to set up. You dont have to be a tech nerd. You will need a smart phone or tablet so it has someplace to take photos of the bar codes for set up.
title: Its really not bad.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Luz A. Gonzalez
content: I like that it was easy to I install both physically and electronically. I dislike that its selective on what motion it records and when it stops recording.  I dislike that I had to pay for continued recording.  I should be able to select to record to my phone or SD card not pay after purchasing the device.
title: RING Doorbell - pretty cool!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paula Cugler
content: Before you spend money on the Ring, STOP....If you have an Android phone DO NOT by a Ring. The volume outside is worse then TERRIBLE. Ring is aware of the system wide problem with Android and still does not have the ability to correct the problem. Basically, its false advertising. People outside our door are not able to hear me even if I yell. Two way conversation is non existant. DO NOT BUY until the problem is fixed.
title: Ring is Falsely Advertising.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Laurie Tinkey
content: I love having some security now. I set it up myself ina short amount of time and we were so happy with the results that we got one for our back door as well.  We were out of town and got an alert and our exterminator was in our front yard and we were able to talk to him and tell him where we needed spraying and he had no idea we weren’t even in the house
title: So easy to set up and works beautifully.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jad
content: I expected this to integrate with Alexa (i.e. Alexa would let me know when someone is ringing the doorbell--Alexa can basically only show me the front door.  It won't alert me to someone ringing it).  So other than a 1080 cam, better battery, and an interchangeable face plate, I'm not sure what you're getting that you don't get with the original.  Alexa integration is bad.  Great concept and it needs more work.
title: Offers very little over the original Ring Doorbell 1

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jennifer Stevens
content: Easy to install and use the app. We have an old house with plaster walls and this don’t get WiFi signal well which is likely the cause, but it takes a while for the video to load and it’s not a clear video at times. It seems like it works in a timely manner only half the time when the doorbell rings. After having this for a while, I’m not sure I feel like I really need a video doorbell.
title: Easy to install and use the app

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michael Inda
content: I love my new ring, it makes me secure and can see all movement as well as speak to my guest or unwanted guest when I'm not home. 06/10/18 Hello Amazon, I purchased my Ring doorbell on February 27th, 2018. I loved it while it worked but as on April 20th it has stopped working. It has had several error's from battery not charred to recharge battery 2%. The battery was hard wired and did not need to be removed to recharge but we attempted to do so anyways in hope it would correct the problem. We have also purchased a separate new battery but that was not the problem. I personally think its a effected model. I attempted to access you extended 1 year warranty but was navigated to sever other pages. I hate to notify you this way but can really use your help. Please advise
title: I love my new ring, it makes me secure and can see all movement as well as speak to my guest or unwanted guest when I'm not home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kat shops!
content: I am very disappointed in this product. It often does not work at all. When it does, I see a black screen sometimes, and due to a delay, nothing but the outside view others. It does what it is supposed to do about 25-30% of the time. I purchased a WiFi booster but it doesn’t help. I am afraid to invest any more with the ring chime boost because some reviewers say it did nothing.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Happydays
content: This product is not only very handy to have, but it's also fun to use.  I was a liitle afraid that the installation would be difficult, but it was a snap. All the tools needed are included in the package.  It's also really easy to link to your Alexa skills so when the doorbell rings it is also broadcast around the house!
title: Easy to Install and Fun to Use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Liebe
content: I bought because I had people jumping my backyard fence, so it was needed for security purposes. Battery is draining too fast, motion is kinda slow. The WiFi it detects is always slow, and I even upgraded with my provider but still slow. No idea what’s up with that. But overall, i feel safe knowing that I can see movements.
title: Good to have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Travis Schlink
content: This is a great addition. Motion sense can be a little to sensitive depending how close your doorbell is to the road/sidewalk. But it’s very comforting to have the added security and package monitoring for sure. Plus we have ours hardwired so no worries about the battery dying from over detecting.
title: Great Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Zip
content: They keep adding so much to the app that it's impossible to open the app and see the camera. The dashboard won't even load since the latest update. This item used to work fine but the app updates are killing it. Very disappointed.
title: The app is making this useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Hamid Mukhtar
content: When it works, it is pleasing. But at least 50% of time, it just keeps trying to connect to ring.com And then it gives up. After a few tries it connects. If there is someone at the door and you are trying to answer your door bell, the person ringing the door bell usually leaves by that time. Nice idea and does work at times but still needs bugs to be fixed and needs to provide a consistent and smoother interface.
title: Long lag time, hit or miss

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jose luis
content: Solo me sirvió por poco más de un mes. Ya no me llega ningún tipo de notificación a mi celular. Lamentablemente, como esto ocurrió después de los 30 días de garantía, debo quedarme con un producto defectuoso y que no ed nada barato.
title: Defectuoso

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: L. Freeman
content: It often misses recording people completely, even when they drop something off right at our door! For us, this is one of the most important features, so we find it very disappointing. Buy a different model!
title: Misses most important motion

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DW
content: Purchased this to replace a hardwired doorbell and is working well so far, after adjusting to the learning curve (motion sensitivity, recharging the battery, etc.)  Bought an extra battery to have ready for switching when battery-in-use is drained.  I also like the neighbor alert feature which has been quite informative. Impressive product and so far, I'm happy with it!
title: Nifty!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Will Sellers
content: Battery drain was so bad that I had no choice but to buy a battery pack. To improve battery life I had to almost turn off all features. I would not buy this device again until there is improvement on battery life and better reception on wifi. especially if using the chime extender. Back and forth with support for over two weeks. This is not how a device is supposed to work.
title: Poor Battery Life and weak WiFi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MAS
content: Positive= Good clear picture. Good motion detection. Great live view. Sound is okay Negative= Get a different masonry drill bit when installing on brick. Delay when it starts recording. Doesn't always have recording available for view
title: Very Good but....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rakesh
content: We were looking for video doorbell for long time and finally we bought Ring Doorbell 2. It is good doorbell. Wifi connection can be improved that is what we feel. Sometime we feel that wifi connection lost between doorbell and internet. Motion detection is not that bad but needs improvement.
title: Good quality video doobell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rita J
content: Very easy instructions and to install. Works fantastic. Motion detector is amazing, it will even capture a leaf with a strong wind and signal me.  View in my phone is very clear and sound for communicating is very clear. I can talk and listen to the person at my door just like they were talking to me in person. I love this Ring. Would highly recommend
title: Absolutely Love seeing and hearing outside my door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Donald S.
content: Looks like a great product.  Unable to locate how to turn off the messages from neighbors about security info.  Also, haven't yet found a way to turn off the built-in chime in the outdoor-mounted door bell or how to lower its volume?  Maybe they are in the app's menus but so far I can't find it.
title: Just purshcaesed Ring Doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TuComp Rafa
content: Not happy.  Setup took a while. 2 hours with testing Removal of old bell and drill anchors for mount. Everything worked great EXCEPT outbound sound on the doorbell itself. Lens covers holds dust and distorts image easily.  Inbound sound on smartphone works fine but that's it. Can't shoo away unwanted people or talk to delivery man.  I don't have the time to waste on a lemon product. Probably why it went on sale and then was pulled off.  Garbage.
title: Sound on speaker defect. Known issue and still shipped.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Home Chef
content: One of the best items I’ve ever purchased.  No issues installing;I’m far from a handyman.  Getting notified when there is motion on my porch adds to peace of mind.  Alexa announces when the bell rings  I hardwired using the existing wiring.  The video is sharp even at night.  You can answer the door from anywhere with two way audio and live video.
title: Know what happens at your door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Angela Beeler
content: I have had this exactly 1 yr and it no longer works!  It wont even reset
title: I have had this exactly 1 yr and it no longer works!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jdiorio1
content: The Ring 2 didn't exactly fit our door frame so we had to jerry-rig a bracket so it would lie flat. That created an additional challenge of making sure the doorbell wires - even with the flimsy extension wires Ring provides - were long enough to hook up to the Ring 2 doorbell. The camera quality is questionable; my daughter tested the doorbell once it was installed and my wife and I found we hardly recognized her from the photos the camera takes.
title: Difficult to set up and install, jury's out on usability

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rick S
content: The Ring doorbell is reasonably priced and performs reliability.  The battery option was a welcomed alternative to wired setups.  Echo paired up and acted as a smart chime which saved on cost. Security is a major concern and the lack of two-factor authentication and reports of some internal data breaches have me concerned. Doorbell cams are very useful and provide a great piece of mind but in the wrong hands it can be a very useful tool for a bad actor.
title: Great Doorbell, not so great security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Louis Loffredo
content: Read so many mixed reviews but we decided to purchase and we love most about it yet it detects the mailman as he’s walking down our steps after the mail is already in our box, doesn’t pick up UPS deliveries after they’ve thrown our package onto our porch, etc. Motion isn’t quick enough yet we changed the settings to detect farther away so if someone swiped a package from our porch, we wouldn’t know who since it would pick them up quick enough. Defeats the purpose
title: Motion takes too long to detect

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D. Caliendo
content: I'm not being critical of the Ring; but be aware that if you live in the country and don't have access to high speed wi fi, this won't work. Ring assured me it would work with Hughesnet....NOT!
title: Won't work without high speed wi fi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: camansell
content: Before you tell me I need service I have a ring account but the device stopped working within 3 months and getting a replacement has been a hassle. I guess I should have listen to my husband when he told me it wasn't worth it.
title: Item stopped working within 3 months

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gregory Marcotte
content: This thing is the best, I live in a busy complex but know most People  but it’s when strangers come up it alerts me. A definitely great but nowadays and the basic subscription is great for your recording
title: Roof doorbell a must

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Scott Angelheart
content: Purchased this to monitor my front porch.  Device is clear and will notify you when there's motion but is kinda useless without paying for the subscription plan.  Just another way for Amazon to force you into a monthly subscription.  Without the plan you cannot record, save or send any video.  It's just a live cam. So if someone breaks into your home or steals something, you won't have any record of it. Kinda disappointed that it doesn't save videos without additional monthly costs.
title: Useless without subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gary P.
content: Easy to install and get working.  Nice way to keep track of package deliveries and generally what's going on around your front door. I liked the doorbell so much I bought two of the spotlights. I live on a large lot and it's nice to see what's going on without going out to snoop around.
title: Great Product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stan Whiteley
content: Product did not indicate that a subscription was required for the unit to work - not a lot of money, but still should have been clear before purchase.  More importantly, the Wifi is very poor - they also did not warn of this prior to purchase and the help indicates that the ATT Uverse service (probably the largest in the US) is too slow for the unit.  This should have been fixed in the device design for such an expensive unit.
title: Poor perforrmance

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ednaz
content: I have 30 mb upload and 90mb downloads but it is not working properly, sometimes not sending single sometimes if someone ring the door my iPhone rings after 2 min. This is my second time I purchase not working like my older style ring door
title: It is not sold works it works on and off

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stacie Chambers
content: I tried to speak to someone on my porch when I wasn't home and I could not understand them. The sound quality is horrible! Unfortunately this was the 1st time I tried to use it in this way and it was outside my return window, by 2 days!
title: Poor quality sound.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JVII
content: The Ring works well, but the video stutters a lot. Even with a “Good” connection and Internet speed (150mbps connection). When the video first starts, there is a freeze for a couple of seconds while the unit connects. It also takes a second or so for the Ring to adjust to bright sunlight. Motion detection is OK,  but the side zones aren’t sensitive enough even when adjusted.
title: Good but video stutters.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Trock
content: This is my first Ring doorbell and so far after 5 months it's been great. I hard wired mine in place of my previous regular doorbell and haven't had a single issue. The quality is adequate for the price. Hopefully future models will enable better quality at distance or zoom.
title: Solid video doorbell for starters

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Roy Miller
content: This product was purchased November 2019 and worked excellent until October 13 2020! It stopped working completely, no video, no doorbell function, nothing! Not a WiFi problem, tested and attempted to reconnect the device repeatedly, checked battery and connections all ok. Unit failed and I will not purchase another! Mounted the unit out of the rain so hasn’t gotten wet. Didn’t last a year!
title: Failed within a year!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Edward J
content: This is an amazing product and so user friendly. I own the Ring 2 and once you download the app and hook it to your home WiFi, you’re golden. The distance from my door to the street is about 20 feet and everything is clear and crisp. The night vision is on point too. I’d recommended this to anyone looking to have more security around their home. Alerts and Live View is also available. Amazing job Ring!!!
title: Exactly what we were looking for

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Evan B. Bruno
content: Wanted to love this but find it nearly useless for real-time use. It's like the police. They show up after the crime has happened. It prevents nothing. My unit is about thirty feet from my orbi satellite and it takes ages for the ring to connect to my phone. Whomever was at the door has long left before I see any footage. Disappointed.
title: visitors gone before connection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LINEST
content: With the events happening with the crazies in todays society, a must have....i purchased the monthly plan as well so events can be recorded. Well worth it-Especially due to the above average Amazon deliveries i receive!
title: A must have...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Glenn
content: I installed a Ring door bell 2 on the front and back door of my house. It is a very easy installation, but once activated I heard a buzzing sound. The noise was tracked to the existing door bell transformer. I found out the hard way, standard transformers cannot support Ring. Waiting for a larger 16V transformer to arrive now. It seems no local supplier stocks the required transformers. It’s not a big problem, but it would have been nice to know ahead of time. Other then this minor problem, I highly recommend Ring.
title: Change the transformer.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Aleks Chernyy
content: I bought the Doorbell 2 a few weeks ago.  The device comes with several covers and attachments so that you could customize it as you think best fits your home. There are settings for both motion detection by area, as well as doorbell activity.  Videos are recorded and stored indefinitely with a small yearly fee. The camera does require a battery that is supplied with the device and charges over several hours, but it lasts a very long time on a single charge (been several weeks and still at 100%) probably depending on how often you use the device. Also, the device requires a wifi connection, and if your router is too far away, you may want to invest in a range booster,  in order to be able to rapidly connect to your door.
title: The device comes with several covers and attachments so that you could customize it as you think best fits your home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brian Carter
content: Great video and audio.  The motion detection is either sensitive or non existent, they haven't gotten the balance right on this yet but its workable.  The battery does not last 6 months to a year.  We have a good but of front door traffic, and with the motion detection on the battery goes down pretty quick, I would say it lasts about 1-2 months then needs recharging.
title: Works as advertised

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: L. M. Rivera
content: Love all of it! Ring doorbell has been on my wishlist and now I have it on my door. It has been easy to install,  great to sync and best of all, I can see who, what is happening at my front door!! Genius!
title: Ring Doorbell - Love at First Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Glenny Spriggy Spriggs
content: I have 12 of these I use at my Airbnb properties. I love being able to stop issues before they happen and if it does I got it on camera! Love these for multiple reasons. Use 2-way authentication to avoid any if the hacking you see on TV nonstop. Good product.
title: Love these for my rental properties!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C. J. Butcher
content: Not very happy with this.  Rarely let me talk with anyone at my door when it rang.  Very slow and poor video most the time.  I moved and left it at the old house, won't be getting another one.
title: Not what it's cracked up to be

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: B. Smith
content: This product and software are awful. What use is this if I cannot view activity? Instead of getting better it has gotten worse. For several days I received no notifications whatsoever. There were mail and package deliveries which were not recorded at all. I'm looking for an alternative, you should too.
title: Blocked from accessing from both phone and pc.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Abbey H. Silva
content: I live alone - am handicapped - this is a security item for me and when I am running errands, doctor apps.,shopping on my mobility scooter know what is going on at my home. The speaker allows me to tell George, my neighbor to come in from my electric recliner when he brings me my mail. I have viewed some interesting and scary Ring videos on My Neighborhood watch app.
title: Security and not hurry to see who’s at your door a must for elderly people

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John P. Woods
content: Monthly subscription is necessary in order to save and review either a motion detection or door bell ring.  I had 30 days to  review and then afterwards it was cut off.  Customers should have a choice to subscribe or at least save for review on your own simm card
title: Required monthly subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chris b
content: Now that we have it, I don’t know how we lived without it b4. Great product. $30 yearly for basic service. Stores tons of footage. Awesome gadget
title: Works really well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C-T---
content: Ring video doorbell 2 works great! It’s a great way to keep an eye on things. The motion detection is a smidge sensor so I do pick up on blowing trees from time to time. Still working on adjusting the setting to account for this. A nice way to add to your home’s security.
title: 2 thumbs up for Ring video doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Travis Roberts
content: This ring doorbell is great!!  I never realized how much my neighbors come and go until I got this device. Picture quality is very good.  I played with the sensitivity so it wouldn't be going off when a fly went by.  I feel much better that I have this device!
title: Ring Doorbell 2 is great!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Wayne H.
content: Not a great product. You are suppose to be able to see your doorway. The unit goes off line and you have to be home to put it back on line. Not reliable goes off line all the time, helpdesk blames it on internet connection.
title: Not a great product. You are suppose to be able to ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Catherine Devlin
content: If you are going to buy just one item for a smart home make it a Ring Doorbell. This was extremely easy to install and set up. Once the battery was charged it took less then 30 minutes to install (10 minutes) and program. The camera quality is amazing and the speed at which it notifies you is even better! Paired with Alexa I get chimes all over my house when someone rings the bell!
title: Essential for a smart home!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gx
content: Got the Ring doorbell2 as part of Amazon sale in Jan 2020. Bell stopped giving sound to chime inside the home.  When contacted Amazon to check with Ring as part of manufacturer warranty. Ring found that my device is refurbished one and cannot provide any fix or replacement. Now back to amazon, they offered return instead of replacement which is ridiculous (even the product is available in stock). product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marlasjoy
content: I upgraded from the ring video doorbell to the ring video doorbell 2 and I don't see any improvement. The original had a nice metal cover and the doorbell 2 is a cheap plastic cover which could easily crack in cold weather. So in my opinion this was a downgrade.:(

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mynx

If your router goes down for any reason, the doorbell does not automatically reset, so again you have to go through the manual process of connecting to wifi.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Darryl
content: New Review: Doorbell started not recording motions or going to live feed. As of today it does nothing but act as a doorbell. Customer service isn't available unfortunately. product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DaytonOhioGuy
content: Works well as intended but interface not as clean as Nest on other rental house. Has a battery that unit can’t operate without.  Battery is useless if power goes out because WIFi is out too. product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jennifer Bradstreet
content: My husband set up our ring doorbell this last weekend and mid-week at about 10pm a man I don't know at all rang out doorbell. Thankfully, I didn't even have to open the door to see what he wanted. As a momma with little ones this kind of security is wonderful. I absolutely love, love, love It! We are recommending it to all of our friends and family!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diane
content: This doorbell is so easy to install, it comes with everything you need including the drill bit and a screw driver!  My 16 year old son was able to install with no problem. I would make sure you charge the battery prior to when you are ready to install as it took overnight to fully charge.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K25689
content: Easy set up and for the price, it's a great WiFi camara, price of subscription per user is not to pricey and give you access to longer time the video is held before deleted and other features

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ivan D. Parra
content: The doorbell works well and it look great. Two issues: a technical one is the motion sensor is extremely sensitive even after adjusting the settings to a minimum. The second one is related to the subscription that is required; I understand you want to make recurring money but at least it should give 24 hours to review your videos (right now only live mode works after the 30 days trial period). If you are like me and to look at the activity around your house (I.e. last night) I suggest you look somewhere else

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: no name
content: too much delay on when doorbell rings and doorbell activiates. wifi signal was good, so not sure of reason for delay. lots of false rings, since house faces street, even with the sensitivity set low. too  dark to tell who is calling since there is light sky behind the person. ok at night with outside light on. service was very good on emails, so i was happy with that. the mechanics of the bell are a two and service is a five, so i gave a three star review. not reliable enough to recommend, but it is fun to play with as a toy.
title: delay affects reliability.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Edwin Gamboa
content: It works most of the time. I've had it for about 6 months now and it's failed about less than 5 times so it's pretty reliable. Another thing is at times when I go to see the live feed it shows as a black screen. That happens more often. It still captures motion but it won't allow me to see the live feed. Overall I'm happy with this purchase. The quality is pretty good both days and nights.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Fritzme

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John L

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Christmas-baby

title: They are still working out the problems. Wait for next improvement.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ely P.
content: Don’t assume all the reviews are accurate... try it out for yourself and if you aren’t happy you can return it. I was weary at first because I read some not good reviews, but I still have it a chance and LOVE IT! We get alerts just fine! If you are fearful of updates to the app. Turn off the automatic updates and control it. Just as you would an Apple iPhone update 😂  We can see who’s at the door and just look outside for any reason when we are away and at home 😂! I’m glad we purchased this and the alarm system!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nickles

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jyowell
