product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: R.D. Young
content: It was easy to install and put the app on my phone.  I was away from home when it rang on my phone and very pleased to see a deliveryman drop off a package I was able to get someone to retrieve for me.  The only downside is that occasionally a Bush sets off the motion detector.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: HERBIE THEGADGETMAN
content: Getting a Ring 2 is one of the best decisions I’ve ever made! I just had it installed by an Amazon installer less than just a week ago and it was helpful in numerous instances! It’s one of those devices you’ll ask yourself how you lived without it to this point.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jenni P.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rich of California
content: 2d Update. I have been using the replacement Ring2 for awhile now. It is better than the one it replaced, but it is still off and on about when it connects. I thought the video froze on me a couple of times, but when I tried to repeat it, it worked ok. Also, it sometimes starts with a washed out video, as the first one did, but usually it clears up much faster. Bottom line, it is ok, but the Floodlight system seems to be the best choice. If I had electrical power at my back door, I would put one there. The new solar spot lights are not as bright as the flood, per reviews I have read. But I am updating my review on Ring2 doorbell from 1 to 3 stars, mainly because of the good customer service. Update: Jessica of customer service spent a great deal of time with me, troubleshooting my entire system, which includes a Ring floodlight and Chime pro. The floodlight has improved greatly. Ring2 still has issues, so they are sending me a replacement unit. I will upgrade my rating, if it works better. I have upgraded my floodlight rating to 4 stars. Very disappointed with this. It worked off and on for awhile, although I never had very good audio. But now it won't connect for long periods of time, at all. I spent $500 upgrading by adding a wifi mesh system that is designed to cover 6000 square feet. I have less than 1000, so it should be plenty of signal for Ring. The doorbell is the worst, but my Ring floodlight camera is almost as bad at times.  However, everything else in my house has great wifi coverage now. I am on Fios with a 150/150 mbps system. I guess I will call Ring tomorrow and go thru everything again, before I send it all back. BTW, even when it does connect, it takes way too long. Anyone stealing packages from the porch would be half a block away before I could see a live view.
title: OK

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: shelli pryll

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: coffeelover

The auditable doorbell sound played for the person outside is a bit too loud and annoying. The unit was pretty easy to install. Overall, I am pleased and am considering adding this to the outside doors in the back of the house for the security aspect of the motion detection.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chuck Baker

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Last

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Barbara Mackenzie
content: We got the Ring 2 for our daughters for Christmas for $129. They loved it! We decided to get one for ourselves but the price went up to $199, so we will not get one at this time. Disappointing!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Thekeithfan

The other thing is the unit is made pretty solid but all the mounting screws broke trying to fasten it to the house.  They were cheap (made you know where).

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chris Stewart

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mj

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert Link
content: This doorbell is nothing short of amazing. I read and reread the reviews worried that the doorbell wouldn’t connect or have a spotty connection to my router. I can easily watch footage on the WiFi or LTE on my phone day or night. The night vision is very impressive as well! Do note that there is a subscription to continue to view your videos, but $3 a month/$30 a year is well worth the added security when packages are so regularly stolen :)

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: tom2007
content: I like most everything about the product.  It was easy to assemble and place.  I didn't pay enough attention to the directions, after I install the two items, it worked perfect, as well as my ring door bell 2.  It's motion sensor's work as promised and contacts you almost immediately.  Con- cell phone hook up only, no computer at all.  But if you can live with that, it work's great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jose Maldonado

Otherwise, great product, I feel much safer to be honest.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Southpawsrock

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jose Marin

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Patty Zing
content: So glad we decided to purchase this.  Very easy to install and set up.  We have no problems with the motion sensor going off too often. We are just far enough off the road, but not too far to see it. I did not have to chAnge any factory settings.
title: Great security but not too invasive.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eric B
content: Have no meager problem with this product except sometimes cant transmit in real time and not the best performance in low light situation but overall it is working as manufacture advertised. maybe new version have better picture and WIFI quality.
title: good product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bai-Oui
content: I love the picture quality. I love pretty much everything about the Ring doorbell, except that it does have a delay, before it notifies me that someone is at my door. That said, I would still buy and recommend this product.
title: Almost 5 stars....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Syke
content: Right out of the box the ring has scratches and scuffs on it when it’s suppose to be brand new and there was no damage to the box. Is a gift for my mom so I’m still in the process of installing it to see if actually works. Will update once finished but not a good start
title: Scratches and scuffs

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Adventure Anywhere
content: Provides great peace of mind! I bought a system with this and the integration works very well. I also really like that the subscription plan is optional so you can still use them with out paying monthly. But if you want it, it’s cheaper than any other monthly security system fee so it’s a good value too.
title: Can’t go wrong with it. Great value and functionality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: James Holmes
content: I like being able to see who’s at the door and what’s going on in front of the house. However, I have never, ever been able to successfully communicate with someone at the door regardless of where I am or what is enabling the communication (or, app or Alexa). So if you want a camera and doorbell, great but talking to someone at the door is a no-go for us.
title: Can’t speak with whoever is at the door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Duck2009
content: This Ring camera went bad after just over one year.  Expected to get more longevity from the product so I am very disappointed.  It wasn't like it was $5 or $10.  It cost over $100 and I certainly would have expected it to last a little longer.
title: Like it but

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diane I
content: Relative to other devices we have in use:  night vision is adequate, motion sensor is good, Day time camera is good, the app & video storage features are extremely slow.  We did not and will not purchase anymore items offered by this company.
title: The door bell video is exceptionally slow in coming up in the application.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bradley Johnson
content: This product is one of the best I have installed or used in my 40 years of home repair. It does everything it promises and more. So easy to install, so intuitive to use. I’m going to install these on all of my entry doors, even those that currently have no door bell. I could not be more pleased.
title: Believe the hype - YES! It is THAT good!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David Hedgpeth
content: This is a totally unreliable product . I have talked to Ring Tech Support several times. They find the problem and get it working . It will work for a few days and then quits again . Then it’s something else . I cannot rely on it working when I need it . I was getting rid of it and getting a system that will work . A complete waste of money and effort
title: Unreliable

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dillon Leibfried
content: Not very pleased with this purchase.  You must have a yearly subscription to make this work correctly.  If you cancel, it will say you have motion at door but by the time you get your phone to connect you can not view this as it is now history.  What a waste of a great idea.  Also to get the proper angle you must now pay an additional $20 dollars plus very high shipping.  Just beware of all the additional costs.
title: Beware.  You must have a yearly subscription to make this thing work correctly.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tami Weston
content: My ring does a decent job picking people up from the side,but is not good  picking people up coming straight up my walkway. It's 32 feet from my sidewalk to my mail slot and if I am lucky I might see the back of my mail person. Many times We do not see anything. I called customer service and She told me to try a few things and email her the results. She called me back once and after that not a word. what they need to understand is The customer is not an interruption of their work  THEY ARE THE REASON THEY HAVE A JOB.  Nobody likes to be blown off
title: Customer Service quits

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kevin Wright
content: The bad: The battery doesn't last very long. So if you can, hard wire it in. The good: You can check the yard at any time on any device with wi-fi or internet service. See the Amazon delivery driver deliveries!
title: Great product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lindsay
content: Takes forever to connect live view to my phone.....not super impressed about that...also recently a neighbor very close had something stolen and what do you know didn’t pick up the motion of that on our sidewalk....
title: Meh ;(

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: OrionGuru
content: Have Ring 2 connected to 24 volt 40 VA doorbell with a parallel 25 ohm resistor. Fully charged battery keeps losing charge each day.  Ring engineers don't know how to steal power from existing doorbell.
title: Battery won't stay charged!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dj johnson
content: It sometimes takes a while for past events to upload. It’s especially frustrating when Someone rings the doorbell and it takes longer than it should to see who’s at my front door. Overall, I’m happy with the product.
title: Strong WiFi connection needed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: NEIL
content: The product works really well overall.  Two things that had minor issues are wifi signal strength and motion detection. Fixed the wifi strength issue with a wifi extender. The motion detection was fine tuned in the app but still has some false alarms every once in awhile.  Overall, works well.
title: Works well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Drewloo
content: We love having a sense of security when we are or aren’t home.  Easy to install.  The camera has great clarity and the mic has great sound.  Totally recommend
title: Sense of security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Johnny
content: Very easy to install and configure and connected easily with my 1980's era door chime which provides power to keep the battery charged and maintained by door chime.  I also picked up the Echo Show 5 as part of the deal and answering or viewing the door is just an Alexa command away!
title: Easy installation and maintained my existing door chime.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alan A. Johnson
content: I live in a adobe house so I always have WiFi problems.  I followed instructions and tested the location before installation and was fine. Installed and the WiFi was too weak.  I thought I would have to return and was given authorization even though I had installed the unit.  I found a better booster and reinstalled the Ring. It works perfectly.  This is a great product.  I am buying another for my back door.
title: Best customer service

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Laura Anderson
content: Received and installed per instructions.  Ring Doorbell and it doesn't stop ringing the bell.  Watch video and suggested turning Diode opposite direction.  Replace the diode and now door bell does not ring.  Reach out to manufacturer, they are going to send new diode.  Receive package with two screws and NO Diode.  Took Ring doorbell off and put in box.  Waste of Money
title: never worked correctly

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Beth Dunn
content: I needed a way to see who is at my door without actually going to the door. The Ring 2 was perfect for my needs. It was professionally installed as part of a renovation, but I was told that the installation was very easy. There was a bit of a learning curve to establish the motion zone, but that was easy to figure out. It is far less sensitive to motion at night, but that may be due to the lack of light we currently have in the area. We may add a unit to cover the driveway.
title: Was exactly what I needed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K. brown
content: The overall product works as it says. However, I charged the battery for more than 24 hours and the battery never charged to 100%. I purchased a additional back up battery and after a few hours it turned green as instructed and was at 100%. I'm thinking that the battery it comes with is refurbished.
title: The battery that it comes with won't charge to 100%

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Miguel Marcos
content: The Introduction Video for this product is deceiving! The video recording is good, the sound could be better. There is about a 20-30 second delay on the notification that motion has been detected or that someone has rung the doorbell. By the time you respond the person is no longer there! Plus the App freezes a lot!  If you want recordings of what happens near your door, then this product is fine, If you are looking for this device to function as the video suggests then don't waste your money!  The communication between the Doorbell and your cell phone takes too long!
title: The App needs lots of work! Not for true security!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kj
content: This worked well for a short while, then it stopped sending notifications to my echo.  Had to completely redo the alexa linking and it seemed to work a while before I had to do it all again.
title: Glitchy product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: al
content: Motion sensor need improvement, very slow detection, mostly only pick up at the end of the motion, unless the intruder acting slowly. Night viewing acceptable .Motion alert has 3-5 sec delay.
title: Easy to install.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dan Cooksey
content: I have been very happy with my Ring Video Doorbell 2.  I have a strong wifi signal and that helps as the signal has to go through a wall and the outside door.  Very happy so far with the performance.
title: Works for Me

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chris smith
content: I am very impressed with ring products I bought 4 competing products and returned them befor i found ring I have the doorbell 2, the floodlight with motion detection, the chime and the internet . It works every time The videos are crystal clear , and would allow the police to identify a criminal, should one ever show up on my doorstep.
title: Five Stars

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kevin and Allanna.
content: Works great. Money well spent considering how much stuff we buy off of amazon. Lol. The battery life is excellent Incase you were wondering. We’ve been using it for over a week in near freezing temps and still have 93% battery left. Will most likely only need to be charged every month or so.
title: Money well spent!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ryan Trudeau
content: After my old doorbell broke I heard so much about the Ring Doorbell and decided to purchase one for Black Friday. It’s a great and easy surveillance system for anyone! Everyone in my house has the app downloaded and we all watch everything crazy! After a month though you will have to pay for a membership to see any videos taken by it starting at $3 a month. The app is easy to use and setup for it is also easy. In the app you can even see nearby neighborhood crime alerts and more to be informed about any suspicious activity with the neighborhood section. By far It’s a great product!
title: Great Doorbell and Surveillance System!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joe Bullock
content: Overall very good product. However the motion detections starts recording a few seconds after something’s been spotted. It also just stop recording the motion even when they are still out there.
title: Good but motion detection isn’t that great it’s slow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D. Horton
content: It is very limited with Google Home. It is so frustrating, if I had known that ahead of time I would have purchased the Nest doorbell. It pays to do your research before you purchase
title: Works great, but, not for Google Home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Debbie Neff
content: this has be fun to have however it takes about 30 seconds to say someone it there, and lots of time it does not work. I have a handicapped son that gets picked up and dropped off and so many times it does not let me know he is back home.
title: frustrated

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sriojas84
content: Very good picture and sound.  The installation was pretty easy. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the drill bit that was included.  I was mounting the camera on brick and a drill bit was provided however it would not work on the brick.  I had to buy a $4 masonry bit to complete installation.
title: Good camera

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: brian andel
content: 1st if you don't pay a month fee, you loose access to all history (even 3 minutes ago).  Realtime works ok (not great).  I bought this because, I don't have existing doorbell wires.  I refuse to pay monthly for anything!!  It wont hook up to Ispy software for you to monitor yourself (at least I haven't figured it out....yet).  Ill get something else that I can record to dvr.  If you want it, Ill give this pos to you.  Send me a shipper.  And the ir has never worked, rebooted several times, no help.  Junk!!!!
title: junk

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Theron Taylor
content: Without a subscription it appears you can only view live video and without a subscription you cant save to a local drive.
title: Basically useless without subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: George P Kolb
content: I was impressed on how this product was packaged, the instructions provided and the tools supplied for installation.  Written instructions were very clear and concise and if followed will provide success.  The tools provided were a drill bit sized for the anchors supplied for installing in stucco or concrete.  Also, a special bit was supplied to install and tighten the cover to the doorbell body achieving a tamper proof set up.  Performance is very good and you will have to adjust the motion detection to suit your needs and willingness to accept notifications-sometimes for legitimate people, dogs, etc approaching your doorbell, sometimes for loud garbage truck driving by.  You can also identify the area in front of your doorbell you want included in the motion detection.  Why not 5 stars?  Twice so far I have had to reset the device because it was not responding-not sending a notification of motion detection.  This was not one event but several approaches over a couple of hours with no notifications.  Both times the device reset promptly.  I’m not sure if it was an Internet/ WiFi modem problem or the ring device.  So far since reset #2, no problems.  As the weeks tick by with no issues I will revisit this review and adjust accordingly.
title: Great security for the front of your house.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M. Norris
content: I Like the ability to keep an eye on my front door. Great Idea! Absolutely hate that Ring wants me to pay $10 or more dollars per month to see the action at my door. I get immediate notification of motion but when I open the video the first seconds of action are not recorded. I see the car driving off- whatever. After the trial the recordings are not saved so the action is lost. When I purchased I did not know I would have to pay to see the video recordings! If you are bothered by paying for things you have already purchased I would suggest living without this device.
title: Monthly service plan SURPRISE!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eric Harmer
content: We ran into some network issues setting it up but support was able to help us fix them and no longer having problems.
title: Great easy to use device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ryan Geraghty
content: It's been great so far. I've been able to keep track of deliveries and door access, even catching a delivery "attempt" that helped us argue with the delivery service. My one complaint is I didn't realize setting it up with the Battery Pack instead of external power will cause a ~3 second delay between motion detection and filming. This results in some videos showing just the sound of someone walking away or nothing at all. I put the blame on myself for not researching this further, and it's not even that big of a deal, just wish I'd realized it sooner.
title: Great experience, just a slight delayed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: G. BROWN
content: Up graded from ring 1 which work good put it on my back door
title: Good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chelsea R
content: I love everything about it except for the fact that it requires a subscription after the 1st 30 days in order for you to have the ability to record whatever triggers the sensor. Other than that it’s a great doorbell camera and it works well with our Alexa products.
title: Good quality product, easy to install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eric Lovelis
content: Someone is at and through my door before I get a notification. E-mailed tech support, tried several things. It just doesn't repond quick enough. I might try the 5g model they have but not sure....
title: The Ring app sucks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: april c
content: Great video quality and notifications. It is a bit slow to load to answer a motion or ring. When I receive a motion alert, by the time it loads to live view, the person is usually gone so then I have to go to my history to view what happened.
title: Great product for neighborhood watch

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ann Conklin
content: The Ring 2 tends to lock up when motion is identified.  A person can get on and off the porch and to their car before the picture is captured.  Seems to have a delayed start once the motion is identified and in a few seconds, the person is gone.  If the person lingers, then they are captured.  Love the notification of movement that hits my phone.  Wish I could see who was setting off the motion.  The video runs for 30 seconds and is blank.
title: Loves the notification of arrival but Locks up on the picture taking.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lewis
content: Really easy to install and to keep track of what is going on. Was even able to report problems with trash pickup that has been going on for about a year with video.  Which you could pull the sensor even closer to the house. Still picks up cars in the street.
title: Works as advertised.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Teknurd
content: This doorbell, in spite of all the tweaks and setting I've tried, still picks up motion from the street. When cars and trucks go by, it senses motion. Kinda defeats the purpose of motion detection if the alerts are all false alarms. Overall, my opinion of the Ring doorbell is: MEH.
title: Motion detection will alert for every car going by regardless of your settings.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Danny
content: Got this for my in-laws and they absolutely love it!! We were skeptical at first putting it on the adjacent wall to the door, but the wide range on the camera equipped with the extra angled base made our worries disappear. We could see the door, and the outside from where it was mounted. Installation and setup was a breeze. Also great to get notifications from the neighborhood to see what's going on at other people's homes.
title: In-laws love it!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Janine K.
content: Motion detection is awful, only picks up motion as people are already walking away . Weak Wifi signal, only works on 2.4 ghz instead of 5 so there is huge delay when you try to answer a ring. Night Vision, absolutely useless faces are blurry white, you would never recognize the person if you ever had to use this. The thing is useless without the subscription as well.
title: Considering returning

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Greg H.
content: Its like being home all the time. Less worry about packages or mail being tampered with, not that it's a huge issue. Gives everyone in the house a peace of mind though. Great quality video, day or night. Slight delay on the video response, but im guessing it's just my wifi. The community share feature is cool to see if anything is happening in your area! Would definitely recommend for any household!
title: Perfect gift for the home.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: khreuzer
content: I bought this one before I purchased the ring pro. One month later I found this battery powered ring is more reliable than the pro at times. I think the main reason is the pro shots at higher resolution and requires more bandwidth and power to activate and connect. I found both have good video quality and the batter for doorbell 2 is as good as advertised. I can see it last minimum 6 month no problem. If your home is not equipped with powerful router I’d suggest you don’t bother with such device. Without solid WiFi signals these doorbells have no use. Overall ring doorbell2 is great, very easy to set up and the monthly $3 storage price is the lowest among competitors.
title: Works great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Corrine Stamm
content: Not sure yet... it's a Christmas Gift... And... ............ ......Epstein didn't Hang himself......
title: It a Christmas Gift

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dora Politidis
content: If I known that you need to pay for storage for the events ….no way I would have purchased it …..to lazy to take it down from the wall to send it back. Is not the $30 a year that they want for the simple plan but another bill are you freaking joking. The actual bell not bad , I was thinking of getting the camera system but paying for each device storage ….NO WAY.
title: You need to pay for storage?????

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: G. Meyer
content: I was pleasantly surprised at how fast and easy installation and setup were.  I’m really blown away by the quality of the video. Very sharp images, and the camera lens is very wide angle.  We are very happy with our purchase, and I’d recommend Ring Video Doorbell 2!
title: Easy to install, easy to set up, easy to use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LV
content: I had to use insulation tape instead of the plastic connectors that come with the package, since the wires inside the old door bell was short. Because if I use those plastic caps,  it will not be compact to screw the ring unit to the wall. I love the fact that you can actually adjust the motion detection and it only detects in the perimeter  that you choose.
title: Can see who is at my  door when I am not home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jake Thomas
content: This product worked great for 16 months and suddenly stopped working. I really enjoyed the service and features of this ring doorbell. Unfortunately, the warranty is only covered for 12 months. The device would no longer power up although it had an excellent wired connection and a fully charged battery. Customer service offered me $100 off my next ring doorbell. In my opinion, this product should be covered for an extended duration under warranty. I have heard many users with similar issues. Please extend the manufacturer warranty for defective devices.
title: Does not last after warranty period is over, please fix

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DD
content: We just installed our Ring Doorbell 2. Installation was a bit involved but my handyman hubby was able to install and it is working great. Still finalizing the settings that will work best for us. Love the neighborhood alerts.
title: Ring Doorbell 2 is working great.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: WRWard
content: Overall like the device. Disappointed that it is virtually useless without an ongoing subscription And even though I turn off monitoring it still goes off when I leave for work at 5am waking the wife when she needs to be sleeping
title: Not exactly what we were expecting

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MG
content: Update: Finally!!! Following 3 ring app "reinstalls" and phone restarts, removing the device and checking it inside, I think I may have a working doorbell and motion camera!! (Original review) After reconfiguring the settings dozens of times, re mounting the device, and spending over 30 minutes on the phone with tech support, I still have a ring device that does not detect motion or send me alerts. It will not pick up motion when standing in front of it, but it is capable of picking up EVERY car that goes by. Junk
title: Junk

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: bschilz
content: I really like it, but the big drawback for me is that once I'm notified of a visitor, I click on the Ring app and it takes much too long to connect with the device and see the video of who is there!
title: Nice to know when someone is approaching

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: H.
content: Bought the RING 2 new 11/25/2019. Installed a month later. Lasted only two months and started to do false alarms every half hour with no video recored. Called RING and was told they will send me a brand new replacement. Arrived today it was refurnished. So I effectively paid a new price but get a refurbished unit. Will see how long this one last.
title: Worked for only TWO months

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Curt P.
content: Like this door bell, but it takes so long to connect to your phone, that by the time the picture finally appears, anyone at the door has long since gone. It talks about that in the instructions and blames your internet WiFi. We have AT&T so I'm sure that is where our problem is.  Anyone interested in this, should be prepared to either send it back if it isn't fast enough, or change internet providers. Love the idea, but it is useless if it takes 2 minutes to connect.
title: serious lag time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Drknght
content: Video doorbell 2 is a great addition to my Ring security system. Alexa integration is easy and amazing. Created a routine and everything with the doorbell and my lights and all... couldn’t be happier
title: Awesome!!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rann
content: This product has been extremely disappointing.  WISH I could send it back.  Spending hours to try to get it to stay hooked to router.  Been out of service more than in service.  Don't waste your money.
title: NOT HAPPY! It keeps disconnecting .

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Manuela Shannon
content: Enclosed screws are cheap and worthless and 4 heads broke off just as we finally put them in. Had to try twice and reposition. Used my original Ring Doorbell screws. Buy your own quality installation screws for mounting.
title: Cheap screws. 4 screw heads broke off.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brian Chalker
content: Takes a long time to sense motion. Sometimes doesn't catch- it at all. Set up was a pain. The battery gage/meter does not work. If I'd paid full price outside of black Friday, I'd be disappointed with this one.
title: Fair

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CRISTY
content: What is with the lag in motion pic?? I get a notification that there's motion click immediately & it shows a live view BUT I cant see what caused the original motion until about 30 seconds I have to close and reopen. It also is inconsistent on motion every 5th pass with my suv gets picked up on the driveway (I drive the same place each time)
title: Ok but not as good as expected and pricey!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AA
content: Excellent product and works above my expectation. One minor suggestion, I wish the screws were little higher quality, the one provided broke by just using my drill even though I was mounting it on a siding
title: Great product and a must have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: patrick Craig
content: having a little problems occasionally with WIFI, but otherwise, its awsome! the  problem I have (not a problem) is dialing it so it's not getting cars passing, otherwise, only thing I can say is GET ONE and buy several more cameras to add to the overall
title: very happy, will add more cameras soon

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: nezbir troffol
content: don't really appreciate the integration with corrupt and abusive American police departments, but beyond that it's useful ...... be nice if it was more hi-def so i could see people clearly 3 blocks down the roads
title: don't appreciate the police integration

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tim R.
content: The idea is great, however the camera is delayed picking up people coming to your door and even though my sensor is set to like 20 feet, they are practically at my door by the time it picks them up, then the feed is not even continuous, it is glitchy.  It should be able to provide a continuous feed from initial pickup until after they leave.  Good thing I got this on Black Friday.  I'm sure there are better options out there.
title: Highly overrated!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kazap
content: I have no experience using this as it was a gift to my daughter. Luckily I bought the version that required no previously installed wiring. Something you must think about when buying.
title: Battery version

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: 1shot
content: I've given the device 7 months of updates and patience, and Live View is still completely worthless.  The load time is sporadic.  Rarely does it load quickly, especially when motion is detected.  So, if you're hoping to see who is at the door within a few seconds, don't count on it with this device.  Has nothing to do with signal strength or bandwidth, either.
title: Live View is completely unreliable

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Calvin Cheung
content: Great security product purchsed with the security camera. Easy install and setup within 15 minutes. Great features
title: Easy and Secure.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Anna
content: I am disappointed with this because of the delay of the announcement that someone is at my door, and even sometimes it doesn’t record at all.  Even as I sit here typing this review I just had an amazon delivery and it did not even pick up the motion. Not sure I would recommend.
title: Not sure I would recommend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sweetums2015
content: Purchased one from Costco and installed it.  Returned it after it kept having loud static noises throughout recordings.  Returned it.  Purchased one from Amazon, which does the same thing.  Had a first generation ring doorbell installed at the same location which did not have the same problem.
title: Loud static noise

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paisis
content: Ring includes everything you need to put this in any door. I have the Elite in the front door and have this one in the side door. Easy connectivity and you get to see everyone or anything coming from the site of the house. The only problem I have the motion sensor is very sensitive so it will send you notification for anything if you don't adjusted for your needs.
title: Works as advertise

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Hollie Garner
content: We love our ring. We bought a second battery so we could change out quickly when the other one gets low. It takes several hours to charge the battery so we just avoided that aggravation based on other reviews.
title: Love it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stacey Hengy
content: I let my wife order this thinking that it was a waste of time.  After installation and 4 months of use I and very impressed with the quality of the video and the product.  The battery lasted just over 8 weeks on the first charge.  It was easy to install and setup.  It is great be able to see when anyone enters our driveway or when we're have packages delivered.  Once again my wife was right.
title: So glade were bought this.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tina E Campbell
content: I have it set to detect when someone approaching the house gets within 10 feet of the house n it picks up cars moving in the street 30 feet away. To change to not pick up the street, it won't pick up anything. It's less than a year old already having technical issues, screen went green. Ring said it was an internet signal problem, internet provider came out checked signal is fine.  Ring's next statement was "sorry we let you down". Really it would work consistently for more than a year for this price plus the $30 subscription.
title: Not impressed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ReneeJones
content: We love ring products. They keep the neighborhood safe. Ours has been great the only issue is the WiFi but that’s our WiFi’s fault not the rings. Their products last and are so affordable compared to other camera systems.
title: Yes to the rings

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kim P
content: The Ring doorbell works fine, but the lag time is very disappointing. People are already walking in my door before the alert sounds. It takes approximately 8 seconds to turn on the live view, which is longer than you think. I was looking for a faster alert time. I kept hoping I would like it and missed the window to return.  It’s a decent product, but I wish I had returned it and tried another product.
title: Slow lag time—disappointing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Colby Lankford
content: Worked well when the battery wasn’t dead. Over the course of the last 10 months I’ve charged the ring replaceable battery three times. Now it won’t keep a charge. Should’ve got the wired Ring.
title: Battery sucks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CM
content: I bought the Ring Video 2 doorbell in a bundle with the Schlage Encode lock. Ring is the leader in video doorbells for a reason. It was easy to install, has a wide range of vision, and customizable alert settings. I used the included optional wedge to point the camera towards the porch stairs, and connected it to my existing doorbell wiring. Life changing technology!
title: Best doorbell on the market!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tony B.
content: So slow as to be useless. I generally can see the back of someone about 5 minutes after the doorbell rings. Never see a face. Have never had it operate quickly enough to converse with someone. Also, it seems Amazon is collecting all data, so there’s that... I’ve added a screenshot of the utter uselessness of the device.
title: Waste of money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: rhino
content: The application / software is really slow to connect, mine is mounted about 20’ from my cable modem and router and I bought the Ring remote booster / door bell too and you can never hear it.  The subscription fees are rediculas too for saved video, I will be switching to A blink system like I had at my previous home.
title: Expensive, big and clunky.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Angela Lingo
content: I was very impressed with how complete the Ring 2 was in terms of DIY installation.  The box included everything you could possibly need including a drill bit for stucco/brick.  I had the doorbell up and configured in about 30 minutes.  The Ring itself works great.  The video is nice and clear; the motion sensing settings offer every sort of option you could need - snooze alerts, turn them off completely during certain hours, etc.  I liked the product so much I ordered a stick up cam for our back patio.
title: The Ring itself works great. The video is nice and clear

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mary Weber
content: Clear picture. Great battery life. Easy installation and setup. Thumbs up all around. Recently had a relative house/dog sit for a few days and it was nice being notified that they were there and were able to confirm that they were able to get into the house. I Also like the community updates and notifications you receive when people report suspicious behavior. Makes you feel like you’re more aware of your surroundings
title: Would buy again

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dmbshamr
content: The signal is sometimes slow to load or will not send a notification at all. Most of the time the doorbell has been accurate and reliable. It is great to know it’s only a salesperson at the door.
title: Reliability

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ralph
content: The most useful feature is the motion detection aspect.  It can alert you if there is someone approaching the unit.  However, it is not a replacement security device for your home.  For that you need additional devices to secure your castle
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Barbara J. Martinez
content: We replaced an older model, this one is so much better.
title: Works great, easy installed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Linda A
content: We bought a house but could not move in for some months...this Ring was a life saver on keeping an eye on who ever cam to the door.  Also to see those people hired to do things and make sure the actually came.  Picture quality is good but not great, maybe RingDoorbell 3 will have better video.
title: Love it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: EX Ford Guy
content: Gives false alerts every time there is a moderate breeze. Changing settings don't help much. This is a pain in the neck.I wish I had bought the competitor product instead. The door bell function does not give enough time to answer the bell. When you do get it in time, the audio is not very good.
title: Terrible false motions alerts

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jason Fike
content: We love this product.  We added flood lights to cover the perimeter as well.  It provides a considerable level of security.  We have amble warning when anyone/anything is approaching from any direction.  Additionally, we have had no stolen packages since this was installed.
title: Game Changer!  Great Product!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Torres
content: This product works very well. I had to purchase a WiFi extender because the signal was weak outside of the house but it’s working fine now. The only issue is that sometimes the video does not show up properly. The installation was simple, I have stucco and had to drill holes on the wall. However, the instructions were very clear. I was able to wire it to the existing doorbell setup with no problem.
title: Good most of the time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: A.K.
content: Very difficult to answer door bell via Ring. Slow and cumbersome. Delays accessing video from motion detector
title: Great concept; however needs improvement in key areas as described in my review

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sean S
content: I got 2 of these. The one for the home worked great no problems at all. However the one I got for the office was defective (wifi didn't work), then the replacement the speaker (where you can talk to someone) was not working correctly, could barely hear anything. Seems that they have some quality control problems as 2 out of 3 of my devices were defective.
title: 2 of 3 ordered were defective.. Quality control issues but LOVE it. If they worked.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David L. Dietze
content: I'v had this for 3 months and its been working fine so far.  Its wired into the doorbell so the battery stays charged.  There is a delay from the notification to the time I can actually see the video, so when someone rings the doorbell, they have left before I can talk to them.  No big deal for me.  the video is very clear and the service is inexpensive if you want your videos saved to the cloud.  (yea you have to pay for the service, just like everything else) i like it
title: its pretty cool

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Vince F.
content: I have never had home security until now. Ring is easy to install and I find it to be a reliable product. The battery life, depending on the motion activity, is about 3 weeks. Great product I have the doorbell and a regular camera. Very reliable.
title: What Home Security should be.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Erin
content: I love having a camera outside. Con is that it has a bit of a delay in starting to record. All other users I’ve talked to say the same. But all in all I’m super glad we’ve got it now just in case anything happens.
title: Very glad to have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Minerx
content: I followed the instructions. I tested the unit while inside the house. When I placed it outdoors (while trying to find the best place to get what we wanted captured) it would no longer work. It never occurred to me that the aluminum siding on our house would interfere with the wi-fi signal. I know when I sit out on the deck, none of my iDevices can get the wi-fi signal, I have to use cell signal. I should have put two and two together. I did try using the chime with range extender, but that did not help any. I give it four stars based upon the quality of the video when I was testing indoors. I am not able to return the device as the box has been opened. The seller kindly agreed to refund some of the money. I am probably going to give this to my mom for her house.
title: When I placed it outdoors (while trying to find the best place to get what we wanted captured) it would ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristopher Allen
content: What a great device. Always on, always works and has never let me down. This was worth every penny.  Clear video and works great with app.
title: Love my ring doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diane L. Bowman
content: Like this product so much, wish I had purchased 2 now when it was on sale for Christmas.  So easy to swap out the battery when it needs changing which was 5 weeks later for me.  Such a clear viewing too for both day and night times!
title: Crisp clean and clear view recordings

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C. Murschell
content: Well built product and easy to install. Caution must be used if installing on a door and behind a storm door as motion is detected by a humans body heat which doesn't penetrate glass.
title: Will not detect motion through glass.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jessica Tritt
content: Battery dies fast if you have it on large range. Also be prepared to pay for the monthly recording storage only way its worth it to me! (it is nice to see whats going on at home when you are away)
title: Works good!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: lostdutchman
content: Have been wanting to try the Ring Doorbell unit for quite a while. Due to defective house wiring, this wireless Ring 2 Video Doorbell fit the bill! Fast shipping as usual from Amazon. Product extremely well made. Very easy to follow, concise Instructions. Comes with all mounting Hardware --- including a Screwdriver ! ! Been desiring additional security with a high quality video/ motion detector doorbell that can be wireless ? ? wait no longer !
title: Superior quality, easy to install !

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Erik
content: Don’t buy a Ring! After the trial is over and you can’t even see what happened at your door unless the person is still standing there. What it sounds like is that you can’t go back and see archived videos. But what is actually happening is you can’t even see the current 30 seconds before the ring was pushed  unless you get on the monthly fee forever. Very disappointed.
title: Don’t buy Ring!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CATHY G. GARY
content: Love the notifications and real time videos.  Highly recommend for anyone.  Mine is battery operated and only needs charging about every 45 days or so.  Ordered second chime to hear doorbell in bedroom at night.  Really like being able to see activity from anywhere when away from home.
title: Works great!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joseph Solarino
content: Got this yesterday on the 12th. and 95% of the time in live view I get nothing but a black screen. My reception says good. Why is this happening. It is definitely not worth the price. If this issue doesn't get fixed I will return. Also I get no sound notification on my phone. WTH!
title: Black screen and no notification sound

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kyle C Sampson
content: The Ring Video Doorbell 2 seems to have better video quality than the original. If you had an original, this comes with a handy mount that makes it so you can swap the old one out and use this one. The battery life is AMAZING!  I can easily go 2 months between charges.
title: Nice improvements over the original.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: IJ
content: When I received the doorbell first thing I did was let the battery charge overnight! The next morning I installed the doorbell and it worked great for 4 hours. I noticed that the live video would not connect so I moved my router closer still it would not connect. I decided to ring the doorbell and to my surprise it did not did anything. Would not light up or reset. I called Ring customer service and they told me to charge the battery 8 more hours. Well I plugged in the battery and two hours later there was the green light indicating it was fully charged. So inserted it again and the doorbell still wouldn’t power on. Will be returning the product.
title: Won’t power on

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: charlie
content: Not terrible, too bad live playback isnt quick and sometimes video playback isnt available. tough to be perfect i guess still a nice unit
title: its an alright product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Yrelle Krypton
content: Cannot answer the doorbell from Alexa Dot and/or Alexa Echo devices. This is not a supported skill for some reason.  It will only do that with Alexa Spot and Alexa Show.  Considering that I have four of the former and none of the latter devices, it is a big disappointment.
title: Doesn't work with all Alexa devices for two way communication

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: James F.
content: Can see everything going on in the line of sight around it. And can hear audio.  Comes up on my phone as a notification when motion detection is sensed.  Also Compatible with alexa.
title: Awesome got 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Telsa
content: This is a great product however my only issue is that doesn’t really have a strong connectivity to our Internet causing a lapse of recording other than that we really enjoy it.
title: Secure

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cassandratrott
content: The sounds is terrible and it's so low you cant hear when people are talking  nor can they hear me good either. Night vision is horrible cant see only dots.  I am very mad with this product
title: Its good but sound and the night vision

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: D. Richardson
content: I live on a busy street so even after adjusting the motion options, it still goes off every 3 mins. But when someone comes onto my property, it doesnt record. Very random on what it wants to do.
title: Eh

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: juan c.
content: Wish ut would automattically appear on my echo show
title: Needs integration work

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: C-RAD
content: Install wasn’t easy as written, but once installed, it works well. It’s very sensitive to any movement and can ring your phone unless you modify it. Very good item to have and glad we bought it.
title: Ring your way to Safety

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Douglas Tuttle
content: Installed very easily and was up and running fast. Great quality video and a very wide angle view. I’ve had mine installed for 2 months and have had no issues with it. I love that it tells me immediately when there is motion or the door bell is pressed, and it records every event in case I miss it.
title: Great video and easy to install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SuperX
content: I didn't want to pay monthly for ADT/security provider or go through the hassle of wiring up other "wireless" cameras but this for the bill! Absolutely no wires needed and can be powered from solar to avoid the occasional battery charge!!! Yes please!!!
title: Easy security that works!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Juan
content: I waited too long to get this product. I monitored pricing for over a year and finally went for it during Black Friday. Installation was a breeze and overall we have nothing but good things to say about it. Video quality is really good and motion detection is a great feature. Best product out there for your doorbell.
title: Love our ring doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jonathan A. Sorrell
content: If I could give this a ZERO I would.  Even after adding a power supply the batter (and I have two) die after a couple days.  I wish I had never bought this!  Past return period.
title: Waste!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: liz p
content: love having the ability to watch my door...the ring is super easy to use although i paid to have it professionally installed...not going to pay the monitoring service..but may add some cameras later...very happy
title: Great security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dominick
content: I love my ring doorbell. I have had no trouble with it at all. The install videos are great and the product works great. I have mine hard wire and live view it all the time. The video quality is awesome and I would recommend product to anyone. I just wish price was lower but it's still a great product.  I like it better then other cameras I have tried.
title: Awesome product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amazon Reader
content: We love this and especially the amount of security it gives.  We purchased one for my parents as well for Christmas.  We plan to buy the motion floodlights next.  There is a slight delay before it will show up on app- this may possibly be due to our WiFi being weak outside.
title: Love our new video doorbell!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jennifer Mercoleza
content: Excellent product for the elderly!  Bought and installed for elderly, but tech comfortable parents. Helps them feel more secure when answering their door. Easy to install and use.
title: Excellent product for the elderly!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mel K
content: We love our ring doorbells. We have a version 1 and 2 now. This works great, don’t see much of a difference between 1 and 2, except that you can change the color of the face plate. The video quality is a little better, but still pretty much the same. They both work great for us.
title: Another great Ring item

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dan C.
content: And it works great. The replacement of the battery is great. Have the first version of the ring and it was a pain to have to remove it from the mount to recharge the battery. I use it wirelessly as you can tell. Having a spare battery to have ready to replace the one in the unit is a must for easy swapping of the battery.
title: This is a replacement

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brad C.
content: Super easy to setup with very clear directions and an easy user interface. Ongoing camera use is great as well. The app and functionality of the camera are easy to use and not wanting for anything. I have other cameras that weren’t too bad, but this is far superior. A week after installing the first camera I got a second for the back door because it is so good.
title: Great product for both functionality and setup, they thought of everything.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: L. Davis
content: Had my ring doorbell installed 3 weeks ago.  It has a great picture and is very reliable.  I get a ring on my phone and a voice tells me if there is motion or if someone is at my door.  My WiFi is a little too slow for my taste.
title: Love my Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ty
content: Dosnt record the whole thing. Wish it recorded what I really wanted or just recorded the whole time and deletes if not saved
title: Always messes up when I need it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: anonymous2
content: Can't turn off recording when your working in the garden, can only turn off alarms. Can't turn off period. But still a great camera and security device. Way too expensive. Bought it on the Amazon Prime Days discount.
title: Works great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Douglas L.
content: I really enjoy the coverage this Ring doorbell provides. Even while at work, I get a motion alarm signal when someone triggers the Front Porch / Main Door. I like to see what’s going on or even listen.
title: Peace of mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: W CLAY JOHNSTON
content: It works as promised, but when I receive a notice of someone ringing the bell, the app takes so long to show the display that more often than not, the visitor has already departed.  Also, not a fan of having my camera's private footage shared with law enforcement without my consent.
title: App is very slow, makes this less useful.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John E. Heidenreich
content: I purchased this as a replacement to a Ring version 1 doorbell. Installation was very easy. My only surprises were the relatively short battery life (on the order of a month), and the motion sensor can be too sensitive at times.  I would suggest a second battery that you keep charged so that you don't have to be offline while recharging.
title: Easy to use and does a solid job

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Thomas F.
content: I was hesitant when ordering this because of all the negative reviews about it, but I took a chance and I’m extremely glad I did! The picture quality is great for day and night! Extremely easy to set up, both manually and on my phone. Highly highly recommend!
title: Try it yourself

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pure Energy
content: I get more alerts for passing traffic, even after adjusting the settings, than I do with actual people at the door. The camera never catches the mailman for some reason.
title: Detects cars But not people

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lisa C.
content: My doorbell wiring was toast, and getting a battery operated doorbell seemed like the laziest option. Install was easy. As a bonus, the neighbourhood notifications have been great. Mostly people posting about dogs they’ve found wandering around (high reunion rates).
title: Introvert’s friend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: LP
content: Worked well until I noticed it was only detecting up to 8’. Good pictures and sound, but useless for motion detection.  Customer service stated a tree 8’ out my door causes an uncorrectable condition. Returned
title: Must have a totally clear view up to 100’

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ana m
content: As you probably heard the life of the battery sucks only last 5 days before having to recharge again! And when you get a notification that there is motion on your door it take a couple seconds to load and view on your phone.
title: Not happy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kathryn M. Andress
content: This is the best thing ever!  I get to see when my daughter gets home and when she leaves in the morning.  I got to see when packages were delivered in the months before Christmas, and I would call my neighbor to put them in my house while I was at work. I had to work Halloween until 8 PM and I got to see the trick or treaters that came to my door.  When it alerts me first thing in the morning, I know my paper has just arrived. And I recently saw a video of deer at 3 AM crossing my yard.  LOVE IT!
title: This is the best thing ever

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K. Jordan
content: RING is awesome! We love our RING doorbell and just added a second one to our home! It has been amazing. We love it soo much that we can’t stop talking about it. We know at least 4 people that have purchased a RING doorbell based on our review of the product. I will be purchasing more products from RING in the near future. Thank you RING for an amazing cost efficient product that helps keep my family safe.
title: Amazed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nicholas
content: No way I would trust this company with ANY of my personal information.  I sent back the product and it has taken them three attempts to refund my money (still havent done it).  The incompetence is so widespread that I have talked to no less than 5 people none of whom have a clue how to issue a simple refund.  Not to mention that the product looked cheap and I didnt want it on my house to begin with.  Hopefully this fad goes the way of the pet rock and goes away.
title: Worst customer service of all time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Need4speed
content: The ring video doorbell was easy to install, it connected to my WiFi easy. The app was also easy. The motion sensor very well. The view is very clear even at night. I can speak to anyone at the door whether I’m home or not.
title: Front Door Security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Antonio O.
content: Not happy...very unstable, and my router is 10 feet from the doorbell... sometimes I get notification, sometimes I dont .Even though its hard wired it wont work without the battery....Trying to get hold ofcustomer support is like trying to talk to someone in the IRS....been on hold for 1/2 hour ... Update Customer service reached out to me and made things right.
title: Not happy..

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alex Martin

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Wilfred
content: As much as I enjoyed the Ring Doorbell I feel like it's usefulness ends after their free 30 day trial of their services. It's about $3/mo which isn't bad but without it, the entire $200 investment isn't worth the money. Here's why. 30 Day Trial/30 Day Return Window Ring was smart to offer a 30 day trial for their services because it forces customers to try their products until the return window closes. After the 30 days, the Ring Doorbell is only available in LIVE VIEW mode. This means that if you have spoty wifi at home or if your phone's data plan wasn't strong enough to load the Live Video during a live incident, then you wouldn't be able to view it again. My phone's data is a bit spotty so sometimes when I attempt to view the live incident, it just shows a blank screen. If I back out of it and try to view it again, it says I can't because it's no longer a live event. Basically, if someone walks up to your door and picks up your packages and leave, you better hope you're not in a meeting or driving so you can view the incident live. If you miss it, it's gone.
title: Basically useless after 30 days unless paying for services

We will see if we get a replacement and how the replacement works.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RICK
content: Everything is great about the ring 2 minus the fact that you have to pay a monthly subscription to keep it going. Doesn’t even save for 24 hours( that’s the least they could have done considering its 200 dollars for the doorbell) doesn’t even save for an hour, really? I may as well stay with my arlo camera system that is up to 5 cameras with a cloud that saves them for a week withought any subscription at all. Very disappointed I think I may even return for a refund.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sherrie spaulding

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Huber
content: My old house had no existing doorbell so I wasn’t sure how well this would work. Installed it quickly and had it working in minutes. The supplied battery is pretty big and runs the camera longer than I was expecting. After a few days battery was at 85%. Since I have no existing wiring, it won’t charge from a doorbell transformer, so I looked into getting a spare battery pack. On rings website I discovered a solar mounting plate that doesn’t seem to be available on Amazon. Now it can keep itself charging whenever the sun is out. Wish I discovered this sooner!
title: Works great with the solar option!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Katie
content: The product was easily installed, and I did it in the dark! It has been very easy to monitor myself, and set up another person on my account (my boyfriend) so that he can track the videos as well when I'm at work. It has given me piece of mind. Only reason I have 4 stars for night vision is because I have always my outside light on and I've not had any visitors in the evening without it so I'm not sure.
title: Piece of mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Vanessa DL
content: Great product. Only thing we didnt know was that we need a membership to be able to see the things we had in mind. In our mind we pay the price of the product and get that with it. It is not too expensive but it should not have a maintenance fee in our opinion.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeff S
