product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J.O.SWAFFORD

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: heather daigle
content: I purchased this item in December 2018. February 6 it stopped working. The battery fully charged but the bell itself kept saying it was only 3% and would not work. After calling Amazon and sitting on hold for 17 minutes I was told to just uninstall it and send it back for a refund. I don’t want to go through all that work. I just want a replacement. According to Amazon they can’t do that.
title: Stopped working

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Erica
content: It's a bit early for me to give an overall review since I have only had ring for a week.  Pluses- I feel safe at night!! My kids can see who is at the door without ever opening the door or asking who is at the door. Minuses the batter goes fast if you have motion sensors activated. I installed mine with 69% and one week later was 40%. Also even on the least sensitive sitting, the motion picks up cars that drive by (out of the zone selected) and even our house flag will set it off.....which drains the battery.  But overall I think it is an amazing product and would recommend.
title: But overall I think it is an amazing product and would recommend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

content: I love the Door Ring. It is so convenient and accessible. The only little issue is the battery life. But besides this very good product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

Bought a super cheap wifi access point ($19 TP-Link) for the ring doorbell (placed it right beside the Orbi mesh wifi system) and the Ring 2 now works well.  There is some kind of incompatibility that neither company can explain or fix.  Every other wifi device I have (and I have many) works well with the Orbi wifi system
title: Wouldn't work with Orbi Mesh wifi

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

I am just over all extremely disappointed, if I could get my money back I would

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

Not sure if this is only an issue with a Samsung phone or not but definitely something to check.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Don B.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rory A. Groessl

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

author: Kimberly Carter
content: Husband installed the doorbell without any mechanical problems. The setup went well until we tried to initiate the motion sensor. I received a low warning 5ft away from my router during setup. It went away as I got a little bit further away.Would love to use the motion sensor (the number one reason it was bought). Also I am now getting a lag from the time the doorbell rings to the time it shows up on my phone. The longest lag was 5 minutes. Not good.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Scott W

This is a huge miss.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: UKMerlin

I am progressively under whelmed by this service.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeremy Yoemans

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Studamire23

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

content: I also own first generation and its battery lasts at least 2-3 weeks. But this one "exceeded" my expectations. After 5 days, battery is dead and needs a recharge, which by the way takes about 5-6 hours...
title: Battery lasts 5 days...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MP
content: My house was vandalized and nothing was caught on video, although it does record every car passing on the street simply cannot be trusted to record human figures. On the off chance it does record people it's often while they are walking away capturing only the back of their heads. This is a huge failure.
title: It fails to record people on the property

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mr. West
content: Absolutely incredible!!! No contract. Just plug and play.  Other Ring users near your house all share information as far as any theft or loose dogs or anything. It’s like a blog. It’s fantastic.
title: Incredible!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Janet L
content: I love this doorbell / video. I set mine up easily and also thru Alexa. I can view my front yard thru my phone, iPad, and tv. I know when packages and mail are delivered. It does take some adjusting as to not pick up many passing cars, in my case I’m only wanting to see who’s in my yard and at my door.
title: Best purchase of the year. Ring doorbell ✅

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: HBGirl
content: Garbage.  Amazon Digital sent defective device and by the time my family member was able to come and install the return window closed.  Ring customer support was not helpful either.  I hate that I wasted $125 on junk that was supposed to be brand new.
title: Defective device that was brand new and can't return 😡

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: shopper11
content: Biggest disappointment.  Ring helpsite not helpful.  Advised me to dismount doorbell and bring it to my router for a speed test  Not possible for a disabled user.  Takes too long when the bell is rung to access the camera  By the time the app opens the device,  people have already walked away Then there are the Alexa compatibility issues  Works with Echo but not with dot.
title: Ring doorbell-big disappointment

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lady Tara 8
content: This doorbell needs constant adjustments.  The app is difficult to navigate. Overall a waste of money. When the app chimes  it may be a car driving by or someone at your door. By the time you open the app the person at the door is generally gone.
title: Must be a better product out there.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Anna B.
content: It is such a relief to see who is coming and going at my house regardless of the hour. I didn’t need the chime pro. In the future however I may purchase a chime. My mesh wireless system linked up just fine and relocating a beacon gave me the signal strength I needed.
title: Love it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kay
content: I was disappointed that the motion detector and doorbell would only make audible alerts on my iPad once each time after  I reset the settings. I had to purchase the separate chime to get audio alerts.  Also disappointed to find that I have to pay for a subscription service to save any videos. I understand that storage costs, but  I expected that it would at least save to my available storage for a day or so.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: vegivamp
content: needing subscription to monthly service makes this product an enslaver to ring .. Eufy is much better as they are not as greedy and allows local recoding.
title: needing subscription to monthly service makes this product an enslaver to ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Doug V
content: Like all the options and abilities you have with this unit Tried lesser product for less but it does not give a quality coverage Ring is worth the price when on sale Normal price was not doable
title: Good quality product but over priced

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Yee
content: Amazon is ruthless. Why did Amazon kill the Ring Doorbell integration with Google Home Hub? Is it because they know their Alexa / Echo hardware products are inferior to Google's, and are hoping this would get Ring doorbell users to switch to Alex / Echo? Google Home Hub users out there, do not buy Ring products anymore!! They don't work with your existing setup.
title: Amazon killed the Google Home Hub integration

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: nutmom
content: Would have given more stars had the save video feature not cost 10 bucks a month.  The camera works well but know it works as a fish eye - where the edges are distorted for a greater viewing degree/angle.  Had the blink system first and it allows for limited save feature wich is perfect.  This purchase will affect my decision for an additional security system (yes, adversly).
title: Requires a monthly or annual fee to save videos

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nancy Walton
content: Picture quality, linked to everyone’s phone, easily recharged and adjusted. Still need a strong WiFi connection for any live or conversational use. Worth the upgrade for sure.
title: Worth the upgrade

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cynthia L. Ferrin
content: If our Internet is acting up, then Ring doesn't detect motion.  But if someone rings the doorbell, both my watch and my cellphone alert me.  Then I can choose to talk to them or not.  It's nice.
title: Better than our last system

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cassandra Mancilla
content: I’m only giving this a 2 star because I have not been able to use my doorbell cam for almost 2 weeks and I’ve only had it for close to a month. Originally it was connected and working well but then I happened to notice the health of the devise stated that the battery was low and then it lost connection. I have charged the battery and have tried to reconnect multiple times with no successful attempts of reconnecting it. :(
title: WiFi connections issues...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Akhaleet
content: It created a need for a new modem and took tree set-up before it would work -sort of.
title: It's not as easy as its advertised.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DEBORAH
content: You can't see who is at your door until they are walking away which defeats the purpose of the entire thing.  The picture should pop up on my phone immediately, AS THEY ARE WALKING UP TO THE DOOR,  so I can decide if I want to answer the door or not.  If it is someone just checking to see if anyone is home, I want to see their FACE as they walk up.  Not just the back of their head as they walk away.  Totally useless
title: Camera should come on and start recording the second someone is within 20 feet of my door, NOT as they are walking away!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RICHARD VU
content: I've just purchased the Ring Video Doorbell 2 and got it installed a 5 days ago. I had a guest stopped by my house on Saturday and of course the Bell did not work due to the battery. I then had to open it back up; recharged the battery for 4-5 hours and put it back in. I've read about the ongoing issue with the battery and I don't think it worth buying it if this issue continue happening. It is not reliable product as they claimed so I am thinking about returning it for something else.  :(
title: Battery issues

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ali Bianchini
content: We LOVE the Ring doorbell! It’s been a game changer.  My husband installed it, it looks great, and it sound/video quality is great! If I were to be really picky: Sometimes it gives an alert when a large truck goes by our street. Also, I’ve noticed that if you’re alerted of motion, it takes a few seconds longer than I would expect to let you see the history of what happened. Overall - we would definitely purchase again and highly recommend it.
title: Love this doorbell and would buy again

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Trena
content: Love my ring. I have felt much safer with it and the camera is amazing I can see all the way out to the end of the driveway which is 75 yards long amazing clarity , easy to use with my phone and Alexa show.
title: Feel so much safer

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: IAM4LSU
content: Love this thing! Video works great and so does the app! You can see who comes to your door, even when your not there and the person at the door has no idea if you are there or not! You can even talk to them at the door!
title: Great device, great price

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ronald
content: Quality of view, means all depends on amount of light available.  There is forus,but does not improve the quality of picture.  Also, noticed most deliveries, (after installing) they do not ring bell, for some reason..includes UPS, FEDEX and USPS.  would NOT recommend
title: Quality of view is not detailed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jmlanger36
content: Works great as our front door ring.  Adds a level of security when someone is at the door.  Very good field of vision and having a recording of someone if there is an issue is a bonus.
title: Perfect

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: jeanpaul
content: You have to pay a subscription to save video
title: You have to pay a subscription to save video

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brittany
content: The ring 2 is amazing, works perfect and really is very easy to install.  Battery life is really bad if you leave it on constant stream - but 30 bucks and you can get another battery and just keep swapping, since it take all of 30 seconds to swap it out.
title: Love it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jerry Jane Payne
content: My new doorbell adds another layer of safety to my home. After having had two middle of the night episodes at my house, I decided it would be wise to install a video doorbell so that in the future I would be able to see such perpetrators.
title: Another layer of safety

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: abc
content: Horrible, battery keeps draining even though it's hardwired! Ring won't fess up to the fact that it's an issue. Do not buy if u don't want to be busy changing the battery every 3days! Take a look at the ring forum and you will see how ring claims it's a cold weather issue. However ppl from south florida and texas say they have the same issue , so it cant be the weather!
title: Do not buy ! Battery will not stay charged even when hardwired!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SDaisy
content: Just what we needed!! I didn’t realize how great Ring would be until we had it. Motion detector misses at times and others notifies us when the sun goes behind a cloud. Happy with it, nonetheless!
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jonathan
content: This product seems like it will solve most security issues for most homes, but the motion detection is very fickle and only picks up motion about 20% of the time. The product also trials the cloud feature for  about a month, but after it concludes the camera is only good for when the button is pressed by someone at the door or for the live view. Otherwise this product is useless. Overall, this is not a good product nor is it reliable. Would not suggest for home security or for home safety.
title: Very disappointed...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Hailey C.
content: Motion detection stopped working after a month of installation. Had to ask for a replacement...
title: Motion detection doesn’t work

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Colitto
content: Disappointed. My ring is running strictly on battery but I’m constantly charging after 3 months of use. I was able to forgive during harsh chicago winter. Warmer weather same results.
title: Not worth it unless you have it hard weird

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alex Andrus
content: Downfall is it takes approximately 5-10 hours to fully charge the battery pack. Other than that, after the instillation and the operation of the doorbell, I love it’s features and the ability to feel secure at my home. After someone presses the doorbell button, you are alerted immediately. After your month free trial, you can select a $3/month subscription to keep all the best features!
title: Great Product!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Donna
content: Great product but motion detection needs refinement. It's hard to limit the motion detection notifications to the RIGHT amount. Mostly too many. But don't want to miss anything either. Wish there was a finer control
title: Great product BUT

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stephanie Arwine
content: I bought this to put on my Motorhome. Although the park I live in has security cameras, I wanted this as added security for my front door. Works as promised but the recording is not always good, but very clear if a police report were needed. Satisfied with purchase.
title: Works as promised

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pamela
content: Have purchased several ring doorbells and have had nothing but trouble with them. Bought this ringdoorbell2 and love it!!! Works beautifully and would purchase again if needed. Highly recommend this if you are thinking about buying a ring doorbell.
title: Efficient and reliable. Operates the way it should.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jim H
content: A great addition to the door. You can see who is at the door like a delivery person.  Live and it notifies you when you can''t answer the door.
title: Excellent picture

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mark Bowyer
content: Love this device and HATE subscription service to see video’s. What a con..... very upset as Arlo and others offer video histories (some time limited) for free.
title: Love the device and hate the subscription

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: pj23
content: I needed the extra security because someone tried getting in my house, my neighbor luckily stopped them and called police. This doorbell plus my neighbors is great comfort. Will probably purchase the chime for inside house as well so I don't have to just rely on hearing a cell phone.
title: security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Grammyteacher
content: Love my Ring doorbell, however I’m not thrilled with the notifications. By the time I open my iPhone to see who is at my door the person has already left.
title: Love my Ring door bell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Graham Curren
content: The Ring Doorbell 2 is easy to install, particularly if you don't have an existing wired system. It functions well, even in the rather dim condo hallway. It took me a little time for me to learn how to use the video and audio, but that I think just proves that men really don't read manuals well, if at all. My one criticism is that it only comes with silver and bronze face plates and our condo corp requires it to be white so I am painting the bronze one white. Hopefully it will work. Suggestion maybe offer a few different Coloured options as accessories. I would have paid for one.
title: Solid and practical device

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TechyLala
content: I like that it does notify me when there is movement in my yard and front porch, but it has a bit of a delay which is why I am not giving it a full 5 stars. Have messed with settings, but it doesn't seem to change...
title: Easy to install and use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: T. Bush
content: Not bad but not as advertised.  Tired of videos showing people already or almost out off view. Simply back recording up 10 sec from motion detection and I'd probably pick up everyone that came to the door. 6 month battery life, HAHAHA. I had to recharge mine before the 30 day trial was over and I don't live on some busy street.  Video is good though but I'm very hesitant to add any other products from this lube until improvements are made.
title: Not what I thought

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sandy Powers
content: One of the smartest investments a home owner can make. Easy to install and the peace of mind it offers is priceless!! No more worries about”Porch Pirates” or dealing with uninvited doorbell ringers! Plus...I can keep an eye on that newspaper swiping neighbor across the street!
title: SECURITY!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ania
content: Very happy with ring products, not happy with delievry... amazon had guaranteed delivery for Christmas, it was a gift and came today. Very not happy about it.
title: Ring great, delivery not.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Serenity Now
content: Dropped it once.  Broke it.  Won’t connect to WiFi any more.  Plus after the initial free storage you have to pay.  Happier with Nest doorbell.  Links with google home.
title: Prefer Nest with Google Home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Larry Tosi
content: Works great. Awesome video quality. Only problem is I have to charge the battery every two weeks we live in Boston and it’s been cold out. I plan on hooking it up to the old doorbell. I also bought serval flood light cameras they all work on same app.
title: Awesome

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marty
content: Good luck with support!! We have Apple phones, downloaded the app and it keeps kicking us out. We deleated the app as instructed them reinstalled it. The app still kicks us out, fix ur app!! If ring doesn’t respond soon We will return!
title: Good luck operating app with Apple!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ski
content: Takes forever for it to connect when someone comes to the door.  They're leaving by the time I see them! Home is only 1600 square feet so distance should not be an issue. Forced to buy WIFI extender to make it work.
title: Not as advertised. Better products available...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: longiron
content: Wife Acceptance Factor is extremely high. Easy to install and set-up with app. If there is ONE smart home device you should get it's a video doorbell. If you current doorbell is illuminated, then Ring Video Doorbell 2 should connect to your internal ringer with no fuss
title: Easy to Install and Use

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Loren
content: I had a nock off before this. And honestly doesn't seem that much of a difference. Besides cost. It starts recording to late and stops to soon. Needs to be a setting for how long after movement you'd like it to keep recording
title: Wanted it to be so much

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tom Gilles
content: Not as easy to setup as directed by instruction book if you are not real quick with technology. Still having trouble with motion even after placing a wedge behind Ring 2. It picks up passing cars but when I reduce the distance it won't pick up people until they are on the porch at the door. Other than that, it is a good product and once I figure out the proper motion  distance I will be happy as a pig in mud.
title: Finding a proper setup for your installation and location

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rody
content: The Wi-Fi signal is the only thing I can say didn’t really make me happy about this product. Well maybe the monthly subscription plan too. Beside that, the product works great.
title: Best  Wireless DoorBeel option in the market

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Neo Chong Yew
content: barely 7 months into the purchase, my doorbell has broken twice. The first time it just stopped working. I did the drill, charge the battery full and did a hard reset on the black rubber button. Call Ring, and they sent me a replacement. The replacement came and it stopped working barely 2 weeks later. This device is unreliable. It is not autonomous and is relying on the given battery pack, so it shouldn't have failed due to some faulty live power connection. It is also installed in a shelter area. Am still in touch with support, and trying to convince them i am too familiar with the standard troubleshooting drill and it is not working.
title: I am still without a working door bell now

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pat Fowler
content: Liked the product but not the fact you have to purchase a monthly plan of $30/month in order to continue viewing the videos.
title: Doorbell fee

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M Bucks county Pa
content: I am so happy I spent the money for this Ring Video doorbell.  I am using the battery which seems to lasting pretty well without needing a charge.  I do plan to purchase a second battery. It very easy to set up and install.  Plan to buy the chime as well.
title: Great product!! Picks up all activity outside iny front yard

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bkennedy
content: I have a ring pro and it works amazing. But I got a ring 2 for my mom and I’m disappointed.  It doesn’t allow for fine tuning on the motion area like the pro does. If I have known that I wouldn’t have gotten it.  She gets a ton of unwanted warnings simply because u cannot fine tune the details.  I suggest the Pro.
title: Ring 2 I don’t suggest now. Go Ring Pro

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: robert wilke
content: Doorbell notifies like it should.  Motion detector does not work unless you are 6 inches from it.  Spent over a hour on phone with support.  All settings are what they should be.  Customer support eventually said we do not know what else to do.  If motion detection is important do not buy.  Extremely disappointed
title: Motion sensor is the worst

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pf
content: Good product easy to set up and use helps keep an eye on think as a cop I think everyone should get one the picture is good quality and helpful and it’s easier to setup than a full camera system
title: Quality easy and helpful

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeanne Furci Wysocki
content: This doorbell is not picking up any of my deliveries. It will show me going out to get them but stupid thing doesn't work.
title: Don't waste your money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: April Bonner
content: After a break-in I ordered a security system but sill didn’t feel protected. With Ring I can see who is at the door before I answer, can see who is around the property at any time and have a much stronger sense of security. I have been so impressed with the Ring products I purchased more for my home and 2 more as gifts. Super easy install and connection to WiFi, the app is dummy proof.
title: Thrilled with Ring2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tessa Neff
content: Brand new, out of the box and it doesn’t work. Spent 2 hours with customer service and device will not connect. They want me to return the device, wait for that to process, and then mail a new one to me. Here’s the kicker, they are out of stock and won’t have more until mid June! Doesn’t make a lot of sense, brand new device, doesn’t work yet I have to wait that long for a new one?
title: Does not work

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Cynthia
content: I have to admit I wasn’t sure if I would like this but I do. I am comfortable knowing I can see what’s going on outside and I love the updates from my neighbors. This is truly neighborhood watch.
title: Better than an alarm; a picture is proof

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: K For correct answer
content: I do not like the idea have to purchase storage! There should be a way to have Storage link up to my messaging or my Amazon account! At least let me have a ability to have 24 hours or 48 hours of storage!
title: Force you to buy storage

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: vince yates
content: The  ring two is easy to set up and does exactly as described.  The only should know fact is the wi-fi  range is a little short.  My router happens to be near the front door where the ring doorbell is.  While setting it up I was walking around the house and I  quickly fell out of wi-fi range.  The app has a feature to test your router.  Mine fell well within the limits but still wouldn’t reach across the house.  Amazon does sell a  wi-Fi extender designed specifically for the ring doorbell. If your router is not near the doorbell plan on buying one of those.
title: Wi-Fi issue

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: sheffins
content: Someone can ring the door and I get the video 5 minutes later.  Why don't you by the extender you ask?  I did that too - another waste of money.  My family is pretty good at all things tech but this has us stumped. Update 10/31/19 - Kikki and the crew at Amazon fixed the whole thing - works great now!  Excellent service!
title: Updated Doesn't work real time / Now it's fine!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Byron P.
content: Haven't been able to view the camera once... literally not once.. I have a wifi repeater 3 meters from the doorbell with nothing but a wooden door between the Ring and the repeater and still I cant get a video feed... Sure it detects movement but the whole damn point of the thing is to actually feed the video. Not just online, I'd just be happy with locally. . I bought a Echo View in a ring bundle for exactly that, turns out no you cant see your door cam...
title: Sorry, but what a disappointment, doesn't work.....

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: H. V. Devera
content: This is my second ring device.  Loved the first one but wanted the removable battery and I purchased a spare.  That way, I can just switch out the battery, when the one in the device is low.  Very convenient.
title: Ring 2 upgrade

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: J. Beasley
content: I am impressed with the clarity of the video image during the day and at night.  The system is user friendly & easy to install.  The only constructive feedback is the small screw to keep battery cover in place the tool that comes with it does not unscrew it; I had to buy a separate tool from hardware store to do this.
title: The system is user friendly & easy to install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Captain Shelton
content: Installed this at my Brother-in-law's house and they love it. Works great. A little more challenging to install in corners, but we figured it out. Will buy this product from this vendor again.
title: Front Door Security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Amy
content: We are a 2 women household with dogs, but this gives me added security to see my front door 24/7.  Sometimes the "there's someone at your front door" is slow in alerting my phone but could be the WiFi, etc.  The important thing is we have it and it's a great deterrent to thieves.  Many crimes and criminals have been identified/thwarted and caught in my neighborhood with The Ring.
title: Very important device for any household!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chris b.
content: The Ring Video Doorbell 2 works well.  The install was easy.  I even hardwired it.  The video is clear.  There has been no trouble connecting to wifi.  The motion detector works well.  So far, so good!  I did sign up for the monitoring service but it is only $30 for the year.
title: Easy Install, Works well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John Lee
content: I got my order last week so I try to install the software by myself, I have called customer service I find out it was defective so I went to amazon site order a return label and reorder the ring again
title: This ring doorbell is defective

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeff Sillin
content: Pros Easy is install and get set up on your phone CONS Like a lot of the other reviews the video quality is mediocre, motion sensor delay will catch cars driving by but not someone walking quickly past the front of the house.  I did find an Amazon document with recommendations and made those changes but still not happy with the results.  I will give it a week before I decide if I will return it or not.
title: Ok but not sure I would buy or recommend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Luis Hernandez
content: Works great ! Does ask for a subscription after the 30day free trial but... It’s 3$ a monthly or 30$ for a year  for a basic plan. 10$ Monthly Or 100$ a year for premium. It’s still a great price to keep your home and family safe ! I personally got the 30$ a year . I’m happy with my purchase .
title: Worth it!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: luv2read
content: I bought this as a gift. They love it so much that I’m planning on buying one for our house. They are getting another for the back door. It is something that is unfortunately what everyone needs today.
title: Most important

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stephen W
content: Product arrived with a rattle in the main unit.  Called Ring, they didn't indicate there was a problem.  After installation and DRILLING HOLES IN MY HOUSE, product stopped working properly after two days.  30+ second delays between pushing the button and alert on phone or Chime Pro.  Returning all for refund, will not ever buy a product from Ring again.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Honest Consumer
content: Don’t buy this for reliable motion detection. I read all the advice on settings and have tried them all. Lousy for detecting humans entering your property. Will detect cars, flags, etc. I guess if a burglar is stupid enough to ring your doorbell it works.
title: Flawed device.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Taylor Jade
content: I was nervous I wouldn’t be able to set this up or would making some damning mistake. But I follower the instructions and everything seems to be working great. I brought an ac transformer so I could hardwire the doorbell and have continuous monitoring. I totally recommend for better security.
title: Pleasantly surprised

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: PepC Face
content: I’m really disappointed with the amount of hacking I’ve been seeing with this ring product. It’s quite disturbing and the fact that ring is not taken accountability for these incidents are even more disturbing
title: Not secure enough

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: TGriff
content: We really like the product. It domes is a little slow to bring up the live view. It works for us since at our age it takes a while to get to the door.
title: It is helpful to Seniors

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dallas Fischlein
content: Doesn’t stay connected to the internet, takes forever to load and show live video, and just the worst product I’ve gotten when it comes to wanting to feel secure in my home. Go with one else.
title: Sucks

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jmalocu
content: How did I get by without this? Not only does it work like a regular doorbell but you can talk to the person too. I really like that I get an alert when there is motion out front of my house while I’m at work.
title: Works perfectly!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Alina Perez
content: I love the ring 2! Super easy to install did it all myself took me half hour including marrying it to my WiFi. We have a second home and we get notified when with any motion in the front doors (deers and bears). The only negative is I would like it to record more🙁
title: inexpensive security door bell with motion sensor

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: wise1owl
content: I live "in the woods" and this has already been invaluable for notifying us when we have packages delivered, visitors, or (yes the do) the deer graze up to the front porch or the garage at night.  Love the security and seeing the wildlife.
title: Now I know when the deer are grazing in the early morn!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: George Ratliff
content: I just had three packages stolen from my front porch. My Ring doorbell saw who did it. But I cannot see the video. Because I did not sign up to pay the ridiculous monthly subscription fee.  I have thrown this scam piece of junk into the garbage and put up a competitor that does not charge a monthly fee but just saves the video. Such a racket. And all of the Ring Security alerts are absurd and often a bit racist.
title: Don't Buy! They force you to pay subscription to see the video!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Roustabout7
content: Awesome. I caught the trash truck destroying my mailbox. They tried to deny it, but then I got em on the ring doorbell video. BOOM! Also keeps the door to door solicitors away. Just bought a Ring stick up cam.
title: Get this now!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: William Covey Jr
content: Motion detection picks up everything even with a full tilt and lowest settings. Better to upgrade to Ring Pro. Good quality camera. Sound could be better.
title: Good quality. Better et to upgrade to Ring pro

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steve Fontana Sr.
content: This product is fantastic!!! It was VERY easy to install and setup. The battery life is amazing! The first week I owned it I was able to catch the mail carrier pulling some shenanigans. We reported  him to his supervisor who asked if we had any proof. We pulled up the video right in front of him and now the carrier goes out of his way to make sure our mail and packages are delivered right! Wonderful product!! Highly recommended!
title: This product is fantastic!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Andrew Geis
content: This is a really cool tech doorbell. The only thing I do not like is you have to pay for saving videos. I think I would just use Blink cameras instead.
title: 2019 Doorbell for us

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Daniel Lee
content: Once we had installed the Ring Video Doorbell 2, we can't wait to use and see how great is it. This Ring can help us to protect our facility in day and night with the video recording. Specially during the night time and holiday, any motion can be catch and we can receive the alert at the real time. With this Ring Video Doorbell 2, you have the most security around your facility. You can also purchase the Chime to make sure you can hear the doorbell even you don't have your phone with you.
title: The reason to use Ring Video Doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Big D
content: Absolutely must have wherever I live now. I can't preach about this enough to friends and family. Very tiny things can trigger false motion but other than that the ring doorbell, the app, the alexa integration and the ring neighborhood community which allows you to see and post suspicious activities as well as crimes within your surrounding area is amazing. Thanks so much to the ring team for doing all your do.
title: Must have!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MrGizmo
content: Part of the function is this video doorbell is that you can share your videos with neighbors who also you RING.  It appears from looking at these videos that many crooks turn around as soon as they see the doorbell camera.  I highly recommend this.
title: It is a great deterrent for thieves!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jalyn
content: Did not work well for me. I might have gotten a defective one, but the video was sketchy & pixilated and it caught every car that went by no matter how I set the motion control. Ring sent me the Ring Doorbell PRO and that works a LOT better for me. Video good. Motion control, good. My recommendation is to spend the extra $50 & get the Pro model.”
title: Get the PRO instead.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JKG1122
content: Bought this 2 months ago, the battery is already dead.  Should last up to a year and 6 months at the minimum.  Not happy that every 8 weeks I will be needing to charge this.  I wish I did the hard wired one. :(

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ascad
content: I'd been kicking around getting a video doorbell for quite some time. We've LOVED having the Ring Video Doorbell and can't figure out why we didn't do it sooner!
title: Love It!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gabe A
content: This is a decent product. The video quality was 1080P. The app did lag half the time whenever you get a notification. But where they do get you at is you need to buy a subscription after the 30 day trial ends. It will not record/store any videos unless you have a subscription. The video doorbell becomes pointless unless you get a subscription. The battery life was mediocre and lasted only a month then it had to be charged again. I would not recommend this product.
title: You have to pay for a subscription after 30 day trial or else this product is pointless.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Adav19
content: Love this thing! I’ve noticed it’s more sensitive in the afternoon- must be how the sun sets on our house! We have a teen who has had people just come over unannounced so it’s helpful to our parenting hahaha!
title: So useful

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ebw1636
content: There is nothing to dislike. The Ring set up was probably the easiest ever. The folks at Ring seem to have though everything through. The doorbell camera is excellent.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: irish lass
content: Easy to install. Everything but the drill was provided. Instructions easy to follow. Picture quality day or night is unbelievable. Clear and crisp. The range of coverage is more than I had imagined. It even covers the door of my neighbor (who has had some packages stolen). I glad I finally invested in this extra piece of mind.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Leanne
content: Super easy installation and I love the cell phone feature.  The video is so crisp.  I did have to play around with the motion zones and alert settings a bit to adjust how many alerts I got, but the app makes that so easy.  I love this, especially the price!
title: Much better than I could even have hoped for.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ironf
content: This was a breeze to hook into our existing powered doorbell. I especially like that it came with all the tools needed to install it. The motion activation needed me to adjust the direction on the doorbell but that was easy with the included parts.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Michael F.
content: Have already resolved several front door  issues by having the Ring motion on the unit....able to see deliveries being made.  Definitely recommend and their tech support is easy to contact for any technical problems.
title: Completely trustworthy.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ashlie Smith
content: I check it constantly.  The video is great quality. I can see everything that goes on in front of my house whenever I want .Easy installation, the box with all the instructions was very well put together. Even comes with a little tool kit. The app was very user friendly to set up. Wish I bought it sooner. Will be adding the additional cameras soon

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Donald George Sr
content: Ring certainly step up there customer satisfaction game with this doorbell.  The video camera has excellent coverage even if your doorbell is in a location that you think has bad visual angles. The lens is appropriately scoped to fish eye the spectrum of view so there is a wide angle view no matter where your wiring is located on the door frame
title: Any Angle Views

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ringbutt
content: I bought this for my girlfriend. She can't see the front of her house so I thought this would be good security for her. She hated answering the door and not knowing who was out there. She loves it! And I now have piece of mind for her
title: Ring doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Villy
content: Funciona tardío, pasado varios minutos es que avisa que hay alguien delante de la puerta
title: Sería práctico si funcionara a tiempo real

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Val

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

content: I just got my door bell, and I have already recommended it to many of my friends. I’m enjoying the convenience of my ring door bell, and thinking of the other ring products.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

content: First off the image quality is not good very pixelated. It will not show a face clear enough to use if you ever needed to go to the police. The doorbell function works great though. My advice is wait a couple years and hopefully these devices will be dialed in better.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: mrbillsw
content: I have had my Ring 2 for a couple of weeks & really like it. Works great, the images are amazingly clear. How cool is it that you can see people on your porch even if they don’t ring the doorbell. Connects with your smart phone. I decided to add a Ring chime this weekend ( which also works great) for added convenience.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SignoftheTimes
content: This thing works very well. I can check live view at any time. It comes in handy when one is not home. Glad I picked ot up during the black friday deal.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jessica R. M. Williams
content: Does just what I need it to do.  It helps also with me being able to keep an eye on my moms house.  Good product.  Has been reliable.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diana M Castro
content: Ring is wonderful, motion detection and answer as well as the door bell.  Video is decent for a little door bell, you can see a lot and know exactly what is happening at your home and neighborhood.  The neighborhood watch is great, it really does help.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: DieselDave
content: Con:Takes too long to bring up on my smart phone. Person at door is long gone before I can see who it is or talk to them. Pro: If someone steals your package off of your doorstep you will probably have a picture of them.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dawn
content: We have kids that are old enough to start staying by themselves and this just gives us that little extra piece of mind! It was easy to set up, its crystal clear and I love it!! The kids have it on their phones and tablets so they can look also!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: E.P.
content: We like the ring doorbell, easy install and have good visibility through camera. Speaker isnt that great as its hard to hear people on both ends. also the app does have some lag time. but overall we like the camera as we can see who's at our door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kerry M. Polly
content: Set up was easy as was installation. Getting your motion range locked in to where you want is a learning process but overall we are very pleased.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nathan Patrick
content: Had to reset every 3 months because it would quit working.  Called customer support 3 time the after a year and a half it quit working would not go into setup mode.  Got told it was out of warranty.  Screw ring don’t waste your money.  Buy a better product and get a company that will stand behind the product they make

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert W. Cole
content: Came with good instructions and everything needed for install, including tools, screws, etc. Helpful videos are also available. Loved the wedge adaptors as I have a 5 step up front porch and a school across the street. The wedges were perfect! I used them both. Now, just waiting for someone to use it...…. lol.
title: Easy instructions. Easy installation.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Phillip
content: This thing is horrible. Incredibly slow delay time so that by the time someone comes to your door and leaves you'll be lucky if you can glimpse their backs.  Also, the zones are worthless in that I can't get objects within 5-10 feet, but it picks up 30+ feet away.  Forget about using it when it gets dark, which is really why I purchased it.  Save your money..buy something else.
title: This thing is horrible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CindyLynnS
content: Absolutely recommend this! It gives us a piece of mind and we can keep watch on the house while we are away. I love that it can record and the night vision is great. It was pretty easy for my husband to install!
title: Must have!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: brianlatka
content: Love this door bell. Purchased the annual membership and love the neighborhood notifications. Being able to see who is at your door when you are not home is a huge plus. So many who come to my door that I have missed. Great security device for such a small dollar amount
title: A must have!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mbean
content: nice night vision and easy to install,  it would be nice to have an option to use you own storage , a monthly fee for a door bell is kind of over board.
title: have to pay for storage

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brian K
content: So far so good! Had to move our American flag because the wind would set off the motion countless times a day. Other than that I have a hard time believing that the Ring 2 doorbell would only connect to our 2.4 WiFi network. There is a definite delay because of the HD video talking longer to upload then it would if connected to our 5 band. Have had to tweak the motion zones several times through trial and error. Otherwise, seems like a great product and meets my expectations!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lydia Smith
content: Does not work well unless your wifi signal is close to the door. Can not see who was at my door after they leave unless I pay a monthly fee. Don't recommend.
title: Monthly fee if you want to see past motions

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Paterog
content: It was a little bit difficult installing but once we had it up, we loved it.  We also like the neighborhood aspect of it. It certainly does it’s job.
title: Great value!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JimM
content: The Ring2 avoids having to run to the front door every time the doorbell rings.  It also lets us know who is/was at the door so we can decide to engage in a conversation with them or simply ignore their visit.  It also provides for enhanced neighborhood security with its shareable video captures.
title: Call-waiting for doorbells

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S. Silvas
content: Was really surprised how quickly this went in using our old doorbell's wiring. And now it actually dings the original chime inside the house as well as alerting the phone - no need for the additional wifi chime thing. Color and field of view are really good and the alerts are helpful. So far, so good.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AWDV8

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jeff Pfohl
content: Love the additional security around the house. Loved the doorbell so much I ordered 2 spotlight cams. The doorbell cam captured the misdelivery of these new cams. I was able to watch the package get delivered to my neighbor by mistake.  I now have those cams also up and running.  Will be buying 1 more when I can.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Budfish
content: Doesn’t always pick up motion and sometimes picks up vehicles passing by but does a fairly good job for what it’s intended to do. It’s a shame I can’t incorporate it into my home surveillance system but that’s because they want you to pay for their service. Greed will prevent that from ever becoming an option.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mickey M
content: Junk.. Would constantly false ring at all hours. Found to be a common problem on Internet forums. No solution from ring. After two units I gave up.  I went back to old school door bell. Don’t waste your money.
title: Junk!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dorla Clevett
content: We cannot see who is at our front door at all. No windows or peep hole, so this Ring doorbell is perfect!  So many features, can’t praise it enough! We paired it with an Echo show 5 with Alexa so we can be sitting on the couch and see and talk to whoever is at the front door, as well as from our smartphones!
title: So many features, can’t praise it enough!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steve Isenberg
content: ...now it won't connect to my router any more.  2.4 GHZ signal that is literally 6 feet away from where the Ring was ostensibly to go.  I don't think it's a signal issue.  Again, it  paired just fine until I realized the battery was at 26% and removed it to charge.... RMA already in progress.  Maybe I'll wait for the 3rd generation?
title: It worked... until I had to recharge the battery...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: BakerGirl
content: We have 2 and it’s good when it works. Sadly Ring puts out firmware updates that keep the battery from charging when hardwired even in warm weather. Their phone support is useless. We will be looking at alternatives.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Trad
content: i have it set to minimal notifications and i still get an average of one week of battery life. to unscrew, then take about 8hrs to fully charge,  not a fun experience. If I had a chance to do it all over again I'd opt not to.
title: Horrible battery life

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Patricia A Foley
content: Allows you to know what's going on without going out. Some trouble with the Wi-Fi shut up if it's not close. Night visions fabulous. Would be nicer if it would turn on sooner.
title: Keep an eye on the neighborhood expl

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nicholas Rossetti
content: I love my ring doorbell so far! Was easy to install, works with our existing doorbell. The video is great quality and picks up every movement in front of the house. I like the neighbors function on the App. It is wonderful to be able to check in at home at any time. Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KPAmom
content: This is the Best purchase I made in a long time!! I love that when motion is detected around my porch, I get an alert! I can look on my phone and see who it is! Answer or not! It was great over the holidays for when I got a shipment of something I ordered, I knew exactly when it was there!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: SteveDryer
content: I set the range to exclude the road in front of my house.  Yet the ring still records every single car that drives by, and it doesn't record a person until they are right up at my doorstep.  There has been a burglar breaking into cars in my neighborhood, he could easily walk into my driveway and check my cars without the Ring recording him because he wouldn't walk up to my front door.  They need to improve how the motion detection works on this.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Raul r.
content: The reason I am giving this 3 stars is the price and the continuing service fee you have to pay. I think it is ridiculous you spent $200 on this and then you still have to have a monthly subscription to view videos. The ONLY thing you can do with this device if you do not have the subscription is view live feed. They should offer one w internal storage that you can access remotely.  I would not buy this in the first place if I had known.
title: Rip off.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rebecca Liles
content: We are so glad that we bought this!  The installation is very professional and they show you how to use everything.  We feel so much more at ease since getting this device.  Highly recommend!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Bud

Even at the lowest setting, every car that past down my street set of the alarm which became aggravating so I had no choice but to turn off the motion detector and use only the door bell.  I wish there was a lower setting then 5 feet.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Les

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Karin Covely
content: Loved the first one, so purchased a second. These are great! Easy install and now I feel more secure, both doors monitored.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dianne Harrington
content: Called Ring the day  installed it and notified them that it continues to drop the wifi connection even after activating device multiple times. Representative advised me to purchase an internet extender. I installed the internet extender and it still dropped the wifi signal. Totally unreliable. Sent email to company re complaint the first day I installed it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Antina Warrior

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brian Johnson

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: RYAN M. FARRIS
content: I really like my ring doorbell, I can chase people off my doorstep from anywhere!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David H.
content: Provides excellent video quality.  Allows you to share videos.  Records sound with video.  You can respond from your cellphone to someone at your door that was detected by motion sensor or actual ringing of door bell.  Can control sensor distance and area. product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: adam zolnierowicz

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Junior

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mark Walters
content: I received the original and I received a replacement. Would I recommend this to anybody my answer is no no, no. I'm still waiting for my refund.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MomW/KidandDog
content: I love this doorbell! My kids love this doorbell! Love, love!  I installed, not too hard.  I had no front doorbell before this. I got a chime too and an extra battery. I like the choice of two different colors for the face plate (silver and a kind of bronze one) included. I really like the Ring "neighborhood watch" kind of alerts too. Sprung for the annual service too, just like saving the videos, in case.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Linda K
content: So far so good...it detects all motion at the front of the house and love being able to communicate with guests at the door when we are upstairs. product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Diego Young

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kimberly rebello
content: Screen is fish eye but overall very happy with it , I have a blink also but it is really slow to alerting you, the ring seem much faster alerting me , plus I like being able to see other videos and screen shot from other ring devices in neighbors , we found a person that has been lurking around our neighbors .

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Christa Morehead
content: Great product. Love the convenience of being able to see who pulls up at my house when I not at home. Only draw back is having to pay for subscription in order to save videos but the price for that if reasonably affordable.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Landon
content: I’ve had it about a month and it’s been flawless. I went ahead and bought the $30 annual subscription so hopefully no hiccups after the first month.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Shopping for new shoes

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

title: doesn't work that well

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Imad
content: Every thing about it as advertised. Most of the events are logged. But it needs fast internet to work well. One thing i didnt like is when the internet modem is disconnected the camera logs nothing. It seems it does not have an intermediate  saving for events in case the system cannot upload. So i guess this is a negative.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dave Feldstein
content: A great addition! People put it down because they get an alert and there is nothing there! That’s because nothing is there! Once in a while a car or person passing will cause an alert! Check it if nothing is there be happy! Also pair it near your wi- fi after that your good with a good wi- fi! My ring is about 30ft from the wi- fi and not in direct line of site! No problems!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joseph and Anne Sawyer
content: I can't sustain a connection and the notifications are so late because of the 2.4ghz connection. Why not the 5ghz? Don't see why I need to pay so much for the pro just to have the 5ghz. They all should be 5ghz. I can not recommend this product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Suse

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: animal lover
content: We essentially see our entire front year and the street. Another cool thing is, the app is linked to other Rings in the neighborhood. So if they chose to, they can play their motion to the entire network and say "This group of teens just ran through the front yard at midnight."  Or "FYI Coyotes!" and they can share the pics. Really great for the price!
title: LOVE IT!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Duck

You have to buy a plan in order to be nothing more than an expensive push button. Also constantly having to adjust the sensitivity.  Is not consistent on what sets it off. POS.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

They know someone is coming and I dont have to holler at them after they walk away. Would recommend this for anyone who needs that extra time to make it to the door.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Abel

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Aranda Spaw
content: Love the ability to keep watch on the outside, while inside! Easy to install and set up! Works well with Echo show5. Allows for 2 way communication, with person at front door. product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jose Pacheco
content: Good cámara
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ok,Boomer
content: I've had my Ring 2 doorbell installed for more than a month now.  I installed it myself.  I am not young, am not an engineer, am not techie....  but it works perfectly.  I love being able to see who is at my door and to talk with them, even if I'm not home.
title: Works perfectly...  good instructions...  rock steady connection

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

content: Rounded up from 4.5 stars I love this thing For me, it provides some safety. I can check who is at my door wherever you are.

I moved my router closer to the location of the ring but it still doesn't always detect motion in warmer weather.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kirstin Darry

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Arlene Blackwell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: PD

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Fabricio
content: Love the ring! Works perfect and as long as you modify the setting to meet your requirements it works perfect. Highly recommended.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

So, it is important to see what is going on there without dropping a ton of money on a security system. The Ring Doorbell is fantastic as it alerts me within seconds of someone at the door and enables me to see and have conversation with visitor as to their reason for being there. All this for about $200. How can you beat that. The device is wired into the doorbell for a trickle charge but even without the power source, the devices batteries last 6 months. Hard to beat. Very satisfied with this product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

content: Only complaint would be it keeps kicking me into guest mode.  I mean it.  I hate hard looking to reset it to have control. The other thing I detest is having to play for a cloud subscription.  They should have made sd slot for people who don't want their cloud

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: adam treptow

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Darnelle Bosquet-Fleurival

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

I was going to buy the motion lights with the camera for over my garage, but the camera on the Ring has a wide enough angle that I can see my driveway.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Russell L Holmes

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M.S
content: I like the fact that I can be sitting anywhere in my house or sitting anywhere in my car and know who's at my front door or back door or walking in front of my house. This is an awesome product every home owner should have. Thanks to the ring team for making such an unbelievable product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: bdiann57

I have tried the hardwired portion and that isn’t working. I will not recommend or buy another one.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David Ebb
content: This is the perfect product for monitoring my front door. Easy to install. Keep the box and everything that came in it. You will need the included screwdriver to open the unit to recharge the battery or reset it.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Marilyn Schmitt
content: I am very happy with my new Ring doorbell.  It was easy to install and gave options for placement that would ensure the best view possible.  The clarity during the day is very sharp color. product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Susan Thompson
content: There is a huge time delay between when someone is at my door and the alert shows up on my phone. The ring was boxed together as a package deal e with a Schlage electric lock. This would imply capability but We can’t get them to work together
title: The ring2 video bell was packaged together with a Schlage auto lock but they are not compatible

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Oromo

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: hfed
content: Ring's video doorbell is excellent.  It arrived with easy instructions, and I installed mine in about 10 mins.  The app is pretty simple to use, but it could be a bit more robust.  I love being able to see who is at my door no matter where I am, and the 2 way talk features makes it to chase off solicitors and unwelcomed guests.  Worth the money IMO!  Only issue I encountered was my wireless signal, which wasnt strong enough to reach the doorbell, so I had to buy their signal booster, which was another $50.
