product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Meema Vandrie
content: I love the Ring 2. Recently the live view hasn’t picked up. Several times I have Gotten out of the car and made it inside the house before the doorbell goes off. I even purchased the ring chime pro but that didn’t help with extending the WiFi.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: CIA

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gabrielle
content: We love this product, works exactly how we want.  Picture is really clear, and sometimes we have fun scaring some visitors at our door with the speaker!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Edgar

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: maccov
content: This is a great product, battery back up and able to use existing power. Able to see what is going on from my phone anywhere and the yearly cost to maintain is within reason. Will most likely buy another one for my back door

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JBonez

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: MASM

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Chad Hedges

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: E.Rich

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Natalie Hernandez

Battery lasted about 1 month before we had to recharge it.  Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carol Ann Rees

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AKS

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JimboSlice82

Another motion?!?!?!  Hey it's that poodle from down the block! Also it rings the bell, which is a total plus with any doorbell.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mr&Mrs
content: It is so nice to be able to monitor what is going on at our front door and front yard. Amazing photo and video footage for such a small camera.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kelli

I have already recommended the Ring 2 to several friends, especially the great Costco deal that includes the Chime and 1-year of storage.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Col Rick Keeling

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sherry l.
content: I usually can go back and watch to see what was going on, but most times the beginning of the video is cut off and we only see someone walking away. I cannot talk to the person outside and when they talk, I cannot understand them. We have excellent WI-FI so that is not the issue

content: Even though this product is supposed to work with an Android, it does not work with my Samsung Galaxy.  I installed the app on my IPad, and as long as the doorbell was within 25 feet of the iPad, it worked.  Anything further and the doorbell would ring but not alert the pad.
title: Don't Waste Your Money

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KIVAN
content: It’s pretty cool to be able to talk to back to a person standing on your doorstep without even being at home, and the motion sensor is awesome and make you feel safer knowing someone is approaching your doorstep.
title: A most have mo matter what

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: AY
content: I have 5 years old Foscam and night video quality way better. Service personal very friendly but most of the time not helpful. Can’t direct motion from person and a lot of fake motions. I am using as doorbell only. That function work fine.
title: Far not the best product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Peter Rutherford
content: Unit works ocsasionaly. Have had people bring packages right up to the front door and unit never picked them up.  At times unit works fine, others not at all.  I have it hardwired, so no battery issue, and strong wireless signal using a mesh setup. Perhaps a faulty unit, perhaps just not good.
title: Useless

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Tracy with MS
content: My husband installed this and it was pretty easy. It is so cool that I can see people at the door bell but I am having issues with the app. I think that is solely on my end though because my husband has no problem using the app to communicate with people.
title: A must have

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: GBartotti
content: Doorbell is working as advertised. Detection range is set just inside front sidewalk. It some large trucks will still trip the sensor. But that is not a problem, would still recommend the doorbell.
title: Great product.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Milan
content: I love the Ring Doorbell, the WiFi Signal  Signal is not so good. The night vision is horrible, I’ve seen my neighbors video  vision quality at night and it’s perfect and very clear.
title: The best Device for protecting of your safety.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: GaarBear
content: So far the Ring has done everything that was expected and advertised. Easy to install, and setup was a snap. Very satisfied with it.
title: Satisfied Customer.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: 36Bladze
content: Love the ease of installation and set up of the system. My only dislike is not being able to set the sensitivity for cars passing by separate from motion of a person
title: New Ring user, love it so far

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nicholas Moore
content: You’re putting someone else’s camera on your property using their servers. It requires much more trust In the company and product than I have To give it more than 2 stars
title: It’s convenient.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Staci Galey
content: I wanted a doorbell on my garage entrance door, but it wasn't wired. This works off of battery, solving that issue. The sound is great as is the picture. I am very satisfied.
title: Great for unwired doors.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: pomgirl
content: This product is very great, the well know Ring doorbell works wonders. It’s very great for securing your home. 10/10 rating
title: Rate: 10/10 (great camera quality)

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ronald W Lane
content: I have the Doorbell2 and flood light both work well but there is a network lag from when you get a notification and you can see a live view. The other feature I like is the neighbor hood notifications letting you know of suspicious activity. The only real downside is when I go out to work in the yard or take the dogs out and forget to turn off notifications, my phone gets load up with notifications.
title: oorbell2 and flood light

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dkoppy
content: One of the best easiest security systems available.  I can check anytime anywhere,Even if nobody has set it off
title: Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rattyboy
content: Doesn't alert but first few weeks after installation.  Probably an Android issue but I like alerts on the phone.
title: Doesn't alert on Android phones

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Charles D
content: I set this up on the backdoor of a seasonal use house.  It provides a view of the entire back yard. It took maybe 10 minutes to hook up (mostly to read the directions). I was able to connect to the existing bell wires, and am thrilled with having an eye on something I would otherwise not be able to see.  I now have two inside cameras, and this one outside.  I like Ring products and plan to keep adding to the system.
title: Easy set up, amazing quality

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Magic Mike
content: I have the original Ring Doorbell so I bought this one for my son.  He just installed it and loves it.  One thing he did was to purchase a bracket that tilts the Ring towards the street.  He really likes what he can see.
title: Bought as gift

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: stephen
content: Works well. Very wide field of view. Can see clear out a ways. Battery is a great option for easy install. My battery last about 2 weeks before needing a charge, we have a lot of recording happening though with deer in the front yard.
title: Works great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nick Paris
content: I love the picture and the motion detection and notifications. Pretty easy to install and I loved the help that the ring app provided when I had questions. I needed to buy a WiFi extender but other than that I’m very satisfied!
title: Great product

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: KY52
content: It keeps falling offline again and again throughout the day..I do have some other indoor/outdoor wireless cameras which performs much more better however Ring Doorbell 2 performs really poorly..I even bought extender to make the signal stronger but still very very bad...so annoying...I bought it to know when my kids' nannies will open the door or if someone comes in front my home....As I don't live in the US, I can't even return or ask it to be fixed if there is any technical problem...so waste of my money
title: Marketing Trap

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dante
content: So far it works great. I just wish at night I could see things better. But it does the job I purchased it for.
title: Has many features.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stephen J. Harris
content: Was not happy with the units.  Returned the 1st one due to choppy voice communication and listening and speaking through the unit.  Second was no better.  Returned that unit also.
title: Did not work well for me

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ExtendedRoar
content: This is a must have!!! Worth every penny. I highly recommend this with the echo. The ring bell and echo works great together. It's a perfect match made from heaven...
title: Buy Buy Buy Buy Buy!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Courtney
content: Great product but sometimes it doesn’t connect fast enough for me to talk through it to the person at my door. That’s my WiFi problem. I keep reminders in my phone to remind myself to charge it once a week. I forgot a few times and thought it was damaged. That’s my bad. A little delayed but overall, it does be job. No product can be perfect.
title: Great product but sometimes it doesn’t connect fast enough for ...

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: JoanieO
content: Bought 2 of these Camera/doorbells and I’m very happy with them. We had to add booster for our WiFi but now they work fine
title: Love these and they are so easy to install. Everyone should get them

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: NY Shopper
content: Using this camera at our home in Barbados.  Works perfectly.  Able to view anytime, anywhere.  Definitely recommend this item.
title: Definitely recommend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: kermit hicks jr
content: It works great zero issues installing it lets me know when someone is in my driveway everything needed for assembly comes in the box I would suggest buying a 7/32 masonry  drill bit just to have a extra one on hand I got one at Lowe’s for under $5
title: It’s easy to install

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: WaLady
content: The ring is probably the best outdoor camera I’ve owned so far. It has clear photos. Ok sound. I like the fact I can change the range of how far it senses. The night vision is ok but wish there was an option to darken and lighten it like my other cameras. Downfall is it was already scratched before I opened the box maybe because it’s all plastic which I was made to think from the discrimination that is was made from metals and other than plastic.
title: Great camera.. bad packaging

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Steve H
content: Works well. Images are good. My two things wish battery would last a little longer. Lasted about 2 months so maybe my expectations are off. Also not a fan of having a subscription for saving or viewing previous images.
title: Pretty good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Merri H.
content: I love being in the basement and have the capability to answer & see whos on my porch I dislike neighborhood chitchat
title: Great invention

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mr Band
content: Doorbell lacks some the features that that hardwired cameras have and seems to take a while longer to connect video. That said the two way video works well and the battery lasts a decent amount of time even without a solar charger.
title: Great concept, but hardwired models work better.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dale Hemphill
content: This was an easy replacement doorbell install. With the helpful videos, I was able to install this pretty quickly. I am visually disabled and I had no problems with this installation.
title: Legally blind, no problem!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kimberlee
content: I purchased this for my husband as a Christmas gift. Now he likes to send me video footage of myself coming and going from the front door. Yay.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John Stowers III
content: Works great. Battery life depends on your settings but for now it is ok. If we go on vacation for a week, a fully charge battery with minimal settings should last.
title: Good buy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Dec
content: Amazed at how good the cameras are in these things.  They come with every needed to install - they are fairly easy to install.  Finally customer support is pretty good.
title: Second Ring Door Bell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brenda L Feller
content: I thought I would have loved this idea and it would let me know when people are at my door immediately. I have discovered that many times it does not transmit until at least 30 seconds after they have reached my door.
title: Thought I would be more impressed.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Ralph Ferro
content: The screws used to attach the unit to the Base are too short and don’t really bite into anything. I used the self tapping screws and they just about grabbed. It seemed like it would very easy to grab a hold of the door bell and yank it off the the mount.
title: Small Mounting Screws are Insecure

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: r57chevy
content: WORKS OK BUT A LOT OF TIMES PEOPLE ARE ALREADY IN MY HOUSE BEFORE THE MOTION DETECTOR GOES OFF..LITTLE DISAPPOINTING..WELL REALLY A LOT DISAPPOINTING WHEN THAT HAPPENS..
title: WORKS OK

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Fire
content: I’ve had 3 video doorbells and a backer on Kickstarter for one of them and the ring is #1 in all aspects without going into a huge drawn out review just buy it and trust me money well spent. It just works, reliability 10/10
title: Hands down the best video doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: dissatidfied customer
content: I loved this product it gave a sense of security, but what really turned me off is the bait a switch by ring or Amazon hiding the fact that after a brief period you are locked out of being able to view activities of your door ring and holding you hostage until you pay a monthly fee. This should be first a foremost advertised in bold letters when your are purchasing this item, not a sneak attack . All I say shame on you Amazon if you New a hid it and ring for doing this . I would not recommend this product not because it’s usless no but for what comes after.
title: Watch for a hidden cost

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Beth Orta
content: This is the greatest product! I love the motion, the video doorbell and the chimes. The app makes it easy to answer the door without opening it. I love the neighbors app and the support that I received from the ring team!
title: Greatest Product !

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lori Sipes
content: Absolutely love these!! Super easy installation too! I do have to remember to have my phone with me when I go outside though because my alarm goes off. Remember, it records everything in view -- including you 😀
title: Love these!!!! Never want to be without them!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nick Taylor
content: This worked exactly the way I expected. The clarity is great. I didn't have any problems adjusting the motion settings or linking it to my Alexa app.
title: Ring Doorbell 2

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kianah Moore
content: I have been having trouble with the battery not charging. I have the cords connected correctly however, it will not charge. With COVID going on I can not get a hold of anyone at Amazon and I don't believe RING would be responsible however, I may give them a call tomorrow.
title: NOT CHARGING

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: S King
content: I want to give it 5 stars but, as we speak, I can't connect to it to see the "live view". Heck, without a subscription you can't see recorded video. So without live view - what is it except a 200 dollar regular doorbell.
title: Lost a star - hope it doesn't keep being iffy

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rich B.
content: I got this to keep to help monitor my father’s behavior. He has Alzheimer’s so being able to see if he’s leaving the house is great. However, half the time I open the app to see if he’s leaving the premises or just going out to the garage, the video feed won’t connect or it doesn’t pick up his motion.
title: Great when it actually works!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Renee
content: Love the ring doorbell.  Easy to install and very nice picture.  Same price here though as everywhere else.  But if you are a prime member shipping is free
title: Love Ring

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Plastik
content: Its good, every-once in a while I cannot see whose at the door the video never loads. I hope they fix that otherwise the main purpose of the doorbell is defeated.
title: Its good

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Eue
content: This is the best gadget i’ve Purchased in a long time.  This is so much more than a doorbell.  I’m so glad my old doorbell broke so I could stumble onto the whole Ring system!  Since I purchased my Ring doorbell, I also bough my mother in law one and my mom 2 Ring Spotlight cams.  My parents are aging and this spotlight cam is a perfect way for me to check in on them throughout the day when i’m unable to drop by.  It so easy to install and operate.  I did all the installations myself and my elderly parents are able to navigate the app.  So easy!
title: More than a doorbell

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Franchesca Fernandez
content: In loveeeee!!!! The only problem is that sometimes does not active the recoreder when someone is moving fast even though the internet is high speed. I had 100mbs/100mbs and I puechased an extender but nothing seem working properly. But I still love it. I can see everything outside my house from everywhere.
title: Good product, poor connectivity

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: OldDad
content: Returned it. Main reason is the fish-eye lens that is way more distorted that it should be. Also the face plate is very hard to get it off, it doesn't just pop off.
title: Returned It

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Pierre Aubert Espenan
content: I have 100 mbps wifi with a strong signal and a hard wired Ring Door Bell 2 nevertheless the live view only works intermittently.  I have another Ring Door Bell 2 at a different house in a rural area without these problems.  I'll check the wifi router because this appears to be the only difference.
title: Works well part of the time

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kristie Tinsley
content: Love it!!! Covers the whole front yard. Lots of notification options. Ring neighbors let you know what’s going on in the area. I even added an indoor wall outlet chime so my elderly father can hear when someone rings the doorbell. Ring has thought of everything!
title: YOU GOTTA GET A RING DOORBELL!!!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: 1FSTTOY
content: I would definitely recommend it. The motion detection works well but not perfect. It picks up my neighbors walking by but then will sometimes miss the delivery guy dropping off a package right on my porch. It needs the option to record video 24/7.
title: Very cool to be able to talk to guests while away from home

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Joey
content: loses connection to the phone occasionally,, i.e. no longer gets notified via phone- only fix is to uninstall and re-install,, have had to do it twice in 6 months..
title: loses connectivity to the app

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: John Nathaniel
content: My Family & I like it. We were able to see who comes in front of our house. Able to track incoming door packages. The negative comment is I still need to buy chime (not included) for the house. Or I can depend on my smart phone to see who's there.
title: Awesome video doorbell!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Hoff
content: Ring makes Apple's packaging/support look mediocre. Jeez, they provided a drill for stucco. Also, extra screws and multiple mounting plates. Excellent labeling on parts packaging. Also product works great and is really cool.
title: Ring Doorbell: great product, great instructions, tools and extra parts

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: B.B.
content: Got it as a gift for my parents... my dad loves this thing. If i trip the motion sensor he will send me a screenshot from the live video of it, usually accompanied by some dad joke. Nice peace of mind for security of packages and if you go away a lot.
title: Parents love this thing

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Zoe Henderson
content: Brilliant. Detection is spot on, good night vision and super useful.
title: Highly recommend

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kapt Krunch
content: Ring stores video so you can always see you comes close to your front door. Not recommended if you have plants in front of your door that can be moved by the wind. That will set off false alarm movements.
title: Absolutely the best door bell ever

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rosa
content: This bell is great, I can see what is going on at my house all day from my desk and interact as well.  The quality is great and it was very easy to install/set up.  My son and daughter in law have it and so does my sister and we all love it!  Oh and no subscriptions.
title: Love having this!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lewis F.
content: I wish there was a zero star option.  This is the worst product I've ever purchased.  It goes off every time a car drives by the house and it's on the lowest setting.  This drains my battery constantly.  This requires me to remove the security screw, fight to remove the cover which is now cracked and then spend hours without security or a doorbell while the battery charges.  Go and spend $400 on a different system.  It will be cheaper in the long run when you factor in the subscription and additional equipment.  I'm throwing mine in the garbage and considering this a $200 lesson learned.
title: Spend the extra money and by a different system

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Jennifer Callahan
content: I love this product so much. It has a range of settings so you can specify if you would like notification when someone approaches your door or only if they ring. It gives a sense of security for my house but also knowing when and that my packages have been delivered.
title: Great product!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Sledge
content: Don’t buy this overpriced gadget, there are less expensive ways to monitor your front door.  This product is so slow that by the time it senses motion and alerts you, what ever was there is gone. Just by a good motion sensing camera and forget this gadget.
title: Over priced gadget

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ash
content: I have one & loved it so much I got one for my parents. They get a lot of sales people and they have a lot of dogs, so getting up and answering the door a lot was very frustrating for them.
title: Great product & gift

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Gersh
content: Install was very easy and I am over 80 years old.  Hardest part wast cutting out some of the quarter molding wood on the front door to fit  the unit in place.  I had questions and when I called the person gave great instructions and was patient.  I liked that they could see what my Ring doorbell was seeing and advise from that.  It is a relief to know that willing support is available 24/7.
title: Install was very easy and I am over 80 years old

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Indysouth
content: I really enjoy this video door bell.  It works most of the time.  I have found that its detection abilities can be spotty with some motion NOT detected.
title: Peace of Mind

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: David Kamner
content: This thing lasted only a little over a year. Then it stopped working. Customer support was not helpfully, and very rude. I was having intermittent connection issues through the year, and support took no responsibility, and just blamed my WiFi (which I know is not the problem). I would not recommend this to anyone.
title: Stopped working right after warranty expired

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Laura Dabbs
content: Wow! We wasn’t replying the market for home protection but was going to be out of town and wanted to keep an eye on the place. Ring does that for us and has been very helpful.  Not only lets you keep an eye out for intruders but it helps me to know when packages have arrived or when my husband (kids) have made it home. My mail carrier was leaving a package on my porch and I was at work, ring alerted me that there was motion at my house and I was able to talk to our mail carrier and ask her not to leave it because I wouldn’t be home.
title: Money well spent does everything I expected and more!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Rock Chalk
content: With the front door facing north, I've been getting too many false alerts due to sunlight reflecting off passing vehicles. Lack of the option for local storage like my old cam had is another con.
title: Too many false motion alerts

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Lynn Reed
content: very easy to install and seems to be very capable so far- only installed on Christmas so too soon to really give a firm rating
title: very good picture

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carol
content: I LOVE the Ring Doorbell but I have some trouble with the app. I don't think I would ever give it up though. I just bought my second doorbell. I'm just going to spend some time figuring out the problem with the app.
title: Love this

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mrs Link
content: Didn’t realize you need buy a subscription to continue seeing all pictures. Had to make adjusts to get view needed bec of location of bell to door.
title: Works

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: M B
content: I bought this for my parents, they appreciate this kind of thing. Seems pretty unnecessary to me. It was fun to install, comes with a kit of everything you need. Looks cool. Feels durable
title: Idk why anyone needs this but

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Robert m.
content: Great product, having the ability to see and talk to someone before opening the door makes my mother and grandmother feel much safer .
title: I think everyone should have 1

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Oscar Cespedes R
content: I had the first version and I wasn't sure tu buy this newest version... but now it performs as a totally new product. Happy to have it
title: Very good purchase

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: smooth
content: Installation was fairly easy, EXCEPT, if you have a better drill bit, then use it!  The drill bit included with the Ring is inadequate.  Other than that, installation was easy.  Follow the video
title: Easy install, but get a better drill bit!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Earl Ewers
content: I returned the first one because it was a refurbished one and I couldn't get the motion dection working,  returned it and bought a new one and am very happy with it.
title: A++

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Minh Le
content: Simply the best video doorbell camera. The motion detection, quality and fact that it is rechargeable is excellent!
title: The best doorbell camera!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Mike G.
content: Super easy to install, step by step with the app. Connects easily to the echo. No follow on directions for app usage so it’s a figure it out as you go. Kept giving me alerts for motion but it was cars in my neighborhood. Had to figure out how to adjust the motion sensors on my own.
title: Pretty Awesome front door camera

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: The Rafs
content: Very easy to remove / recharge the battery. Video quality is much better Definitely a good deterrent.
title: Huge improvement over the original

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: nancy van zandt
content: This was purchased for my brother's house and he loves it. The installation was easy and so was the setup. The unit arrived on time and packaged as to arrive with no damage.
title: He loves it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Brittany W
content: Don’t buy unless you want to pay $3 / month for the subscription.  After the free 30 day trial, you can’t see the last video.  So unless you are tethered to your phone and catch the ring real time you will not be able to see who was at your door.  (Or if you are slow to answer the ring you will miss it).  I’m returning mine sine it doesn’t at least let you see the last video...  you are hostage to the subscription!
title: Ring is useless without the $3 monthly subscription..  good for Amazon bad for customer experience!

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Stephen Smith
content: Glad I have the Ring doorbell 2 but was missing the security screw to keep battery secure. WiFi is slow even though works well on all other PCs and Android items in my home.
title: Glad I have it but.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Nursetree
content: It’s great. Sometimes it picks up phantoms but it’s reliable. I talked to my wine delivery guy. It worked it great
title: Ring is great

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Kathy Richards

author: Lee

Not that I have tons of visitors, but the speaker has now worked 3 out of 3 times since replacing the battery. Thank you Ring for the customer service. I have now bumped my review up to 2 stars, but not sure I can give higher star rating yet, because of earlier problems.  If Ring performs well for the next 6 mos I will update my star rating. Original Review: HATE HATE HATE the ring doorbell.  Firstly: I just charged the battery 2 days ago, and the battery is low and needing to be recharged again today ... NOTE: no one has even been at my house to ring the bell these past 2 days and the "motion" notifications are off, so why did the battery discharge so quickly?  Secondly: When somebody rings the doorbell, try opening the app and answering your doorbell if you are not in a good wifi area ... forget it.  Thirdly: even with good wifi, I've tried to answer when somebody rings but the speaker will most times not work so the person at my door can't hear me saying "hello".  Out of approximately 6 visitors ringing my doorbell, since my purchase 2 mos ago, this ring doorbell has worked only twice. AND this is my 2nd ring doorbell, because the first one did not work at all and had to be returned!  The ring doorbell has proven to be a complete waste of money.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Grouch92
content: Love it!  I liked my Ring 1, too, but there were some problems with it.  They are gone with the Ring 2.  The image quality is drastically better as you would expect.  But other things, too.  There seems to be much less lag time before the Ring detects something and begins to record.  Live View is much, much fast at this, too. I can now face my Ring 2 toward the street, even though it gets direct afternoon sun.  While there is lens flare, you expect that from any camera pointing into the sun.  The good news is that even with the lens flare, the video is remarkably clear.  Night vision is much better, as well. There seems to be better Motion Zone sensitivity now.  I had to cut the distance to almost nothing in the Ring 1 to avoid trucks setting it off.  Now I can extend the area out much further without getting the false vehicle alerts. Best of all is the removable battery, especially for someone like me who runs it totally on battery power.  While I don't know if it's larger than the one on the Ring 1, it seems like it might be.  And being able to recharge it by just removing the face plate is a real improvement over uninstalling the entire unit to charge it.  Plus, now you can keep a fully charged extra battery on hand to swap out the depleted one. Before you lost any Ring usage while recharging the battery.
title: Upgraded from Ring Original

A delivery man dropped off a box near our front door. Ring recorded a very choppy "figure" that was heavily pixelated which then froze. Audio was recording delivery man scanning the box and other scuffling sounds. Then video came back with the man walking away. The video I'm uploading is our plow guy shoveling the front steps. Notice how you can hear the sounds, but the video freezes. I will be providing a follow-up review if Ring ever fixes this issue. If not, I will keep the rating at 1 star.

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: ROANDER
content: UPDATE TO ORIGINAL REVIEW - 12/1/2017 I can now happily report that my RVD2 is working much better!  The problem seemed to have been due to the Ring Pro Chime needing new firmware.  Once it received new firmware, then the connection to the Ring Doorbell went steady and has remained steady and pretty fast ever since (about 2 weeks now).  I am bumping up my original 1 star score to a 4 star score since it is now working as it should.  I really can't give it a 5 star score as there are still some hangups regarding the product (i.e. - the need to have a Chime Pro in the mix & night vision issues when a porch light is on).  Now that it's working though, I love the peace of mind that it offers.  I would recommend the RVD2, but know going into it that it may not work right off the bat without some troubleshooting involved.  Good luck!  :) Original Review: Simply put, the Ring Video Doorbell 2 has been a piece of junk so far.  I set it up, following all the directions, and out of the box, it's performance is horrible.  Troubleshooting to get it to work has yielded the same results - still not working.  All wireless connections are very good, and my connection speed is 91 Mbps down and 80 Mbps up - there shouldn't be any problems in the connection department.  The issue I'm experiencing is that it sometimes works (about 5% of the time), but most all the time (95%) does not (all aspects - motion, doorbell activation, and live view).  Reading some of the reviews stated that performance improves when adding the Ring Chime Pro, so got that the next day, set it up, and still not working.  Called support and spent an hour with them this morning moving the Ring, disconnecting, connecting, etc... and still doesn't work.  The only thing they could offer was to send me another Ring Chime Pro for more troubleshooting....  How about just getting the Ring Doorbell to work without the Chime Pro??? I'm betting that the new Chime Pro will not work either, so sadly I will likely end up returning both the Ring Video Doorbell 2 and Ring Chime Pro.  Super bummed as I was excited about adding this product to my home.  I will update this review if it does end up working with the new Chime Pro, but still makes me wonder why the Ring VD2 doesn't work by itself??? Anyway, this is just my experience.  If you do decide to try it, I sincerely hope it works out for you!
title: Update to original review

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Helene S.
content: I cannot give this item more than 3 stars even though for the most part it does what it says and works well.  There is one huge issue, though, which is causing the lower review, and I don't know what to do about it. Generally, this works as expected.  As a single woman living alone, it is very reassuring to be able to see who is at the door without opening it, talking to them, and also getting a Live View at any time.  In this regard, I am getting everything I expected.  Sometimes the app is a little slow to load (and I have a very up-to-date phone and great Wi-Fi), but I've managed ok with it. Here's the main problem....this particular item (Ring Video Doorbell 2) does not allow you to adjust sensitivity to "People Only."  This became important early on, because I am woken up at 3:00 - 4:00 a.m. virtually every morning to my neighbor's car headlights swooshing across my porch.  I get an alert on my phone, waking me up, only to find it's his headlights.  Adjusting the zones did no good, because the headlights literally sweep over my whole porch.  In reading online, it seemed there was a way to select "People Only" somewhere in the settings, but alas....that is only for the Doorbell PRO, not the one I have.  In an online chat with a representative at Ring, he basically said I'm out of luck....nothing can be done.  Well, he DID suggest I turn off the motion overnight so I'm not woken up (ummm, do they not think I'd want to be alerted and woken if someone is on my porch at 3:00 a.m.???!!!).  Then he suggested that I adjust the settings so I only get alerted if there is motion for more than one minute.  Seriously...if someone is at my door for 2 SECONDS at 3:00 a.m., I want to be alerted!  I understand that the rep couldn't fix my issue, but I felt the suggestions were a bit asinine.  Better to just say, "I'm so sorry that this can't be fixed" than to suggest I turn off my motion overnight and leave my house vulnerable. I am not sure what I am going to do here.  I could buy the Pro and just take the $200 loss on this item (return window has closed), but honestly I am kind of turned off at the ridiculous suggestions I got from the rep.  I know there are other options out there, other companies.  I just know I can't go much longer being awoken almost every morning to this. If you get this item -- PLEASE make sure you will not have an issue with neighbor's headlights, bugs (yes, they set it off once or twice too), or even the sun and shadows, as you CANNOT adjust for this.  Spend extra $$ for the Pro version, or just go with a different company.
title: Ring doorbell is ok but has a huge flaw, and their customer service had ridiculous suggestions

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Littlestar4
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. With an increase in property crimes in our area, my husband decided to order the Ring Video Doorbell 2, & I am very happy he did.  The Ring2 is a self contained, battery operated doorbell.  No electrician or wiring needed as it runs on a rechargeable battery.  You do have the option of hardwiring it into your electrical system, if you wish.  It also must connect to your in-home Wi-Fi. The Ring 2 has an HD Video Stream.  Placed on our front porch, it gives a view of the entire porch, front yard and the street in front of our home.(See upload)  The picture & video is quite bright and clear, even at night.  he Doorbell works via an app that can be accessed on your cell phone or the computer.  That means that you can still see & talk with  people who come to your home, even if you are not home yourself.  You also choose to be notified if there is motion - for example if the mailman throws a package on your porch.  There is no extra fee to simply have the device & use the app- however, if you want to save or download any of the videos to share with anyone (like the police or a neighborhood watch) then you will need to pay a small monthly(or annual) fee of around $3.  You can build an entire surveillance network with Ring products, if you wish.  They also sell a stick up cam, a floodlight cam, a spotlight cam, in addition to other versions of the doorbell with more features. Through the App there is a "Ring Neighborhood" where others in your area who have Ring products can share videos of people who have been to their home. For example, videos of people who broke into cars or homes.  I am very pleased with this product and we have been using it for over a month.  I suspect it will definitely come in handy when we go on vacation and can see who the "kids" have over while we are gone! lol
title: An excellent addition to your home security

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Carolyn
content: I’m a techie geek. My whole house has cloud cameras, Alexa runs the temp, the garage, speakers, IRobot, etc. I so wanted to love this product, but it is really subpar. Ex: I left a package out yesterday. Motion sensor picked up delivery truck pulling up and then pulling out 5 mins later. Neglected to record human being actually walking to the door, 6” in front of doorbell and grabbing package. Ex2 Doorbell rings. I’m upstairs (next to the high speed router). I pull up the ap so I can see who is there (2 small kids so deciding if it’s worth answering). It literally takes so long to connect to ring.com the person is gone by the time the picture is available. This happens 99% of the time and we have high speed internet with no issues. It’s a cool product when it works, but it’s so rare that I have to give it 1 star, which I rarely do for product ratings.
title: Doesn’t cut it

product: Ring Video Doorbell 2 with HD Video, Motion Activated Alerts, Easy Installation
author: Melrin
content: The doorbell works well and the installation was simple enough. I knocked off a star because the installation could be even easier.  If you have an old doorbell or want to use the existing transformer to power the Ring you must obtain a resistor . Back in the day there were stores where hobbyists bought such things for very little. At one time I had a tool box full of them leftover from projects. Now that store is gone and finding a place that has that resistor for sale isn't easy. There's one available on site for pennies and I ordered it with the Ring doorbell.  The resistor is big and hard to hide once connected.  I've installed a couple of these for others without an issue but as I was installing this one a lead broke off. The remaining piece was too close to allow soldering the wire to it. I had to find a resistor locally and it cost 8 bucks; that's a ridiculous expense Ring could eliminate. They already include a diode, including a resistor as well would cost them pennies and prevent buyers paying ridiculous prices. Other than that the device works as advertised and performs well.
title: Great device, Ring could make installation easier
